title: Chop and Chew
address: 1842 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2J9
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"highlights","name":"Highlights","options":[{"name":"Great cocktails","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Coffee","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Small plates","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Bar on-site","enabled":true},{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Alli Law","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuw2PSSH40kNh4M66-kN3WUUrl90W7IdeUeu3FBxAJmfbw75ml=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in for a late lunch and was so glad to find this place while looking online for a place to eat. The food was so fresh and hot when it came out, we both got poutine and i got the mushroom wings as well. The sever was amazing and so nice asking us about our trip and what we’ve been up to in the city! Great spot for great food and atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfob3VkjJJZVrwjPxdXkXgNASvwCqEbeo7PVA_\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Angie h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK5-Eyg-HKdLqH6Sh0Yu5AouPT5bxsEAkZr27lVeLcEluqhYqm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The staff and service is the highlight of this joint! Sooo lovely and friendly (shoutout to Alexis)! The tropical pineapple-mango beer is a must try if you like fruit sour beer. The portions are huge and fries are superb! Pulled pork was a hit, the burger was alright but best not to expect a regular burger. Mushroom wings were okay but I wouldn’t order again. It’s a bit of an eclectic menu but definitely worth the visit! Be sure to have the fries and gravy in your meal! There’s indoor and outdoor seating but it does get busy, so go early to beat the rush.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi1_JjLDGsJl0cnUonLqE_QhO6fKxqcdKU-Tih\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"YJ K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBPuQFnODlS32_YTAMV0B-4x5XKOmAKQ998gbZqE5DPsuartXYjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chop \u0026 Chew is one of the feel-good restaurants in my neighbourhood. It's a casual hangout, but they serve hearty, homemade foods that are absolutely delicious! Must try their sausage platter,  mushroom wings, and loco moco! Chicken schnitzel and mac\u0026cheese were so good, too. Recommend having a cold slaw as a side to add extra freshness and crunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlsBHL45-LCLvmJP3eU1_Sz7ellkid-3Okj1pS\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We sampled several \"small\" plates on our recent visit to Chop and Chew, most of which would qualify as meals in themselves.  Definitely like the options to mix and match a vaiety of menu items.  Especially liked the beet salad, mac n cheese and the herbaceous chorizo sausage. Only real down side was the very uncomfortable seats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWJEB48YnZlAx-Qooduygs0vs-oyk_5cqXa_UK\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Sally Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0eyDDwZ49vPjmipVMdwmg8FMdCNV5-4V_Kwq3zs9up_IjFIZ5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my 2nd time having dinner at Chop and Chew 2 Friday nights in a row! :D\nThe sausage platter was a must try if you have never been there. Drinks were great too! The service was warm and friendly, price was very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1nerN4azHxRicibg_3A5tVJqHdxvIFz1qeieC\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Scotty Gage","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnx8QAnWBepNPQXpflBV6y0wKk4pj1WiNQlJh7MZJm0bK2ois=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time at Chop and Chew.  First of all, the service was incredible.  The staff was beyond friendly and took great care to share with us the menu, their favorites, and recommendations for the day.  We split the mushroom wings, which were a great way to start.  For dinner, I had the Chop and Chew plate with a brat and the beef Guiness sausage, and they were fantastic.  The homemade slaw was great as well.  My wife had the chicken schnitzel, and it w\nas delish...And to top it off, we had a great conversation with Alexis, learning a little more about Canada and Vancouver.  If you get a chance to stop in, as ask for him...and ask him what makes him Brilliant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDsAC9Q8G1A5x0dGiPRKrtcBi8sNf_ztDyN4Ko\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Veronika S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4Qv4g9Jkf6KRIHVw7FujPaFMxBGsR6W-mLDX333k9R-vMdKvD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my kind of place! Love that they support local partners. Service was awesome. Food and drinks were amazing. Nacho and cheese tower was insane. Not sure if they do this already since I only saw shows on Tuesday nights, but I would love to see an occasional comedy night on a weekend 😉. We will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZtT6JXfFzDXrLBFtimzdXuL2hR4SeW5ZmmYfo\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Mike Plumb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr0v1e8g5LcqnZOR_AM6yTlveusuWHa22G8NP1F9SgGonebTGlxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shayan and the team always treat my buddies and I so nice. We pop by every 2-3 weeks for a meal and a few drinks. Recently, they set up for Oktoberfest at Wildeye Brewing, was solid as usual. Look forward to visiting whenever we can. Keep it up 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN-jQNBGvPViCd0QaSJmnnth-tZsZEH4rDJIsU\u0026fid=0x0:0xed361f21fa92bec6"],"When":"2024-12-2"}]

[{"Name":"MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9H_EQpzod7ZaaejfWXSoeCD7Y0bzBy_7sfgaVVeAPO3j9xIpV1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy laid back environment for an amazing meal. We sat near the fireplace and had the Perogies; Bistro salad; French onion soup and their special, Hungarian Goulash. For dessert we shared the banana bread chocolate pudding served warm with ice cream. Everything was absolutely on point!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM22sHJdAv_DmOI1pFieKaRbts3OX12Qmy7YGMo&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a lovely time here with a few friends! We had the Beef Bourguignon, Mac & Cheese, and Crab Bisque - very tasty! Our server was very attentive and took great care of us! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsU4Ov-C0ZbVsPHq9rJ1bLFEy6mrFfbHe1gK_D&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Craig Weiner, D.C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVq6SWqDBPOR8Lttun3-AOWep_DApMArIEgXjE5ZD3t-AfzEmq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Happened to be walking by exploring off the water bus looking for good food and not overwhelmed by crowds and this fit the bill…it was quant and comfortable…the French onion soup was fabulous and filling to share and the banana bread pudding was unique and delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMH3wGu0YG_p4Yl0gb74yA-xRtgZt_8W8WLR6P3&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Micah Limpin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLhsdN2QmMAoen3ek_Kgx9NIv5ddQAQOYPFxh6MDY3fnkpu6piBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recommend this place to anyone who isnt sure what they want to eat! They almost have everything I wanted to try. A must visit! Our server Anais was great and we felt welcome. She was patient and wonderful server.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP24shA9cGFhrCgzMazRte89qJ51f6ZJy-SFYi_&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"M. A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLCC1RNpkYVL_wmAKVl8CVTBHMM0HswNTdpuCsVi3nWEHRpCVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried "Lobster + Mac & cheese" it was so soft & smooth & delicious.
I also ordered the "tasty chicken" sandwich & it was so yummy...
The staff were sweet, friendly & helpful with a perfect vibe.
We will come back soon to try the other tasty items on the menu !
Thanks for a perfect evening...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIhsKiFQIYU9gdBzOjEHzCgPusWX4RGhm0kaH6&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This has always been my place to go to when I need comfort food,  or when I need hangover food.  They never disappoint.  They have all these specials for lunch, that are reasonably priced.   I always get their onion soup with a side salad and both are my absolute go to when I come here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjmu_FnhoqzErHNj8GRK9dDmKNIcxcRhUj8OuF&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Heather Flynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIvbDOe9V_OREfzdm_L9vZrdO5O-AQQBzx7IMAasjoa_xnHXKr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Don't come here with a large group (more than 4 people). I am really disappointed in my last visit here. I came in with a group of 7 and was told my wait time would be 60 minutes. I waited 60 minutes. I asked the hostess how much longer I could expect to wait and I was told another 60 minutes. Very surprised, I tried to figure out why my wait time increased so much and wasn't given an explanation. I confirmed my name and group size with the hostess and she seemed confused about who I was. My wait time was then changed to 40 minutes. I returned 20 minutes later just to check in and was then told my group had already been seated so I was no longer on the wait list. Umm... What?! Someone who seemed in charge immediately took action and after another 15 minutes we had a table. The food was good but not worth a 95 minute wait. They need to figure out their table waiting system.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Sarmiento","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwRJgSVaaTo-qHosXRCOQi0cqgNL2HZQzFyszXyzzkpD7W8UhzIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The location is excellent if you are visiting North Vancouver. Very good welcome service, onion soup is a very good option, I also recommend the Goulash and for a refreshing sangria or strawberry lemonade.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSW9qHnb2WhbNWCLjxi7YAbZlK87eVJ8sXNGRm&fid=0x0:0x3f8230865e7c7fcf"],"When":"2024-11-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M Ko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3SLRQ7GpEHn44kmQJwvAZOKpGxEPoyKfPiKnR9-KG7sdBVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice happy hour. Food was tasty. Oysters were very fresh and tasty. Cocktail was good. Service was good.

Went there again for Hh last week. Our usual server was nice as usual (sorry, forgot his name). But there was another lady server who had a very bad attitude and didn’t have patience to hear the customer and didn’t know much about the food they served. She’s just terrible!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt0OZ1fMG56cX3NrmjhlTd_2SwUrj19a7ot8TW&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Charlotte Ahern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIPiozrQvoE9VHwHlHplLKf8CwHn2sxLmtNEQA3XBtEU3mCI2D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible evening at Seaside Provisions! Their newly expanded room is absolutely stunning—large, beautifully designed, and with a unique concept where you can build your own charcuterie board. The wine list is extensive, and the staff are incredibly knowledgeable when it comes to pairing recommendations. Sebastian, our host for the evening, went above and beyond to make sure we had a fantastic experience.

The cocktails were top-notch, and the dessert—bread pudding—was a true standout, one of the best I’ve ever had! If you’re visiting, I highly recommend trying the oysters and the wagyu carpaccio. And don’t miss their fancy cheese and meat counter—it’s a high-end foodie experience you won’t want to miss!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfB2iWkxxtSMKUaQEHiddVKyKFCUaauXZR-W-n&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Robin Clements","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9PmsLxITJmMMeaAz28FAyYktWqAc6468HB42trXKaraHdb6JS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for happy hour because of the $1.50 oysters. We ordered 2 dozen oysters and a few other appetizers (mushroom flatbread not pictured but it was delicious). The shrimp cocktail and the brussel sprouts were nothing to write home about, but the burrata salad was incredibly tasty and had me writing down what was in it so I could recreate it at home. The oysters were fresh and full of flavour, exactly what we wanted. The interior of the restaurant was nice but we were sat in a corner so we didn’t get to see much of it. Our waitress also kept trying to upsell us and recommended the most expensive items on the menu which was a little off putting but easy to shrug off. We will definitely be back to try more things on the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOX-Q9gt34kmUcIkZ2uc3BU6Zoo_aRsHTnb-z5p&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Emma F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0dlt8ocxLH7yPca2ojNkGI_PBBfsXKMNtqOXZnh4xc0FK3htC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We absolutely loved the oysters and charcuterie boards. We arrived at happy hour and we're treated to wonderful service. The cocktails were perfectly crafted. We will definitely return again to sample more of the menu.

Did I mention happy hour and extremely well priced?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMKgWWh_Iy4sUbbjLXb3oZ1RZESztp1jPmma6N&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkLPbuR2Lbk_N-PtXNVGF1nDc7UOQmEl0cDxsJheipcOTu3i85=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an INCREDIBLE place for happy hour!  Located within walking distance from the seabus, this lovely establishment went above and beyond to ensure my experience with them was top-notch.  My server Veronica was friendly and attentive, as well as the host/manager who took extra measures to ensure all my needs were met (my friends say Vadim goes above and beyond and deserves a shoutout too!).  I loved that the oysters were all meaty kuushis packed with fresh flavour.  Word of warning to those sensitive to spice: there is a little spicy kick to the cocktail sauce, so be careful when dipping your prawn cocktail!  Super tasty, though, to those who don't mind a flavourful kick to the palate.

Bread pudding I had to send back even though it was recommended as the best.  First time trying this dish as a dessert (closest thing Ive had before this was yorkshire pudding as an entree accomaniment) and I originally wanted the tiramisu, but the hostess mentioned either the chocolate cake/bread pudding stood out more for her personally.  While I loved the non-featured items of the plate like fresh fruit, salted caramel, and vanilla ice cream with the graham cracker crumb bottom, perhaps I'm simply not a fan of "bread pudding" itself so the feature completely turned me off, and that's not the establishment's fault.  Reasons: weird consistency (half cooked/half doughy bread, kinda dry even with salted caramel drizzled on top, mine felt stale but i could be wrong since I have nothing to compare it to) with conflicting infused flavours.  This one had raisins/nuts, and the profile wasn't harmonious with everything going on the plate.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXENBzpBtHj53YXiHsX0WJJIlYpAAxJQiMeOMf&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Chloe MacDonald-Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5zL1-YjQshAAOOXLHLzCgNRwSlewF18GbUfuF6yTdawXHi8nN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"1 star… not best service overall, then server rolled their eyes when we selected a tip. Biggest disappointment was that we came from Burnaby just to have oysters special and they limited us to 6 per table saying they were low. (There were three of us.. can’t imagine a table with more people). And then when we asked if we could have more since it’s the only reason we came, they said no they only had six left, which sounded like a lie. No compassion.

Besides this, delicious food, great aesthetic, great location, has paid parking below! But I wouldn’t go back.

When I go to a restaurant, I go to have a good time not to feel unwelcome just because of feeling disappointment. If a customer feels disappointed, the servers should show empathy and say that they totally understand that we took a whole trip to get here and they’re very sorry that they don’t have any more oysters. Or something along those lines. At least that’s how I treated people when I served and hosted. Instead, I felt like we were in the wrong for being disappointed that we travelled so long just to come to a place that doesn’t have what we want even though it’s a huge part of their restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC_vE8iTZ6mUysa0guReNv21aD-CnpcACPPMtu&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Bryce Bastiaanssen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGTAJckOfugyPlMouHfeWGFBHilkVoxMyQNhFu3i8GXkTovk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best fine dining establishments in North Vancouver, my waitress today was Emily she was brilliant,  service always comes with a smile! And the food is nothing short of delicious, today I had the steak frites cooked to a perfect medium rare, and the mushroom flatbread both dishes were rich with flavour & fresh ingredients, the steak melts in your mouth! 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0c6BCn24HGj8UXR5ozFFLScSsccuh-PcZxug8&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Behrad Mehrabkhani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3gk8QsL1cqJybOR_6cSPf0u6NpcA8PjE7zClAELrYupyJUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Happy Hour on the North Shore! All the food was amazing! Especially the Mushroom flatbread & Oysters! And you have to try the Tres Leches Tirmisu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMx98gdiquZOL_DMRJooQkeFfTpPPgy3im3sk6N&fid=0x0:0x46f34abd8e759908"],"When":"2024-10-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's an amazing brunch place!
It always has a line up so it isn't a secret that they have amazing brunch food that's worth returning for.
The eggs Benny, and milkshake special is always my go to.

If you want to create a sunshine breakfast, get the Old Town Breakfast, with white toast, ham, scrambled eggs, and also order a side of hollandaise sauce and slices of lemons to squeeze juice from(using a butter knife and fork). Mix the juice into the Hollandaise sauce to make it extra tangy, and poor over as shown! Enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx3xrK4RMsCvExdyiiafzDQVNpOhKzN9TnNA2U&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our daughter had a Professional Day, so we were able to go out with my mom for breakfast on a Monday morning. We decided to try out the North Vancouver location of Jam Cafe.

From what I know, other branches of this restaurant tend to be super busy with lineups out the door. Not the case with this one. We walked in and got a table very easily! (Weekends might be a different story) It's a very spacious restaurant with a fun vibe to it; while there was no lineup to get into the restaurant, it was still quite busy inside.

Featured here:
Lavender Latte
Mocha
The Fat Elvis Waffle
Blueberry Hill Pancakes
The Gravy Coops

The Fat Elvis Waffle is supposed to have peanut butter drizzled on top but our daughter isn't a fan of peanut butter. Instead, the restaurant drizzled condensed milk on top. This was at my request as I had searched the menu to see what other ingredients might possibly be used as a substitute for peanut butter. I was very happy that they were able to grant my request.

My jaw dropped when the Blueberry Hill Pancakes arrived. Blueberry Hill? More like Blueberry Mountain! It was a ginormous stack of pancakes!  I managed to get through half the stack. The leftovers lasted us two more breakfasts before they were gone! If you like Blueberry Pancakes I highly recommend the Blueberry Hill Pancakes. These pancakes were not only huge, but they were covered with a very generous portion of blueberries & blueberry sauce. There's a bit of lemon curd on it too, but not quite as much of it as the blueberries. I wouldn't have minded a bit more lemon curd; however, the sparse amount of lemon curd still worked fine for me as it's the blueberries I was more interested in.

Very impressed with this place. We will definitely come back sometime!

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKBFSdvFHzTgFFALhgQoDBn_NycT5297pVc76t&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Kamran Omanian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL11B3eQNiN_WiuE5-Y8UqFZL1hM0CKvPsPJvlQxbhvp6MVUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good service and ambiance. Great menu and choices. The pancakes were good, disn't lije the maple syrup, its mixed and watered down, had to ask for regular syrup. The eggs benny was beautiful but the hollandise sauce was avg and the english muffin was not toasted properly. The Hash was great","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM14AmrPwfmQo76A_2L-wmp1KNwIIAYCXLPWm0F&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Farokh Shahabi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjfr1Pm2FE2FXOzHV8UnUKLm3pbzpn1gGhVfzH6HRc5_1PEQ78=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best brunch I had in Vancouver!

Amazing waffles, eggs Benedict dishs and super tasty hash browns.

Be aware that there’s usually a long queue but it’s worth it!

If I could, I would’ve come every week.

Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzDpSikZbZkpBq-iSPiRiC3_zG5GP7gE0Pwx9_&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Devineah Prasad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXX1DFa9bRk6bvv1_M-orvwe0-273w8OFGry_kkVxXgLnOAtjdI1w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second time in this restaurant and I love it. The place is so nice and clean. They have such cool decorations around the restaurant. The staff here are very nice and friendly. The food is to die for. So delicious. The atmosphere  is really chill and inviting. I would definitely recommend this place. Five out of five.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBRzP_LSGYP5gaGhgjwKCupOSHXD_3c-_NEUwm&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well-run brunch establishment with great food, good vibes and fantastic, knowledgeable service!

The place is relatively new to North Van but has hit the ground running. The portions are surprisingly massive, and I had trouble finishing the Charley bowl I ordered. It was extremely tasty with a number of flavours and textures colliding into what that spikey haired guy calls FLAVOURTOWN.

10/10 will visit again. Perhaps even to slam back 5-10 mimosas and walk around the Shipyards day-drunk, yelling at the common-folk.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhNKrsNhcYWWWga5c9oK9OGlSFBTIVw0ufltBj&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the top breakfast places in the North Shore. I hope they break the string of bad luck for restaurants at their location. The breakfast choices balance between Canadian and Mexican inspired. I had the eggs in purgatory skillet. It was not only physically hot but spicy. Chorizo meatballs and eggs balance the brioche and fresh arugula. I just didn't think the radish enhanced the dish. A small slice of avocado would have been better. The free flowing coffee is good and the staff are really friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOomzQEE82vNcC6j6-Jrce_1Zpwxk0yX_flT3rX&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Veronica N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaEZZcukGThSmHA881UMjlshS09D0BtOAEz9vsdpXKxEW84w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The restaurant was not busy, but the service was very slow and inattentive. While the food tasted good, the portions have significantly decreased. I ordered the Old Town Breakfast, and the portion had shrunk considerably. The kids' pancakes were very small, about the size of three coffee cup lids, and cost $13.99 with unfresh fruit. The quality at Jam Cafe has noticeably declined. However, the Later Tater Bowl was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNV8QzN3JI5GncvOG7gRevgMymjVC1zkbtY7_uX&fid=0x0:0x37a569df1e4b03aa"],"When":"2024-8-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abi Calivoso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPLvX-2NstcSp4j8IcVz8wJlk-gu0sWZ77g8AlvN3EwuAeifKtlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I don’t know how I feel about some of the drinks, they are definitely different but absolutely worth a try! Food wasn’t the best but it was such a fun place to hang out and have cocktails. I’m a little bit upset because on the menu beans and rice costed $4 but my receipt showed $5 so I asked our server and she just said “yeah it’s extra so that’s the price”. I didn’t want to argue with her so I just paid but I was expecting more customer service. Yeah it’s only a buck but it’s kinda false advertising and if I was drunk I wouldn’t have noticed I was mid-charged.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwT5E9-R1JlyqI0U5YOvVxPoNPZKMUL87j4I7X&fid=0x0:0xf141558e0568e0e9"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"tyler lucian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWogBqa6rL9sgKyDx1OmuR92fz0FSDHumfU-E5ddn8jhdcdB4JT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice vibe.  I enjoyed my brunch at Raglans Bistro. I ordered the triple that and it was all great except the toast was a bit over cooked. I would defined be back to try more of the menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWXtr4ss91Zmiw7SC_KdCE865ebs9gwJLvMW7t&fid=0x0:0xf141558e0568e0e9"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend and I ordered the same chicken ancho burrito, but hers fell apart half way through. The burrito was a little too salty as well, but other than that, the experience was great. The beans and chicken in the burrito were super soft, and the size was plenty filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRPqTJFsbp263OeJT3t8mgZ0vuhWjPe8_3Sajj&fid=0x0:0xf141558e0568e0e9"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Pat C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjW7Q6BvlMrbFGVR-zkyEMyM_lm3DYCRYzOo7Wm30x7fS2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At was our first time at Raglan’s Bistro & their colourful patio & sign 🪧 caught our eye. We were so happy that their patio was open & they turned on the heater for us & our pup. I ordered the piña colada 🍍 🥥 🍹 & huevos rancheros with a side of summer sausage. While my husband ordered a burger & she staff accommodated his request to make the order vegan. The food came out quickly & was HOT. 🍽️ the summer sausage caught my eye as soon as the staff brought it out: it was colourful & looked juicy. And after taking a bite: I knew it wasn’t just store-bought/ a ready to cook sausage. It juicy & burst with flavour with each bite, & was so good that I had to ask if it was house-made or a specialty order. One of the staff said it was indeed house-made & took lots of recipe-tweaking. My cocktail was refreshing after finishing up a walk around Mahon Park & felt like I was in a tropical country. 🌴 And my cast iron plate of huevos rancheros was filling, scrumptious & definitely made our stroll worth it. My husband was happy with a full belly with his burger. 🍔

Highly recommend Raglan’s for their friendly staff, colourful & heated patio, & yummy food. 💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-icNJ49hd6iczJBfPJ9d1SQca59BQ7ddM4XE&fid=0x0:0xf141558e0568e0e9"],"When":"2024-2-26"},{"Name":"Mahsa Al","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlnjaaMlHVt2QE6J6dPuqgGlG4byySFGE-wInaKC9mdbYcfG73=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cool place in the north van. It's small but good food and atmosphere. The drinks are top-notch. Loved the blue Hawaiian. The burger is amazing. It's loaded and very tasty. Substituting fries with salad is a little expensive and would've been nice to be mentioned beforehand. It's still very tasty salad. Will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD__L2MhrBD64CE-uxiyFVL1vnXqpd6Of71L3X&fid=0x0:0xf141558e0568e0e9"],"When":"2023-3-14"},{"Name":"L S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7Fs9Zln1Mi6KJj1r9xT5ZY-1fXZdBRHpZUBGr97nnpUmsTNiyFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute spot with friendly service and good food. They also have outside seating for puppies! It felt like a beach spot...except it was raining. The patio is covered with heaters.

I had the chicken sandwich with home fries for brunch with a surf and turf Caesar.

All were tasty!! Caesar was spicy and delicious. Good olives and pickles beans.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMm15aStUkHwN6h38QlUHqtpA7IK0j2ZfzCzA9R&fid=0x0:0xf141558e0568e0e9"],"When":"2023-3-19"},{"Name":"Bethany Walker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFpdnWGyVrQmNfgUU_zW5rW8eeOCcNYpqQ-c1IKCelgeMEDOXS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food tasted good but not how described. I ordered jerk chicken wings and I was genuinely wondering if they used the wrong sauce because they tasted nothing like jerk, just herb and garlic. The cocktails were a little underwhelming and also not quite as described. For example the drink I ordered sounded quite sweet on the menu, but tasted very sour and limey when I got it- no lime was mentioned in the item description. My friend's salad was delicious though and accurate to the menu description.
The atmosphere was fun and the service was good. I think the menu is a little overpriced for what you get though, considering the inaccuracies.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"colin hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRrsmbd1lQgRbO1g8zC3FQJ27fV9dDs0kqmkLcX89oDngiLKV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a grand burger 🍔 yummy thanks so much. The French fries are amazing.
That's some special burger Lolo yummmmmmmm!!!!! Can't wait till I try your pouting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRsXWXkrgaUzT_dwxaZPXI-yfsbZZE8E3v4NnW&fid=0x0:0xf141558e0568e0e9"],"When":"2024-1-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M. A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLCC1RNpkYVL_wmAKVl8CVTBHMM0HswNTdpuCsVi3nWEHRpCVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered Catch burgers with fries & were happy to find another dog friendly nice restaurant with tasty burgers.
The staff were so kind & friendly & asked if our dog needed a water bowl under the sun... Of course, I recommend this place... !👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsZqsdIy-7ogWLdChVXYfQuSVHH1_XZPJ1umR-&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Cindy Ly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzge4iM_AthUe2Y8lEMYg2Y2ExA0fMxlIza7QeGpuo6ooWkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time trying this place out. They had a mix of korean fusion brunch. We went with a total of 4 girls each ordered a different drink to try. Most of the lattes were made very well not overly sweet. Service seemed understaffed. The waitress tried to memorize our order . I did remind her maybe to jot it down because we had a lot of different things.  Some things were missed or wrong but they did give us a free dessert as an apology, which was nice. Overall the steak bulgogi was really well cooked and I would order it again. The yuzu cronut which was free wasn't worth it, texture was overly hard and didn't have much of a yuzu flavor. Forgot to add a must order is the churros. Soft and warm with a dipping caramel.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkchqxH7o_L19kr3BKTx9ZWBFyMydGrn_EGwhy&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Samantha Godin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZxwefvF8-bu-GmtrH0BSkuhWoCtcdh_v6BkVIyeFSHrqf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recommend you stop in for a bite here while you explore everything that North Vancouver has to offer. Love the atmosphere and vibe of this cute little corner restaurant. Food was delicious, had the Belt and my friend had the Salmon bagel, service was quick and friendly. Will definitely be coming back to try their Happy Hour specials as I was tempted by their selection of mimosas and margaritas.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaHMYzh2mwKZbcdBPzlkOIxA5eckpA2FhNiqM&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Rosie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJz4H1tL3T9Bs6UQSB5pP6-85rCn7xVEwV4-7OXBlfK_rocGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for brunch, and I must say the food was delicious. The potato rosti was so good that we had to order a second one. The lemon French toast is so good and filled with delicious berries. The waffle and the chicken was absolutely delicious as well. I will definitely be coming back for other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7CaOtydFCtvDfCgeJFy34VJI7MMOMD4FT8SWH&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Carlos Alberto Navarro Marcos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk-zsb36z0al-aQHdb7Y9u-Rt-YsLWFFlcFf7nB7p_Fi7hq8-cLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best culinary experience I had in Vancouver. This location is convenient with parking close by. Huevos rancheros, chocolate waffles are delicious, highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqXYwU5269K6be4KPrL94ZPkqzqJk_ielqbO5-&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Vivian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5oIohR4fUBBrbBee_LLq3WUW8Q6ENGMJVFgSz8SVr8PH9Ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for brunch on a weekday and it was very easy to make a reservation online. The interior is so chic and clean. Service was great and staff were friendly. They answered our questions on the menu clearly. We got the
-ICED HOJICHA PASSION LATTE
-BLACK SESAME LATTE
-KFC DUTCH BABY BAKED PANCAKE
-SALMON GRAVLAX BAGEL
-CAULIFLOWER BENNY
-PULLED BBQ PORK SHOULDER BENNY

Definitely try to KFC Dutch baby baked pancake, it's unique and taste good. Although the bagel only comes in half, but they were very generous with the smoked salmon so I was pretty full.
Cauliflower benny was very delicious as well. We also ordered their croissants. The hazelnut one was so good! I wish we bought more to take home. We spent more than an hour there and the vibe was just so relaxing. I will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1h8uoGIefGrB77FpJPvYzE2Ov0pr9Fv3mRo1g&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We weren't big fan of Catch 122 when it was still in Gastown, but the quality and service has been really good ever since they moved to North Vancouver. The space is brighter and the food is always on point as well. Definitely one of our favourite brunch spots in the city now!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTZHeRX6MV9qdOR62ytZOoDXeQ9HpfHrDU2hhJ&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"ei thu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzOxHVYADzF2AMZ42zJKG6AVHbpHJoM4wSsT2_XxvbDNzql2br=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommended for the tasty bites! Servers are friendly and courteous. Had pulled pork and steak. Both are soo delicious with great presentation! Their raspberry cuffin is so yummy too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlq4SzYJR9_xFW5w_OVlRw0STvtFkiXg-YPXhX&fid=0x0:0x9e25b86dc6e87aa7"],"When":"2024-9-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nima Rostamzadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHwJC_x7Rv04fBYpiR4SWiKr8ID4g6ADoBVioHxSK21hl4yc8E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Farina a Legna with my family, and it was absolutely amazing! The pizza and pasta were out of this world—easily some of the best we’ve ever had. Every dish was fresh, flavorful, and cooked to perfection. The ambiance was cozy, and the service was excellent.

If you’re looking for authentic Italian food that truly delivers on taste, Farina a Legna is the place to go. Highly recommend it for a fantastic dining experience with family or friends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2c_M_vtDJVavGel1l5bksxI_fd2YCt6Qlh0XV&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Hay Leigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3lw-VM_9NiDkl3P2xmDBrgW_mHw454nMiYrvTPrl44QLhjbc7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a cute little Italian spot in North Vancouver. The service is efficient and friendly. The food is delicious and comes out quick! The only thing I would suggest is add a little more meat to the pasta dishes. The noodle to meat ratio was off, however I’d still eat here again because it was that good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmKXjF4nQ3VVTz28s_mSK8Whg77y3pqpjm2wMy&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Gawain Bonell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUwMjfJSzWyM-oLNRw0j-JkY4pjJMFqh8_CH-Xo5upqys7KYM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Italian restaurant! Excellent service and authentic Italian food! Highly recommend the breakfast pizza and the classic kale salad!

The cappuccino was also spectacular! I had two to myself!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw1yx5CGS0UUhjB8OC4HFexQS89NiwKEcidgqC&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Robin Clements","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9PmsLxITJmMMeaAz28FAyYktWqAc6468HB42trXKaraHdb6JS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute Italian place in Lower Lonsdale. We’ve passed by here several times and it’s always been very busy at dinner time, so we decided to stop here for dinner when I was craving Italian. I absolutely adore the interior, as you can tell a lot of thought went into the decor. We came during happy hour which was a pleasant surprise for us, and the restaurant began to fill up a little while after we sat down. The staff were very helpful with their recommendations, and gave us pleasant conversation. We ordered the two crostinis on the happy hour menu (both were fantastic), the calabrian chili pomodoro mussels, and the ragu di manzo and prosciutto & arugula pizza to share. The pasta and the appetizers were excellent, the pizza left something to be desired. Overall, it was a great Italian dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaN9NCgk9IyHuy69ZPDwSQ7kONfl-D2i5Vqd0z&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"JESSICA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB2i5CpRP7UX8-wv47l2MrFmMz2VuMLPi87EdWVFtliHFbqvwR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall, a wonderful Italian evening.
Pastas were excellent, service was even better. Pizzas were average (we got the bubbles on the crust tho) but toppings were a little lackluster: definitely a two-hand or fold kinda slice as the crust is very droopy. Roasted veg were good but nothing special. Pastas were cooked al dente but the ragu had very little beef. Not pictured is the pesto spaghettoni but it was very good. Tiramisu is really good here!

People have commented on the noise level, but it’s nothing out of the ordinary for an open space like this. Great to see an open kitchen. The dining chairs are a little uncomfortable.

Family style meal price point is excellent: a group of 4 split the $180 of 2 appies, 2 pastas, 2 pizzas and 2 desserts","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0GS5Fo3cO-yJyjGwd4hyMjTph8fAgAKz8q1qC&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-vTKhWcbMf5XfD64Qt0powreK0HFQCwV23NNqzAHWle3btcw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Had read all the positive reviews so had high hopes , got a margherita pizza which was terrible probably had more basil than cheese on it  , also got a finocchiona pizza fennel sausage was good but pizza was nothing special , dough pretty dry . Not sure why they put so much basil on the pizzas almost like they’re trying to hide how little toppings there is","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMcVIhvS1uDUWYe3hjptbGUjS0hVcfowFSHRlG&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Ja Flo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBm3nzgSRkq6cwWE_xrOcxl6duQ0fvvCqmm-vP7hNqgTw7IxU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"nice italian restaurant . came in for lunch .. Erin the hostess was really nice
brock our server was also cool! the birch and cedar fired oven is a hit.. u can really taste in the food ! will definitely come back to try the other pastas","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVlubcyQkw54sX0RhDwSmHjBlc8qi-b1gA2ulJ&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Anna Mitsui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVDTOHxKs3AIz4hkq5uV9Ev3W3K6_JqahuN3bXGAf-mSbBSt0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had really good experience here. My bf doesn’t usually like squid ink pasta but we tried it since the chef Marvin recommended it to us. We absolutely loved it. My bf was surprised how fresh the seafood in this pasta was. I finished all the pasta sauce by dipping the pizza we also ordered. It was too good to be wasted. In addition, all the ppl who work there are very friendly and nice. It’s a very cute place good for a date, girl night, birthday celebration and any kind of occasion. I will definitely go back! You must book a table. This place is always popular and busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwrIF_KUwhsoVBnxWAqIqzTavabqjbBdnbP040&fid=0x0:0x7c183726e6ad9e14"],"When":"2024-3-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fuzzy Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhjGNDhI-RZYgIiVRXnRDEQCiyyP-dsVjb7EhBkcymNr9MvYi0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a small little place,  but definitely a gem.  I have been here a few times for lunch already and they never disappoint.

We had The Crispy Fried Chicken Sandwich, a little bland, extra crispy and they came with a tray of condiments to accommodate.   We also had The Greek Chicken Gyro, which was not my first time,  but it did not disappoint.   Both came with a side,  but we chose fries.  Both lunch meals were $21 each, so not cheap, but for the quality, it was reasonable compared to all the restaurants in the same neighborhood.

Staff was super friendly and very knowledgeable about the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYp7FRhpAcs9yLqmlOuBNm9de5JYADXtLNiNzh&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Chang Wun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXinnRETbtdmwq0G3dzHpocXq4c0y1kT8tCLTmXT5-MPrsCx3WH9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We sat outside the patio, the restaurant is dog friendly, they prepare water and treats for our dog which is really nice. The foods are surprised! All of them taste sooo good! The portion is big and the price is reasonable! Definitely will revisit 💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkYvjCpmvwCretR_zPW5eEekY0ccHfVWsdHKsz&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Dani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBK_VPJmM3HNw92FZJ3qfBOxBY84qgJshYwRUeK3lDNNEfHm0mIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came across this gem on the way to a hike and were pleasantly surprised. The service was very friendly, cute patio and the portion size and value was great.
We can't wait to come back and try the bakings which are made in house.
The angel bread breakfast sandwich was amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzWy5PHh7Wawx7gZgHxJN6HVAFp9iAcizVmevn&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Joe 147","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7qiu1e06TZY7jLmAyImwsWW8IF-0-goWbOUGJ_X4nZEfhrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Make sure to catch the lemonade and the scone. They are insanely good!!

The smoked salmon bagel and the yoghurt were perfect and the service really good! We loved it here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhpmx7sb9TFHU9NwmGpiCTYCFehtZCkZplmR6G&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Tobias Jesso (Goppy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT-U1SeJBIuIfNLgjRTrgvGzFZdyRlfCnLGz-s-BqPh11ZSiZ_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food great, portions fine for my appetite, service ok, and atmosphere a little wanting. Not the best location or space aesthetically. I will come back if I’m in the neighbourhood but I probably would not go out of my way like today.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8wAbKWlwsXf8Y48y_3vrKbsj-3Va5FCDikWs1&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was looking for a place we hadn't yet visited in Lower Lonsdale and chose Kitchen Craft Eatery based on the glowing reviews on Google.  We had the Hoisin Meatloaf Banh Mi and the Greek Chicken Gyro (no photo) with tomato soup. The soup was delicious and served piping hot.   The sandwiches were flavourful and generously portioned.  The key lime pie dessert was creamy and quite luxurious.

Service was very friendly and accommodating as we were allowed to delay our reservation as we were running late.

Would recommend unequivocally!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9SCcRrWnKwny4ekl_WffN63mkMw51xgrMs8rh&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Shane O Connor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxH6u1_tnZCeXgDA6KapqtZ-7t8U483wdPPBanRGYpbIdBxVnw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried the eatery today for the first time today, hidden gem, great service and food, fair price point, being able to bring our pup on the patio was a great bonus! Highly recommend, we will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_1TKP2ltZ1PxBgI4TskiXFigSgtg3Tn5BOztd&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jana Kht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKPys-mtCkm58mY_uPV8uDvmkNSNYLEbVO6k50cRNPJ-wVPXe5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, one of the best places we’ve ever tried in Vancouver, we drive all the way from Burnaby to eat here and it is so worth the drive. Their service is very fast and they have the best Caesar salads in town. Their fries are very crispy and delicious and the big cheese is one of our favourite sandwiches. Atmosphere is great they play good music and on a sunny day. It’s the perfect place to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA45CCGzI66FGCWVz3G9puEtfskosPaZ053KrG&fid=0x0:0x401b742271d8ba4b"],"When":"2024-5-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jakob Doucet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvofelJL9DMQO43NTBLUtMq8yqA9fyytPXRNeiw-nIQnMASg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where do I even start? What a great experience last night at My Cucina. Cipriano, the owner, was great to us. All he cared about was making our experience the best it could be, and he delivered. The food was super fresh and authentic! We started with an assortment of appetizers, and then we all transitioned into pasta for our mains. The liquor prices were super affordable, and all the glasses came chilled. For dessert, the tiramisu on the homemade macaron was unbelievable! I highly recommend you give this place a try; you will not be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWjIrp6vznmNyTvSL8KTFyY7QAFR62dSfZxwGH&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Eliza Sonsini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZcbcldSupxcMDc3nsDOy1_bAWPNf73-QntcdRCZpXaug6Cc0n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at this Italian restaurant and was thoroughly impressed. The food was exceptional, with the burrata and prosciutto salad being particularly amazing and the pesto with pistachios perfectly executed. The portion sizes were generous, providing excellent value for money, and the gelato was both delicious and impressively large. The service was outstanding and truly five-star. While the timing was a bit slower than what you might find in Vancouver, it wasn’t an issue for me but could be a consideration for those accustomed to faster service. Overall, it was a fantastic dining experience that I would highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYR_KyYBMq1nBqtjXRCvGHRq8rAEHRKbXq13Rg&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Chandra Alahari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8t-WPE0jEmdCqsZQMxB7cUZaHP-26VBy6yh9dAb2EW-3AadqJ6g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An excellent place for authentic Italian food. The atmosphere is cozy, and the food is outstanding. The appetizer, pizza, and spaghetti all exceeded my expectations. The service was good too; Mackenzie took great care of us. I would definitely recommend this place if you're interested in trying pure Italian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYA5c69kThz3xTHcZwDAfRcC65m1SpYLcBNryW&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"S C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRMl2YKAAKc7sPmSvGp3PQTTe7EIYxMhTechNTB9PTQolChQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking for a dog friendly spot to eat in North Van after a hike and this was one of the options I had. No regrets with giving them a try. I had a great experience. The staff members were super friendly. Put 2 tables together for us outside and checked up on us. Good pasta with a decent portion size. A generous amount of mussels compared to what you would get at other restaurants. Recommend. If you sit out, no alcohol can be served. They also serve Gelato!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaS_1EiFUJ5R6rb9G9w3bOysOgtFny18FV157J&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Vicki Morrison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5PphYbOEz_S6Y5pjGfVKEpc03pY6JxVEF8aMKHbLyQZAegw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My Aunt and I had a fabulous evening.  We were warmly greeted by the owner.  He assisted us in selecting a lovely robust Italian red wine that paired beautifully with our meal and explained the menu items to us in detail.  I enjoyed the carbonara while my aunt had the tagliette with tomatoes and burrata, both were presented beautifully and very delicious.  We finished off our evening by sharing their scrumptious Tiramisu.  I will definitely return next time I am visiting.   Thanks for a fabulous experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPylP98fHkOaxC2Zk5dguKXpyvzn3yAyVQDvfRw&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Hsieh Karen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhW3l2BNOrcwoWjXM_gL9tH9CdoN7kn3tptRftQsqmOSEcwyY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came for lunch with 2 young children, and one of my boys is allergic to gluten. The staff was very friendly to let us know that they could tailor some dishes to gluten-free. Although it took a while for the dishes to be served, we really enjoyed the dishes.My boys ate lots. We also got a scoop of strawberry Gelato to go.The gelato for sure was the icing on the cake!

If we are around next time, definitely would like to try out other dishes.

*Excuse for the first photo, cause my kids can't wait to dig in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCHKu6JKP0-4R-lhOWgWwXysDs-orMRDaXJPRk&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"David Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYWwbbj5xYvMxtEEq5HNMw_xynPQLHyq4Oq1zkZVKlnUQ0hjx8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite place to have a nice dinner in North Vancouver. My Cucina is owned and operated by a friendly and extremely knowledgeable chef named Razvan. He is a part of the North Vancouver community.  He sources a number of his ingredients from Italy as well.

Everything on the menu is wonderful. On the starter side, we love the bruschetta with mango and prosciutto, and the prosciutto with burata cheese & arugula.

For mains, our kids love the Tagliatelle al Ragu alla Bolognese and the Pizza della Casa (Chef's Pizza). Our kids have allergies to eggs and nuts, and the staff are always outstanding at checking on allergies and preparing dishes in a way that is safe for them.

My personal favorite entrees are Spaghetti alle Cozze (Spaghetti with Mussels, garlic, and white wine), Spaghetti al Pesto con Pomodorini, and the Rigatoni con pesto di Pistacchio e Guanciale. The gnocchi is also fantastic, and the carbonara is a pleasure.

There is now a new lunch special as well.

We love this spot, and come back often. Great food and service, and a local business worth supporting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpEe3FNe9qLSUjj1iwhHIrBVy_DSnYUgMTM7qZ&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIl73j4Tlojzv_ajj1iOCjnMkET0DPwHfRtrMjXlVWUCtjOqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday we went this restaurant. The food we ate was the best. We ate  pizza and pasta. It was so so delicious with deep flavor. It was little bit salty for my husband's pasta and expected thirsty later but he didn't feel thirsty at all until this morning.  When my husband mentioned that his pasta was bit salty and owner made new pasta for him.  We really impressed that owner's kindness and confident for the food that he uses very good ingredient. They don't use salt but uses generous ingredients...
They tried best to please  customer. we felt comfortable and  relax ... atmosphere.  Anyway we all enjoyed happy moments while having lunch there.    We want to go back again...👍🏼👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcndPZMFSAzsoDzgmlozIXS905ks3tlfISqI4h&fid=0x0:0x64c1a3ddeb0f39bb"],"When":"2023-12-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Hals","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU696KwqrdoZHbs7ynk8ZuNFd2SO7217jwpyrunW3i4YMQjsOAkug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is delish

We sat at upstairs bar and had a good view of Vancouver. The bartender was our server and he was so cool and fun.

You are greeted at the restaurant with a glass of bubblies.

Food always rocks here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCt56P8IDKFwlT1IYa_TdnyBlroIEKLTxtxtUq&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Shahrzad Matin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr3Y2zjCIPyX_qS5DOamXBuLhPj_aJnaUF2sdw1Z1ZeFtoSqs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a late lunch there today with my son. We were greeted at the door by a lovely young man who was super kind with a welcoming smile who took us to an accessible yet lovely table(I’m in a wheelchair). Our server Rowen greeted us with a lovely smile. She was super friendly and helped us choose our lunch. Excellent service, excellent food. Thank you joeys for such great food & lovely staff. Thank you Rowen. See you soon 🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdxVcQJZ2giA7GBfhRaQr-3sXnxAhtFycQf1xm&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"S L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV3dRExUU6CcyKh7lSLVNfnclkZ3QvSxHjyu6gjmW4Ii5hPUY7lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you find yourself in North Vancouver, especially on a Friday evening, make sure to visit this fantastic spot.

The tuna poke bowl is a standout—its flavors and textures surpass even some of the poke I've had in Hawaii. The bowl features a delightful mix of fresh vegetables and a perfectly balanced dressing with just the right amount of spice.

The sushi cone, unfortunately, fell short of expectations. It was rather basic and lacked any distinctive flavor or impressive kick. I wouldn’t recommend ordering it; there are better options on the menu to explore.

The steak frites is also worth a try. While it may not be the best steak you've ever had, it's still quite enjoyable. I’d suggest taking advantage of the happy hour deals to get the most value. The combination of stunning views, a vibrant atmosphere, and flavorful food makes this place a must-visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6U9Zz2V_F2eA8QGFJQylJSZSx6_C_LnCUawAL&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Arash Soltani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvZdn7w2EcuTsYXUcwvoMghOqilJEWQUxRYBsGmIcN9ZgXSUy-qg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered sushi and it was great. Staff are so professional. The restaurant’s atmosphere is very welcoming, and the view is amazing. We were also offered complimentary drink while waiting on our reservation. Highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc7PBoEg71lsH1JPIOF4wpi5AvB61_lZR7ucxw&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Shahrzad M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhv00VZcEcvdRA0F_XVDemsk3WIUKEYeyLQgQoMuDyNohRh7lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time ordering thanksgiving meal from a restaurant & Im so glad we gave it a chance. The food was excellent, very easy to put together and it was delicious. There was salad, turkey, veggies, stuffing, dinner rolls, yummy mashed potatoes, cranberry sauce, gravy. For dessert there was apple pie & ice cream. Four of us ate & we have leftovers. Thank you for making our thanksgiving meal a special one. We definitely had more time to spend with family rather than spending hours in the kitchen & Im grateful for that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0m7zcsUwkQa5UImi0GQs3xCitU8hTWp2XFBOO&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Angela McLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhudkUrB5p2Ejn3LOyIJjAZG6TxsisWo6arhMb6j7H0VEcbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great dinner at Joey’s Shipyard in North Vancouver tonight. From the start, they made it special with a welcome drink of bubbles, and later, we were treated to a complimentary Bellini. For appys, we went with the Szechuan chicken lettuce wraps and hibachi wings. For mains, I had the steak and sushi combo, and my husband tried the grilled chicken club—everything was delicious! We finished off with a molten chocolate cake and vanilla ice cream!

Service was top-notch. Our server, Taylor, was super friendly, attentive, and made the whole experience even more enjoyable! The view of downtown Vancouver was also amazing and really added to the ambiance. Overall, it was a wonderful evening, and we will definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDaSxOUDvrIJrQWavgntYdSZeiYbnHWQSI6Bjx&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Jason Brawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGJaU20iM-ZTxKU88Eh8aQ0G6FeQUBkbo4O84nuTWj3KUf3yIR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friday night we headed to Joey for date night, and we’re both happy we did. As with any Joey location we’ve visited before, it’s upscale casual done right. The atmosphere is perfect, with a colour palette, furnishings, music, and lighting that are all on point. As with other Joey restaurants in our experience, they’ve also done an excellent job of choosing great staff – both the hostesses and our server Harrison were excellent.

The food was quite good. We started with the Scallop & Prawn Ceviche, the presentation of which was excellent, and even for someone like me who hates cilantro, it was awfully yummy. I can’t say for sure if the tortilla chips were made fresh in the back, but they sure tasted like it. As far as starters go, this one is a 10.

We followed that by sharing the Chicken Parmesan – not something we’ve ever ordered, and perhaps not as enticing as some of their other offerings, but we simply wanted something different. Despite not being big pasta eaters, we still really enjoyed the dish. Chicken is often overcooked, but they nailed it, and it was juicy and delicious. Nothing fancy or notable here, just a very serviceable version of a classic dish. If this is a dish you’re familiar with, you won’t be disappointed.

We always consider the restroom when rating a restaurant, and for the most part Joey did a great job ensuring it was clean and classy. Our only complaint was the absurdly awkward hand dryers. We both walked out of the restroom at the same time, looked at each other, and our first comment was about how we had to use the dryers from the side instead of how they're meant to be used – from the front. A small thing they could consider fixing.

Overall a wonderful place to enjoy date night, with excellent service, good food, and a great atmosphere for enjoying time and conversation with your favourite human.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6SNv5V8UxuErHGPWC-EBdzfIbGVyVOultsVsi&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Tammy Chapman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrYxMsLPF2oQSLl1MBtNQrD5E2zyZGFxEhs87kRKIYjG64zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Was having dinner with some friends. Our server was really nice and friendly but at times seemed scattered. We sat periodically with empty plates at the table. Two plates would be taken away while the other two remained at the table and the server carried on to other tables. Perhaps the server is new or had to many tables. I've worked in the industry for several years so I understand what it can be like. The one thing I really frown upon is when the server doesn't have their hair tied back especially if its long. Our server was constantly playing with their hair and then placing the guests cutlery in front of them on the table. From a health and safely standard this is a big no no. Quite frankly it's disgusting. I was shocked when our knives were placed on the table two were very dirty, also not to mention it felt like our coffee was dumped into the cups the person who poured the coffee took no care to wipe the cup down. The person who served it probably had no idea. Over all it will be awhile before I come back here. Service is generally good along with the food but there really needs to be some attention to details especially when it comes to service and cleanliness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWzJ1mW86xrcKuSgbGsGxnjEq3vY3TC6PmeDyP&fid=0x0:0xaaf02f9bd527580d"],"When":"2024-8-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jason Gardiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmYfX-ZRJM4SZ0OD4ncBAb9A84dMfn2swh03k68XM6Pw-t1BfE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for food and beverages at The Wallace Shipyards!  It was a beautiful day, we were able to sit outside for an evening dinner and drinks!  🌇

Pizza was delicious and the chicken sandwich was huge!  Squid (calamari) starter was super tasty! 😋

Coconut margarita and Spicy pomegranate margarita were yummy!  The standard beer flight provides an opportunity to taste the full gamut from Cider to Dark!

Wonderful service and we’d return to try more of their deliciousness!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMsbu5xf0IFiHjcCOuCJbXwiqfN7Q9tbgWfesN&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Amanda Melo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNQMePiQGMRneEXwVuk8uIxOkiQDZkYzR38BVNEnOFDAoGofnV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had such an amazing time during the happy hour thanks to the incredible Carlan! Both of my parents are out of town visiting and we came in an awkward timing, but she made sure we were always catered to and happy, with great remarks about the food and drinks menu.

It was such an awesome summer day and we stayed for longer than we anticipated, as the atmosphere was so so good! When times like these happen we are truly appreciative, as it leaves a great feeling of joy that we carried out of the restaurant after -sadly- leaving.

I live in the city and will for sure make this my go to place, thanks again for such a great time to all staff but specially Carlan 🩵","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMknrmCQneRPviggw08vmK0sX5f3g0rA_CRAkVM&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favourite places in Lower Lonsdale to enjoy craft beer with some really tasty food! I had the Margherita Pizza this time with my Hall Pass IPA and it was fantastic! I also love the Fish and Chips and Mac and Cheese here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUTh9zV5e44anEMjlQ_wce3zFpkY2x00FgRcFy&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Veronica Antoine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJofqlNGnGs62PynouEOstsXFhL-drzbOhJf6e0rvYSr1v7-k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time at Tap and Barrel, and it was too good! For myself and a child we were seated quickly without reservations. Great spot out on the patio. The food was great and so were the drinks. Our server Montana was super awesome! She recommended the Korean bbq wings, new fav!
Will definitely be coming by again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxLfEEO9-05r47XkHI5-0xlkd-hMXPcRX-hj3-&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Mahi Mohammadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqC-rZuQ76AwKkD3oY9lIbbPffPrvfajyPTndb0NlfbHCj4Y4W=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this location of Tap & Barrel, and the experience was fantastic! The location is perfect, offering stunning views that really elevate the dining experience. The food and drinks were excellent, with a great selection to suit all tastes. But what truly stood out was the exceptional service from Felipe. Even though we were a large group, he handled everything smoothly, always with a great attitude and a welcoming smile. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great food, drinks, and top-tier service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_-Xqi9oAfOtLLGwr07pcSw92OysGjw8Yytd53&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Spike Luk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVljR41LewaD1cz5kVqUD3bmc9ybJSH00GIF-DrHusS8cKNejJe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We decided to stop here to avoid rush hour over the 2nd narrows bridge.   The patio had a nice view of Vancouver.   The drinks were good.  The deep fried pickles, pizza, and gyoza were perfect snacks!
Overall a good experience and would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzlrEU76XpLIlApCXlVc7vjXQ8OJsHG3U9Abrj&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Gabriel Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFS1ZCZG33rDp5IgotlKkfy57sXzM1DGyM3JqdeNIkzG50bfvE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The service and atmosphere was fine, but the food was terribly inconsistent. The truffle waffle fries were quite bland, while the "crispy" Humboldt squid was extremely salty! Also, I don't think I'll ever make the mistake of paying $18.90 for half a portion of squid and half a portion of fried banana peppers. Phillips "For peach sake" Ale was really good though!

Consider Tap & Barrel Bridges. Better view, better food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyYro639I8wlOLyQTf1O44veSPssHIAGtLko6Y&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Peko Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUdl8sDCcDMw8sE3VD8dOiWiDJcclI64brJOQ78lfRiQFFVay-hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had my dinner around 6:30 PM on Wednesday and loved the pizza, chicken wings, crispy Humboldt squid, and beer. The patio is excellent, and a special thanks to Alyssa for her outstanding and speedy service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrukllvMxqn1KAtjxaj-E_eg6YGF0iAQ7wKTyF&fid=0x0:0xeedb2eaeef11268c"],"When":"2024-6-24"}]
