user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nazli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2aGlD-TZ0FiVGrVu_tf4SQkQQqOxZxh4T-z8wzuYYaFQxKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had an amazing breakfast at Douce Diner! The Denver-inspired dish and Eggs Benny with Avocados were incredibly delicious. The hash browns stood out—lightly fried or grilled, perfectly crispy, and not heavy at all, one type made from freshly grated potatoes.
Every bite had a unique and delightful flavor. Highly recommend for a truly tasty start to your day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxuSbtRBN3gl_hVA3dsQWyzLfT6-ciTCqe566n&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Edward Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJ5t1luJWZ0TXirubqGJZ41s6LG2QmSjyD9Fyi7Z2m-eTjmKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Serviceable (capable and adequate) establishment, with a nice selection of offerings...the food stands a little above 'middle-of-the-pack' in a very competitive market.  Our experience was marred by some misunderstandings placing our orders, but it was rectified in the end.   The food was enjoyable, plated in a pleasing manner, and I can see why they have positive reviews, but not what I would consider noteworthy.

Would we return?  If we were in the area, perhaps, but would not go out of our way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjgyTfQYXt95QTALsO1uo2a-wSiknGkFNAUzCo&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Kayte Lawrence","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDiMEOTVmCK9krDKP9rBBt4qUkjON4zCJHeEO8GB93YfpY3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place for breakfast. They have gluten free buns, so they're able to make GF breakfast sandwiches, which was a huge bonus for me. Food was excellent, staff were great, and the tea was actually really good tea! I had English breakfast tea, expecting the usual red rose garbage, but instead, they had really nice organic tea that had colour and flavour! I'll definitely be going back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHXwGq4nPs53vqmegD08K2Ml9AZTLL5BmCwT-d&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"SMF","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILHGy5XoEayVUsxXvSpofvuoFCeG7cVMRInUa4z3aBM9ALrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got to visit (the highly recommended) Douce Diner and loved everything about it. Their legendary buttermilk biscuits are incredible and everything else we ate was excellent and high quality. Love that it's all organic and seasonal. The decor is a classic retro vibe with character and the staff is lovely. Between the food and ambience, Douce Diner leaves you with a warm and cozy familiar feeling that will make you want to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNobfSJMZ2MOVk4zgROZ5wmhsBhRKIdCkPhl4xg&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited DOUCE for breakfast on a Saturday morning around 9 AM, and we were pleasantly surprised to find no wait. The food was absolutely awesome—delicious and satisfying, with generous portions that offered great value for the price. The service was good, and the atmosphere was warm and inviting, making for a perfect start to the day. Overall, a wonderful experience at a fair price. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP24U8-DNYxaB91SHsWYSb-sP6yXBs6ueTUqhpm&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Hye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULQQSi1mhNFty7n8ZPesKkMpD31jiIGazltx_wRmE-swaOwr4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had been pretty curious about this retro diner-style brunch restaurant for quite a while and finally got a chance to drop in. The place was quite a bit smaller than it looks in the photos.

We ordered the “Pastrami Hash,” which was the special of the day—don’t remember the exact name—and the “Breakfast Sammy with Avocado.” Both dishes were good, but in terms of taste, they didn’t stand out like at many other brunch places. We also wished the dishes had included more veggies. The portion sizes were decent—not too small or too big, which I liked. The service was very casual but helpful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrDgVlai20RpylcIr4YOx_dcHyp_ifWLk2E88&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Mehrnoosh Hadizadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKH8DmjlmAEMzEGUkWBQ2W9ZBtrP4ocUpsC3AgGIY-Jiy-R6o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently returned to this place for brunch, excited to indulge in their famous French toast, as I had done on my previous visit. Unfortunately, my experience this time fell short of expectations.

Upon ordering the French toast, I was looking forward to the delightful combination of flavors, particularly the berries that were mentioned in the menu. However, I was disappointed to find out that they had run out of berries, and no one informed me before I placed my order. Instead, what arrived at my table was just the French toast topped with cream, lacking the vibrant and refreshing touch that the berries would have provided.

While the French toast itself was delicious, the absence of the berries made the dish feel incomplete and less satisfying. I had hoped for a more balanced and flavorful experience, so it was disheartening to miss out on that.

Overall, my second visit was not as enjoyable as the first. I understand that items can run out, but better communication would have been appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1PHK9gO0C4LVljdmQwWRJvefYRaB4gYSypVU&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"MG_FXV","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiigFyUNoiwP5bHSXlNRrOpnatj6VSziAvS6zd1X48n-qBzP4n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little place. Felt really like a diner... Where everyone goes to. We were able to finish everything on the plate... That's how good it was. I don't mind driving here for the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO_m_NjJ-fRXqCPE57-Rsa2jtPHO5fMSGwBQBJ&fid=0x0:0xa142e6cb6d2265ae"],"When":"2024-10-11"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Johnson Hsin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJod1Ky8nWyo6bJwD11XbmtXok3a518fIFRBw8HjqKKYlhXqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place to hang out. The Bomba shrimp tasted great with the bread. Both the Gull \u0026 Animal burger were great. The pork ribs was a bit salty and dry. The Greek yogurt with the ribs made it dryer, probably best to combine this with something lighter or saucy. Overall great place ro relax near the Quay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN47awmP3_YGaNvg4fqZvFRZMqRTwuZyd7_YsOL\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It will always be The Rusty Gull to me.  Great place.  Been several times and the service is always great.  Love the back deck on a sunny day.  Have the burger every time.  Because it is so good.  Can get busy, but worth the wait.  Local Legend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcHS0LCerWB7gDJdKLIP2dxtUzhB0EzuQxDKjL\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2024-1-20"},{"Name":"chris wealick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeKvENecQP2KeLHl2OqHcUdxcTy1qia7vM0WLOtVD3QxaKcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An amazing atmosphere with wonderful wait staff and a kitchen that more than knocks it out of the park time and time again. The chef takes extreme pride in their work and butchers all meat in house making the steaks, both the delmonico ribeye and zabaton some of the best I've eaten in my life! You can't beat the price to taste performance on any of the meals at the gull, from the burgers and chicken sandos all the way to the steak and salmon mains. Absolutely delicious every time! 🤤","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl84y9HtALu2-AZvGkufU6S-1ALbDk6et7ogQ8\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Armin Mizani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYst5VL5xb0VXtedJ9A5mAFzLXBgAIqu8FXBvv1LpyGMAzLbLO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing, especially the Gull Burger!\n\nFriendly staff, great service, liked almost everything I’ve tried on the menu and I’ve been here quite a few times. Really like the drinks as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwcDLl2llCRg0Yhu-61vVk2BvAjuPvMvr8pEO-6UJ2zh-0_1gy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great spot and definitely one that we recommend to friends and family when they visit. We've been here a few times and I only remembered to take photos once before eating.  We love their Pork Belly Nugz, Steak \u0026 Potatoes, The Gull Style Burger,  and if you are considering dessert, definitely try their Birdie Bar! It's SO Good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrCLkZLAJjpDUdVttJoOTQzM61cgd3A35bChwd\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2023-4-21"},{"Name":"Talid Jalbout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXaUeHBH7AVJdkjB_vmutMGnZKiS_gwPrWTjeXNr8SoSvPSvNMCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy interior, local beers, friendly service and most importantly... Delicious food! The burgers are ground inhouse, so the beef paddy isn't scorched to death. Comes to you a little pink and mouth watering juicy! Highly recommended stop. One thing to note, they also do some seriously good cocktails, the bartender knows what they are doing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIBL1uGBiKjYDZRSii569V3zCcniJpvRuZ60ND\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2022-4-25"},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised by this place! It doesn’t look like much from the outside, but once you step in, it’s much more lively. I think they’ve recently updated their menu with more local and higher-quality options, and the food is actually pretty good. Their wine list is solid too. Definitely recommend checking it out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Dropped by here on Wednesday night and it was quite busy. It looked like they had a free beer with a burger. We didn’t have the burger but it did look really good. We shared two appetizers and they were really excellent. This is a nice local establishment and used to be a very well known pub. I don’t know if I would call it a pub as much anymore because it has been quite modernized and the menu isn’t your regular pub fare. The service was excellent and the wine list had great options. You can also get off sales. Definitely worth checking out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2hI4hCDzC2HTArb6fVXJhU17GfVBEeT3G10oQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xf6fb0203a92213eb"],"When":"2023-4-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ronald F.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfsVcRI7BpIjuooS8UbIVDIvWFBIiILIgqvCpWDbg_S_TALw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used a groupon - Deluxe Date Night + Wine for TWO.
0.5L of wine, 1 appetizer, 1 dessert, 2 entrees.

We didn't drink alcohol so we were offered a mocktail each.  Our friend who went the week before was offered 2 mocktails each, additional appetizer, additional dessert.

So for value, it was poor.

Food:
blackened creole chicken breast - overcooked, dry, hard as a rubber sole, pretty salty.  0/10
Steelhead salmon - steelhead are trout, not salmon. It was overcooked, but less dry than the chicken. 6.5/10
Wagyu carpaccio - all the accompaniments overwhelmed the taste of the raw beef. I could only taste the arugula, capers, mayonnaise, toast, and none of the beef. It's okay. 5/10
Creme brulee - French macron was hard and not tasty. The sugar had an off taste. The creme was brown - due to gingerbread being mixed in. Overly sweet.  3/10.
Seasonal mocktail - tasted strongly of cinnamon, with some fruits mixed in, that's all I can say. Cinnamon was not listed on the menu as an ingredient. 1/10.

Pretty disappointed. Service was mediocre. Food was bad. Value was terrible. I probably wouldn't come back even if the meal was free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2a56UoP4duG124CriKe_SvNz-PNfZGUaiG7_S&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Brenda Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAtWERG6b8Dr_KgsnfDrxwX3wtjwE5xBesQ1Bq1-CobeE2TmKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited this restaurant to celebrate my husband’s birthday. The food (we ordered prim rib special and sable fish)was outstanding, and the service exceeded our expectations. Ji was exceptionally knowledgeable and friendly, providing a memorable experience. We look forward to returning in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGGwr_zCQ3WxAudfRdMPSu3ZKY1Etf83D4vUQX&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid Happy Hour at The Lobby. Good selection of drinks and food. Fish taco was tasty - ask them to pan fry the fish if you'd rather not have deep fried. And the cauliflower was good and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTEZrKBNCOfVVDWCT3MycQpdvaf-iEMwr39cyk&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Pam Delfino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVou97WNj_X-lZ_I6WAUZr7ELzzqVVEd-LYy7ydp9dEDslErRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty food and amazing service always! Loved the gyoza and garlic parm fries! So glad my friend introduced me to this place! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5ehC_IRQ6Ioy0hWn9_-y3mOpeetIC-FaTyA0c&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Kunal Seth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWdDRAcDowkwjEZaJvFCyiv0CIEY7JSPh_sU8un3Er3D5lhx4K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Not super impressed by this restaurant. The service is pretty okay and the food portions were pretty small too. The cost for the food is not worth it too, i would rather just eat on a restaurant on the pier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIxFy6LGrCZaqNuf51PYrKb74o9OYjWaSepHzL&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update May, 2024 Mother's Day Three Course Dinner
We tried everything on the menu except the spinach salad.  The highlights were the cauliflower and truffle veloute, the prime rib and the desserts.  All were outstanding.  The ahi tuna carpaccio and Haida Gwaii halibut were also very good.  The Fraser Valley duck was just okay, one of the two pieces of breast was a little rubbery and the portion was on the small side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN6spTkF9hx-9ZuIXjaCW5yh7VrwYW2vn_wrnaY&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Max Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbjiegI59Eg59ykUflDHPD8_pJMJrbDl5s3kDw0SKQb1p-y1Q-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went to The Lobby Restaurant for Christmas dinner, and they did not disappoint. We needed to make a reservation beforehand as the restaurant was very busy. We had a private room to have dinner in, which was pleasant, although it was right near a footpath and the room had big windows, so it wasn't very private. The waitress was lovely and was a great caterer, but she did seem quite stressed, perhaps because it was a busy night. The food took a while to come but it was delicious. There was a lot of flavour in every bite. However, it might be best not to come with kids, as the food options were not very kid friendly (raw meat). For starters, I had the Wagyu Beef Carpaccio, which was delicious, and my first taste of raw beef. As for the main, I had the Fraser Valley Turkey. It was a bit dry but still very tasty and filling. As for the dessert, I ordered the Eggnog Cheesecake, which was tasty but very rich. Besides the cost of everything, this was a very memorable Christmas dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlFCzvlrOraCXqJtJF_dYQ-ONfZUF_EFu8YWAk&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2023-4-28"},{"Name":"Kenie m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWD9U_h9zKo_74t3zs1PioW-fQ_pHhruLiklqu2BECKyj1_UD-UKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredible food of the highest standard, artfully presented in a stunning environment. The meals were excellent, and each of the drinks served was a unique and original piece of art in its own right. You have our utmost gratitude for helping to ensure that this year's celebration of our anniversary will be lovingly recollected by every one of our cherished friends and family members!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUxEL3FJLBsLNL9WuvVF20MB8Mh3z0UQ2RatNI&fid=0x0:0x909b21f1647df7ab"],"When":"2022-11-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Irina Alekhina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6x8p_OkHudd_XUBJYc1UMgIsB8-Nia6M8JzVExMtP3qQuCWWs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fishworks is a seafood lover’s paradise! Their Caesar is hands down the best I’ve ever had, perfectly balanced and absolutely refreshing. The oysters? Unbelievably fresh—delivered to the restaurant while we were eating! You can’t get fresher than that.

We ordered the seafood tower, and WOW—it was massive, beautifully presented, and every bite was delicious. From the lobster to the prawns to the crab legs, everything was perfectly prepared. To top it all off, the prices were surprisingly affordable for such top-quality seafood.

Strongly, strongly recommended for anyone craving amazing seafood. I’ll be coming back as often as I can! Many, many well-deserved 5 stars! 🌟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOPoCQjEnyqcfr1xGPgwf5aZ6B028VDEF8oIah&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Natasha D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIlLnFPz3t1q9O7Ia-zG2_ArrxoRq3glAYLEtYSBG9z6TabA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Phenomenal food and service. My husband and I went today for happy hour/dinner and I would go back a million times. From the moment we walked in until we left it was great. Everything I tried was amazing( espresso martini, scallops, grilled octopus, halibut dinner and even the brownie for dessert). My husband had oysters, and a seafood tower. I will be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdWMiNhe01IQCmkoWfoN5LKobXYJY2k7xf1bU3&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Megan Pellouchoud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMYmm_V8nptM-L_I3XJs5khn1ELKI3ygzBaBUREs0CKOj_49d87Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best restaurant of our entire trip through Canada and Alaska. Stopped here with the family for dinner and had the best oysters we’ve ever tasted. Each dish was delicious and was beyond expectation. Menu was diverse and unique as well as fairly priced. In addition to amazing food, we had some of the best service (especially at the bar with Tom) we ever experienced in a restaurant. We left super satisfied and happy. Thank you for such an enjoyable experience that we all won’t forget. We will be visiting again when we stop in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNymYjmPS3Lr1Q6PULCfyZauknXv4kog2bUCKFg&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Nelia Lepska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvZEzOn9nFTIevpRLHoVme5AkaqZWbvxUCu0rLegZigTHPfYfh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Cozy and gentle atmosphere.
I really liked the compliment from the restaurant in the form of warm bread and something similar to hummus for it.
I recommend the incredibly delicious fried octopus and the sea tower.

But the whole impression was spoiled by the unpolite service.
When I came at 5 pm I did not have a table reserved, but we were offered to sit for half an hour. After 40 minutes the girl said that the reservation was cancelled and you can be there for an unlimited time - we were delighted. Around 6:10 pm our waiter comes and warns that we must vacate the table at 6:40 pm, but they will save a place at the bar for us.
As a result, we were brazenly kicked out around 7:20-7:30 pm and there were no more places at the bar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUcp_1bQ2chiqrN7MwEdqv76lLVE-owQOb8385&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fish and chips was tasty, great pieces of halibut! They provided aoli instead of tartar sauce though, that wasn't ideal, but the rest was amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP31odkhdfFzUP_5Ee8uyqMZc0yLSTzbdh27mFv&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"S G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcO4F0zv_pOHr7IJrYIR3lyZcfY64r6fuPT5erJ2F6pMwsiDAD-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food, great ambiance, fair pricing, hospitable service - what's not to like?

Enjoyed the delicious food and the treatment. A real gem in North Van!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQxZXFVZOSAt__AZqOMpp95CasceCMhdLtOxwR&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Paul Rondeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWud2O79gqkHkgkw8XLlTly4855w4zQuECqNb6Iq_cxHMS3y4p-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The quality of the food and seafood here is amazing but the portions are very small especially for the price. I would avoid the appetizers due to the small portions as it was tough to share them… the main dishes were great. Staff were friendly but stressed out and was on the slow side for service. I’m not sure if I would return or not.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4pL29szvg3U1ZbxhLYhYYwW3rv4WWgaVcAn49&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not often that I am served a dinner with a couple of misses and I want to return. Fishworks was almost full on the blustery Monday evening, a sign that good things are happening in the restaurant. Staff we encountered welcomed us with friendly greetings and offered a comfortable table in a quiet corner. I enjoyed the room's simple design, featuring tasteful wall art that reflects this North Vancouver neighbourhood. The menu is focused on sustainable seafood but includes a number of selections for diners who prefer food raised on land.

The young server was quick and attentive. My partner enjoyed Hokkaido Scallops with squash tortellini, sage butter sauce, and toasted walnuts. Scallops are easily overcooked but these shellfish well prepared. I had Sockeye Salmon Wellington and while the salmon was well cooked, the phyllo pastry was roasted beyond flaky. It was like a hard cracker. Overall though, the dinner was worthwhile.

Dessert was also mixed. Partner enjoyed crème caramel but the meringue in my Strawberry Pavlova was inedible. Undissolved sugar gave it the taste and mouthfeel of a sugar cube. When I indicated dissatisfaction, an alternative dessert was offered and the Pavlova was removed from our bill. The server and the manager responded to my remarks in a thoroughly professional manner. Flaws happen in restaurants but the strength of a dining room is determined by how well the staff responds. Fishworks did that well. We will not hesitate to return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMteKlvYqdtxie71RCWe05mczGG2Ifdi3PQ_VGW&fid=0x0:0xfd5d9cc981c7faad"],"When":"2024-11-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great addition to the Shipyards! I wish there were more restaurants like this on the North Shore, as it really makes a difference having good places to eat that aren’t chains like Joeys or Browns. The pizza is always delicious, and they're very accommodating with vegan and vegetarian options—even if it's not on the menu, just ask and they'll make it happen. They're especially vegan-friendly and will make you a vegan pasta or pizza on request. There’s often a table available for walk-ins, but I’d recommend booking ahead as it can get really busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx9KAjBDTBb-oPd_WJDi3v2mxMbwKq-g4YtWH1&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"E J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrvh4CbdP6FQQxMyj7Ing9kTE03rzh86JIpgFN_ZRhysfntmzi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had great time at Nook it feels like only real restaurant in the shipyards compared to the rest of the corporate style restaurants near by, even though there are other nook locations here the feel at this location was like real mom and pop shop the vibe was banging.👍

The interior is so real, like I didn't expect it to be so cozy it felt like it had been lived in.

We had the whipped riccotta crostini, and it was so lovey like a desert that it reminded me of hazelnut spread with hints of black pepper. I wouldn't have mind having that for dessert ⭐️

I had the rigatoni Boscaiola pasta
but vegetarian and it was delicious& filling like mushrooms strongnoff⭐️

A lot of the dishes can be turned vegetarian if need be, and some were vegetarian.

Overall, I had a wonderful time and will 100% comeback⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEWFdhXSPuqeUSZhyISlLO5jpoOpKmoOizImW2&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Natasha Saad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKW4dh24mm5y4pHYMYocKp_hB3Ox1oqdBtXipFwNFr8CcQYbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good pasta and pizza. Italian comfort food was so delicious, cozy atmosphere and excellent service. Great selection of beer on tap and fantastic cocktails. Love the add-ons like burrata, or eggs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTFiSLME-fk10Rih6k4Fqzn9s8GXiqFRaPuu3Z&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Kelly Dame","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdmskNmGZiKdnAju8r_NhxeNcbwmaYFJcZ1fSl-C4TXt9hptg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My Friend and I ate at this restaurant today for happy hour and we had a fantastic experience! We had the meatballs which were amazing! They  melted in your mouth with a beautiful tomatoe sauce with lots of cheese.
We also had the Caesar salad which was also delicious!! It had so much flavor and again they were generous with the cheese!
The service was impeccable, really couldn’t have asked for a better experience, and all with a beautiful view!
Definitely will return!❤️❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"October 12, 2024: we had to go back for the wonderful pizza for lunch on Saturday and once again enjoyed the great view on the patio, and wonderful service from Chris and Justine. Thank you!

October 5, 2024: My family has been to Nook a few times and I finally had a chance to join them. Now I know why they love it so much!

We sat outside - I was a bit worried it would be too chilly but with the heaters and blankets I felt toasty warm. It was so nice being out in the open with the beautiful view of the area!

The food was excellent! We ordered Spaghetti Bolognese, Rigatoni Boscaiola, and Pepperoni Pizza and all were delicious! I think this was one of the best pizzas I have ever had - the crust so light and tender, just the right amount of cheese and tasty pepperoni!

And the service was fantastic! Thank you to Brad for making sure my drink was just the way I like it and Kirsten for your extraordinary and friendly service. You helped to make it it extra special - thank you so much!

I appreciate that my family introduced me to Nook - now I understand why it is a favourite of theirs! We will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQDVbGbgMKIpXX7sHcChmONcF0IGGuB2yfamwo&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Talid Jalbout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXaUeHBH7AVJdkjB_vmutMGnZKiS_gwPrWTjeXNr8SoSvPSvNMCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Everyone really enjoyed themselves, the interior is nice and welcoming. If you're brave enough to eat outside in winter, they do have blankets you can borrow to keep you warm. Service was good and food came out quickly. I'd recommend sharing your mains. Everything tasted great, the pizza was Neapolitan style, with a great crust. My very minor observation was that the orecchiette looked more like smooth conchiglie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5qc2kAA_TQiohFb9jeSJ4jQFpBtvyb0fTWELt&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Balkaran Matharu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVknnRHfA6loJ3mArT1IlYiyOJz3vf2-Ol7OlNcvA5NbbbPFusi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here with a group of 5 and we had a great experience at Nook! Our server was Daisy and she was phenomenal! Service was fantastic and the food was delicious! Love the ambience and atmosphere of the restaurant as well, it's very modern and cozy. I highly recommend visiting during happy hour, as they have tons of options during happy hour, and at a terrific price. We had a great time dining at Nook, the food was so yummy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pooneh Ashja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLvYCv83fYH_2cvB_GvPGsx-cWB3nHtTpKcJM5kyhA3XmSl58N9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mushroom pizza was excellent. The Rigatoni Boscaiola pasta was tasty too but the Rigatoni itself was a bit undercooked.
Nice atmosphere with seats both inside and outside. Servers were friendly. A bit hard to get their attention. Overall, it was a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN69LSxcuHnw4N4kKdXj4mD0TZlmCRmdREs9vpU&fid=0x0:0xfbfd2b39076c805f"],"When":"2023-8-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelly Hrelja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVWh8qmVdPEfqahFaQ6ox93SOukCBaQIQqwS9jEApuOOnHfC4ZzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute brewery! I really enjoyed all of their sours - some were quite tart but still fruity and delicious! The burrito bowls were also tasty. Would definitely go back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlNA_-Ws3Uza143lEef-qQv4DmrXH68SXZq6ep&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Saul George","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8jz4Qn_4S6XSEPIldz0kEElylnamanCf2J6bY64D2Nm9WTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little brewery with a wide range of taps. Huge fan of their classic salted lime lager, and would definitely recommend the cafe cold brew lager for a new experience.
We also grabbed one of each taco, most of which were fantastic! Some interesting options like a jackfruit taco, as well as all the classics.
It gets quite busy on the weekends, but it wasn't too long of a wait if you're willing to brave chilly North Van!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsqHJ0Gpr6QPkwRbmOGnyQh_1jVv2oXszdWdwW&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little brewery in NS brewery district!
Charming Greek style tile decor and casual Mexican foods such as tacos, nachos, and quesadillas.
Their beer is great (5 stars), very easy to drink. My favorite is Paloma grapefruit lager but others including stout, ipa, and sour are all pretty good. Foods were ok (3 stars) and reasonably priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJYABbiykpqVoMnDmu4ilhHev64OFjRgiHKVh9&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Ash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqRwI_N5-jlH21SdZ5KzhdsDV_6bnCmnnvRAc7A0vTSwLG2a0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love their beer especially the salted lime larger. The food was tasty. I tried the jackfruit taco. It was good. It's my first time trying a jackfruit taco in Vancouver so I was happy with the overall taste. The beef burrito was tasty too. The staff is friendly. I liked the atmosphere. Highly recommend 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTgm4pOpIS7EKsOTaFA9zrOkeOaiGAh0UGwFxc&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Kyle Neely","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoQTi13rcd3LYCBulmOi4yaggIetIP3R0nwjX4l1EbK0yOK8Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely brewery with unique beers and excellent service. We got in 15 minutes before last call super hungry and they served us some really good food. Those bar nuts were such a good snack. The bartender was super friendly. Loved their Mexican inspired beer styles. Would recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gaye Gibson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkd-8-39Y7Ze2zneOhZUjswZZdlIsvc_dBeY5dyHwqVNHy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went to La Cerveceria for the first time tonight. The salted lime lager was really good, nice and refreshing. I shared a burrito with my friend and it was good. The nachos however, were awful! They used liquid cheese (Velveeta?) instead of real cheese and it was so disappointing. Instead of being crunchy, the chips were limp from the cheese. I would not recommend the nachos at all, but the beer was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXQOMsv4McsnwXYakgvNcb1DC1umP1jXM9VRc&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"J M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrCYdAMWhFRMQrSlIuWU1NLDwQKlJVjzAIT4Ccn-c59_I1bQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Staff was good, friendly enough. Beer is pretty mid, none of the 6 we tried were bad, but none were worth returning for either. We ordered nachos and I mean….yikes. Movie theatre level. So if “just fine” is your thing, then you’ve found your spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkkilfjYZcmcnQmOf-iG-owTzLRimmdzJFVf9K&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"sharon ghirra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPvROyUaJgsxMl-PUsuzPJtPb7HdAgT8ROIN1ej-TzcbU8RK9GNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went for the highly raved salted lime beer. It was good but not as hyped as I had read other reviews about. The staff were really sweet and the food was a sizable portion to have while drinking","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMk_aY6LcOb4UBSC_WYA4RkRgnlDMDT1PqHsuOk&fid=0x0:0xf3aeb2269697e898"],"When":"2024-8-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Miguel A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwoTpd5iqD69MdqJUPNBD26Yl2kRX5Wn4tiTAcVAZZubBKF6XU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I held our wedding ceremony and reception at Pier 7 on November 10.
We couldn’t have been happier with the restaurant - the view was amazing, the food was spectacular, and most of all the service was just top notch - shout out to the manager, Eddie, and the two lovely servers who took care of us on our special day, Nina and Erica( I could be wrong with the second name, I’m sorry for that. you both were so lovely)

The communication with Eddie was just amazing, he was very helpful throughout the week leading up to our wedding. On the day itself he was there making sure we are looked after.

The food - my guests were very very happy and full after the wedding.

We couldn’t be more happier and words cannot express how grateful we are for the team (and not to forget to mention the amazing kitchen/BOH) for giving us such a wonderful memory to look back at to.  I wish we had photos of the food to add to the review. But we were so busy with our guests.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4zrZKc0GjnZh_FwuMmWBEOyiOWpFHCYc1K7NF&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Mr. D3stiny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmzIhx_TbGLr99K-XazqSInw-sDwp6qXMiqUHcvxMgi154KCBl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my wife and I first time there. We did have a reservation sometime ago but had to cancel.
The service was good and the food was great. They sat us by a window to see the amazing view. We had the Fried Cod and Chips and an order of prawns. The prawns were delicious and the cod and fries were cooked well. All and all the atmosphere is a lil quiet needs some music 🎶 but otherwise very nice place to eat and enjoy a beautiful view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR0Lmdnq8ezWQrzaYe0nTMrK8iyBr8zzhB6jDt&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Pedro Sousa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYb24yb8LNBET4mbZ6yPa15qx1UDwKQkvKn98fIN2RQXModeD5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great meal with the ocean right by your side. The service from the servers was amazing, attentive, friendly and very professionals from start to finish!
A very relaxed dinner focused on seafood, and a great conversation, two ingredients for a great time. And the pier area was just a very good surprise, lots of fun and movement!
Strongly recommend for you to give it a try :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSZsnWWropQ3dgxXFNcLoiwEwv3Av9M_aef2dX&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Genesis Jeru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDlbnM1zs4MNddfJfHGvlyBUZyvNGTsBaqXNQ1SMZ7mv_ckeBI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is an updated review.

The first couple of experiences I had with Pier 7 wasn’t really great to the point where I never considered coming back. However, after the last time I went here the manager reached out to me and asked about what happened. Keon, the manager. professionally handled the complaint and went above and beyond to fix multiple issues I had regarding the service.

Invited me back and saved a table for me on a busy weekend with a really great view. We’ve ordered the chicken spaghettini, steak frites, prawn cocktail and the pier 7 oyster trio. I didn’t really raise my hopes up, but this time it was a really great experience. The checkbacks were consistent, food was great (steak frites could’ve been more softer). The dessert was also pretty good. As a restaurant manager myself, this service recovery’s pretty good and again, Keon did a very great job.

I’m just hoping that for my next visit, the service won’t change and be able to keep it consistent.

Thank you Pier 7. See you every weekends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqCi6o3_Z_AdnKld4004bGqg2ycFEjA0uf1f-s&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Davin Gegolick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvBcMLpi2napCKTzG6RZY93OeqjytMfWgeTria7T9nsbg9Be-7Og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There was 6 of us traveling to Vancouver from Edmonton for the first time and this was one of our first stops. We got lunch on the outdoor patio which had stunning views of the industrial shipyard…very cool. Great food, drinks, and atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFoeFoj2-wK_jLtt5DQcz2mGpMH3CxY1Jh4bSd&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Carolin Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6UTw8MiPD4lMns2KEwQKDCBNWoS11pESIXB034eh8riDIAVWn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I had a table beside the window on the ground floor. Although it's only a partial harbor view, it's still enjoyable on a sunny day. The food was good, and some dishes came with a lot of potatoes. The waiters seemed very busy, and it took time to flag down our server.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9hEt74Wh-uxcVSPmDRbGF2YaeXjG5tppxwmpI&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Haran Raj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7bNYpY-eZMT6groh2iRJoDILIekiKkfhmMv0OgHOkdN9ql-BSoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful view. Great service and the food is authentic. We had the prime burger, calamari and their seafood chowder. Note: the fried jalapeño in the calamari has some kick to it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFqCqLwaRemrSXlmqmA25Udtt4CM1PNxhyqy3v&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Steve Ody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgDBZZqM1U0qxSyRgiy8liONCA7pVQ_tskfmEXOwgKAYqDgcl1dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Steak sandwich and the steelhead salmon was delicious. Not certain that the chowder was made in house but overall it was a good dinner. Service was excellent, thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcpnM-EzTVuprrkWI3ugOXFUktM8pecHlEyP6T&fid=0x0:0x1e267aa5b333b845"],"When":"2024-9-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelly Argue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHguvt2mUYK3ZLLT7t42H3YMBdzPp4wF0FbC-_ZBGyrnECZG3faw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I got to go, and within 30 minutes of closing so I'm taking that into consideration.
I have never been to this franchise before but I was pleasantly surprised by the very large and varied menu. They apparently have some really good breakfast poutine, lots of different egg dishes but I went with the banana cream pie french toast and it was quite good 👍 It wasn't super hot, which again I was coming in very close to closing so I'm taking that into consideration. The display was beautiful but it didn't have a super strong taste for being banana. There was a lot of whipped cream.
I was most impressed with my greeting as I walked through the door, the host or manager that welcomed me was super friendly, I gave me a lot of different recommendations on the menu as I'm a vegetarian, took my payment and assured me that my food would be ready within 10 minutes so I could get to my next business appointment.

I would like to try it again not so close to closing and be able to sit down.

All in all very happy with my service and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_2zlkmoQA4VMVgyNzUUQNZwC3gc_dG7zwgf-5&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJs_km6RslliP6cTTiQcv7eI3BYv9_LkkJf-8xS0POhDRp70O4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Highly suggest putting your name on the wait list before heading to this place!  Quite busy. Very filling and very tasty dishes. Fantastic breakfast/brunch restro, all their locations have been consistent with good service and well made food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhluvZZ3BE-urOvIbWRXPL4K2u6aNcYlGYlog6&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"San Wayne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjFb2dB41O9n_VFwgfqlyajgDnGhNggu7YKnObZ04VikDc3OZS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We see many dishes empty but we need to wait for 15mins. And the receptionist is not allowed us to wait inside even outside is raining and nobody is waiting inside. A bit disappointed on this without any consideration. We have no umbrella and wait outside. Besides this, I appreciate the waiter serving us very good with smile and love. The food is also good. Hope to consider more the customer instead of robust thinking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOx9qMyPxPr7sRqrrqEL_HLwnlo9NiEri7h-cEX&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Angela Cruikshank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQfp5et78JyhQ7mCDPsK3BFFhFDsPsNTC8zygD-TpS9GJBKdG9iw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely breakfast spot!!! I had no knowledge of this chain and I will be back for sure.
I love a basic breakfast and theirs was wonderful.  I showed up before 9 and got to take advantage of their early morning breakfast special…$12.
Nice touch was extra bit of butter.  And as I rarely finish a whole breakfast was grateful for only one piece of delicious sourdough toast. Decor is so cute.  Bathrooms for “Everyone”.  Coffee mug is huge!
Super close to Lion’s Gate Hospital.
Really truly I have nothing bad to say. 👏🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML9ZeSoNsKbtKS3axHa21xGKZ9bXj4hY82s5Kt&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"JJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUHVlV6bJsWbJvCsygRpLBGWRv5c7O7lOsekjNsIqfLzjiZQSTRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect brunch spot on the way from the mountain. Parking along both side of the street was very easy.

We arrive around 1pm so not too crowded during that time. Opted for outdoor patio seating to enjoy the sun. Also indoor music was a bit loud.

Our server was very courteous, she offered to go over the entire menu since it was our first time at OEB.
Classic breakfast didn't wow with the plate, but taste good.
Farmer's john delight with the omelets is very good with fruit on the side.
Soul in a bowl poutine is a must-try or you may try other combination of the poutine. Perfect seasoned potatos with chunks of bacons, cheese & eggs on top + hollandaise sauce. Mouth watering good.

Total bill came to about $60 plus tips for 2 people, good price considering the quality/portion of food.
Will be trying out other locations when in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-_GQN9uNGU8LhAYVyk_WkwUgaUpo-qNkASdvs&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time dining at this OEB! Very busy during lunch hour, so we were sat at a high table with bar seats. Love the decorative interior with high ceilings, wall art and various seating options. Our server was attentive and friendly. No problems with sharing an entrée (Truffled Squash Benny) between two people as a lighter lunch! We really liked the use of a croissant as opposed to the regular English muffin for the base of the benny. It was nice and flakey, and the squash was braised well. Would return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2TC_Ofia4pZnH7_KEQnwE1xDfSoJ8cOsPGwBD&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place for breakfast, expect line up but its worth to wait.
Quick service, and friendly server, plus yummy breakfast !
Definitely will coming back here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDwalXaqrigTitfEsr3RKJBly8CECGZVzmN2SZ&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"YJ K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBPuQFnODlS32_YTAMV0B-4x5XKOmAKQ998gbZqE5DPsuartXYjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's lovely to have a good breakfast within half an hour of waiting on weekends. You can even put your name on a waitlist using Yelp- how exciting!

I always love savouring the blueberry bangers. Added crunch waffles this time. Yum yum~~

New menu Wake'n Bacon- love at first bite!! 😍 Maple glazed bacon lardons complement the sweet but savoury salted caramel bread pudding. Strawberries add freshness and colours, and sliced almonds add some crunch to the dish. Just unforgettable!

It is my personal wish that many other restaurants, too, will wow their customers by introducing new menus from time to time. I left OEB North Vancouver dreaming of returning and having one more bite of Wake'n Bacon 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-P9SXUXi2KgEh_VZOTJhbdykaWldzCHHd_xfs&fid=0x0:0x2e718799528755b8"],"When":"2024-11-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Isobel Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXofkM9cPKs8xyZpd85Bu-2sn6hgHkpFK93thNaHtY_yZwzPhuf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food and service here at Mythos are certainly deserving of their glowing reviews. My husband and I popped in for dinner one evening, and we ordered the moussaka and the roast lamb shoulder, as well as the hummus to start. All three dishes were executed to perfection.

The hummus was so creamy, and such a generous portion as well. It came with two pieces of pita bread, but we were even asked if we wanted more to finish our hummus with as well.

The roast lamb was the star of the evening; tasty and fork tender. The moussaka was excellent as well. Both came with sides of a fresh Greek salad and potatoes, and portion sizes were so generous we struggled to finish our plates (and not without trying; they were that good).

Service here was amazing as well. From start to end, we were well taken care of by Raul, who also made sure to check that we were comfortable and that we enjoyed our meal. The food was served really fast as well; just how we like it.

We definitely recommend Mythos to anyone who wants a tasty, authentic Greek dining experience here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBqF-jsp2MxI_YLKkRBoeT7hQnY5S42Q6bBcK2&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Lucas Currie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdjwmwgEnlE6FRohkM26CFbDskWj7Kd_pG7u-VZu-TqBIKdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service from start to finish was incredible.  Food was served quick, fresh and hot! Large portions, the tastiest food you will find. The lamb was HUGE, and melts off the bone, and the flavour WOW.  Moussaka is also top notch, and the potato is one of the best I've had. We both quite literally licked the plates clean.  Compliments to the chef! The food was so good we HAD to order dessert. Unfortunately we were so pumped to eat it we forgot to take a photo 😅 baklava sundae is sizeable, and they don't skimp on the baklava. Recommend the Roast Lamb, Moussaka and Baklava sundae.  5/5","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDQYHpS8CbQ2n_piqrHXmdpZed1uhdvl9_ZNA3&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Shannon O'Neill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgZBvtwtmtw4Poaj3MQR1873q0qP1OZPsSVl0-1Tntj68YkC7M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is unbeatable! Top service, atmosphere and food was unreal!! It was all so fresh, healthy and delicious! We felt like we were in Greece 🇬🇷 definitely recommend this place and will be coming back again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAd6FIY5ySFRN8PbPNPV1TtE2kL-EgfiEHUmki&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"deanna chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdwGSeqcEDo0rzi9pPXRf03hCYRI1KvG9IJoiZWuj-jvO-Qppmfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"When in town visiting and in the mood for lamb, I come here.

The first time I came here, the food ruined it for me getting lamb from anywhere else. It is not the same any more when I go back to Saskatchewan, it is not that good anywhere else.

I always order the Roast Lamb. My husband always has the Lamb Shank. There is a lot of food there and if you add on an appetizer and / or dessert... I have a hard time walking out the door.

The service is always good. Somehow we always have a choice of rooms to sit in and we usually pick that back room where it is usually the cooler of them all during a heat wave in BC.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxCx6Y20g89E_EUXayzj0K9gyTZ0SLf2dDgbEb&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Jayanti Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyoJdadazExRVSUdtLZfXeiC-vnYqojxLpaMyAxYs5O4jSyuni=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let me tell you, this place is amazing. Not only is the restaurant absolutely gorgeous, the vibe and ambiance of the place is so inviting. The servers were charismatic too, which was lovely.

Now onto the food. Probably the most amazing lamb and pasta we’ve had in a long time if not ever. The lamb was so succulent and pulled apart from the bone so easily and the potatoes were sublime. The pasta was just perfect. The sauce to pasta ratio was just right and the seafood was perfectly cooked! Could not recommend this place more. Has definitely become a favourite in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqD45Wr2d4qmDqH3u45wakXPzoilZS9vq1FAYd&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Jaida Regan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnJLf-7_be7JVPiOtQt4GL2o6z7IS8fEsMHUYulFcDNSxRYDWx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing meal! We split one appetizer and entree and it was the perfect amount of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0QJTqa6oZiRxYEuUgsH0tfppfVK7CQOkwxmRL&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSL4vktPKNFoHU_qemcEmny8UpQEiE7NhD561JAlKgq7PhZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's my favorite place. The food is really good, the servers are really nice, and the atmosphere is really good. ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf7hgfI-gXh-W1etnsFaCO_aNz943e4wAPpkW8&fid=0x0:0x32f9d74a3095cbc7"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Ahmad Elmoussa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKYDmw5dw_9JVxNrc9m73Fn8tlquKO_2E2SHV9qf0G31UEYMDg1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just visited this incredible Greek restaurant, and I’m still blown away! From start to finish, everything was absolutely amazing. The food was phenomenal — every dish was bursting with authentic flavors, cooked to perfection, and presented beautifully. I highly recommend trying the moussaka and grilled lamb — they were absolute standouts!

What really made the evening unforgettable was our waitress, Andrea. She was attentive, warm, and her positive energy truly elevated our entire dining experience. She anticipated our every need, gave great menu recommendations, and her friendly smile made us feel at home. Andrea, you made our night!

If you're looking for authentic Greek food with top-notch service, this place is a must-visit! I’ll definitely be coming back soon! صحة وهنا","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ava Yeganeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9tl4gIIPMFy4hyI3W3ymgXIBHQie_SI-ZoGmo1bKQu2C_kEFzqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I had an amazing experience at Carpe in Shipyards, North Vancouver! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was welcoming and vibrant, with a cozy yet modern vibe that fits the waterfront setting perfectly. The service was top-notch—friendly, attentive, and fast without feeling rushed.

Now, the food! I tried their signature burger, and it was absolutely delicious. The patty was cooked to perfection, juicy and full of flavor, with fresh toppings that took the taste to the next level. Their fries were crispy and seasoned just right. You can really tell they use high-quality ingredients. They also have a great selection of drinks to complement the meal.

Overall, Carpe is the perfect spot for a casual but unforgettable meal. If you're in the Shipyards area, this place is a must-visit. I'll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjLkOHy6V0wmcEgsutWyeiNdl3qOSGOxGhf9i6&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Matt Ajami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUi9BqP3Uoggyl9CoDZ49GUHGNhsvtfvA0HT8_vA6UVRGNbpoAk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at Carpe in North Vancouver, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience. As someone who eats out frequently and travels a lot, I’ve tried burgers from coast to coast, but the burger at Carpe stands out as the best I’ve had in Canada.

The flavors were incredibly well-balanced, the ingredients were fresh, and the burger was cooked to absolute perfection. Every bite was juicy and flavorful, with just the right combination of toppings to enhance, not overpower, the patty. Even the bun was spot on – soft but held everything together without falling apart.

What made the experience even better was the cozy atmosphere and warm service. The staff were friendly, attentive, and genuinely passionate about the food they served, which made the meal all the more enjoyable.

If you’re ever in North Vancouver, don’t miss the opportunity to stop by Carpe. Whether you’re a local or just passing through, this little gem will surprise you with its quality. I’ll definitely be back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnBcovr2z8N8nnfV2bhEFYKlD4weJkyaijAWiV&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Christopher Okello","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURoZz9P8978akI8LKPljYFy3CjE0nvUvm4EXFPukSVElffAzcB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I visited Carpe burger on Wednesday and had a great experience! Staff are very friendly & willing to help, the food is delicious! The smash burger was our favourite. It’s conveniently located for both inside dining or if you just want to grab the food and go walk on the pier. Highly highly recommend & cannot wait to visit again! Thank you team Carpe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbW8OplWIWBrH84hbDVEgKQyHwGPUZvdaurYFP&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"D Smurt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFMn_dqAOyQbOGs70jceToQMFxlTqwAZ_CpS19c2RhS51FXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Being a former Lolo local I can safely say that I've eaten at nearly every restaurant in the area, an expensive and delicious adventure to say the least.

The service, these are some darn good people that deserve your business. They care and their food and establishment speaks loudly to their commitment. Friendly and welcoming.

The restaurant, CLEAN! Like spotless clean. Between their kitchen area and service area the place is spotless. Well done!

The food, expensive and worth it! I am willing to pay any amount to eat the best food that is available to me. The ingredients are the pinnacle of fresh, the quality exceptional. In the top list of best tasting smash burgers I've had, and I've had a lot 😅 I had my go to burger spot, known for massive food and amusingly bad service (part of its charm) at a similar price point... I will come to Carpe hands down every time I'm in the area going forward.

Exceptional quality food is the result of high quality ingredients that are prepared by people who care, all of which comes at a premium that I am willing to pay. Oh, and they are licensed... Enjoy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3KkbgqFqtVZDbTLbgVA5MPpdfoIi-M42TjwIj&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"M. A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLCC1RNpkYVL_wmAKVl8CVTBHMM0HswNTdpuCsVi3nWEHRpCVa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you read my reviews or follow my favorites in google, my favorite foods are Kebabs & Burgers , and I tried almost every burger in the area! This "Shipyard Burger" is "THE BEST",  "BY TASTE" !
Juicy &Delicious without adding any more sauce! Try it ! You'll realize why I'm suggesting it !!! They offer it with or without fries or salad, you can choose if you want to order fries or not...
Nice & cool staff 👌(Dog friendly)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhWQ_7QWEt7RwU96o6KBf3fDRgoKdxPOaJawxV&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Sevil Nail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXIrvvJX3HFMWi1bSlO-kvLug2gAo8Wxk3y0twzyMftsk-E3I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“I recently dined at Carpe Burger and had an amazing experience. The burgers were cooked to perfection, juicy and flavorful, and the toppings were fresh and generous. The service was excellent, with friendly and attentive staff who made sure we had everything we needed. The restaurant has a cozy and welcoming ambiance with a modern and clean design. Their signature Shipyard burger is a must-try, with a delicious blend of flavors that stands out. I highly recommend Carpe burger for anyone looking for a great burger experience. I’ll definitely be back soon!”","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMa4AUHHCHsibZG1eV0BfTbvZyspx2HzQLZNbRU&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Panteha Ebrahimii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp1neZmF9TAV9Mm2SPPocowHUnqOs_JTslv6MT8SBP5-H-Z0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently had the pleasure of dining at Carpe Grill & Diner, and it was an experience worth sharing! From the moment we walked in, the atmosphere was warm and inviting, with a relaxed yet vibrant vibe that made us feel right at home.

We decided to try their veggie burger, and it was nothing short of amazing. As vegetarians, we often find ourselves with limited options at most restaurants, but Carpe Grill & Diner truly exceeded our expectations. The veggie patty was perfectly seasoned, with just the right balance of texture and flavor. It was clear that a lot of thought had gone into making this dish not just an option for vegetarians but a standout menu item on its own. Paired with fresh toppings and a soft bun, every bite was delicious and satisfying.

The service was equally impressive. The staff were incredibly friendly, attentive, and genuinely seemed to care about ensuring we had a great experience. Nader, in particular, went above and beyond to make our visit special. He was not only professional and courteous but also had such a positive and welcoming attitude that it added to the overall enjoyment of our meal.

It’s rare to find a place where both the food and service are exceptional, but Carpe Grill & Diner nails it. Whether you’re a vegetarian or just someone looking for a great meal, I highly recommend giving this place a try. We’ll definitely be back soon, and next time, we might even bring some friends along to share the experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M. RA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgnrdgN2E0osF7UjMGdY9rCa28cO2-aoqMORSfjK16076rCKc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg I can’t say enough good things. The burger was beyond amazing! The fries were soo good great crunch.  The service was wonderful getting to meet the owner and let him know how happy we were!! Can’t wait to come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxM5Qpbs3OkUNPOoi1N0ZKzsqToKd1E8Ha-lfR&fid=0x0:0x73a62c47e9773bd2"],"When":"2024-9-8"}]

I especially enjoyed the live music on Friday—really added to the overall vibe. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBSFUrVrdGsSQiqHylOPyrbCk9ywC2crcNAwxD&fid=0x0:0xe1e08bd7104f1f97"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Sunghyun Tjen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8NjtnCn6iayqN9kMtlE0TjNKALkna0s1H0kGJem8L50wqpGdKCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited here for their Wednesday pizza night, and it was a delightful experience. After a recent trip to Italy, I found myself missing the authentic pizza I had in Rome. Thankfully, I discovered they offer pizzas that rival those in Italy. The pizza was fresh, flavorful, and transported me back to the streets of Rome. If you're craving authentic Italian pizza, I highly recommend giving it a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ6pvyD7eP9aHLVXKeO8ebtvA7p8j-QdZ09_rw&fid=0x0:0xe1e08bd7104f1f97"],"When":"2024-4-25"},{"Name":"加藤秀明","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGcXg4ZLZjXbu2hPGA5FuZH13ZNqYV4KecUvSl1RGp7kFO3VuGVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to Vancouver from Japan for having such a good pizza again actually. The cozy ambiance and friendly staff make it the perfect spot for any occasion.

Whether you’re craving pasta, pizza, or classic desserts like tiramisu, Palermo Cucina never disappoints. A must-visit for authentic Italian dining!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonathan Irving","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcoPU9fAZDdaIaESSKgQ_6KzLAkEZt3ZadImppbegW94EmMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our server Tina was absolutely amazing! Pay this girl all the money and she will continue to bring back customers like myself! Thanks Tina","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mahshid Mahdvar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-zctYTHsXRgZ4LkBA0JgKtGpSkKAiyGUkPENazIp-Fqc60BZP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and great ambiance. title: Anatoli Souvlaki

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Saeed Sabeti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9BB0ZOMFykYbcyhdylHgAX94mk7AelIyWlm2AxrBPlkVbqjcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You could never expect to have this food experience if you walked past this restaurant. We’ve been living in the neighbourhood for years but never tried the food. I’m blown away by how different and delicious Greek food is! I believe what we ordered is one of their traditional cuisines. High quality, fresh ingredients and experience 👍🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjhra-bdw1A0L7pptvyFqM4vkK9lHaXS0bgcNX&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Brandon Bear","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQx8UvsjjXLMQ9vuoUAke7WFOu1cDMwUYDJ2CgSYYU9ZBvW1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anatoli Souvlaki is the perfect hidden gem. The warm, inviting atmosphere and soft music provides the perfect environment for a charming date night. The service was incredible (Sam) with well dressed and mannered staff, prompt service and tasty drinks. The food was perfectly prepared, with fresh ingredients and authentic flavors. We were not expecting this level of professionalism but were certainly pleasantly surprised. Anytime we're back in North Van we'll be sure to make a visit back at Anatoli.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMewD5fU1dz4Z9jTjSZzxIPM8PaNnngDH01R_-J&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Don R Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlaWij7xrbYcwkz7FscJMnAIxuYixNyVFja7O780zWpDE5h2f7rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lunch visit.

Just next to Londsdale Quay, this long time family run restaurant still serves up a hearty and healthy lunch. (Attached pictures are of lunch portions. Souvlaki lunch and Calamari lunch)

The service was very friendly and very informed on food allergy options.

Good food, cooked fresh.

Indoor and outdoor seating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrNmioeF-WMAwOpTTkSx4ygiKEAzl5E_pcsfhN&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Nicole C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNZcAIQ4qr7hn5gxjgCqqDZnmoGrKcOcXa6nrEAFlT4Kmg7hPu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"**Update: Rating Changed from 2 to 5 stars**

After leaving a negative review (bottom) due to a bad dining experience, Anatoli's manager (Georgia) immediately reached out. She gave me a call, listened to my experience, relayed what she had learned after speaking to staff, apologized sincerely for our experience, and invited my friends and I back for a chance to make things right.

We returned to Anatoli's last night and everything was 10/10. The service was outstanding the food was wonderful—a complete 180 from our previous dining experience. Our server Tim was very attentive, friendly, and ensured we all had a good time.

We tried multiple dishes with everything tasting superb! (I wish we had taken more photos but we started eating as soon as the food arrived!) Our highlights were definitely the watermelon salad and the grilled humboldt squid.

I understand mistakes can happen at restaurants and I believe a big indicator on a business' professionalism is how they try to make things right with the customer.

Georgia and her team went above and beyond to give us a true taste of what dinner at Anatoli's is like.

We will definitely be coming back!

***
After reading so many positive reviews and having this restaurant strongly recommended by close friends, I was so surprised to have experienced such awful service. Off the top, I want to say our issue was not with our server (who was great!) but with the kitchen. Our group of five waited 45 minutes for our mains (no appetizers were ordered) and one of our guests received her meal 10 minutes after everyone else's. The big issue though was that all of our food (rice, meat, and potatoes) were cold. When I brought this to the server's attention, she apologized, spoke to the kitchen and then shockingly returned to tell me that "they don't believe me." She said the kitchen staff had said plates can get cold while people wait to eat, so the plate was probably cold but not the food. I was stunned at this response as I wasn't trying to send my food back, just have it warmed up. I had tasted everything on my plate before speaking to the waitress and even asked guests at our table to confirm it was cold. The server was noticeably embarrassed and offered to take my plate back to be warmed up. After about five minutes the plate returned and the meat and rice were the exact same cold temperature and the potatoes had, at best, increased from cold to mildly warm. At this point, we were well over an hour into our dinner, my friends had been eating for 15 minutes, so I told the server the food was still cold but that I didn't want to wait any longer. She apologized profusely, said she would speak to the manager and when she returned she said they had offered to give us each a dessert. I felt it would have been more professional if the manager had come over to speak to our table personally but I appreciated the gesture. And it was not just our table experiencing issues with the kitchen. A table of eight directly beside us made multiple complaints about how long their food was taking and then had their mains arrive 10-15 minutes apart. The restaurant is gorgeous and our server was very professional but when you're charging $30 for a main, making guests wait 45 minutes, serving cold food, and then having your chefs openly dispute your claim that the food is cold and argue with their own staff, it leaves customers with a tremendously negative experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFxCU5hTp7-ao8szjvj-dDoaESq78t9vmriKgQ&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Romantic Spirit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCOCvFxjQApDCEXk-a-OPAkRV025OSNERq20H9bHjJEdlqY0el=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved my food, time and the fun belly dancer they had for entertainment. The servers were cheerful, helpful and on point.

Good People and great food.
We had the perfect night.

Thanks guys! 🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuzTaFX0OYFJQnmRwuteBNAzjxvhjLuHJSK_d6&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"April Heyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzhK8ZI-LCFNEN2-quYoNjfEii33Wm3ajB65Q4iGUbScPkyz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic service! Fantastic food!
My fiancé and I don't get a chance to go on dates very often, so when we do, it's nice when it feels special. We had the restaurant to ourselves when we first arrived for happy hour on a Monday afternoon, but it filled up with customers by the time we were done. The food was delicious and flavourful. We love Greek food and this really was extra yum! The calamari was perfectly crispy and fresh. The lamb kabab was killer, so much flavour. And can't beat that saganaki. Spiery is an amazing server. Nice guy, very attentive and funny. Made our date very memorable! We will be back for sure. :-)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0sSelrGNBXGCIMbXzpCgtz6ALhryklnRxR_Qb&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Srikantha Kalaghatta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7kV3vSmU11E2VJr6yMSYBtHLByJ47CPuwfOKoc_5xVBiEfsZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anatoli Souvlaki is a Greek spot that’s pretty upscale. The place was packed when we went—definitely book ahead. We ordered Hummus, Vegan Calamari, Vegan Souvlaki Dinner, and Baklawa. The Vegan Calamari was a standout—it’s a must-try. The dips were also really good.

It’s on the pricey side, but the food is worth it. The vibe is nice too. The only downside was waiting a bit despite having a reservation. Overall, a solid choice for a special night out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH8AvVrcKZdqjuVm0-ZhuCgzbi6M4RIxMIWbKG&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"Ryan Dai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvz_7CRNc0uzQynlzLBSk6wo_JRdBk-3lTZRZl_hkyJTXWois=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great value for their happy hour menu! Lovely Greek spot in North Van serving great souvlaki and keftedes!

100% will return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDznx4jQ94QrednvLrng3PuPZo5Q_vUNRLNgUP&fid=0x0:0x8778d34e1ec9df96"],"When":"2024-9-24"}]
