[{"Name":"ELYA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWroZHC6pSizdyfWUIhJh17GjQZ9lpxl9_1Hjh0QbqgkQ1DV4Ij=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time eating here and the service, Price, quality, and quantity of food was on point! 🤌🏽 🥙🌯

A locally owned and operated Döner Kebab location right near the Lonsdale Quay Sea Bus and Bus Station. Good for all backgrounds with vegan (Falafel) 🥗🧆and Halal Meats 🍗🐓🥩🐄🍖🐑(Chicken, Beef, and Lamb).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXLvD8w4KhXnf7SBPmPBG4PeNxhVVHKbVGB7T3&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Tiara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOGTnVSprrRfKnl8HxlMWqGPfK-EAnduRxsmD5lBjFitcsiWe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love the chicken donair! I grab one every time I’m in north van. Very flavorful and filling! Everyone is really nice too. There’s a bit of a lineup but absolutely worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQGrFf1gQiPyj9kJvuwVhjUjy0GZAEJTLYZ0kF&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Jonny Padilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZfpOXfFLHuvk_h3vclfvmxp7tkDOYQk8g-euCrp8vk5GXCmN0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is fresh and has great flavor! The people are kind and friendly! The staff went out of the way to make falafel to perfection! Plus it is made fresh daily! The chicken wrap is also amazing! I Would highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZIAv5VEi_--WPz6zzMBhtQwOusAGEtfrObfzE&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Hande","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKP9N2AyeBX9W2s_3LoXlHQjAtQ5IYF4Cvhf7QwCaFxI1yr8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We really liked the donair at SeaSide Donair Kebab. Ordered beef wrap, mix platter and chicken donair for kids. We all enjoyed our dinner by the seaside. Veggies were fresh, really liked the sauces. Another must try place. Also greatly appreciate the halal businesses like this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIBiyZvKjNOZ1ap947LwgjyIh7HmeUonuo1Z80&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Michael Poon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkSjd152a9dCUO4PnImKzhY9WH9eKUK9V2LBwuuOvnQGB3LhYS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious! Friendly staff,  generous portions. A guest came in to collect cans from the trash and they greeted him and gave his daughter her choice of free drink. These are amazing people. Would be even better if you recycled your containers or used compostable ones!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcIssmxbLBUOdNhrymp0TZRxHOcj4OZ17taB_R&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Persian Doner (Donair).
These people are very kind, friendly and respectful here of people's request to have spicy or not spicy.

You can choose between a Doner wrap or Doner platter.

I had the Lamb Platter. It was simply amazing.
They prepare all the meat here from scratch, so no preservatives are added.

Very healthy food.

Try the Persian yogurt beverage.

Thanks again guys.

I will stop in to say hi again.
👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwC4jZCe59PhIi11dGr4GxAoIl6_6yZMxEip0o&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Luis Vilanova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8vXY70z1XxygzB1TChmx9fqanFj5LJMztuM8yk_9znoNKhqrf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seaside Donair Kebab is a hidden gem that delivers an unforgettable dining experience! The chicken platter is absolutely divine—perfectly seasoned, tender, and served with fresh sides that complement every bite. The cozy, family-owned atmosphere makes you feel right at home, especially when you’re greeted warmly with “my dear” and treated like the VIP you are. Add in great music and a vibrant yet relaxed vibe, and you’ve got the perfect spot for a meal that leaves you smiling. Two thumbs up and then some—don’t miss it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHCaHrYFBHQAVPvb8XkmG5PKS9RXe2t8qU7me45eDHIzMWLK8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They made us feel welcome and took extra care in preparing our platter. Above and beyond service and delicious food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaJiM8lDK9umP-oWSjRTnp6NLa2SbV-BNSx7H0&fid=0x0:0x85a560466624cbc4"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anna Zynyuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEVCHIKsKuiw97vIhmPPgXkG7HcaHaNb-3--o8aOWtKf0Jnbjo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We’ve been using Holly Food for our premade healthy meals for the family, and we couldn’t be more impressed! we have tried many Vancouver based meal prep companies and are super happy we stumbled upon Holly Food. The meals are absolutely delicious, with the perfect balance of fresh ingredients, rich flavors, and thoughtful nutrition. Each dish feels like it was crafted with care. The staff is always so friendly! 🧡 They go out of their way to ensure we’re always happy. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maryam Chatr Bahr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPa7sxDg58rm17dmy-pbxFfEZIPGCepjFAWkEuHzst_pK9vDxa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"lots of super flavourful, healthy options!
I am grateful that I can get super delicious, healthy meals delivered to me on a weekly basis. This means that I don't have to waste money on buying ingredients where I'll only be using a small amount, then having the rest of it go bad in my fridge. I also save a ton of time on grocery shopping & trying to find new recipes to make each week.
even on a busy day when I'm feeling tired, it's really no effort at all to eat fresh instead of ordering takeout
Hollyfood has been also an absolute lifesaver during COVD-19 since at the beginning it was so hard to get out to get groceries. I have a huge appreciation for all of their staff who have continued to work through the pandemic to make sure that we're well fed.
Thanks Holly food! you guys are awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCUEw8EO39EKC-okQvhdACfWzGl2LeEs8TUYlt&fid=0x0:0x524a9f6056e73c23"],"When":"2020-11-20"},{"Name":"Hamid Payombarnia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6MVPaNkCJrzg_-V3-Y-jLaQRbGHfkSwlHzTveP8OrB-jM4DPsPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a Turkey for our Thanksgiving party to Holly Food. It was an awesome experience. The Turkey was incredibly delicious. It was put in a high quality dish so we could use the dish itself on our table and didn’t have to change it. All of the side dishes were amazing too. Gravy was perfect. The roasted vegetables side dish was great too. My wife loved it. The bread pudding stuffing was very good. Cranberry sauce and mashed potato were lovely.
Everything arrived on time as we already had planned for and promised, warm and ready to be served in their own dishes.
All guests enjoyed and asked for the contact.
We became a loyal client to the Holly Food and for sure will order again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alireza Johari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBI-tSftmkFb2ak53uPg8MBZ7dzxO3_-ayEXvk16BL1YbUBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been with Holly Food for more than 2 years and am very satisfied. I especially liked the fact that their food quality has improved even though it was good to begin with. Totally recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Noosh Onedrive","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWstXouFoXaMko_XP8AYcx8U5TKxE-BnIqzPdOyjV2XtoBD3JkR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I couldn’t be happier with choosing Holly food for my custom meal plans!  Food is always fresh, tasted great and came in great value. Customer service is exceptional. I highly recommend them to anyone and everyone looking for a meal prep service. It’s a great way to save time for you to focus on more important things in life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Sedgwick Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdfRvTBbAJAlAb274_voWaQvx9Fufqz5q48H6jPI9Ogdw8aiE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been enjoying Holly's Food service for almost a year now and we couldn't be happier.  Healthy, organic, nutrient dense meals that taste great and are so convenient for our busy lifestyle!  Moji goes above and beyond to make sure we are always satisfied - we never get bored of the meal options as he is always providing new menu items for us to select from.  Highly recommend Holly Foods!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"88West Realty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0jU6vth74s1xyo8IT6Ct-fZSUjZtPOdCDzrQ9lKtkCDvwdoeX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a perfect Thanksgiving feast with Holly food’s Thanksgiving Special combination of delicious roasted and juicy turkey, rich and silky gravy, stuffing loaded with flavour, creamy mashed potato, fragrant moist bread, flavourful veggies and citrus flavouring cranberry sauce.  All these were packed nicely and separately in nice containers.  We could not ask for a better feast.  Food was ready and delivered on time.  Holly food is highly recommended.  Huge thanks to everyone at Holly Food for delivering beyond our expectation.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Farzaneh asghari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV4rUe8oZNJIp5g1JR7apNBs6HaGmvEMYZsQEKcEBGRK8Ctvk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Holly Food has been a life saver to my husband and I. We are two busy professionals that like to eat healthy. We used to spend 1 day every weekend meal prepping for the entire week leaving very little time for us to unwind and socialize. We felt that this was a cost to pay if we needed to stick to certain nutritional diet and and if we're on a budget. We did try other services that provide groceries and recipes and found those less efficient and more costly and not as healthy. For us the answer has been Holly food. The team is very flexible from customizing your orders to delivery method and time. The meals are always in good quality, fresh and healthy. They have lots of menu options, so if you are vegan, on a veto diet or a balanced diet you will always find the right choice for you on their menu, and even then if you get tired of it, they can customize for you to add an extra layer of variety...

I highly recommend that you give them a try.  you'll get your weekends back to do whatever you need to do to rest and enjoy!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"amin sharifkhani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMTgfDWY5t5B0505ZKtuOzmoiK_kJcbZee_v7o-9xVgyDyuVRTog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Fryingpan Express for Hot Chicken, and unfortunately, the experience left much to be desired. The restaurant is an open space with minimal design, featuring extremely cheap decor and tables that don’t create a welcoming atmosphere. While it wasn’t dirty, it also wasn’t very clean, which added to the overall lackluster ambiance.

For the food, I ordered a mild hotness chicken burger with fries and a Coke. The presentation was very basic—fries were dumped in a basket with the burger on top, reminiscent of something you might get at a diner. The portion size was disappointing; the burger was quite small, and the fries were nothing special.

The chicken in the burger was thick and juicy, which was a plus, but the flavor left a lot to be desired. The “mild” hotness was overwhelming, and I’m someone who enjoys spicy food. It seemed like the heat was used to mask the blandness of the chicken. The burger itself was very basic—just the chicken and bread, with a tiny portion of coleslaw and a single slice of pickle drowned in condiments.

Even the little things, like the ketchup packets and napkins, screamed cheap. The ketchup was in single-use packets like you’d find at a fast-food joint, and the napkins were the flimsy type you might see in a gas station restroom.

Overall, Fryingpan Express for Hot Chicken seems to cut corners at every opportunity, which shows in both the service and food quality. I wouldn’t recommend it unless you’re in a pinch and have no other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrWnw_UQryGeGd16JMQ64crZ69r8IhOB4fEUxH&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Joaquin Surijon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRl_0NnJWTKW0CwMobY87xpQkHv9cGa_klyETq6yYZG_js2HZ1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was with a friend and the manager let me stay late to finish my food because I did come a little late, he also let me stay to wait for my friends dad to pick us up.

The food also taste INCREDIBLY good and has the best fries in the world, I'm not even joking.

The atmosphere is also good because it's not messy, and it's comfortable.

Really good and deserves the best reviews possible.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYJ3wwMi9FMqZtFGF9ykiVxJrwGwjpZDFuP2lg&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Sharon Sa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-ZatOwc0o-_pcFCHW6F3-vZav6E45c9r8cCGUjqpf-G46H7p8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I sent my partner on a mission to get fried chicken as our late night snack and we were both pleasantly surprised with the quality and service. The strips tasted homemade, cozy. It was a dry rub (which is exactly what I was looking for), with perfect paprika seasoning and not greasy at all. Tons of fries & the burger is THICC. A true North Shore gem indeed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmf04xQWU-8pLOB7Dua_QinfT5GGUvQUhnLWzR&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvTieCyaoAYyvUnI3OUHNKjWCcqK4N_iCIOFS8aC16shbIuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff with quick service.

I had the chicken bits and waffles, the chicken was super crispy with lots of flavor. The waffles were crispy with a fluffy center. I wish more syrup was given with the meal otherwise it was amazing!

My husband ordered the chicken sandwich in fire. Overall the sandwich was good, but the heat level didn’t match its description. Good flavor, but not a lot of heat.

The lemon ade is so refreshing. I was expecting a fresh squeezed lemonade and it’s so much more. It is carbonated. I highly recommend. I was not as fond of the orange one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYmgHQLmo2KqD8-zZJD-qHaDnOnQ5bqUBybsUS&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Harsimran Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDa1UNDMjPgv8WXJwYPcX6bLZjELBQG9JAUIMHAF1dX03GPxu_PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great place for spicy chicken lovers
Their sandwich and chicken poutine with fries were delicious.
Chicken was juicy, nicely cooked and had a good taste.
The spice level was good as we ordered the hot one.
They serve beer on taps. Nice place to dine in.
Definitely recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR29BEOemLoqvIoOpVmJ8x7kVWS8jImoNfKo3t&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Tigran Babaev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvL9Fbf_VIMCBhKquhWZ3P1E6SnhoUQY27nXE0oxZvAF-LqZFh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fryingpan Express is a solid spot for hot chicken! The prices are reasonable, and the portion sizes are really generous—you definitely won’t leave hungry. The service was quick, which made it super convenient for a lunch stop. The chicken sandwich was flavorful and spicy. The bulgogi sandwich was not great. Overall, it’s a great place to grab a tasty meal without spending too much. Definitely worth a visit if you’re craving hot chicken!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"EMMANUEL OSORIO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcR60Obi3Qu_DWCW8RKTw8OcXnjpKX3Z790F8OcvqBRS4aPu2O=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Don’t waster your time and money ordering bulgogi, beef is hard to bite, and flavour is meh!
On the other hand, chicken is very good, medium would be good for someone who likes spicy food but can’t really handle spicy food. Hot and Fire, is where the real heat is!
No regrets with chicken!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVLAsowM_RZqvCVvYlNLLVryiMDk2qTbG_XaoH&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"James Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZRyjsM-pHopHIRypyRiKUToycChueMK4kZIYB7aJBPnVKlY-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here with my family for lunch, and I tried the Chicken Sandwich (mild), Waffles N Chicken Bites (zero), and the Orange Ade.

Starting out with the drink, it was refreshing, and you could clearly tell the use of fresh oranges from the taste. It tasted like it came straight out of a dessert cafe instead of a chicken restaurant. The sides (potato and sweet potato fries) were salted to the extent where they weren't flavourless, but not too salty, right in the middle. They were very well done.

The burger had excellent portion (I am a heavy eater, and I was very pleased with how filling it was), and the chicken breast was tender and juicy. The burger was a perfect combination of chicken, relish, and the sauce also complimented the flavour well. I would recommend to order either the zero or mild spice level for others who don't necessarily handle spice well like myself. It didn't leave a greasy after taste at all, which is exactly what I seek in a chicken sandwich.

Moreover, the chicken and waffles also offered great portion, and I was particularly impressed by the waffles. They were soft, and the vanilla cream was especially tasty and addicting, effectively balancing out the chicken flavour to go well hand in hand.

In addition, the staff were friendly, enthusiastic, while the interior offered a clean, spacious, and cozy atmosphere that accompanied the dining experience competently. Overall, I had a wonderful time eating here, and I can't wait until I am in the North Vancouver area again to bring my friends here as well. I highly recommend the restaurant to anyone else nearby!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOawMkNCKpMmxw9oFdNBQmtrCPpLL59XNmwy_cj&fid=0x0:0x9cd2c350c480bbda"],"When":"2023-5-10"}]

descriptions: Relaxed place serving creative & classic Indian dishes such as tikka masala, curries & samosas.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nadir Zulqernain (Broker Nadir)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhEJmar-xPGvkChLjdSk0W2wzn9BfvbU7Rx_M524YyfDxob5mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Indian Fusion is a delightful place at the North End of Upper Lonsdale, across from London Drugs.

The food was authentic, and cooked to perfection. Most delightful was the Tandoori Fish.

We shall definately return.

Update: 10/15/24 We returned for more great food. The highlight of this meal was Grilled Platter. It was the best marinated and grilled food I have had in years.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNq-iwtYhXXKSiykpnqOxHAr009YPaxLXKGlPsg&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"G N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIK8vq04Ld7ecfN3UXJngSzrlnaZhhARbZFpOnBa-SSVn8_Sw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Indian foods I’ve ever had! And I’ve had many😁 always fresh food, tasty, great quality, price is great for the quality and quantity. Very clean. Owners are welcoming and kind. I certainly recommend this place for delusions Indian. I live out of country and every time in Vancouver, this place is on the top of my list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQ3mYR0v8kn0uC6axTf1Kpga7OL0-TNJp9UXJ-&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Sheida B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY_3vfIu53b6zcNLQtWUQq0oJf2HkI_n4Ig63UjDD6u7pfjnXa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this Indian restaurant during my trip to Vancouver, and I was thoroughly impressed. The food was outstanding and exceptionally fresh. The mango lassi, in particular, was one of the best I’ve ever had—absolutely delicious. The ambiance was warm and inviting, creating a delightful dining experience. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for authentic Indian cuisine and a pleasant atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVgM1OZOq2s00m3O8NkQvbN-C7T9zMaIsPRvU_&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"April Heyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzhK8ZI-LCFNEN2-quYoNjfEii33Wm3ajB65Q4iGUbScPkyz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've probably already made a review about this place. It's the best Indian food on the shore. We've tried them all.
My favourite dish is the vegetable biryani. Packed with flavour and all types of vegetables. Every bite is a surprise. My other favourite is the lamb vindaloo. My family thinks it's really spicy so that means extra raita An extra lamb for me :-)
We always get the garlic naan and vegetable peas as well. Extra mint chutney. All their dishes are fantastic.
The photo I added is not very good. My
fiancé dished up my food in a container because I was working lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFH9-l-1tYgUw4pHixb_cf5jX0K338lhB-enmi&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Harshal Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiN57fk4KgqPiBdHOry-0lYuHSsf0LGxdgak2hZathqPSZUvB_og=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent pricing of lunch special at 13.95! I had the vegetarian version and it had palak paneer, daal makhani, naan (I swapped it for roti), rice, curd and salad. The palak paneer is very tasty and paneer is super soft and fresh! I wish the daal makhani had more lentils but I can understand that given the price point. Would recommend the restaurant to add an option of a sweet dish for couple bucks more.
Will definitely visit again for a la carte menu and try other options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7X3t9QvE9r_hV5mxFXE9OOXZbJpHesSZuyJkO&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"B Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG-AFIhXFz7kzMW1D6sAVQDc-xumMScnMFMoV4h79FM1tJjWI8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great friendly service and seriously delicious food. I could eat the entire meal over again! The Chicken Palak was very tasty and the chicken was really tender. We had a a vegetarian with us and there were lots of options for him. He loves the Dal Makhani - orders it every time. The Mutter paneer was good too.
Our only suggestion for improvement is that the interior could do with something to dampen the sound as it quite noisy when the restaurant is busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr0I5zOe9Y0b1N4ma-ryJC44281UHwP3_AjL7W&fid=0x0:0x702aff7908674cff"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Lucy Boghus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlwDcjHyD6R4KQ_S-AJh2jmiNvGyXdrzmCIDg6wJaoMDHIzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Indian restaurant if it is not the best. The food is delicious,my sister who is visiting from Sweden and I were eating there every day, the chicken tikka is amazing, butter chicken is out of this world, everything on the menu is absolutely delicious..the restaurant is very welcoming, the service very pleasant and professional,the atmosphere is great, the music is mesmerizing..Bravo 👏 worth every penny spent.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fair Review","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhwkh4P_LiG8B2hSQNbVvq0cI63jDqwXDWBJ2ln071MkYm_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After 10 years of enjoying this place, I can confidently say it’s my favorite for Indian cuisine! While it may not be very traditional, the flavors are absolutely delicious and incredibly satisfying. Every dish I've tried has been tasty and full of unique twists that keep me coming back for more. If you love Indian food and are looking for something different yet delicious, I highly recommend giving this place a try! You won’t be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Julia Esteves","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZrjMpWV5hOHGhBUwImJ_Bsyza2Hax_XPh7OFiZJPsPYwxiqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very clean place calm and peaceful ambiance. Pizza is delicious! Staff is friendly but lack in attentiveness. They spend most their time talking behind the counter and not aware when guests need something.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBTVpZdn1_LfzSOgmdc6spE7BUCyC0x5jQ0K3v&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service, style, food were all excellent! And the tables themselves are gorgeous; pictured here. This place (albeit a bit bright) will look so much better full, so I wanted to share our great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgLcAfDC59zq42_hWQkTg86DZU_oSJ0vDu_Kp5&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Ramin Khatami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLg5w2wLoMRqRwcwJDN1XDYwnNQ1xOHafXQekgbpEwCereqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food and nice staff. We ordered their Margherita, Capricciosa, and Pollo Verde Pizza which were delicious. Highly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwZodMsuFXHN7EKxRKTJOrYjmMFw7DjRj3mv75&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Zahra Modiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLpVkbYjtnodK3FgdiVTohICGAct0oFRnsRoo47tJMSe8eG6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sorry to say the service was good until the food arrived.  The soup was uncooked and a small piece of plastic was in my soup.  They didn't offer an alternative or discount. They also denied my claim and said it'd onion skin. I know the difference, it was plastic.  But things happens and it's better if not denied and a simple apology would be accepted as I paid fully for the bad soup. Totally uncooked. It's just a soup. How hard is to make that? Make sure it is cooked before it is served.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"param parkash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4GjTwUYwzDq_M1KDsLxtYNUaLlLQSsnVHDF3ZC-Xyz-4wozxNZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a good place. Me and friends had pizza and pasta plus garlic bread 🥖. I love the garlic bread 😍😍😍😍 and pizza (38) from menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHTuUIVdU7-r0Ld5Vr_BERGFuplSC-TRAxnxNq&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Zeinab Aboualy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr7iHnJB-s6QUi4eRMV-Lmcipyhv8gKmgv2tMcEk1dcSPuFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered lunch today  December 15th, for three people . Pisto, futichini and Lasagna, the price was $ 128, food was disgusting, disgusting. We ate so little throw the rest in the garbage . all of us got diarrhea and vomit. This place should be closed","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kimmy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqFvnLEM0whRo4uH8lPTjoTlgz4S_H2fMA3TF6e0k3D16y34LT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I really enjoyed our dinner at Roma!
Firstly we were greeted right away and had great service from our server.
To start we tried the focaccia bread which was so fluffy and filled with seasoning.
I decided to get lasagna since I haven’t had one from a restaurant in years, and it seriously did not disappoint. It does take 20 mins for the lasagna (as said on the menu) but it was worth the wait (plus there was live music so that kept us entertained). My boyfriend had the carbonara pasta and he said it was delicious.
We’re looking forward to dining here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD7VZ5WyzYLsKG_vbwqBfDYcurs_2l1np52w9w&fid=0x0:0xf4adc12a0ef89f16"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Kait","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdQWrOBSno6mfsV7fmOW5mfAt3rZRYPI9EocQUfyWsIPgnCtrs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We came in as a party of 2.  The restaurant was not busy.  The corner we were sat in was freezing cold and once the food was served we were not checked on even once.  Could not ask for anything since no one came to ask how the meal was, my water was empty the entire meal.  The pizza crust was soggy and greasy.  The meal and the service were very underwhelming. I’d get it if the restaurant was busy but it was pretty much empty. We couldn’t even get our servers attention to ask for the bill.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Brian Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEemNKLBP3C5JptQoY3azcZi7PzpGVEl7SXpYXVYRvK7NsgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is absolutely horrible even by food court standards. Not authentic because it’s not even Thai-owned.  Ordered the pad sew and it had no taste. The “vegetables” are basically mostly onions. Ordered the Thai milk tea and it tasted like water with some milk.  Overpriced and bad quality. I would never eat here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZTNNUX0o0rqLaam0KuIhC_oZ1gvPwcqsOfPKl\u0026fid=0x0:0x45f24890a61d32a8"],"When":"2019-9-9"},{"Name":"C M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXahKGwJwckrNbbywm0FvsahFFOdrXPireznQanePBldg9kgnHxQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m not very familiar with Thai food, but I liked this taste. Food was fresh and staff was helpful. There are food court style seats and you can see the water view.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9d-hhB-Kg27MX7f4pjnGvrCYdnCfUfOOX5gs0\u0026fid=0x0:0x45f24890a61d32a8"],"When":"2021-7-20"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great authentic thai food!!  Perfectly made with great wok skills!  Pad sew beef medium and Thai fried rice chicken mild were amazing!  Definitely check this place out. Made in front of your eyes with a fire wok!  🔥 don't stand too close or you'll get burnt!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTrnLLuX6RWmAI2Hty_Pcc4vWUuoQHQwR6A3Yt\u0026fid=0x0:0x45f24890a61d32a8"],"When":"2019-9-4"},{"Name":"Vivian Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8tzMo3nwS7kerAcgusZMHzGfc5FaXOzKXi01CFuy3YmZqznz5Dw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the daily special Eggplant Shrimp Fried Noodle. I am satisfied. It is really spicy but it is good. The shrimp is very fresh. And we found a place to seat that has waterfront view. The price is very affordable too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyS44CYt0FH8TDcv41zYwCLWFsDFGb06Nb0dQr\u0026fid=0x0:0x45f24890a61d32a8"],"When":"2021-7-28"},{"Name":"Elizabeth W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEbAPwglJb_asmsFrGB-KktXJwggfZ48trAZn8UyKqQMFTJiWZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fast, tasty, and great price. I like the #4 with tofu. You can customize your meal ( meat options, spice level), and the staff are really nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz6Q0OQUoDMfVqt7EQU4Vgp73IVOdE6zY5FmTm\u0026fid=0x0:0x45f24890a61d32a8"],"When":"2018-11-2"},{"Name":"Rebecca Gutierrez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIz10EVpx08ICjR_XQxdPMKwj8AA7QTmRppJoReLA5YyjWv7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love this thai place! It's inside the marketplace. Great portion for the price. Their pad thai is never dry after plating, which is a big deal to me. That is why I drive from Surrey to eat here! Also, not a bad view of the waterfront!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnjjVFNxNUREx5ySvx97mL6itFgiyeQsFMbuyX\u0026fid=0x0:0x45f24890a61d32a8"],"When":"2021-6-7"},{"Name":"Spencer Moreau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdlRvxaAN0zP3qmSVtVAJac6ymbuOCM1tpr0dJ_kTyfqpvXE_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here a few times now for the chicken pad Thai and each time I was very satisfied. Super hot and made fresh to order, especially when the happy older guy is behind the wok.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMERZsDOvE05JbyPij0lqhrgSQDNqOmcwGXKg3M\u0026fid=0x0:0x45f24890a61d32a8"],"When":"2020-10-23"},{"Name":"Tombert Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPBxI_k-U_bsxEo5jgZCSGM6zCzad2priqCO4cybkQaaCfnZI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Bangkok General - medium hot - made on the spot. Tastes so good, pretty amazing for food court","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0_OuNNet_l3KBOiZgfe2BCXslePMMDukY8i-s\u0026fid=0x0:0x45f24890a61d32a8"],"When":"2019-8-31"}]

title: Ramen DANBO Lonsdale
address: 1445 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2H9
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alyssa Becker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY6yLOJC8FHbZyNnvdB9FRJMHiXeHs1u8gK7cue0KwMXsHcu5wBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great ramen located in North Vancouver.  We arrived at 8:00 on a Saturday night and waiting in line about 30 minutes to get a table.  While in line you can fill out your order. Once seated we had good within 5 minutes.  While we are use to waiting in line for ramen we thought we’d be safe because it was later in the evening but we were wrong!  Still - no regrets.  It was delicious.  Would definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPevlXdHFoTqlBk064mDabsiPGes4HqJknQZYU_&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Marina Ernesto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQEvjM1AkMxzyZd3RsU6MTkoDKhjWiPFtexf9Vj_7eaudTzr5i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This ramen spot is a gem, especially for vegan ramen lovers. You can personalize as you like, so each visit can be a bit different. The vegan ramen here is outstanding, with a flavorful, umami-rich broth and a vegan egg that tastes as good as it looks.
In my stay I went two times and had two amazing experiences, with no line.

One small caveat: when ordering the vegan combo with two toppings and gyoza, it came with a regular egg instead of the vegan one—something that could use an update on the vegan menu for clarity. But overall, this is a go-to spot for those seeking a unique, tasty vegan ramen experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7R2rVt92B8-orP5pF9WugpcgadoE77_plVtHI&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Yevhenii Doiar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvWRrMZXfrdtKGSECkg3LSRyWfb7z2eDIURP29Hu9e8nOU0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pretty good ramen with fair opportunities of customization, nice place to have lunch at. The only thing, I would suggest not to buy drinks there cause there is something wrong with their way of washing their cups.
The water glass had something black in it, like a tiny piece of rubber or a fly. The tea cup had a layer of oil on top of my tea, potentially the washing liquid. When I asked the waiter about it they just said that they will take it away from me, meanwhile I paid for it without any replacement.

But nice good ramen. I guess I just happened to be the unlucky one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgft4c0OU9F_DDSuiobZ3GreZN34FJFFwYMH4F&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Alicia C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5FZx59zq_1boLwx6VJi3MNlKYZ3f_bpTKTI_oZju90xHEIRQAGg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There was a lineup, as usual, the evening we were there. I reckon we waited for 20 minutes before we were seated. While waiting, you do get an order sheet to customize your order. From the type of broth, the richness of the broth, noodles to toppings and proteins.

Food arrived fairly quickly. While Danbo is clearly a popular choice here, I do think it's slightly overrated. However, ramen can be subjective so this is still a good option, if you are near to a Ramen Danbo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnMD1n9d3nJ8wOtCwvvEaSscuLMLqRam2WcfYs&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Richie Simpson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY4wUjlonS36CO_iMVM-sXqINdzArY0SeAXqSZf0FD4devpySxzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Ramen which you can customize!

So flavorful, different thickness of noodles, and the gyoza were all the best!

I ordered the thin which was very thin ramen noodles.
My wife ordered thick noodles. They were good...a bit thicker than the usual ramen noodles but not like wide fat udon like noodles.
We both got the rich broth and mine had the spicy added...which wasn't spicy really.

The gyoza were amazing whether veggie or pork.

The staff were all perfect and sprung to life as I yelled "Oishii Desu" while leaving.

I really felt like we were back in Japan again! Till my Suica card couldn't be used to pay... The seating felt close but yet still had plenty of room to be comfortable. The service was top notch and really stands up to serving with pride and honor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiVJx5icf-37vEf4t_FVL40kZUsZEMrs2IZfhj&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Danbo on North shore! No line up after 9:00pm on Saturday. Their ramen is simple everyday kinda ramen. Tonkotsu based broth with some variety such as miso and shio

Reasonably priced though it will add up if you choose add-ons. Small place but with quick turn overs.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjPMpbNvUEV3dpIjKS6f_fHn1dhVLZFfQpPiV3&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"A B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCcuZOwKS-6B_U4QrjbIvS-wiVw0TRl7NfrZZxIIy1_MWzbVNKUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally, a legit ramen spot in the north shore that isn’t catering to the neighbourhood (speaking of the ramen spot besides chipotle).

Simple and straight forward menu. You can customize the way you want your noodles and broth, and have the option for the red spices to be taken in or out.

The prices are very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxx24MFF2_2Wd4m0b1--Po1WPr6bBfWbsnxAbJ&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Naman Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqyHFTpE7RIHr--lG_q4QyYb_Mr043-EbuODelIBp3AguHK00l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"How can I capture the taste of this Ramen in this post. The miso broth is out of this world umami and rich. The flavors are complex without being heavy handed. The noodles are perfectly thin and chewy. The chashu is delicate filling.

However, what blew my mind was the Chashu Pork Danburi. Basically just wood grilled pork on rice. Don't let the simplicity fool you. The charred and smoky pork is melt in your mouth rich and too good. This should be a menu item by itself.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgdhEMF_Kpl2cIks8MMPjWh2oLxBq8TqhKoQQK&fid=0x0:0x73b5df837d5f7d21"],"When":"2024-10-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Renan Nicodemos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRQm-Me4q4JVoP5YYcJ3TzhDK_ELxdhLbuvWQmIn2MSMr6woiLOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been ordering from Rosemary Rocksalt for a while now, and they never disappoint! The bagels are always fresh and delicious, and the variety they offer is fantastic. The team is incredibly responsive, and they go out of their way to ensure every order is perfect. Even when an item is missing, they quickly find a solution and make the experience seamless. Their attention to detail and customer service is top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for quality bagels and great service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs1qZ-Nfq-aqP5YI-aDaDEe3ZFJliu7YG9IqLm&fid=0x0:0xb539d77736432f37"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Have been to this location previously for their bagels and vegan cream cheese (from Living Tree Foods). Last day, I picked up a Too Good To Go surprise bag and received a dozen day-old bagels for $5.99. I was able to pick between sesame or rainbow bagels. A dozen fresh bagels retail for $16.95, and "lucky leftovers" are $10.95. They had an even better deal in-store the morning I went, which was 2 for 1 day-old bagels!

Pickup was prompt! They always have good bagels for freezing, that still taste great when toasted and 'brought to life.' While TGTG is a good option, they're also just as good fresh for a bit more money and you can select the bagels you prefer. Our family's favourite is their signature rosemary rocksalt bagels!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFe3AX3oomEN0Hvc2zIo0eTzk1nzBqgS5wkMim&fid=0x0:0xb539d77736432f37"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"David A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_LonqlQmTZwcwyJyQqGakRXp1JUxsD8ThkCc3__fNWL8W6n-Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I really like the stratacoma bagel from here but after reading some reviews I feel disgusted seeing where my food came from. I've been ordering from this place via UBER Eats but I think I may need to stop given the evidence of rats in this locations restaurant. It's unfortunate because the sandwiches always taste great and for that reason I'm leaving a good review. But if there's rats in this restaurant then I can't come to eat from this place ever again. They have lost me as a customer and I've been a repeating customer for the past month.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNaRJi9oaOyAwuTnMzviRyeakYWYv8_GiEey608&fid=0x0:0xb539d77736432f37"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Parneet kaur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpIGINjUasB_PcPEvJfUt7azsA9_g9US-rNLg_Xre_OzApLFs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service and mind blowing sandwiches. I tried the Strathcona sandwich on everything bagel. It was so delicious. Will definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjHyXi4JfeFjYFKh7xn88V1tbWyB0AKhcGN_yt&fid=0x0:0xb539d77736432f37"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Gazal MN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxiM9vbWvs6L14I9BW2Up8YaSQRQZ2rpd1FPfeC9zqMZoQYig0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Their MONT-ROYAL used to be absolutely my go to bagel sandwich at this location. However, over the course of time their quality has gone down! My bagel was totally burnt and inedible today!😖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOocv2p98wqAQ44CSdDTmfBri5Rirz9B33lVJoS&fid=0x0:0xb539d77736432f37"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Robie Malabanan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEtFp-hLdlWWaj_ODpc2vvYzy658pNrksKXr20_CikUK4wIKc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service with high quality bagel sandwiches. Love the egg and smoked meat sandwiches :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrTzjSZKxasY-70MwHnUCV1N164dDH5VemvgcN&fid=0x0:0xb539d77736432f37"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Ingrid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpVWYE02jGFs0A11ktEWI9H7CZbLJ9JYdf1YYkwmfeo5vnwA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’ve lived in Montreal for 15 years and had bagel for breakfast daily half of those years… and unfortunately this is not Montreal bagel ☹️
Tried their sesame bagels twice, because after the disappointing first time I wanted to see maybe that was just a bad batch.
The first time I had it fresh, and the dough was very sticky, too moist, and too sweet.
The second time I bought frozen (6$ for a dozen which is an incredible deal considering the fresh dozen costs more than twice), and made sure to toast it through.
Still the same! Nothing like the fluffy and chewy interior of a fairmont or st-viateur bagel. These ones stick to ur gum. The exterior is the only good part.

And at this price point… very disappointed but I guess this is what you get outside of Montreal 😔

I’m sure the 15$ sandwiches taste great but you don’t judge a Montreal bagel by its filling! No need crazy amount of cream cheese either. But if you try this place out then a sandwich is probably your best bet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe1UqPn5_JnbOn5lY8cZS5Lo8UFgYo_d4UTuc&fid=0x0:0xb539d77736432f37"],"When":"2023-4-28"},{"Name":"Ravikumar Gunturi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUTOQV8oDq90goaarU4x6ulfFQZ6d2Vj23PzVOG0pHnhgVms9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"People who work here are usually nice. My major issue is with the uncoordinated effort between them. They are not sure which one is your order when picking up. It's not that they have too many orders. Just lack of coordination. Another issue is how they force you to tip whole ordering online pick up. I am not a big fan of them suggesting a huge percentage of the order when I am actually going and picking up.","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Refined Italian fare, including pasta & seafood, plus international wines, served in a comfy space.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jennifer Prout","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFG3sID5k_iSx0qDGMNZngrrubg3FxZW14ndy5NF7i2PEedUWi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place feels like you have been transported to Italy. Wonderful community feel, kind staff, reasonable pricing, and impeccable quality. I always get so excited to come here, order a litre of great wine and have just impeccable vibes. Recently I asked for extra lemony pasta and they absolutely delivered. Please go here to discover your new favorite Italian restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXDHqw3O-4vPULpDAqZ2CuaJqheN2RuwM9b4yr&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Mark Olexson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVP0MMCJueIkT7Ny9a3t1yKGlm9DzCi8EhIjL62H0o1vjup2dfe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and excellent service in a cozy environment. Plenty of options but the fettuccine in lobster and shrimp rose sauce is my favourite! Don't fill up on the fresh baked bread, although it's very tempting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgqj-4b9eWPhzXoIuSCC-ebV8yuFDkXH_svdEY&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Noah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqkvV75G57oYy-ytQ6EJhJfxYAFBkZuQKsBrK94un0NnaUn3Cn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bravo Cucina offers a dining experience that feels both refined and welcoming. The menu is a celebration of Italian cuisine, with rich, handmade pastas, perfectly crisp wood-fired pizzas, and seasonal dishes prepared with care and fresh ingredients. The atmosphere strikes the perfect balance between elegance and comfort, making it ideal for a cozy date night or a relaxed gathering with friends. Attentive staff ensure every detail is taken care of, leaving you free to enjoy every bite. For anyone craving Italian food done right, this is a must-visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an enjoyable dinner here for a work gathering! Service was attentive and friendly. Our food and drinks came out in a timely manner for our whole group. I've had their linguine in a creamy curry sauce multiple times, and it never fails in its flavour. However, I ordered the Vitello Forestiera to try something new (veal medallions with mushrooms). The meat was tender and lathered in sauce. The meal started with a daily special salad, and the refreshing fruits (pineapple, mango) balanced off the walnuts and soft brie cheese. The mango cheesecake for dessert was fairly decadent, but made the perfect sharing dessert to end a meal.

Always like coming here for work gatherings and would return for a special occasion, as prices are more on the high end. Restaurant is in a good and convenient location!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuWaL7xzyEQj-9Kki-gFHSPhnYvZy0hSLfXqjq&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2023-6-30"},{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Warm late-spring day made the outdoor patio a pleasant spot to dine in early evening. Lonsdale, with noisy motorcycles, siren blaring police vehicles and other urban traffic, may not be perfect  but there are plenty of happy places to eat on this street. Bravo Cucina has been a fixture for many years and has outlived many other good restaurants in North Vancouver.
Two of us shared a Caesar salad and warm bread accompanied by a delicious white bean, garlic and olive oil paste. She had veal-stuffed cannelloni and I had the seafood special: prawns and scallops in a light sauce with vegetables. Except for the lightly-seared and slightly over-cooked scallops (my preference is a hard-sear and barely warm centre), all was well prepared. Server was a delight and prices reasonable. Worth a return visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORlEok2FS4k7J4LBj4pAWnptuu08TikyR8Ez1S&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2023-6-7"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hadn't been to Bravo for years, after too many disappointments, but I returned after hearing that some of its long-time servers are now actually running the restaurant! You can see and feel the changes happening - a long overdue breath of fresh air. The Fettuccine Cascardi (chicken in lemon cream) was delicious. Looking forward to returning and sampling more of the menu. Hope they start using an online reservation system soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPPBtGghyOO_OY9i6jb4HBFdUZNHcUNqrFYfWc&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"Carol Reimer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeMIr_kV_AfEa-0OCFREPPALakn_FLw8fPaYJcGxfLP-pyJM6O=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always fabulous!!  Cozy, quiet enough to talk with friends.  Delicious food.  Staff owned so they truly care.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaTw3mnOK8l8haAjS6bfO1ye0bRyF4XKnDg89neYDPBoOw4QlgPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Modern share plates - good for groups.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfzhNOL8UZBxWoXFb5Y35EjaKWT4nU9V55DAp5&fid=0x0:0x155d62137f341471"],"When":"2024-9-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sina A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImG1XHnGA_pQuHdzrDPWIi_n5QVeWW96WNVfV6rs4YcB-eIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As a Persian, one of the most delicious Persian restaurants I’ve been to. Price is slightly high but the portions are good and it’s very high quality!

Although, they brought the wrong salads and didn’t bring my Coke Zero which kinda sucks, and we had to pack our own foods which was kinda difficult since the containers were small. Only reason why it’s not 5 stars was service, but overall still excellent","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSOc24JXEEbn3C1INs1wsksuNR2nbCSTiHWKCh&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Mehdi Karamnejad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA6B5oES5Aw7ts20EuYjoTDlVn9saczAthf5ZxL-LVqat7pb8G=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food is pretty good actually. Kabab Torsh and Koobide is pretty good.
The service is meh, we were not checked on even once during the meal after we received the food. Even though they were friendly, I think they just don’t have enough servers.
They are slow it took 30 minutes to get 3 meals. Their portions are not that great. If you are going to charge for Tahdig you gotta do better with portions","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0x58Q5lfsGle_Y8P9qg5NBb7-fgGrxkIwJD4M&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Gina Grape","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjfpAS0e1J9DlXOCRvxRrfnAvo44TyYUw59aPp0ohD7GacQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great place for Persian  food.  Went for Lamb shanks that melts in your mouth with its succulent taste, and Cornish chicken that just tastes as awesome.  Relaxing ambience and good service from the staff.  We could use more bread though in the beginning  ;)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ6Os3nJBHI9CdXVJrjgT3MPnI2JamR2BNgkuU&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Minoo Yoga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWIRBE2dsxlBQYpeqPSiOzYby0bgbCmhGq7Jy_doDnxxr5i7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great dining experience at Sadra restaurant .The food was tasty and of good quality, and each portion was served with a variety of side veggies. The staff were friendly, and the atmosphere was clean and pleasant. Highly recommend! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOBat03r23Hig-aNzFqTVdSdeVlUsr3Ok4zgVB&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Hamid Hokmabady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7WZLyu_HOQmlaPNp7_DM2O2xqd1gC2SZfDODd0oflh-tyDjAc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited various Iranian restaurants, and our recent visit to Sadra Restaurant was quite impressive. Both the food and service were commendable. The lady serving us was incredibly warm and kind. The food quality exceeded my expectations, although I found the meat plate a bit cold; I would prefer it to be served warmer. Adding more traditional music could potentially enhance the overall atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPN8LuBADYpFMFvAiW8wiRmtsLI6sjqC1ANvkT&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2023-12-26"},{"Name":"Hanif hossein doust","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURFdZuk39m58otOiA87UmGPGdOAwMM03FhsmkfoNYSKH6It_2e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best restaurants in lower mainland;
Fantastic food
Great service
Reasonable prices","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcexrL2YZdj9JfZdmNJ4fOnfJAxl8aaO7lL-yB&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Rojan Javid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5a5V1XXPAk1QEKUvR_bnkhWEoAgtgrwXpqrFEP-DhIGVECzRL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious!! The portion of the dishes are great. I love how they include “tahdig” with the rice for each meal, it’s a great touch! The atmosphere is somewhat modern and the staff are very polite. We were visiting from Toronto and really enjoyed the quality of food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF-uBRtfOFlSXDHoTte_NxNKlBhix6IbBheeq5&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Mary Amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_wPdUtL-CYpV2n5n7XufIkG6LG_2JovTm8Q3k1x3ewL-tl_Zr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had hair in my food and I had to argue for refund. The servers said chef is not here we have to charge you. I was scared when the manager was angry asking me whats the problem. It's a nice restaurant with nice food if they could be more clean and better customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPEfPmf1cb5horhE4fa6l9vpM96kHFGK6uOvNg&fid=0x0:0xa36c798ce1c06dca"],"When":"2024-5-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"真下梨花","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIOlZ69e1S9-dqhb2bjg27L7pEWWq_gtZ_stv7qikUDj4tyg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their Blukogi was so good!

I personally prefer a stronger flavor for bulgogi, but since this is a health-conscious restaurant, I think this lighter taste works too. I’m not good with spicy food, but the kimchi wasn’t too spicy and was really delicious! The complimentary pickles were so tasty that I asked for more, and they happily gave me an extra serving.

Above all, the staff’s smiles were wonderful and they were so kind, which made me want to come back again! (I’m afraid I don’t remember their name but I visited there on December 13th at about 5pm) The smoothie I had for dessert was large, refreshing, and very delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjti_Oo9LDdXWXwMnLycLXctORi1qOD8bE-j9l&fid=0x0:0x82d71940cc4396c9"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Melissa Denise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmPJUZyg5bbjNmbLw_9Zpw5GxBBDSB1XEPNgj4DHq-_lkoMwmALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Me and my friend wanted healthy food after our hike, and we found this place on google maps!

The food here is sooooooooo good. They have so many different options: bowls, wraps, smoothies, etc. It was hard deciding what to get but we both chose the falafel wrap with a fresh squeezed orange juice. Omg.... I'm a huge meat eater but this wrap was delicious!!!

I love how there are vegetarian, vegan, and meat options here. I live far from this place but I already want to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9S8dOVMRmnGzBCxCpBdm0li7A5LODskHXZ2uF&fid=0x0:0x82d71940cc4396c9"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Bryan Rosenbaum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLJFg5ac7VBTF6Ek2eWk5UVYyNkCfqojAbsPrjz3sw-6GlSUVGHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Wela twice during our stay at the Lonsdale Quay Hotel. Excellent quality and lots of choices, in bowls and wraps. Vegetarian options as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHYoW0G6Zcn7kwehwZmkSIaXeiSoyidHmi3x83&fid=0x0:0x82d71940cc4396c9"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Picked up a couple of bowls and a smoothie (using my Plant Curious book coupon). Service was friendly! Been loving their Shroomami bowl since visiting their Nelson Street location, and it didn't disappoint having it from their Lonsdale Quay location! Their sautéed mushrooms are packed with umami flavour. It also comes with a good amount of edamame! At the end, we could also add pickled onions, fried onions, and sesame seeds as toppings (highly recommend their pickled onions). For one of the bowls, we were able to substitute the spinach and kale for some quinoa, so did appreciate the customization! If we had one minor issue, it would be to ask for more sauce. The creamy sesame dressing could have been more plentiful to cover the various ingredients.

The Vanilla Matcha smoothie was alright. I was able to substitute the whey for vegan whey/protein, but it was definitely a prominent banana flavour when I was hoping for a stronger matcha one! It was very creamy. I'd probably like to try one of their more tropical smoothies in the future! Would recommend for their bowls! There is lots of seating inside and outside of the quay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkJhtfU63ObmSsoChNnkmMFJqgc3trbSmExxb0&fid=0x0:0x82d71940cc4396c9"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Bjorn Julson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD8tYqVsFBex0AINg9nvvtuPkpRfUR5pXqbomGN7IkeYw1ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was made quicker than I could order! Check out the colors, if this doesn’t scream fresh, then I think you need to redefine the word.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwkHRKXZLKgowUQlTXpsioTyyRwALvI1Lq0Sc&fid=0x0:0x82d71940cc4396c9"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Rashaad Manji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1OsA7Y0FDUTIqltosGdOOWGcBzQ7oQLK1HqwQbqSkdqtSW505=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had ordered the Kale Mango smoothie, and I love it! Amazing service and delicious smoothie.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSR6TWoOVlhL1Gbo7qAh-1lqn7ABfuciPbnZ-c&fid=0x0:0x82d71940cc4396c9"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Varun Priolkar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8tBc3H6oUChXRrUs1uZKHcY9uobb6K0Zxab9foDWPLTkGxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Decent place for healthy-ish food. Taste is good. However use of seed oils(especially peanut oil) is unacceptable when they market themselves as health food store. I know healthier oils like olive, avocado, coconut are more expensive, but customers are paying high prices and deserve good ingredients. Otherwise there wouldn't be much difference between them and something like Chipotle, other than the healthy marketing.

Service, ambience was exceptional, no complaints there. I would have given lower rating if not for this.

I am giving 4/5 only because they market as health food store and would upgrade to 5/5 if they use better oils.

EDIT: i asked in store after comment below and they said they used sunflower oil. Would be nice to have details of oils on website.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs0M6SVBGVtK-fKHwLxnFC7xN7oLhUeL2D1-Z8&fid=0x0:0x82d71940cc4396c9"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Nicola Lake","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKH9HAjXPtfFpxn5b7Dug6MVe3raPkmEXmxnsgPxtHqYRDN-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Beef Bulgogi bowl and it was incredible. Nice sweet flavour, loads of meat and I’m stuffed and satisfied! Highly recommend to visit them at the Quay, lots of other little stores to browse too.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi on the North Shore! This place is always such a treat, and I can’t stop raving about it. Their salmon and avocado truffle oshi is my absolute go-to—I would eat it multiple times a week if I could. Their party trays are perfect for larger groups and are reasonably priced for the quality. The restaurant is in a beautifully restored heritage house, and the staff are always so welcoming. I love dining in, but I often order online too—it’s fantastic no matter how you enjoy it! We need more places like Green Leaf on the North Shore. Don’t walk—run!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOViveDtJgF_40X8mflw1qwddYvUTdamVOPMUaZ&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Gemma Boothroyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYT33iilC0hUrH_Kx1DApSbirTimOoVbSL3BKh-5kba7gU_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh me oh my, what a spot.

The oshi here is tremendous - and incredibly affordable for good sushi. The quantities are generous (I’ve never seen more tuna in a tuna roll than I did here at Green Leaf, and I’ve had a loooot of tuna rolls…), the service is warm and generous too.

We also had the avocado salad, not pictured here, but was fresh and flavourful as a starter! Was filled to the brim with avocado. Again, they proved they’re not skimping out in ingredient quantity and quality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFHwhTJOWnSOWsNmElBYj64fyVhyYYqGxm9Wku&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Angie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyUjdZQkz0bhaDppuQsySaOzrLROWSfhKe7zzOgxtMex30Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here for the first time - got their aburi platter - 6 rolls, 38 pieces, very filling. We liked it all except for the saba. The shrimp with pesto sauce is interesting, our favourite is the yukke tuna. All the rest are pretty standard aburi. We also ordered tako wasa - not enough wasabi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB9wOOqubk9BDalNOEqiHfH9k9jhe_4VFdEn-J&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"LACH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvoWLiWB1v-C_K87w2FdiHuLSxuwdlRyOdAjMTwOJj7KtAzibI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Phenomenal service. Waitress came over and ask each time new dish was delivered how was the food. They also refill the water 5 times without us asking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBwJ6_J75WVlDSCTnfsw6rpP6gI_e0DSvlp63r&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Chris Smithson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ZPoi52jJsVk3YfvB72BCAyHy11qZAAdFY0afBmDsM-cd3x8C-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Flavourful aburi sushi, A+ plating/presentation, but far too much oil is used, and the fish is over seared on top to the point where the entire piece of fish is cooked.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPV9YdWGMLMPNS1z4HCmIhdvdkYlKhK7Fr12re_&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"NewHigh Parallel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjGO8VbIakxKr3On9Tn2qzWGaPgevfkQ3K1opqLsNKWVaIhT3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently, a friend and I had the pleasure of dining at Green Leaf Sushi, and it was an experience worth sharing. Opting for their Signature Aburi Platter, we embarked on a culinary journey that left us thoroughly impressed.From the moment we stepped into the restaurant, we were greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere. The sleek yet comfortable ambiance set the stage for a memorable evening. The staff were attentive and friendly, ensuring that our dining experience was nothing short of exceptional.Now, let's talk about the sushi. Each piece on the platter was a delightful fusion of flavors and textures. The expertly seared fish added a unique depth that complemented the freshness of the ingredients. It was evident that the chefs took great pride in their craft, and it showed in every bite.What truly stood out about our visit was the perfect balance of sophistication and approachability. The restaurant manages to deliver top-notch sushi without any pretense, making it an ideal spot for both casual diners and sushi enthusiasts alike.In conclusion, our experience at Green Leaf Sushi exceeded our expectations on every level. From the impeccable food to the welcoming atmosphere, it's a dining destination that I wouldn't hesitate to recommend. Whether you're in the mood for a casual night out or a special occasion, Green Leaf Sushi delivers an unforgettable experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcrgkCG6X9PC3RvsndGzDXJPA9OqQqQ1SvalbU&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The taste is as good as always, but perhaps due to inflation, the fish fillets are getting smaller. It might taste even better with a bit more sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9qEwmBh3xmeru72n25Kslk0KCfnJE8p2GhHQF&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Nuri OHN (KR_Rainmaker)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWd1SudyL65jPyPeWcgId_TpUHmrUxBGmrxLFn_PEYkRm-9dk-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No complaints and perfect. It was our first time to visit and have a lunch. Taste and interior were awesome. We ordered Aburi platter. It was more ideal for 3 to 4 person. We brought half to home. Next time for sure, I will tip more. Sorry for being cheap today. If I tip afterward, I would pay more than I actually tipped today.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfD6HY5lC7wdLbJJPl-v-82BQR6qyeLZPQEtCQ&fid=0x0:0x87b9d2f18f1161f0"],"When":"2024-3-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great visit here. Patio tables out front are on a quiet street and have good shade, so they're great even on a warm day. House white was very drinkable. Pasta special was excellent, and the pear/brie flatbread is always good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObxgELMIOomMVw9DvtIWsBT1ZzeGVNn_NICzcg&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"carolyn kennedy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXSIrPkzNCfiSyzmsxc9iAK7MONN62s-g8GL1pYBCv-6rOYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Crispy cauliflower was delicious and crispy- I recommend to try this.  The burger was also good with a large size, quality beef patty. Fries were tasty and crispy-perhaps a little over salted. I will definitely eat here again. Thank you !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Telfer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMZyDwIXqYSPKspkyfuFeDUK5Imol4YuwfyrXHbzawmTQg0ZEAkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the food here - great salads, burgers, and appies. Great for cocktails and wine, not a prime spot for beer. The have a really lovely patio on a quiet street and a very funny, cozy interior.

Highly recommend the beet salad and power bowl!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPI6fKjuIegOA9pudwvfJqN90TAeXXJqWQFTLKR&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Alyssa Plausteiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSRN5KPCLb6PEOVBqsmwQHDR-QQgi0HbyZ-kREl4LdT84JDkk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I visited for the first time yesterday on our vacation. Overall, great atmosphere and food. As for service, our server with the short hair and glasses really went above and beyond well caring for our party. She was incredibly kind and attentive. I did notice that the dining room seemed short staffed, but our server really did her best despite it. Management should probably look at hiring more staff or maybe better support for their existing staff? Despite everything we will definitely be back and will recommend this place to our friends planning to visit Vancouver soon. Definitely a hidden gem, with great service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The lamb burger was a little charred, which I dislike, but was still flavourful and quite filling. The cherry cocktail and sour beer were delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZslLfgQdIEGtyZ8g0mBvhQesIlfBBYcpbFp1p&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2024-4-12"},{"Name":"Daniel Silver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJawI80c4qwvuA-pWmht_nhIypwFKNS8vUDHnZIepoqs0gJvft7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I really enjoyed the Crispy Cauliflower and Sundried Tomato Hummus appetizers with the first being a pretty unique dish which should definitely be tried.

The Finch & Barley Burger was good and I highly recommend getting the yam fries with them as they are excellent. I wouldn't recommend the Grilled Halloumi Sandwich or Pear Brie flatbread as these were out least favorite dishes. Overall a good spot with friendly service despite a few hiccups.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbLWE4ttndZKfsc76fXqujGV5i-T63oXKK7_n4&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2021-8-20"},{"Name":"Shannon Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdA9fI1D4sQbJdWkYLA0OO-hNdB9W9HBBN-of9Qaj-bl2HCFzy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great pub concept! Mediterranean style pub fare! Parking was a little difficult on a Friday night being close to a popular night life street. Music inside was a little loud for us so we sat on the patio. But atmosphere in and out were still great! And the drinks were fantastic!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gary O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxoS-FbJ8vYZQUB8LNUflczBtAZOBGAS9Bg2psXfXB7JWk9sAi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best meals of my life. I’ll definitely be back. It’s a busy place and reservations are recommended. Tried some cocktails and food and all were delicious. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP08DW8brojFQoBjMEPJGsYydJkVLbvNnYi3-VR&fid=0x0:0x110582240eab76b8"],"When":"2022-4-23"}]
