user_reviews:
[{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a long history of good market while next to the public transit. The first time that I went to this market was 1986. They are still under the renovation now but remain open.  The food court is small and not roomy while now.  Hopefully, they will finish it nicely later.
If you are a visitor, this is a good spot for you since there are lots of things to do and see.  It takes you only a few minutes walk to the Shipyard Plaza.  Don't miss this area.  They offer free skate in winter.
They had a big good view outdoor seating area around the old food court year ago.  The ceiling high windows all around is good for the customers sitting inside but we still have nice view.  The window can be closed or opened depends on the weather.  This is  a really lovely eating area for all.
There are many restaurants, bakeries, sweet, ice-cream and shops in the market. We didn't find any seafood and fresh produce fruits like before.
It's more likely a food place instead of market.
If you look for quick food, this is the best place for you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwdknfsha5wV7RjcDdhY51BtuXayX-I__FmqhQ&fid=0x0:0x396d6df57869e042"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"smile crafts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIb7zN2G_KSOloZj9rsHowXaCMuAaWaFQLau7K9JNwnF7Xa0hO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went there with my friend to the Christmas market and it's such a cute little place. Reached there through sea bus, perfect place to spend your weekend if you don't want to spend too much. Love the ice skating rink 💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxSr5dje6cq1qH2ckApJE6N9cI6A7tfACpVxvw&fid=0x0:0x396d6df57869e042"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Shahbaz Salehi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsbgr6SmAPEhFmhmcaR78qqYW_wrDDZL7lwNuJ2NTZt_LiQl41=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute indoor market place. They have food, gift shops etc. there are bathrooms located on first floor. There are 3 levels. It’s a good place to walk around and try different foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnKg-qkXXAKPZs4kvykJMc2OCYgyv6iylwEAKc&fid=0x0:0x396d6df57869e042"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Sam Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSeVO8E3yvku7uop8tLoVEGM_NaXzKBAia20QDNEQRDvXqDThPZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Many shops to explore and nice restaurants to try out. The outside yard by the sea is a great place to enjoy the scenery and appreciate the nice environment and great atmosphere to unwind, relax and enjoy any and various kinds of great delicious foods.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYIMylSToPP31gnRmaJdcfljQz1aaEysQG9asb&fid=0x0:0x396d6df57869e042"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Vitor Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwevxE5UXPkw9ApX5Fs6ulz4TUI9eLT7PRvXINLBBuq4ARi_ftNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing, this is an incredible Public Market with many many options to eat. There’s all kinds of food; mexican, pizza, canadian, asian. From soups and salad bowls to high-end bite size desserts and ice cream. I highly recommend trying to go on a day off/vacation, there is a lot to see and it changes from time to time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvg_sq_QM0MkjwMOo-nd5EBao1ZTM5mP9aKNaw&fid=0x0:0x396d6df57869e042"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Cosmo Kwan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB4JsBwE0uCK4wKlZRN8M9a3Yh3TUSvDluKgY2A2xaYEGmCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have to say i love this Market on the North Shore! It has a special feeling to this place. Follow by the 2024 1st German Christmas Market atmosphere is just so jolly and merry! Loved the shops inside the Market follow by the Christmas Huts outside the Waterfront area. Will be back more often during the summer! Will need to check it out during the New Year 2025 and the Spring/Summer seasons see what new and its events for this Market.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rick Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgl51VE-11ZQHoLrvu5S0KCm_i6Bwt16vq_3evtPm8uLm2KZK8Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Beautiful place to be on Fridays shipyards market live band food trucks .. boutique pop shops beer garden .. and host of in the night over looking Vancouver down town from the pier .. family friendly and fun night must try","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxnwYVAqxifBCgIII1G0epAH1duo34drTC4fTZ&fid=0x0:0x396d6df57869e042"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Digithaze Hobble","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmcmRRBqsf9aWAu6pA-wdn8j8p4VnRaYeylOOYV35c4TxuYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The market was conveniently looking the bay right next to the seabus station. From the pier, we enjoyed a clear view of the water, facing North shore. Our first stop was at the market’s food court, where we indulged in smoothies and coffee. Beyond the restaurants, the market offered a variety of shops, including candy, flower, and gift stores. Interestingly, there was even a chiropractor, acupuncture, and massage clinic on the second floor. Curious, we explored the shops upstairs as well. 🛍️🌊☕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb8JJQYsuO4kpmnr-GkXSOzCcNqnvQCZ-Oa4jH&fid=0x0:0x396d6df57869e042"],"When":"2024-6-1"}]

title: Jägerhof Restaurant
address: 71 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2E5
descriptions: Hosting live music on weekends, this eatery serves hearty food from Germany, Austria & Switzerland.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Catherine James-Davies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1l9CWJB95-za20TRElqoXVF9pbwXCNVYh6OZ0kDWkNx9SDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had yet another wonderful meal and experience at The Jägerhof last night. We have been many times over the years, as usual, we were warmly greeted and had exceptional service throughout the evening. We chose the Alpine Charcuterie plate and a special feature onion tartlet as appetizers,  the Expo Schnitzel and Rouladen for main courses and treated ourselves to dessert of Vienna Apfelstreudel and Crème Brûlée, all were beautifully presented and so delicious. The restaurant was full and very fun! The owners Christopher and Kassandra have done a great job running a unique, family owned restaurant that offers quality food with a charming atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUivrhSVVSbG5RgZ9-V_RdiS9qJv-CVhSH0YDO&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Connor Vadeboncoeur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbcvPAlRKn2JwLnXFmj0AHLwIektegOc-cSa_1fVF0vyn7Kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jägerhof is the absolute best restaurant you could ever experience. Everyone is so warm and welcoming. The server gave amazing tips on what I should try. The Austrian Beer I got recommended was amazing! I also got recommended the Daily special, and oh boy... it DID NOT disappoint... I ate my meal before I could even finish my beer. It was that good. I will be going at least once a month","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMv05c-gnYlV6T_8O6tllztPGKVgDEQ09AJ7w0N&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKyNxnZbOKuiKThmqj1fhIzFPAEzf4pHpid4eMlRu2gI0Wa3uHYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went on a Saturday night for the live music. The piano player was excellent and really adds to a surreal experience. Make sure to make a reservation beforehand, the place was packed! It's busy and chaotic, but that somehow adds to the experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmnCifBaT_ygDlgwLyF9vAdbFpo3Udr1KczDAB&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Emily Cramer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_B4oMUQ50pJ-nTK26prgCSkIzq12yuTBNgAR6essfxXo4SpOG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s a very fun restaurant, really unlike any other experience. Very unique feeling, with all the old Teutonic art and taxidermy animals in the walls, live pianist and vocalist belting out old jazz tunes. Food is great. My husband only wanted the pork hock; he reports it’s the best he’s had and it made him very happy. I had the chicken in white whine sauce, also quite satisfying and tasty. Worth the effort to make a reservation.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpNyvrxCSIFzaWXsvbh60FJcbwdzgmNlwUQG23SnZxq6dIQWI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When we walked past the restaurant, the outside decor was amazing. Old school Bavarian style. There was also live performances inside that attracted our attention.
Stepping inside of the restaurant, the servers welcomed us very warmly. We went without a reservation at 5:00pm and at that time you didn’t need a reservation but you typically would on a Friday night so remember to book one.
Now, onto the food. The food was amazing. We ordered a beer (Czech Dark Beer) and it went really well with the meats. We were sharing so we wanted to order a bit of everything. Out of the sausage platter, the venison sausage is a must-try. The Bratwurst also tastes very authentic and went very well with the beer. The Schnitzel was alright, but the mushroom sauce elevated it to a 10/10 immediately- the sauce is a must try. The Ham was a bit salty but paired well with the Sauerkraut and the beer. The third dish was the Schweinshaxe, but it kind of disappointed . The portion is of average/smaller size, and skin was not as crispy as we’d like it to be. However, the meat was very juicy and paired amazingly well with the sauce and Sauerkraut. Perhaps it was because we were in a rush and we kind of rushed the kitchen (the Schweinshaxe would usually take 20 minutes. Ours was in 15 ish). It still tasted great nevertheless.
If you come here next time, definitely try the mushroom sauce (Jager?) and the schnitzel. Also get the dark beer with the meat (per server recommendation) and the venison sausage. If you have enough time , try the Schweinshaxe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcA22JgLyKa7Dd1Gs6TfoxRkPWaqjphSqaK63R&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Aila Sin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8MgZXJGh2Udq48mzaMNH8FqwzoLdEJITvzQVTvQsse2QChQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm flabbergasted that this place is currently averaging '4.7' stars as the average rating. I think '2.5' stars would be extremely generous. My parter and I were deceived by the rating and decided to give this place a shot.

This has to be, hands down, the most sorry excuse for food in general (forget German food) I have ever seen or eaten in my life.

The soup of the day was a stodgy, sour, gluey mess that looked like something you'd get served if you were a prisoner of war. The "stone ground freshly made bread basket" was a couple of dry pieces of brown toast that looked it was from No Frills.

The Swiss rosti was DRENCHED in oil. I'm not being hyperbolic, but there was oil oozing out of the pancake when I pressed into it with my fork, and a thick layer of oil swimming on the plate when I lifted the rosti to look underneath. The lettuce on top of the rosti was wilted, grey, wet, and cold. My partner ordered Schnitzel - it tasted like frozen food, extremely bland with cold sides.

Service was mediocre, aside from bringing us our plates of food from the kitchen with a smile, there wasn't much else by way of "hospitality". The tablecloth and glasses were visibly stained and dirty. The ambiance was kitschy, gloomy, and stuffy.

99.9% of the clientele here on the night we visited were MUCH older folk. I'm not sure if that's the reason for the high rating - really old people with barely any teeth left or working tastebuds probably love the stodgy and bland bits fried glue the restaurant is marketing as "German food".

Not surprised this place is open only 4 days of the week from 5- 9PM/10 PM. I'm surprised this place is still in business to begin with.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWHQeFh305YxnZsfiymxxQoL0mE_27y-ZgJ7zs&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Hwee Koh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhqqKEI2nFBltb_QZU0XAqm6SHevU-3iWbyTMesf5SZzl7Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A lively and cozy restaurant with nice music playing. Love the atmosphere. The restaurant was busy and we were lucky to get a table without a reservation. We had the following items:
- Beet, goat cheese and apple salad
- Trio of artisan sausages
- Jäger Schnitzel with spätzle
- Schnitzel Dolce Brusco
- Bavarian Schweinshaxn
Everything we had were delicious. Wish we had room for desserts. We will return to try other dishes and desserts whenever we visit Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQm5MZ7QT3O6lU01RpkedpZ627WqalvfA_ZYke&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Thomas Tricarico","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhws5bVYDwmrI4nzI8NtjFY5tCFNmhM_PZ57tj9M9bdO7Dag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another great meal at Jagerhof with some Old friends. Reservations required here and they're only open a few days a week, Thur-Sun from 5PM..Reservations were made weeks in advance for this past Friday. Great service from Melanie, pleasant and knew the menu quite well and offered suggestions to try which we did. Started with gruyere speck biscuits which were very good, my Mrs had their Expo schnitzel stuffed with black forest ham and camember cheese with cabbage and spaetzle and I had the  Swiss raclette schnitzel with Jager sause with cabbage and potatoes...like the others had..The spaeztle was an ad-on. Our friends had the Wiener schnitzel and Jager schnitzel...everything was Really good. It was a complete  dinner with no room left for dessert but we did finish with specialty coffees while music began to play.  It was a most enjoyable evening again and thank you and your staff for a wonderful evening.
Mr and Mrs T.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuuPdzWpiCCK62gxcO4hqNciFmxCV1hb7_Q9o7&fid=0x0:0x653aba0057cf290a"],"When":"2024-7-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eric Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlU-3PL5lXr0fnWYaC3MgD7YEA-M3CKuKKccWmbp_HpzGChqE_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Sempre Uno is a hidden gem! The food is authentic, flavorful, and always fresh. The pasta dishes are perfectly cooked, and the wood-fired pizzas are a must-try. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, and the staff are attentive and friendly. Great place for both date nights and family dinners. I highly recommend it if you're craving genuine Italian cuisine. We'll definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYUE_rFKwDyNIf7kH-HH6wsVoGXiFcJgbi3mlx&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Colin Embree","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJemh8_zg8cMqAdL5tG0k_m025Sb06g7v22KOyFR_3NSNWYyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came for a birthday on a rainy Sunday evening. The inside is beautiful and feels a bit more dressed up than the other options on the North Shore. We tried a few drinks from their Negroni menu and were impressed. The salads and squid we ordered for starters were fantastic. All of the pasta dishes were delicious. The portions were surprisingly large, which was nice. Overall a great spot at the bottom of lonsdale for some higher class Italian.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnafYhOn8Nn7-I-f-LwbLyqgN3VezumwIc9OGM&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Margarita Wyld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVT3G-w3JgS-inerNOsld0u8R2bqYbX9IFT-VytYM9Bre31LUo-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family has dined here a number of times and always had a wonderful meal. The pastas are so so so delicious - perfectly cooked, great flavours, and the wine list is really nice as well. The waiters provide a warm and knowledgeable service, they are very friendly! I also appreciate the Italian music that is played. This restaurant can be good for fancy nights or more casual family nights - yes it’s white tablecloths and upscale, but never stuffy - definitely try the pastas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSaFijkIJQesHURdioU10SXiu5-vAi3Ylo12au&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Mark Nagy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNIrIe0ghYGH-XQcU9eUuwXGybf__prXFTcPPiHKoPlElLdGE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Magnifico!
Probably our best meal for the trip!
So good!
A big shout out to our waiter Bibby for the awesome service! We appreciate the suggestions they were first class!🙂😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAt9NBnkByePxOXd2hC4aYZO6vRlUWAH0x7g6y&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"A L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcWvY2Pd19Eeci2K4O3hkkV0s9bHnGUU-wE3SepzT8O_esP-Xj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a wonderful experience dining at Sempre Uno for the first time!

The atmosphere was perfect.  Some people were dressed casually, others a little fancier but no pressure either way. The staff greeted us right away and seated us at our table. There is both indoor and outdoor seating. I believe their outdoors is heated for the cooler days.
Overall great layout.
There’s an open kitchen and bar which is nice as well, feels very welcoming.

Onto the service and food! The menu read very well, and it was hard picking. Our waiter recommended a few options, plus went through some daily specials which all sounded AMAZING.
We ended up starting with the carpaccio, oysters (that were on special)  and a classic ceasar salad.
Everything was delicious. Our daughter had a smaller order of their Ragu bolognese and it was possibly the best bolognese we’ve ever had. (Highly recommend a full order!)

For mains we had the Lobster Tagliarini , mussels/clams in a Yuzu curry base (was one of the appetizer specials) and Scallop and Prawn risotto. Every dish blew it out of the park. They were SO delicious. It’s hard to find a place where every single dish is a hit. This was it.

For dessert we shared the lemon cheesecake and the Budino. Hard to pick which one was better but if we had to, the Budino!

The service was also amazing. Our waiter was very attentive and friendly.
The whole vibe of the place and staff were superb.

We will definitely be back!!

🍝 🍝 🍝 🍝 🍝
5/5 experience (possibly even 6).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmuHEwfsDs0EEH7CzXBTjwVxwStXqyuFEpxqt1&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Maya Andersen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJww3WBH6tsz_E81NCJeGrd0C_P6fT5K_IDQgvF3sXSJdJ5vnk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Sempre Uno for a dinner with my mom and we had a lovely time. The food was great we had the special burratta salad, prawn salad as appetizers and lamb special as a main and seafood pasta - UNREAL! Not to mention my non-alcoholic cocktail was super fun and yummy! Loved the vibe. Sophie was our server, coming back for Valentine’s Day and will be requesting her as my server again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUd38sS5MF3UWYFFv5aDziIr6Af5-PtQwmQKxe&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-1-21"},{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a great experience for our wedding anniversary. Most important thing, be prepared for an expensive meal. If you go in with any other expectation, you’re going to be disappointed. That is not a negative by any means it’s just an expectation. The service is top-notch and I would definitely like to give a call out to our server Morris, he was excellent and definitely added to the experience of the evening. The food was really good, lovely presentation, excellent flavours and cooked to perfection. My husband had the lamb and I had veal and they were both excellent. Just a heads up the lamb is spicy, which was unexpected and would’ve wrecked my dinner, but my husband said it was excellent. My husband had the testarossa cocktail and it was fun, definitely worth ordering for the presentation. It was a very busy night so we ended up being sat out on the patio, which we were hesitant about at first. It is very comfortable on the patio, warm and heated, our seat had a peekaboo of the ocean. You do need to be OK with people walking by but we enjoy watching people so that worked out fine. I have read some comments where people said it had an Italian “feel”. We personally don’t agree with this, the inside of the restaurant is very cold and does not have an old Italian restaurant feel at all. It is the total opposite decor of the restaurant that was there before which definitely captured the old Italian feel.  It’s very modern so we were happy to be put outside. Two suggestions, we found it kind of cheeky that we had to pay for bread at the table, considering the cost of all the other menu items and they definitely need to take the scented candles out of the little bathrooms. Haha I know this sounds weird, but it’s a small space and it was way too much smells.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2VZuyd_BQ_mMg8a2lBeHPlzG08W6IzWL6Npk_&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-4-15"},{"Name":"George Chatzivasileiou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvjVY_pLjYmxuEPhQ3w-uqtevJGoASxAG9o0qGG16ii5MmWAOn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loves the risotto - great flavour! Enjoyed a modern approach to prosciutto and melon served on a bed of arugula and topped with Parmigiano. I enjoyed it with an order of fresh bread which I quite liked - foccacia with herb inclusions. For dessert, although I am not a big cherry person, I did try the Ciliegie Filate but its not for me. Having said that it was a nice combination of textures and if you do like cherry, you ll probably love it! Lastly great service which I really appreciated.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcD_ZOZeMEHqkt5ojsr54NqAdDFBOkx8EDckSo&fid=0x0:0x13823003b4dff702"],"When":"2024-6-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small unassuming eatery in central Lonsdale!
Food overall was good and reasonably priced. Liked their satay skewers the most. They were very soft and juicy. Too bad they sold out rendang but sambal veggies were excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_pb-0rtA8xmx4QNL6-KLQ_9IZXRp8bQpl3d3F&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Tim Crawford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe3SGOEkSF3XrCAmNjNXRKCIj9Sf5U8-D6a9GM780W786-7O0RSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here from google searches and extremely pleasantly surprised with the malaysian curry laksa. Omg i finished the whole thing with the soup, it’s huge. Packed with seafood. Yummm….More reasons to come back to north van… Louis is super cool. Vibe is good. I found a new go-to for lunch when I’m around!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLWikv7Tdyy24t8ejZawU2_YrDtWvgwSc2rMMJ&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Arlene Herauf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSUCmMRdwMoYQntB6EcL6CeEXmF0TqoTuc39Uhv-Lit4l7kGYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited Tamarind Hill twice now and enjoyed our meal there both times. The first time we went for dinner and found it to be quite dark and cold inside. The restaurant is small with not too many tables but enough to still get a seat though it's quite close to each other, which we didn't like.

The second time we attended a family birthday party dinner and the seating was again, very tight. They pushed the smaller tables together by the bench against the wall and it was hard to get in and out, especially with a baby car seat.

The food was delicious with a large variety of Malaysian dishes.  We were glad to see that there were spicy and non spicy dishes, some more flavourful than others.  We ordered all kinds of meat and veggie dishes like laksa, satay, coconut rice, fish etc etc. The food was fresh and hot and everyone enjoyed eating. The AC was turned off and it became quite hot and stuffy especially after eating spicy dishes. The service was excellent and AC was turned on promptly. Overall we enjoyed our dinner and will return again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNux6c6eAOSRPw9r3es0O0qt25X59RZUBOhAQ8B&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2022-10-25"},{"Name":"Sandra Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy1lUFtw_zuiqbUdz24zqemK2qXm7x8ZGgzNdi3qENuU0BjgqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is always excellent. Food is amazing and service is always good. A bit dark inside, and could use a good dusting. Doesn’t stop us from going. In fact, we are headed there today for laksa.  Update **** lighting has been updated. No longer dark. Amazing improvement. Whatever else that was changed, it sure got rid of the dust. If you’ve not eaten here, you’ve seriously missed out in life so far.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update

Recently revisited Tamarind Hill and found the food to be excellent, the decor getting a little worn and the service perfunctory.  I reckon the server really doesn't want to be there, he was so lacking in interest or enthusiasm.  The food, however, was better than ever.  Two of us shared the green papaya and mango salad to start followed by Hainanese chicken, mee goreng and eggplant in spicy chili garlic.  All served piping hot and in generous portions.  The food definitely is worth returning for despite the service issue.

Been to Tamarind Hill several times but haven't visited in quite awhile so decided to have lunch there the other day.  Three of us shared a mango and green papaya salad, calamari, Hainanese chicken and nasi goreng.  The salad was very enjoyable - just a little bit spicy in a good way. The calamari was pretty good, though the portion size was on the small side. Hainanese chicken was very moist and tasty, would order again. The nasi goreng was meh, not a lot of flavour. Service was good and despite arriving under an hour before closing, we were not rushed out. The place is very small and even though only a few tables occupied it was very noisy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-Prxyezgcz_9QsNE-sVmKov7A7pgTk51l_WXL&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Mike Martinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLOAkJp2Q1yCjWcKFZ4eZ0yz-bzAFsSTdILZB9gkL_6LXSnt9KgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Singapore laksa here is one of my favourite things to eat in all of Vancouver and I make a special trip whenever I’m nearby. Flavour explosion. Super nice guy that runs the place as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victoria Shen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRF8C1lkAmvsRBpM1gCE2-f02y5IoOz2aPZtgSuYsnKyLxnOpo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"2024/8/17
Frank and I took Sea Bus to Lonsdale Quay and spent the morning there. We decided to have Laksa  for lunch, so Tamarind Hill was picked.
We offered Laksa & fried rice and they were good. The average cost per person was  around CAD25 tax & tip included.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP48ZdM7FGTjk0uRRAIxxfYF1GgsGgmUd5ZA9w&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Caroline Toledo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh3C31P2xpvptcJtW3gyJhOcWchMyln7AA1tszj9jcCHqbcoW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered satay chicken which was okay but the Laska soup was very good and also Mee goreng was amazing. I really loved it. It looks likes a family owned restaurant.  Just the service was not the best.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBSAw-KIswKjUjGO3gPCMCXKZ2MMsmv3jttNOh&fid=0x0:0xe54699419a6445a7"],"When":"2023-11-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fernanda Canziani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVu6uLOmkV4YVvfvoAV9GW3LEjONC_hfZZNWPR722fhKCNSx7tqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had my first experience with Iranian food, and it was fantastic! The kebab was incredibly tasty, the lamb was juicy and flavourful and complemented perfectly by the dill rice and eggplant dip/pita bread. The portion sizes were generous, too. I visited on a weekday night, and the place was nearly full.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOl2NG4DqBwiij_svbr68DZ8r33u44u0JoatWQ8&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Raad Saadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlQnT-rCTufI0eWe2KZSlXk8eUcfDOi6mWMjYZfgRE2L7IdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was really amazing, 10/10. It's my new favorite Persian Restaurant in town and definitely coming back.
The staff were really nice and accommodating even though the place was packed!
The atmosphere was great too and the music wasn't loud in an annoying way.
The banquettes were super comfy too, which is uncommon these days.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgdXX4TEK9UYiFFuP8ggH7nWpcQbEzpsxholHd&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Atlac Mdzh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmp8pn6U1S_KsOxdPvVN179SqKOQPaim2AxrOd-rorYkvJMKVF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice location and nice people, a few things :
Food tasted good, not super but still good persian food , portions were big and I appreciate that you can easily share, the bread was good , tbh I got surprised with the دوغ  or the Persian yogurt drink they have which is not hard to make but it tasted so watery no taste basically and yogurt bowl  was small not enough for 1 person. When you order yogurt they ask if you want in house bread which in many Persian restaurants is on house with yogurt when you order but here chair separately $5 or so , didn’t expect that neither but was tasty and fresh tbh , I loved how they put stuff in the side of your dish it’s nice and was fresh actually. We tried shush and  kobide , I really liked the  kobide
Love the fact the have menus with pictures
Thanks for having us

If you find my review useful kindly like or reply to it
Thanks","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKt1E9k6wjmX-SGLvord5jTWXzT4zTnTqJPNYr&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Samira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl26_X01AKboPrIEHlsjXoj5iqcLLzL1lJnvwXaMVPIOXx9As=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We live in Montreal and when we were on our trip in Vancouver we tried this Persian restaurant.

Awesome, it was amazing unfortunately we do not have such restaurants in Montreal.
The service was good. The Staff was nice.
It was a bit packed cause it was weekend. So you need to reserve in advance.
All in all,
I love it and it reminded me of the fabulous food of my lovely country 🥰🥰😍😘
The prices were reasonable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUvI84vnnnoKTbzKDgkM3fb3kA01szr5aUwuDU&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Floba Design Studio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-3Iw6fAygwK-55KLTdpKiNjn0G3wJJpe_BKq-5VhOzS7xqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Shishlik Restaurant, and I must say it’s hands down the best Persian food in Vancouver! The dishes were absolutely delicious, full of authentic flavors, and beautifully presented. The staff were incredibly friendly and polite, providing excellent service throughout our visit. Whether you’re a fan of Persian cuisine or trying it for the first time, I highly recommend this place. You won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtY2izJ1_fOGG1fIW0bUVHgqwgQe8TZ2vcYIU&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Fred Zibaei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYTUBSn76p_1OIT0cmP86YsOx1NbXz_95SgxjoFo9xCuZzT0PV9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had dinner at Shishlik with a friend last night! We ordered Loghmeh Kabab and Louti Kabab, which they were very good! The service was good as well, but based on the number of tables in the restaurant, they need to have more servers to adequately serve patrons!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDYU2XoqAb-danGEIEahkPl-daGiOvIPCNaQFD&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got Vaziry and Shandiz Shishlik Lambshanks with house Doogh drink. Everything was mind blowing. The environment and interior design were lovely, the staff were friendly and super helpful. The quantity of the portions were great, 2 meals were enough for 3 people.

Very reasonable prices for the food quality and quality. Highly recommended and will definitely comeback!!

Try lamb neck with dill rice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcdcks1cPibahOPfv1HBdqLuvEIdJ87S36pq46&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Ashkan N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGC9QpVpAYzkuU2nETbRxXDGZW6ZxU4DFK0Bytd5fdamCstw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Visited shishlik couple of weeks ago for the first time. The restaurant offers a delightful dining experience with its great atmosphere that truly enhances your visit. The ambiance is warm and inviting.
The food, overall, is decent. The kababs are particularly noteworthy—nicely cooked and delicious, showcasing the authentic flavors of Persian cuisine.
The service was generally good, with attentive and friendly staff. However, we were a bit disappointed when we requested to substitute rice with salad due to dietary preferences and were told it was not an option. It was disheartening to see all that rice go to waste. Despite this, overall experience was good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlj6thNaED2Dij86aQMIgifuA52Wgc4MODmXXM&fid=0x0:0x8d82164d63b14f8f"],"When":"2024-6-24"}]

[{"Name":"Eddy Sarkisov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG98v6-uWBVoVhhe0wZ5uf7FzYGcT0nyISnrGo_7Dxh1t7zdl_tQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good service and the items arrive quick. Presentation is great. The actual flavor is pretty good as well, just lacking something for the full 5 stars but I would be keen to return for another go","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtRhNR1GVtEoKb0lMC_nS8EA8eJE92O5d_XY8c&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Marc De Vinci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcOJ8mRMqlnBdsa6zASLgWNyKUnRRXZtxhrNdX2W80TpZxpOE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming for 20 years. Never been disappointed. Fish is always fresh, great selection of traditional fare and more creative rolls. Run by Japanese people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9NDQdXAksNQwd04y0ismlh_gsChCw78qKJH21&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quality of ingredients here are quite good, although I’m not sure if I would call it amazing. The grilled salmon belly is my favourite, as well as the toro. The soft shell grab tasted fresh, although a tad too salty for me and I quite enjoyed their rolls. I found that the sashimi slices were a bit thicker than I would’ve liked, but overall, quite yummy and I wouldn’t mind coming back. Service is good and the restaurant is clean and tidy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzDe2n7vflAvWNQMN-AWa2_MSndhFLyF1RQtqc&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"Andrés Ignacio Torres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgvhRq_LGeIym63Capp_XcT22lZsF_W-Xh0EIO2Ak0iCrCO2GU-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited this place by chance and was completely blown away by it. The food was incredibly tasty! Everything was fresh and nice, and the service was fast and very attentive. Definitely one of the best, if not THE best, restaurants I’ve been to in the Metro Vancouver area. I will definitely be coming back. Loved the chicken yakisoba!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MelIcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ94Agtw4l23RP9-_8KdG4izI-oP5yjugdF_vUbzwR1RiDbxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely fresh meals. Well prepared. Tempura batter is light and not soaked. The deep fried roll was so good and different from others I have tried. Great texture, flavor and filled me up.
Lots of choices to choose from. Quick service and extremely polite.
Will definitely be back to try other dishes!
Thank you 🙏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"O T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNMZRDyPmCXOIYr2knffcKqnpyxzie7qHVjFWoC2-ZmJX5_do-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The portions at this restaurant are extremely small and not worth the high price tag. If you’re hungry, I wouldn’t recommend dining here because you’ll likely leave unsatisfied. The food itself was relatively good, but it felt like we were paying more for the fancy presentation than the actual meal. For example, we paid around $50 for what you see in the picture, and we were still hungry when we left. To make matters worse, the service was rushed and unwelcoming. The waitress kept pushing us to leave because the restaurant was closing at 10, which came across as very rude. I understand needing to close on time, but it could have been handled more politely. Overall, while the food tasted decent, the small portions, high prices, and unfriendly service make it hard to recommend this place. There are far better options out there for the same price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLY3lN7JeRzn-S4xkAv9QHPvrN_plVVW_yqpSB&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2023-9-29"},{"Name":"Lyubka Krasteva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyK1DCK3Ze-EiSYqmbHpnqcl2kgY7-HDuLhP-wDVSJWQ3ysYkftA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’m not sure if my experience is because I went to pick up only an hour before they closed. But for my meal I ordered no rice and extra veggies, I got a total of 1 broccoli, 2 pieces of red peppers and 1 carrot and a ton of bean sprouts. I genuinely was looking forward to eating vegetables and chicken. Not bean sprouts and chicken. I personally was expecting a lot more colorful vegetables. The chicken in my dish was decent. The other meal that we ordered, the chicken looked like it was breaded and soggy. I was very disappointed. I’ve attached pictures for reference. I couldn’t go back to the restaurant to fix the issue as they would’ve been closed by the time I drove back to them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSjUxIPZnuuP42PUU_Ehacy7diVpt-D-xPO87D&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On a cool November evening we decided to focus on hot dishes at Hachi Hana.  We ordered chicken yakisoba, spicy agedashi tofu, BBQ salmon cheeks and belly and the Hachi Hana sushi combo. The yakisoba came out sizzling hot; a fairly generous portion and quite tasty. And proper buckwheat soba noodles. The salmon was likewise a good portion. Would have been perfect if the skin was crunchier. Not much to say about the agedashi and sushi.  The agedashi had just the right amount of broth so the tofu stayed nice and crisp.  The sushi combo was fresh and good value.

Service was attentive and polite. We were cheerfully greeted on entry, the server helpful about menu questions and tea was refilled promptly.

Overall a very good experience and will return again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOeJxX47fUb156vZat2RvvXdgi8vSXO6q9vbR6&fid=0x0:0x6e2c938210a1abf"],"When":"2023-11-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Roja Andii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiU2kkNRvcx2AWGX87jP0xQL3-D5Ecc9G7UykBg_ttiiyd2UEW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed our meal; the quality was excellent, and the service was pleasant. The atmosphere was nice, but we would have preferred more of an authentic Korean experience regarding the atmosphere.

Generally, we’ll go back there again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNa7oPKxl1nQ0uBwiAlI_M9U_TfGuiKehKwurJs&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Hanan Arab","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcfw3vWTebVqbghiiqOsFiI9mSwHxeibdNavhwakZ-sy2IPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food. Very friendly staff. And excellent service.

FYI, though, the MENU HAS BEEN UPDATED.  So, lots of the pictures on here are no longer available.  I have attached photos of the current menu.

We ordered the bibimbap and the soy garlic chicken. Both were absolutely delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoq64q2nYKImYuEHgK8XBrG5IRvgM_0z2uSnTF&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Aila Sin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8MgZXJGh2Udq48mzaMNH8FqwzoLdEJITvzQVTvQsse2QChQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Absolutely disgusting. 🤢

I ordered the tuna kimchi jiggae. It was so stinky, smelt like rotten fish. The soup itself was SO SALTY!! My lips were stinging a few minutes after I began eating from the ridiculous amount of salt. I paid a whopping 18$ for a bowl of stinky, fishy, salty dirty dishwater.

I don’t know who the cooks or owners of this restaurant are, but if the owners and cooks are Korean, I have a question for you guys:

Do you have any pride in being South Korean? Do you have any pride in your culture’s cuisine? If you do, why are you fooling customers and serving such rotten, MSG laden, salty food? And calling it “Korean food”?

I lived in Seoul so I know how incredible real Korean food tastes. Please don’t go to this restaurant - it’s garbage food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCRqpKAd6H90EeLisJI6DFhNzoUYxl-qOol1Lx&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Tommy Byun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQhlW94B8T2fhww-HWh0iFh-RYIvFitfF4mjJX2E5t_heAv3Lb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"UPDATE OCT 2024:

The menu completed changed since I visited last year, so I was a bit disappointed for not being able to get the dish I liked, so me and my 3 other friends ordered fried chicken, 비빔냉면, 뚝불 & 돼지고기 김치찌개.

fried chicken & 뚝불 was alright, but 김치찌개 was subpar, and 비빔냉면 was shockingly bad. No taste at all on the noodles, and only thing you could taste is the spicy flavour. I am a believer of no-food waste and I usually dont leave any leftovers, but the 냉면 was so bad that I couldn't finish it. It was the worst one I had in my life pretty much.

I have told the server after paying for everything, that the 냉면 needs to improve to be able to sell. Hope it gets better in the future, and I will give one more try ordering other dishes, and I really hope they are good, because this used to be my favourite restaurant before the menu change.

Question to the restaurant: did the chef change along with the menu?

2022 REVIEW:

A great place for a Korean dinner over a wide selection of drinks on Lonsdale.

Could feel a bit pricey, but the food definitely makes up for it. Some menus are not as common as the ones you see at a typical Korean restaurant, and it was exciting to see a few creative dishes. The staff was friendly, and they had variety of dishes for us to use for different type of food we ordered.

If you order the spicy stir fried squid, make sure to ask for the fried rice with a remainder sauce!

Strongly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGo3viVwmw0xk5vczAEReiowcGfUHcALxDz-df&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2022-8-13"},{"Name":"Ian Bedford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_F6Ox9wo8tsLpIOSDDynb4iMk7zpEHee-hkr48D4FH1TjGO0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wife and I came to try Bukchon and will definitely return. Service was excellent from our first male server and then from Amy - genuinely nice people. The bulgogi gimbap and ramen deal is great - lots of food and excellent value, not to mention it was delicious. Impressed. Mango Mochis for dessert were the perfect end to the meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5dnnBVShLOlJqE4hcMQqgsKgIncFkHTSK266V&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Cynthia Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIgJLEixmBFSpcdPUrxPS8B5Ns_vUpaafkJvloW58On3Jj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here for dinner and was surprised the menu changed. It wasn't what I was expecting from their google review images so that was slightly disappointing. It's more like a Korean snack bar.

I would say their tteokbokki is a must try! It comes with tempura and is quite filling to share between two people. Servers were friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkz9Q8-1pSBgTfQ0wjV5HL8NX-Jlee7jInoCE&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPbk-web2pK2sfSW-iwa9OxoGBCL6__d16ddmsaqGTAZclKrJubQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lady who served was kind and the food was fantastic! I tried the hot pot ddeokboki and it was not very spicy and had the right amount of sugar, so it was good. The sweet potato fries that came with it were so delicious! 😋","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John S. Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY2Ep7ch7V2UQQStkfKRCyZc0k9VeqhcTlPhj83vVQx0-nqsPqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Did not know what to eat in a Friday evening. Did a Google search for Korean food and this place stood out. Was not sure what to expect. When we got in all the servers are very friendly and kind. ordered the traditional dishes in a Korean restaurant and they were so good. Very authentic , possibly the best seafood pancake i ever had! Very good bibimbap. Food is a bit spicy so you should be aware of that but I do love my spice. Spicy seafood udon was fire. They have some craft beer on tap but next time I should get some Soju! If you like Korean food this place is one of the best in the north shore! Seafood dishes are awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqApgvrHYOGJaiQGg3SJ46KBOimqBRaa3eYbuv&fid=0x0:0xea2e4bf47d5189f6"],"When":"2023-11-26"}]

[{"Name":"Rahna Swii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0vbFHYZui6YwWZADvebdid421Vz_1-SKxc9aB42VBpntDOnIb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely phénoménal!!! I got the Jess poke with garlic chips and the jelly noodles ….it was a whole nother level of poke. It took me a while to choose cause I’m just indecisive in general but I would go back again and again for this bowl. Omgosh!!! and their Yuzu lemonade made in house is so delicious especially on a hot day. Great service, fresh food and great atmosphere. You will see me here more often 100 percent. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwlObaj3-V_qI384nr9G7gqKEXYJhU5aotDkQy&fid=0x0:0xbc4be5ee471251bd"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Lauren Noble","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISrD7u0r2PHiY8F2Y-0P6M5Lxi57bmaEJcR3OjzZgKOmWmRGY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My new favourite poke place, they are quick, friendly and the food is tasty. They also have machines for self ordering if that’s your thing. There are a good amount of topping options and avocado is a normal topping, not extra $ like other places!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPxBPpxKHLj7OvY3AN5C-WsYd2EX_1MJv9oHeb&fid=0x0:0xbc4be5ee471251bd"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good little restaurant for a quick meal. Had the Classic Poke with salmon & tuna and the Pink Poke (grilled salmon).  Both had a nice fresh taste and decent portion size. Soba noodles for an extra charge, but worth it. Probably a better place for lunch than dinner.  Service was polite, but unremarkable.  I found the seating to be quite uncomfortable and so would order a takeaway lunch next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO90rMAGS24W0EZFkkE4lf8C03PGhks6nBb6B1h&fid=0x0:0xbc4be5ee471251bd"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Kay Jiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUncM1CcE069_iitI_R9GtCmUC7_CaMSM1OOIJvZO2eHKmly5HR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My boyfriend and I are avid fans of poke so we eat it quite a lot. Decided to try out this place since it’s right under his gym. We were quite surprised how great the portions were for the price (especially compared to other Poke chains). The bowls tasted great, parking is a bit hard to find but would definitely come back here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdIHflwPZ1pD_6DNG8REZv5yHWOip-23C0jn6X&fid=0x0:0xbc4be5ee471251bd"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Gary Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7yqiCoYI22AhCGvzb1rjxsOjn6ecwWZwfvpujCyzXz1sHNw20=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food!  It would  be great if there is an option to reduce the amount of rice by half.

This is our new favorite asian restaurant in Londale for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvXOyxnCFs0HN5uCTVFIa2B7Be3lV9ITjfYPWT&fid=0x0:0xbc4be5ee471251bd"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Carol Reimer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeMIr_kV_AfEa-0OCFREPPALakn_FLw8fPaYJcGxfLP-pyJM6O=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous!   Fresh, tasty and healthy!

Our only regret is that we live 2 minutes away and haven't eaten there far more often.    We will definitely return again.

Thank you for a great dinner.  All 4 of us enjoyed it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"CJ Koyanagi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp5WNqOGTQEP8wtkV6KS3Lhoq66fn9dWyOivUlpPyvj92gWWY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"MOM'S Bulgogi rice bowl - the BEST rice bowl I've ever had! Every biteful was a wonderful surprise for my taste buds. Very pleasant and efficient staff - keep up the good work - would highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC5O0ORQ06ajV_NMAwHXU-ymRUjvpAE7PMMnZ8&fid=0x0:0xbc4be5ee471251bd"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Kimberly D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8h7YCz4CKN35cUZuRzxi5Ui-JEII2xMD-HDnXgQelK1JZ12LY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I were so happy when we saw the sign that a poke place was opening so close to home. The portions are very generous, and I love that all the toppings (including avocado) are included in the price. My favorite is the spicy salmon poke bowl, but the beef curry is wonderful too. The pickled veggies are amazing. I wish I could buy those by the jar to keep on hand at home!The fish is always fresh and the best ingredients are used. You can tell that they care about the quality of the food and the staff are so kind and friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNym-kp9In6Y1fTsED7TPdGpDySEf_XNklmm5uj&fid=0x0:0xbc4be5ee471251bd"],"When":"2024-1-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came with a few friends, and the servers were super friendly and chill. Great wraps made with warm fresh meats. Nice and clean, a little chilly because they kept the windows open, but it’s understandable considering the roasting chicken and beef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHEVoMWmUJoWX-7uFMSskt3mQayv_UxjISYRs5&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2024-1-22"},{"Name":"Akram Hashdari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCdjEMM8SEkgqT6zwDRopN3ZZOWIhUoq-OxxdRTqaESsIOFNSxTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're craving fresh, healthy, vegetarian food in a peaceful environment with positive vibes and great prices, Lonsdale Best Falafel is the spot to visit. The taste is as authentic as it gets—truly capturing the original flavor of Lebanese falafel. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raif Weston - Real Estate Services","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgo3Awp_AeJN_a9cowvplRMkyhJUWl-z6wC4NgW9IYMfv2A1HHtg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1st time here & the chicken shawarma plate was amazing, I couldn't fault it. Such great flavours from everything and the music takes you straight to the Middle East. Highly recommended!

I just returned to make sure the chicken shawarma plate was still amazing and it was even better than before! The char on the chicken was delicious and it was more food than I could eat. Absolutely amazing 👏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf8v5Z3YKTR6hvtYl83ZKfMIn9oKvebesSSV2t&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2022-10-5"},{"Name":"Georgia Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG5Lck04a7WApEkamCJTik_GXzCj9C5fH6GktQHR94rUzxHkx7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My go to place for excellent meal that never disappoints. The staff are lovely always very friendly and kind and always do their best to make sure I leave a very happy and no longer hungry customer. Their chicken shawarma wrap with all the fixings is my all time favourite. Always tastes fresh, chicken is rich with flavour and just a little crispy on the edges and the sauces just tie it all together, and for an added special bonus if you’re extra hungry I recommend adding the fried halloumi to the wrap for the extra cheesy richness. Also highly recommend the fruit drinks mango is my favourite. I’d recommend this place to anyone it’s just that good. See you soon best falafel, you always leave me wanting to come back again for more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roxana Albusel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8evtGokfiNno0vtrcTLJlyoINs1rXQMg92lDyK8UbX_CRFgf4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Best Falafel so much, the food is always amazing, the staff there is sooooo very kind and friendly, I've never had one bad experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKRq0FxHJw4JR3960_X-GwYkN7YpVyUAc5JdCi&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"__","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURtewwsqVG5PO3uKPn3OOA0FnfaP0WZtSfpikwyWKQHm8YamdS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"After hiking nearby at Deep Cove I wanted lunch someplace nearby the Superchargers, and fortunately I found this place.

I woud highly recommend for a quick falafel lunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmCzok1YWkDxSOVTAUIHSJrHQsfkHzs4j_N9BE&fid=0x0:0x82a9ddfcf55a1211"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very tasty Shawarma and Falafel! [{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't been to a good Mexican restaurant in ages until Tequila Cantina.

Food: 5/5 - food's fresh & tasty. We had their Thursday's special of any choice of meat or veggie burrito. We opted for the Birria (juicy beef) & Carnita (Pulled pork topped with pickled onions, cilantro and jalapeno). We were given nachos and sauces to start us off. They offer daily specials for each day of the week. We both enjoyed our choices. There are vegetarian and vegan options.

Service: 5/5 - our friendly server helped recommend what to order.

Ambience: 5/5 - great vibe to the place

I'll be back to try their other dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHX9zn-tqJ1ywpxeAgbVW-l3GItc2Wd9G5Zr_2&fid=0x0:0xe2f5badc5f9a7ef7"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"On Friday nights there is live music and the atmosphere is amazing. Feels kind of trivial making a 1 star review over chips and salsa but we ordered 2 servings and got likely 25 chips total. Like in both orders COMBINED. That was 8 bucks for that. Woof. [{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My partner and I came here for dinner a few weeks ago. He ordered the teriyaki set A and I ordered a veggie combo which includes cucumber, avocado and yam rolls. The service was good and the food was yummy. The restaurant wasn't too busy so we didn't have to wait. We had some leftovers and asked for a take out container. We were asked to pay for this. Overall, we had a good time and we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6m-_Ef_sEoYu9l8Kw__Hz527kwENDzdo3E8d6&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Ss W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO2c5mKnbli1BnGAmVNeFTG8cuiptGfaoGASzlUNOFP4ApJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’m sorry, but there are definitely better restaurants in Vancouver that deserve a top 50 spot. This one? Not even in my top 500.

The presentation was okay, but the taste didn’t quite hit the mark. I ordered the Teriyaki Chicken Don, and the texture of the meat felt a bit off—almost like it had a slightly spoiled quality—and there was a gamey smell that I just couldn’t handle. That said, it’s priced around $15, so I guess you get what you pay for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEvqgtbTq6LDp3vfR5X4YuWbYnSHQy5PJ0RPna&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Thedishdetective Lala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD_tj6k6xpF8R8uVmPtHQuGBgjvefVOKaKmqeE1mkWnmvdyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"JL Sushi & Kitchen
Location: 140 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2E8

Overview:
Located on Lonsdale Avenue in North Vancouver, JL Sushi & Kitchen offers a range of Japanese-inspired dishes in a casual dining setting. During our visit, we experienced a variety of items, each showcasing different aspects of the restaurant’s culinary approach. While the meal had its highlights, some dishes left room for improvement.

Service:
Upon arrival, we were promptly greeted by the hostess and seated without delay. The service throughout the meal was attentive and friendly, with our waitress making sure we were well taken care of. This level of hospitality certainly enhanced the dining experience.

Rating : 8/10

Foods:

•	Tako Wasabi:
The Tako Wasabi featured seasoned octopus paired with a hint of wasabi. The balance between the savory flavors of the octopus and the sharp kick of wasabi was well-executed. However, the accompanying seaweed portion was somewhat sparse, limiting its potential as a balanced side element. Despite this minor shortcoming, the dish was enjoyable and satisfying.

Rating: 8/10

•	JL Poke Bowl (Brown Rice & Avocado):

The poke bowl, featuring brown rice and avocado, was underwhelming. While the ingredients were fresh, the portion was smaller than expected, and the overall flavor profile lacked the depth found in similar dishes at other establishments. There was nothing particularly memorable about the dish, and it didn’t stand out amidst the other offerings.

Rating: 6/10

•	Lonsdale Crossing Roll:
This roll combined prawn and yam tempura with cream cheese and crab meat, topped with avocado and a special house sauce. The flavors were rich and well-balanced, with the creaminess of the avocado and crab working harmoniously with the crispy tempura. The special sauce added a delightful finishing touch, making this one of the more successful dishes of the evening.

Rating: 8/10

•	Katsu Don:
The Katsu Don, featuring deep-fried breaded pork and egg served over rice with Japanese soup stock, was another strong dish. The pork was perfectly fried, maintaining a crisp texture while remaining tender inside. The seasoning was well-balanced, and the dish as a whole was comforting and flavorful.

Rating: 8/10

•	Oyster Motoyaki:
Unfortunately, the Oyster Motoyaki was the least enjoyable dish of the night. The dish was overly dominated by mayonnaise-based sauce, which masked the flavor of the oysters. Compared to similar offerings at other Japanese restaurants, this rendition was disappointing. The portion was served in a platter-style presentation, and the overall taste failed to impress.

Rating: 4/10

Ambiance:
The ambiance of JL Sushi & Kitchen is functional but not particularly remarkable. While the space was clean and comfortable, there was nothing about the decor or atmosphere that stood out or elevated the dining experience. It’s a suitable spot for a casual meal, but it lacks the visual or experiential elements that might make it more memorable.

Price:
The prices were reasonable given the quality and quantity of food. While some dishes didn’t quite meet expectations, the pricing was in line with similar restaurants in the area, making it an affordable option for those seeking Japanese cuisine.

Verdict:
Overall, JL Sushi & Kitchen provides a decent dining experience, with a few standout dishes alongside some that could use improvement. The service was a definite highlight, and the reasonable pricing makes it a viable option for those in the area. While there were some disappointments, particularly with the Oyster Motoyaki, I would consider returning to explore more of the menu, especially given the quality of the Katsu Don and Lonsdale Crossing Roll.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5Oh7RTFBdyeUWPm-wxLwQippuMA9bLnbi7hVu&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Chloe Genargue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcB97SzXsMD6panoq_G9yq28plXwWkj0h7AznJw7Xc37ypMfg5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A few blocks away from where I work. So convenient to grab a quick and affordable lunch Sets.
You are getting the quality of what you’re paying.
A massive portion and selection for the Lunch Sets.
I ordered my set with the Salmon, it was pretty dry. But still okay to eat.
I love the dynamite roll and the tempura.

The servers were so pleasant and friendly.
Glad to know Lower Lonsdale has a great neighborhood restaurants to dine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1m70A5jk3lJF9GJXlBuekgHn8oa91SGq8r8WL&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-3-20"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi store! I came here and enjoyed a lunch box, we also had the sukiyaki beef don. Both were delicious and a good serving size! We both took leftovers to go and had it for lunch the next day!
Super friendly service and a well kept restaurant.
It got busy at lunch so it's not a secret that it's a gem.
Will be returning often and I recommend you try it out too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0obzOi0hXXt64dgyqY-cqHolWCAr_Gk3w4RbD&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-2-29"},{"Name":"N S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXRzLQNzAm15UlBfX7COiltDgIbuvu3aoCf80fqVOqJb7EEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service, very friendly chefs and servers! And the food was very fresh and tasty!! Also talk about bang for your buck, huge portions compared to any other sushi in its area! Thank you! You have yourself a customer for life!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abdelrahman Khalaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2jHI4KfqcSaV3xQ_vuzOHPSCzM5tStwL7T9jnOX2wCZGamqfc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely five stars ! Special rolls with tops are amazing in quantity and price, tried volcano and heaven and recommend heaven big time. Basics ( Musi - California- Dynamite ) are in good quality!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkAK9Ql00y5PZVOydemm9w5lI1csG3Y21Y30to&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had a very good oshi lunch special for $22 which was a great combo of sockeye oshi, gyoza, tempura, egg roll, and cali roll  with miso soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjNyxrCNKDlCrLOeBi2p9EbsNPEN9T-Z5xK2Xy&fid=0x0:0x54af63e105f36f8a"],"When":"2023-11-9"}]

[{"Name":"GH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjL7JVV6ausdnP45ZqwT_MXpeCtJK50ZS4aFzmUFU_4i3_4eA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the only Korean-Chinese restaurant I go to in this area. The food is, of course, fresh and delicious, and the staff is as friendly as always. The atmosphere feels like a hidden gem outside the city, so much so that it makes me feel like I’m traveling in Korea.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpuxHbBn0AyEdixNrxZgVQjvK6aCoKF7S3vQum&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Clare Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk8vaI8odicOm4apSk77_C5_lBI2gd1LxngMFranmQFokEsPvD-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"9/10 homey unfussy food! Best bang for your buck when the food is shared family style. Top dishes were def the black bean noodles (nice that they offer veg option) and the seafood noodle soup. The texture/bounce of the noodles is perfect.
The omurice and dumplings were just okay. Altho it was very kind of them to give us the dumplings on the house.
Service was fast. Very impressed by how one sweet lady can serve the entire place.
Atmosphere is hole in the wall but that’s how you know it’s good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbtYVmou0WFa-1lyi1_PV2ZjolqjRuMPT_RYuO&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"bupoko s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTVXAY02lFQD8GsrbBJdEpfn3z8bGiPjw5uB17iUQmX_MCGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food sold here is always delicious and fresh. I felt the deep flavor that I eat in Korea.

If you are looking for a romantic atmosphere with your partner, don't expect much atmosphere, but if you want a really delicious meal, I recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-js-98X3cHgmiikVxlyu6I8kehQK20wElM5GJ&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Y L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV236YiWDAw91lf0BivhX8vPLApY6lFjId9AQG1MMNy3GQCimu9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food tastes healthy and home made. A little bland. Expected fire taste from wok, but not sure if they use a wok here. It's worth a visit if you live around here but definitely was not worth it for us coming from downtown.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJrOQ_LMsOQsom3qykaRwP4Ypr_0-DefPxu2H_&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"LJL Films","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCgSeNULZxYSN1RX9TsWUKfoxsI5VRIlsDI6c8zvdgRlAQV60=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is so delicious! It’s my favourite place to get jjajangmyeon! All of the servers are so nice and helpful. The L7 lunch special is my favourite! It’s a good deal and the portion is big too! Thank you to everyone at Ga Hyang Ru","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMksOKH9dQtr_0hFBC9IG6HiSsCymtrTK1McKxq&fid=0x0:0x4ef1ed265bc799d6"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered Seafood Fried Rice w/ Jajjang and Kimchi Fried Rice, the large one but in fact its not that large, tastes so so, but service is fast and friendly.
