[{"Name":"Syeda A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLA1b-5WhasR1TM5GKZxAAXbVs_p0jRSvE9SGmvE7yNJo7qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at mehman wonderful restaurant, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. The food was not only delicious but also beautifully presented. The service was top-notch, with attentive staff who made the dining experience even more enjoyable. The ambiance was cozy and inviting, creating the perfect setting for a memorable meal. Overall, I had a fantastic time and can't wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNy0HFUxl3czgeGW118iFdU0qkoNxr3KkMW1Tit&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Sam T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYH2HlvznSHM5eDKRYBfXJd81lY8LS-lnOduo3uvXHcfViqR_E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have tried almost every persian restaurant in North Van. Here's my experience with Mehman. Food was ok. Got the Lamb shank it was good. But it could be a bit more tender and more stew.  Not sure what her name is. The lovely girl who served suggested an appetizer with Youghurt, which paired with Lamb shank pretty well. I went there after a hard hike and she was sight for sore eyes. Very kind and welcoming.  She deserves a raise. I will be coming back just to try out other foods she recommended in the menu. Thank you for making my day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9CQX7V9eymaxCJC9e1mwMKNYhcZYShkddZbfq&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Jalal Khouhak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVclqVH87OZmLXh208eHQQGPnJIjocfhvuF158JR0_LSB-gls0t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We got “Jegar” with their amazing freshly baked bread! The Jegar was great but if they serve it in smaller piece it will be cooked better! The staff are super nice and polite, with their amazing hospitality. Btw, their washroom was not clean! They should clean it more often:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaC2ati51neqiTngUkQrVL7TPq-qu23f4bB_jO&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"mojee m","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRCV36UAR_R_b9Ypj9Hj4QQlgjImyCyMTqSKbZtDvaDWFrQU5f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"⭐ 1/5

I had a very disappointing experience at Mehman Restaurant. First, I was surprised to find that we had to pay for our order before eating, with an expectation for a tip without even tasting the food. There was nothing particularly special about the food or service to justify that approach.

The worst part was seeing a mouse in the dining area. When I informed the staff, the response was very casual; the server just mentioned she was scared. When my wife asked if the manager had been informed, the server said the manager was aware and "sorry," but there was no direct apology or acknowledgment from the manager. This lack of concern for hygiene and customer service is unacceptable and made for a very unpleasant dining experience. I hope the management takes this seriously and addresses the hygiene and service issues immediately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdsj7wH3UrV8cmHEGQPRMiVoL0jXfB2J4CFYuS&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Mahshid Danesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHemIacwbk0GiNirEHYhbh0Eay7-WDGcghfSitdUwN-1Yy1UzL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Barely you can find jigar kebab in Vancouver. A fresh baked Persian bread and well cooked jigar with fat! Thanks to Mitra for her great service and kindness.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB19ster8W-k_IcZS0JZpt1Yj1rlSWSr03srTC&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Sam John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEQkBEQv7b1GBbxGySzoDQyABH9L76RKafkp3_QByEtFRfCRfj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I traveled out of town to visit this restaurant that I found on Google Maps. It had positive reviews, so we decided to give it a try since many reviewers mentioned the delicious food. The reviews were accurate, and the food was indeed excellent. However, the customer service was lacking. The waitress was impolite and displayed a poor attitude. When we requested a bag, she refused, claiming they did not have any and suggested we leave if we were finished. We will not be returning to this establishment. I do not recommend this restaurant to others. I suggest looking for an alternative dining option.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoOp1-hUFp_A7uY3UTDspt8I1GdE2H3UAwQOqK&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"khaza hamim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9AEIsqGhRBU9-8ZP8dsEWjs0v_mQC8tOGcd3U8_leaxEx5fOOoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best persian resturant around Vancouver! The price to portion ratio is amazing! Each order comes with extra Nan with butter and other vegies. Taste is delicious, one of the best for koobideh dishes! This was my 2nd visit and I plan to go there again. Highly recommended!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMd0HYPQajewj_mCUvPBgnygUwCbOfoaT1GUL8N&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Aik Mubsir","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUk5RZaEBhtjsSRHVRAFInmX47TbsPbF8UOL-XLEsqcoxXI1JLWOw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Usually, you either get delicious food or large portions. Here you get both. Great service as well. Shafiqa really took great care of us just like a mehman.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIqNjJ8c4y8k-sNamvA9amOCPdcuXrrJjdaXo1&fid=0x0:0x71b4c4b229f124fe"],"When":"2024-5-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best spot in North Vancouver.  The location is good for all.  It's just located next to the Sea Bus terminal.
If you are a visitor, take the Sea Bus getting there is a better way.
They are holding the Christmas Market in Shipyard now.  Don't miss this event since it is great and FREE.  You can bring your whole big family but it will not hurt your wallet.  It's a free skate plaza there too.  Great for kids and rental skate are provided.
If you don't want to long line up for the German food, try go there on weekdays.  It's super busy on weekend.  The whole family will enjoy it but please wearing warmly since it is while on the seaside with water view.  There are a lots of restaurants in this area if you don't want lining long for food.
Try come there on Friday and Saturday evening since they have live bands, beer garden, market, food trucks in summer. The sunset and downtown view are perfect for some pictures.
It's also a good spot for watching the fireworks in summer.
They have a big water park in summer and a skate plaza in winter.
Lots of good restaurants  around it.  The Lonsdale Quay Market is a good place for shop and eat too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqrdn1On7lBFo2w3SWPcrKg4S4lmM3yDcM0W1F&fid=0x0:0x1fd7731462b9e2fc"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Bohdana Makarenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7L24PPn7DLA9zCSgNnqsrI1S-Dqh1aC5OTmckTXcMUKjDbBV61g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"During the summer, “The Shipyard” comes alive every Friday evening with its vibrant night market. This event is a must-visit, offering free entry to everyone. Stroll through the market and discover a wide array of unique and interesting items available for purchase, from handcrafted goods to trendy accessories. Food lovers will be delighted by the variety of food trucks serving delicious treats, catering to all tastes.

The atmosphere is electric, thanks to the live music that fills the air, creating a perfect backdrop for a fun night out. Whether you’re looking to shop, eat, or simply enjoy the lively ambiance, “The Shipyard” night market has something for everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkXpb-g3Te9V1D8nT2_puXRHBkya-NUZ8-Ko36&fid=0x0:0x1fd7731462b9e2fc"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Jason Rossetto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmK0T5xx4wK3HgM1cklp33BKNej3WA51hRyuvnH70JQYh0xCBj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to visit, very scenic especially at dusk. Close to transit. Lots of paid parking. Lots of top rated restaurants. I was dining at Joey's which boasts a really great menu and an intimate atmosphere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4LbbfObp46a_N9iIMo0pJzaAwtHfbzZytlnvL&fid=0x0:0x1fd7731462b9e2fc"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Randy Vannatter (Randy Vancouver)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXA4_J2kKqCfy52net3jr_46DfnAluk9Vgol7ONVDmHdfF6TfJ2ZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great place to discover. Went there in winter, has ice rink. Now it will have a Christmas Market until Christmas. Lots of artisans, food and galleries. Kind of romantic with the lights glittering against the downtown skyline. Took Seabus over and back. Another great thing to do.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6Ph99GC9lH2XvbVBhqGgF-Ru9CK6ZTV3LCRtJ&fid=0x0:0x1fd7731462b9e2fc"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Lennon Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwe_m6qYIEHATjSnml4gX-Y12vRQeIbn0M9ULVvCgz53d3E-gs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice area where you can see Vancouver's skyline! Lots of restaurants and shops nearby. There's a children's playground and waterpark just out in the open. Not a lot of people during my visit but I'm sure it can be very busy at times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV2Xnm3T4V5BTAroajiVeYw3OGpCsJmMPYtMwB&fid=0x0:0x1fd7731462b9e2fc"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Gregory Kehm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHwkFiN0ZimbmFXnCj5WuXUxSGZEVmb7k1zQTV7nSvkB1lvAhheQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A covered ice rink makes a lot of sense in North Vancouver! Surrounded by flavourful restaurants (e.g. The Nook), the Christmas market and festive lights and music this is a super place to go with family and kids.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNu5hYtKwt4Kiq4UTM1BT26UVz-1duPpT5VKGg&fid=0x0:0x1fd7731462b9e2fc"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Alireza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFO8S_5bnJ1Gbxa0DrJ-JDnEI06M_5nz8TkqZ51KiwdQjq5mRr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vancouver Shipyards on the North Shore is a cool spot to check out. The shipbuilding scale and views of the skyline are impressive. If you’re around, grab a bite at nearby spots like Tap & Barrel, Pier 7, or Joey Shipyards. It’s a real taste of BC’s industry and vibe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpKj7X0faqg76GoetUyLmdwLC3H1eXn5JISXon&fid=0x0:0x1fd7731462b9e2fc"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has completely transformed North Van over the past five years, with new restaurants, shops, events, and the art gallery. I can't wait to see what's next! I just wish the Quay would hurry up and be developed—it's taking forever.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsDjn0wLN1b3H_ulKU8uJrlbr_9Qz9Uycnghh8&fid=0x0:0x1fd7731462b9e2fc"],"When":"2024-8-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Emma F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0dlt8ocxLH7yPca2ojNkGI_PBBfsXKMNtqOXZnh4xc0FK3htC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love it. It's been several years since I visited here.I was at first sad that the previous Korean restaurant had closed. I was not disappointed with the current iteration that operates in this. Love the food choices, we were not disappointed and left with a pile of take home for later. Quick and friendly service at a wonderful price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu6XY0bgvJyE5I54WbpJTsKdtzq7lW0Cc6Akwy&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"John Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJregxc3_fCZvjsOnXVnua2b7W3a62231b72eOiaC_v0L6ydg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great quality of food with authentic Korean taste - can't praise enough the cold noodles (naengmyeon) and braised spicy chicken (dak-dori-tang). It's definitely one of my go-to places when I'm in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjKe1r9fZzBoAT5ODlkN13Al1yaAfrU0uXy6Iz&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Kimberly Pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO1dARYUL2Mzc-rZaF6IoFRL6CQVAIOAT6Zusl515wQAooebafSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"During our journey to Whistler, we made a pit stop in this area to recharge my car, and we took the opportunity to grab some lunch. With everyone in our group expressing curiosity about this place, we ultimately decided to give it a try. The establishment appeared to be well-maintained, and the service was friendly, albeit a bit slow. However, my friends were disappointed with their meals, finding them lacking in flavor and too plain. While my noodle dish was enjoyable, it didn't quite justify the high price considering the portion size. It felt like this Korean restaurant deviated from the traditional experience I usually seek. One aspect I particularly appreciate in Korean restaurants is the variety of side dishes, but here they only provided three small ones, and we had to repeatedly request more kimchi. Considering the overall cost, we concluded that the value for money was not satisfactory. If we find ourselves in the area again, we'll probably opt for a different restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkJluxGw-da_OpOqjKxgg74UL-u6Is-N1JRE_n&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2023-7-5"},{"Name":"Kara P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjg1k6HQ3dTSLd6-3GD__tca76hpSq2TW047xZX9CkdCgr848=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my first visit here, the foods were all good!
Especially the Dakdori-tang was perfect~
and also server was kind, The atmosphere here is also good. I love bori restaurant! I assure you, I‘ll definitely come back~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJVMQjMoHNyyP9fuDk3Sxqsg1dpCwJhyWiC7ND&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2024-4-11"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My husband and I went out for lunch with my mom at Bori Korean Restaurant. We  ordered: Deep Fried Chicken, Seafood Pancake, Japchae noodles (vegetarian), and Hot Pot Rice with Fish Roe.

Flavourful, warm, hearty food on a cold winter's day. Everything was delicious but our favourite was the Hot Pot Rice with Fish Roe. We'd never seen this on a Korean menu before and it was wonderful. I always love colourful dishes and this dish was colourful. It was also a nice change of pace from ordering the standard Bibimbap rice dish that we usually order at Korean restaurants. Fish Roe are tiny but it's amazing how such a tiny ingredient can make such a huge difference to food. It really elevated this dish to another level.

Service: Could have been better
Parking: Free parking on Lonsdale or on some of the side streets
Location: 2039 Lonsdale Ave., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs2Gz6e1uRIr43tTed9hp9A1XyfNhtdzK_rrJG&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2023-3-15"},{"Name":"Sofia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnRDJPI394nftETjhBj_4CdCVx6Riikpgayv9ibcRPZSAjv7U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall nice Korean restaurant, I had the spicy beef soup it was delicious but I wish they could adjust the spice level like other places. Their banchan is great, they won’t refill unless you ask. No tea offered, I feel like other Korean places offer a bit more of the real Korean experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dylan Hendricks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQA2q_i_cbvFJmt5oGxZ7BA4GKrRPCLdlqYIQQi_N7sjF5Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The spicy pork dish was fantastic, as were the side dishes. Wasn't the biggest fan of the fried squid (quite stringy) but perhaps that's more of a palate thing.

One thing is - stay away from delivery. It truly doesn't translate well. You're much better off enjoying all the dishes in person on their piping hot stone plates and platters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODs54ItB4iSuPMcq2Rfq7e4itBxT3rJWK140r-&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"Yu Jie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIDzlgjJNPXRr29zbwqfO_jj0-acIeBUPJBr6ENweCt7Kck1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food, good price point for quality authentic Korean food. The restaurant is clean, well lit and spacious. Servers are exceptionally friendly and accommodating. The staff are very efficient and we did not wait long for our food to arrive. The dishes were plated well and bonus points for pretty plates as they looked amazing for the food photos.
Food had good proportions and were flavourful. The seafood soft tofu soup had the most ingredients I have ever had at a Korean restaurant and with a delicious kick of spice. Unlike many restaurants that use way too much flour in their seafood pancake, the seafood pancake at Bori had a nice crunch and was refreshing with the green onion base.

Overall, the atmosphere is great for families and friends. I can tell Bori puts a lot of care and effort into their dishes and you will walk out satisfied. There is ample free parking around the neighbourhood. Will be back soon to try their other menu items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkVbgI7lIIWDqSPYZbcABzkyOdd-T5viiPlSnn&fid=0x0:0x7e1c5a0e477e91dc"],"When":"2022-8-23"}]

about: [{"id":"from_the_business","name":"From the business","options":[{"name":"Identifies as women-owned","enabled":true}]},{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Alcohol","enabled":true},{"name":"Beer","enabled":true},{"name":"Cocktails","enabled":true},{"name":"Hard liquor","enabled":true},{"name":"Healthy options","enabled":true},{"name":"Wine","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Dessert","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true},{"name":"Upscale","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true},{"name":"Transgender safe space","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Reservations required","enabled":true},{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sumire Ninomiya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm-M5CCbH8omzg2hl1Ei1Uk1T7pnlAYQ5yqgkYgA6w3LfHZlT8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I reserved this restaurant for my partner’s birthday, and the quality of food and service did not disappoint. Each nigiri was made with a great care and love, and some hot foods in between were also presented very delicately.  The chef was super friendly and welcoming as well. We could tell how much passion he puts into the food he provides!

I told them that it was my partner’s birthday prior to our visit, and they wrote “happy birthday” on his dessert plate at the end! They even gave him a small gift (a bar of soap) and a message card with all
the workers’ signatures! How sweet is that!! Overall, this place is added to our list of favourite restaurants for special occasions :) We will be back in the future for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXJAApt_FyCVksN1zLg16RGEIjjqRDqwhv9qcX&fid=0x0:0x3755422c9d05a221"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Lina N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGYl-FoMQXVaIFWwUYxVGoP2xvtLJoQ_IvI3WulXiw5QzPSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was prepared efficiently and with thought. Each piece had unique flavors that mesh well together, and wow, was it amazing. Like the fresh prawn and shaved yolk combination. I've never eaten a handroll with cooked fish before. The sablefish handroll was delicious. We ordered a 3 flight sake sample and a lavender plum wine (highly recommended). The bafun uni was so fresh and delightful that we decided to add an additional uni order at the end. The place itself was clean and reminded me of the omakase experiences I've had in Japan. Parking is available in the building (free).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyggOKdO3vlBzttI3Gf0MpTaAOKSOSKG7kKZDw&fid=0x0:0x3755422c9d05a221"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Fiona Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5lvKafRBsY_1hHoEaNEQaidmUqlnI2-ULblOCoCi1q3D695OGzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I recently celebrated his birthday at ​S​ushi Mahana and from the moment we arrived, Ryoko's warm greeting made us feel welcome. We were then introduced to Chef Hiroshi, who prepared an exceptional omakase.  Each dish was thoughtfully crafted and a delight to eat. We thoroughly enjoyed our meal. The personalized touch of a "Happy Birthday" message on the dessert plate, along with a small gift, was a lovely surprise. We will certainly be recommending Sushi Mahana to our friends. Thank you for a memorable birthday celebration.!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcvaTGGwuIYTA5mjqHrn86SSJf6Tw_ZRQVI4hc&fid=0x0:0x3755422c9d05a221"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"E Feng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVajh-hpsxW4YzCMghVXxN-I_2gPN4a8rScTpIdsmq3ON_0d_SO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly tasty and excellent quality! The sushi pieces were beautifully presented and with well paired flavour notes and unique seasoning. Personal absolute favourites were the Tenshi No Ebi, Gindara, and Kinmedai. Huge thank you to Chef Hiroshi and his team, definitely will be coming back again! ごちそさま~~","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3DtYTp6mCBkMCSo2TePuTRyownE76XllRLrrf&fid=0x0:0x3755422c9d05a221"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"John lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHcEpe_rdGFT18X1xSq_zGAWTDJet6abEOGhjWIbqUaXkcOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great time at Sushi Mahana. Chef Hoshiko knows his art inside out -- the fish selection is quite amazing (definitely not easy to come by in Vancouver); each sushi is perfectly pressed and sized; the temperature is just right; condiments added on top are well thought out. There are about 15 pieces of nigiri sushi punctuated by cooked dishes, salad, and soups. The hirame with sudachi and sea salt awakens my taste buds nicely. Other highlights include angel prawn with egg yolk powder, kanpachi with sea grapes, kegani in Hokkaido sweet corn jus, and akami + ootoro maki topped with Bafun uni and ikura. To round things up, the caramel crusted tamagoyaki is more like creme brulee, and hojicha sorbet with purple yam mont blanc over crushed rice cracker is simply divine. Service is detailed and attentive. Highly recommended. Worth the splurge on special occasions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXY_A9fEtkrpoTEwnsCJzD3BlKwGTX8TPLiJx2&fid=0x0:0x3755422c9d05a221"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Marilyn Yeo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD7bZuv9AI0LpiPgvK5mqCryiLXQaNya_cPF_dgL1hRT72PJuITQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dining at Sushi Mahana was amazing! We came to celebrate my partner's birthday, and it turned out to be such a cute and memorable experience. They surprised us with a handwritten birthday card signed by the whole staff, gave him a small gift, and even sang "Happy Birthday!" We honestly didn't expect any of that.

The food was fantastic and super high quality. Our taste buds have been spoiled—normal sushi just won’t compare anymore. The staff were incredibly attentive and made sure we had everything we needed.

One of the best parts was watching the chef prepare the sushi. It would have been great to hear more about his journey with sushi and why they chose each dish for the menu.

We had a fantastic time and can’t wait to come back in October. They mentioned they try to change up the menu every two months, so there will be new things to try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9E4wO3peeM1jhPYew04Aeg_TgC0JQzd5_TQNM&fid=0x0:0x3755422c9d05a221"],"When":"2024-6-16"},{"Name":"Allie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX8BpQWnXLfGLokmKKosRlzEoP6eR0ESL4qdqkWhi6FXr2IKj3i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the best omakase in vancouver. every bite was 10/10. felt like we were in japan.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-kbnbdKU45qYeMo_1T2tWdrrLb1RQCOLcUrXB&fid=0x0:0x3755422c9d05a221"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Foodie Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6n06QAfqStqer1ZgBILsv-fiSHmrGRZuznSS1ny9iQFfb_Ognuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The establishment impresses with its favorable ambiance and attentive service, skillfully complemented by captivating lighting and decor that exude a palpable sense of sophistication. The visual elements play a substantial role in creating a distinguished atmosphere. Nevertheless, a noteworthy observation is the slightly loose consistency of the sushi rice. Considering the relatively high cost of $195+tax per person, there is a discernable expectation for the sushi to deliver an even more refined and exquisite taste, ensuring that every aspect of the dining experience aligns seamlessly with the premium pricing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYFcKRb71viekB-0zDe_B_CdJpdbK_u-axH1n9&fid=0x0:0x3755422c9d05a221"],"When":"2024-2-5"}]

title: Orto Artisan Pasta
address: 1600 Mackay Rd, North Vancouver, BC V7P 2M4
descriptions: Homey, family-operated restaurant offering handmade pasta, Italian-style fare & a seasonal garden.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Orto Artisan Pasta: A North Vancouver Culinary Gem 🍝✨

After bookmarking Orto Artisan Pasta for years, I finally indulged in a delightful lunch before exploring North Vancouver. The cozy ambiance and attentive staff made for a welcoming experience.

I savored the Pappardelle Bolognese and Squid Ink Spaghetti with scallops, prawns, garlic, and white wine. Both dishes were exquisite, showcasing the restaurant's commitment to authentic Italian flavors.

This charming eatery is a must-visit for pasta enthusiasts. I eagerly anticipate my next visit to further explore their menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN89fA_vyEn31DYtvTFJdgebsKI2fPg3H0Ej5Z6&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a great experience. Our friends have told us about this place for a couple of months, describing the venue, the quality of the food and the beautiful garden atmosphere. We finally found a time to visit and we were not disappointed. Unfortunately, it wasn’t a nice summer night so we had to sit inside but it was still awesome. Eclectic, fresh, great atmosphere and our server was funny, witty and engaging. I wish I’d asked her name but I will next time I go back, which is a guarantee!! The food was excellent! Rich, fresh….you could tell there was thought put into each dish & the process. I felt like I had stumbled across an incredible little restaurant in a small Italian village. To find a gem like this in North Van is amazing. I’ll be back again and again. Top picks: calamari, Caesar salad, squid ink seafood pasta, gnocchi & tiramisu. Not to mention how reasonable the prices are. Four of us had appetizers, 4 mains and two desserts, including a bottle of wine and our bill was $150 per couple, including tip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8Q9M2hQoB7YtK0Syc431RKkikMinO5a0d5-dy&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Jo-Anne Lodermeier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtPOeJ4LCMgl6Pb7aa1JrjQcuslbDpk7fgJTybJImHlEhldg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Orto is a delightful restaurant that truly deserves its five-star reputation. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere. The decor is modern yet cozy, making it an ideal spot for both intimate dinners and casual gatherings. We arrived during the opening hours, which allowed us to enjoy the space without the hustle and bustle that often comes later in the evening.

The service at Orto was exceptional. Our server was attentive without being intrusive, providing us with insightful recommendations that showcased the restaurant’s commitment to quality. Each dish we ordered was a masterpiece, reflecting the chef's dedication to using fresh, local ingredients. The presentation was stunning, and every bite was a celebration of flavor.

One standout dish was the bolognese which was perfectly cooked, with just the right amount of seasoning. The accompanying Ceasar salad was vibrant and added a delightful crunch. Another highlight was the grilled calamari, which was tender and infused with a beautiful flavor that complemented the dish beautifully. Each plate was thoughtfully crafted, demonstrating not only culinary skill but also a passion for the art of cooking.

The location of Orto is another significant advantage. Nestled in a charming area, it’s easily accessible yet feels like a hidden gem. While parking can be a bit challenging, it’s worth the effort to experience the culinary delights that await inside. The ambiance is relaxed, making it a great place to unwind and enjoy a meal without feeling rushed.

While dining, it was noticeable that the clientele shared a similar background, creating a unique community feel within the restaurant. This added to the overall experience, as it fostered a sense of connection among the guests. However, the atmosphere remained inclusive and welcoming to everyone.

Overall, Orto is a restaurant that excels in every aspect. The combination of outstanding dishes, impeccable service, and a pleasant environment makes it a must-visit. Whether you’re a local or just passing through, this restaurant is sure to leave a lasting impression. I highly recommend making a reservation, as it’s bound to become a popular spot once word gets out about its incredible offerings.

In conclusion, if you’re looking for a dining experience that combines exquisite food with exceptional service, Orto is the place to be. From the moment you step through the door until the last bite of dessert, you are treated to a culinary journey that is both memorable and satisfying. We left with full bellies and happy hearts, eager to return and explore more of what this fantastic restaurant has to offer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA6PIKcNZatAactDc_-8GlAWxxiKhzDO2ZZ9cq&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jordan Steinberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnvXZLxwwpYfgue59KTCiZiY4cXmCjOYXG6LTHpjW9QFbBIQ9N=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely place. All local ingredients and freshly made food. Service was perfect and quick. Definitely want to make a reservation but absolutely worth it. Went for our anniversary and had a wonderful time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB-H07jNs_5M4CXdKbFm7uPpwSYjUKhoilUVzH&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"A Sabbagh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUL-2va_MHC5Mgh04vuVhmt6hFnG9YfVPuqkR-OMbWb_bkNoxXuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We weren’t aware that pre-booking was required, however, we were warmly welcomed by the owner, Brigitte. Thank you, Brigitte, for your hospitality!

The restaurant has a cozy indoor seating and a beautiful garden-style outdoor patio, which is simply amazing. While there was a small hiccup with our order, the overall charm of the place, the delicious food, and the friendliness of the owner and the staff, more than made up for it.

A lovely restaurant with fantastic food and great staff. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRN8aChnWAgQXkOpqRWowmbMbiazs50Hb5AUOP&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Chi Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIG_YAsoeyvRTVt3BDDgEIzENhMLFfB2DKDNLYoaUdvWjrxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cute place with a great atmosphere. The staff were super friendly and service was quick. Came for dinner and we ordered the duck leg special and the mushroom Alfredo pasta, with a glass of prosecco. Both were delicious and will definitely be back to try other items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgowY8lQcuxzcKpmb8FCooeo76wZmZPEquBcaQ&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Anna Romeyn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS-9iMgS0_gCkM9o5I5bNyBueCz3Gv99UcJcEARpr3DQ7JAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently dined here with a larger group and I have to say it was one of the best restaurant experiences I have had in the city in a long time. The food was absolutely delicious and the service from Sam was exceptional. He is a true hospitality professional. The whole group kept commenting how perfect everything was all night. We shared a few different appetizers (the Pear and Gorgonzola tart was life changing), pastas and finished with a selection of incredible desserts. The spread they put on for a group was not only delicious but also excellent value.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"E J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrvh4CbdP6FQQxMyj7Ing9kTE03rzh86JIpgFN_ZRhysfntmzi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovey restaurant, the patio is beautiful, especially in the summertime full of greenery.

The appetizers were so good and filling that we barely had room for the mains.

The pasta was so fresh that every bite was a power bomb.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOptmAd_cFZhN8iGvciPRrdknF2eXephhw7mwN8&fid=0x0:0xf6e8aa51f45b12b4"],"When":"2024-9-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Emma Werthemann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfSAhUghDXfM0JNoZsHASQ7KdI4PfE9OJOTOx7OBvMTGOLwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rice and noodles is a amazing restaurant!! The food is really delicious and you can see how much the staff enjoys to cook! The food is really made with love and right in front of you. The atmosphere is very chill and in general everything is well organized! Very very lovely place!! Emma and Claudia ❤️❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuur7nwLN1SBl92NxvJvziENP67mZDFMn5hEF6&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time trying this place out. Searched Thai Food near me.
I asked for Tom Yum with no tomatoes 7 spice, got a curry dish it looked good had lots of spice but I said I asked for Tom Yum.

The other server was really nice about fixing it but when they brought the correct soup it had tomatoes in it and practically no spice!

Language barrier.

No one's perfect I guess.

I don't think I will come back especially when it felt like the cook just had to take a look at who got a wrong order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe52OiuQCrvbHzSIYyTFrfgzyohesSdwueIKrp&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Greg H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLS42NOGEGDpuFyEpOVCT4MpAfYJRSGGJb74YYTSy7FNARaiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered take out. Food was on time and came as prepared.  But the quality of the food was really disappointing. Pad Thai was bland and dry, with the chicken being particularly dry. Chicken satay skewers were basically not edible - dry and hard. Green tofu curry had decent flavor but the tofu was dry and chewy. Overall not good enough food to ever order from here again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX5OupUQlYEyXIONuF9OrBEy6ps-rJAaIfpFiS&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Jayne Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVehZJKmm_F-UVczi0tJH3Ltubk-03r3LMGoGyU5znQAzuxXdh4pw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have now gotten take out 3x in a row from here so I feel like it’s safe to say that we love this place! It has been challenging to find good and reasonably priced South East Asian take out and this is so much better than what I was expecting! I feel like I’m eating the food of my childhood. So far, we’ve had just the Pineapple Fried Rice and Coconut Curry Soup and both have been fantastic! The Gyozas are also very good! I took a point off for atmosphere because I don't think this is the kind of place that is intended for dine-in anyway, but it's clean and fairly spacious for the size should you wish to stay. The food was also ready right on time and the portion size was quite generous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpyfrXf63VfELGK8OdxqOsiSuK86yg6MVI1xEV&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-3-31"},{"Name":"Alexandra Grant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXePX6GZpWSlrAO1xBHbmOVxKn0iHfKAD6ff-li37TjZNDhPDOG-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pad Thai was great! It didn't taste as fresh as I would have liked, but not bad. The service was very attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHz0224qGWrZXtogDyHcCmTT4_neYf5io79YEQ&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Jewel Bernal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoP8VLfOFXX4-I_VGJd5oFIg-A8RpcBTu5M8ZTJnh9P5nYTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ambiance of the store is impressive, and the crew is warm and welcoming. I thoroughly enjoyed my Laksa from Rice and Noodles Restaurant, which was packed with flavors and ingredients. It was delicious and provided a satisfying experience for the price. I always order here because of the quality they offer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP-O5IyKsfGS8GDA3TKmaWBSKSE20vzTmm1ovb&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Alexa Freudigmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5lps1YQgh69OIDyJHo6S2Ebpvk8kqOmESG1I0nqMjhg1pNqc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time happening upon Rice and Noodle and glad we decided to stop in. Super tasty fresh food, flavours are spot on. The counter service was friendly and prices are fair. I had the Laksa - spice level 3 was perfect. Definitely more flavorful than other Thai or noodle options on the Shore. We’ll be back for sure!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjgeKL_c2Bo607fkTEBeZDIROm3eyjXtCHdZVd&fid=0x0:0x25cbd361b7dc12dc"],"When":"2024-5-9"},{"Name":"Heidi Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmz8Uuw7dDEcf5eczBY3WsTelcr7h4v5T_Ne7TYvqui1m871w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best pad Thai I’ve ever had. The ingredients, seafood, etc., are extremely fresh. The staff is friendly , smile and humorous, which is nice to see in a restaurant atmosphere that is informal . . I also have to say that the restaurant is very clean which is something that’s lacking along Lonsdale. I also love that they’re open late. Some of us work the night shifts and it’s hard to find good food into the late evening.. They seem to be busy up  the end too

Can’t wait to try the other noodles however I just keep ordering the pad Thai because it’s so good Try to venture  to something else","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Sushi Umi
address: 1995 Lonsdale Ave, North Vancouver, BC V7M 2K3
descriptions: Warm, wood-hued eatery offering Japanese cooked dishes alongside sushi, sashimi & sake.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by today for lunch.  Pleasantly surprised with my Beef Yakisoba.  Normally would get sushi but decided to go different.

Service is great and the food is excellent.  Our server really went above and beyond.  I felt really looked after.  Even after I spilled my tea and made a mess.  She was friendly and polite.  Would come back anytime.  A wonderful spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAvNumTlJ3duCzg_rOBwZ5ufKZ3Fk8l0wlKJ4G&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Ed Russel Tayag","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_aofbQuZWRhfkFJz7db7dik8h255Wsqs2_K2tHqeXxfpsda4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All their specialty rolls are bomb! All the rolls taste fresh and very tightly packed with ingredients and flavour.

Service was really fast and friendly. They are very attentive to our table on a dinner rush. All our drinks never went empty.

The atmosphere makes you feel at home with the lighting and comfortable seating.

Another plus are the washrooms which is really clean.

Definitely will come back with friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHDxxzMriodzuojJkZ8nYL5fpTPfLBB3fd2PXj&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"andy Jahhan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLoj5m5Vi1EbIOWL8pFRxYYgchz3-Llg9e1EMQSVX2NTsZ3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is delicious. The service is good, but the hostess was a bit overbearing. When we arrived, we were greeted by a hostess who insisted that we sit at the table closest to the restroom, as all other tables were reserved. We explained that we were unable to sit there and she continued to refuse, stating that only that table was available. As we began to leave the restaurant, she relented and told us to sit wherever we wanted, but her tone was quite rude. It was not a pleasant experience, but the food is excellent. Will I return? Probably not, but I will order takeout.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMf-UlqtnzdGII8q0jWWlhrRIe3x87d5SRniZT&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Kasumi Okajima (Kas)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3m9Zzz5V40ZOlaImUkn3ZQp6STmmVav3AD_8yRA8CBB-Hy749=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Now I can tell everyone tell me this sushi place, huge portion with quality and great service. Each sushi has good enough amount so just let you know haha","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu3qKOCyB-2bzCn8AY__WM4fkNpH6gcUzh18sL&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Karla Albarran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzUF87FlOHrkpXO3A-JkhcIJs5XyJ8It9hkIm_dNQh2fUbLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST sushi in north van.
The special rolls are huge and so good!
The service is fast, everything is so clean.
10000% must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTFUBopa7nip332SDGubjIZbSqPeIox2aUBEYz&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Nicole DeWolf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr_WvxEmb1DNqQAXSBpR7UwBEO2ItOyTEPKKPKIyR9jE6MKQh9lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Casual atmosphere... generous portions...very fresh fish. The shrimp was likely the low point...but no one goes to a sushi restaurant for the shrimp...Here, the tuna, salmon and uni were sublime. We had the sushi and sashimi platter and were blown away by the portions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzAMgxfLU9GCmoE1ZDb7MJnC1kEFzwfcbbCI2P&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Jay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMSBuPzluSoWnnNo1MNK2x6M66ep9pofz6iT0dmWr3wuV1Eps=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this restaurant. The food quality and atmosphere were both excellent, and the fried dishes were especially top-notch. The sushi was also very fresh. I’d definitely come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFJMTnYMLd2476-Qoqv9kJQMVRMWB25hJB_Har&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"DK","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKZYekfDqO-37uBZ5ToTRdrdV8iR0ZbyK_Dbf6RqdiUCXTuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a Korean run sushi shop, and the quality of the rolls were pretty good.

We tried their special rolls and they did not skimp out on ingredients.
Party Tray C as you can see had good variety with the nigiri having big fish chunks on top.
Tempura was good, while not the best (could be more crunchy, flaky)

Overall I would visit this place again because the service was great and the price was incredibly cheap for the food portion we received.
Next time I would probably focus more on special rolls and nigiri&sashimi combo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnqMXm1C9u19IfWnhYb-1uWixMI7CaChl2MxET&fid=0x0:0xef013793d269ec09"],"When":"2024-6-24"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ali Zhiani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlz8XBdsJO5fVLq5qsLLMBaIwoImyJlB_nVCNOvh3zr4TnOIPz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like the food!! Their boxes are very tasty. The price is so reasonable and we as a family are pleased. But I expected more smiles from the personnel!! As a recommendation I suggest they wear a white clothes instead of black ones and serve the food more gently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_0do7Xv5_TxgrXSV3-6onNLsu88alvr3Wy2v5\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent variety with tons of combo possibilities (love the Super Combo option!). Good quality, great value. They do a really nice Spicy Tuna roll, not overdressed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0W-5WO3y6ZQw0SwDPW4Uux3HNQp4vsLJFstsd\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"AdrianLee263","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXAhMYzY2_PZAqB1pKWjI7kxSq9mPV0Ra40Vu_zkWmXxnpaX4kiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered Bento Box 1 (Beef Teriyaki Bento) \u0026 Sushi Combo (Avocado Roll + Oshinko Roll) + Miso Soup, taste delicious, good value and portion. Fast service. Came here for many times already for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwjBSnra9p_ZDmBKDrajrz3bTqUgfthqy8YN--\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Deborah Ramnath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBA32LD_C1LcprxKUkxdjbBSbN2-_EsIVsWFhO4bPv970iQMr3YQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I had the special box 🍱 with teriyaki beef and also a sushi special 🍣. The meals were reasonably priced. Some items were very delicious and some were bland (lacking flavor/seasoning). It is a nice place to sit and eat, the service is fast. I personally found that the tempura lacked seasoning/flavor it was bland however it was very crispy and still okay. The salad 🥗 was nice and the miso soup was a good starter. The California roll is good. I would eat here again because it is convenient for me in North Vancouver, it’s reasonably priced and the service is fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXPnqLdvDZlStoI21lRyMeSQGj8zwrfaaEdJog\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2023-7-18"},{"Name":"L Silver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqgXScPFK4x2G77lwd6cJCHy5YWm8y8iZ05mzyk1VGNFx9kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Honestly the best price around for sushi and it's not half bad if u get the basics. However if you are a clean person this isn't the place for you. I've walked in before and caught the front staff at the counter picking their nose, no I'm not joking maybe cause they opened not much earlier they thought no one would come in. I stayed away for a while. Another time I went to Yuko maki (recently) I went to the bathroom and came out the same time as staff and they did not wash their hands and went to the dinning area and carried on their duties. My stomach hurt after my most recent visit. Loved this place but after this I'm going to avoid this place once again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanaz Erfanian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6T34fblo5pEptDgHbWM2F1C15g2hat47wtY907SndxFMI0tsB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is perfect my favourite is California roll.\nThis place has both cucumber and avocado  in its California roll and it is very unique.\nHighly recommended 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODnqOEOvCPzwwFvs7ZmHldV1p3iBGjCkOMAh78\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Ethan Cap","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0soIougKcPC2QXhngy5fg0qd4FUp8gfDZjZfoTX24jb5EEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. Crazy value, huge portions for a price that’s remained relatively stable over the years. Yeah it might not be the friendliest service but it’s part of the experience lol. Takeout is always quick, on time, and accurate. Best sushi spot on the north shore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shelby McLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGrJIxT_w5hI3sCYlNvQIRBmY0nhG0Y1Wwz7fnYiH39NwxA_WG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the sushi special to go. Ordered and got food in 10 minutes. Good value, not the best sushi I've ever had but for 3 rolls and a miso soup for $12 I’m  fine with that lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtbHyU-XACK2xct7VyEKVXPSt1bBVY87-1cOzM\u0026fid=0x0:0x176f6294c3726627"],"When":"2024-2-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jo-Anne Lodermeier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtPOeJ4LCMgl6Pb7aa1JrjQcuslbDpk7fgJTybJImHlEhldg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Captain Oven Pizza, and I have to say it was an absolutely delightful experience! The pizza was, as always, incredibly delicious, with the perfect blend of flavors and a crispy crust that keeps me coming back for more. The waitstaff were very attentive and friendly, ensuring that we had everything we needed throughout our meal.

One of my favorite features of this place is the unlimited parmesan and garlic sauce they offer. It adds a fantastic touch to the pizza and allows you to customize each slice just the way you like it. Plus, they have a variety of other condiments available, which is a nice bonus.

I also loved their selection of different pops from the USA and Italy. It’s great to have unique beverage options that you don’t find everywhere. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, making it a perfect spot for a casual meal with friends or family.

Overall, Captain Oven Pizza never disappoints, and I can't wait to return for another round of their amazing pizza and excellent service! Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNscmIajcMNCWXoSMPObSlkaEzVEgnW15g9NZhd&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gathered with my family for a weekend lunch, we ventured into this quaint pizza shop eager to indulge in some cheesy delights. Opting for the Cheese Steak Pizza and the Chicken Pesto Pizza, we were pleasantly surprised by the culinary journey that unfolded. Both pizzas were expertly seasoned and cooked to perfection, with each bite bursting with flavor. The Cheese Steak Pizza boasted a perfect balance of cheese and tender steak, while the Chicken Pesto Pizza delighted with its fragrant pesto and succulent chicken. However, what truly stood out was the impeccable customer service. From the moment we walked in, the staff made us feel welcome and attended to our needs with warmth and efficiency. Overall, our experience at this pizza shop was nothing short of excellent, leaving us with satisfied stomachs and smiles on our faces.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNt_wZY9I3aYXWRJ3jf7QJMxEK6lNdkN9oHIh2E&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Guilherme Ferreira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmThqeCWNrsyXJZjneih37EcEZEvnqUIFUcp2QP2xojnmpCVSq4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I’m really sad that I can’t give a five-star rating. I still remember driving all the way from downtown to Surrey just to grab a pizza that was absolutely the best. Even after almost 40 to 45 minutes, the pizza would still be hot and smell delicious. Unfortunately, the newer branches don’t live up to the reputation of that first location, which was worth the drive just for a fully loaded pizza with lots of toppings. This branch, however, takes forever to deliver, and the pizza arrives cold as a stone with barely any toppings. It’s disappointing, especially considering the high price and lack of commitment to quality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHFeWyxl4LvIWKbhg7BZkT6AxkHAIsnPC-_jnB&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Mark Turnbull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb3y-xYzCVR6N_Ai49HYr4STDQ454gU7LeU-LpiQKvRGfVZTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza. Fairly thin crust and good amount of toppings. They were friendly to order with and the order was delivered quickly","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtCyYHdHnl89VF_N5UNIym46wNo79UJCeuSHzL&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Roisin Mulligan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPqK61ndRffvYoLnXKmjidHw6Bi77yTD5phd1xbStxRzhyo4OALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordering a large number of pizzas for a family party and not only was the process a smooth one, the team at Captains Oven even helped my husband load up the car with all the pizzas.

The pizzas were delicious - a huge hit with our family.

And our Gluten Free friends even said it was one of the best GF pizzas they'd had in Vancouver!

Thank you to the whole team - you were fantastic!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lea N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC5dNj4va57NmmwcANWtt0xAsy0IWKksbPPNzFMbeknpxkJzwf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered a large vegetarian pizza, 10/10. Staff is super friendly and quality of dough and toppings is super good. Pizza was giant! This is honestly the best place to get italian pizza for an affordable price on the North Shore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEiC32erLt8xRAm9ygVZmXkTt9YKx8z7YDcp5i&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Alex Sanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-rI-pnfftFGHeGJz_1NlD5bWiCny8rcgWXbBF2zFQpbJjAi8c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"People in Vancouver know very little about what a good pizza is and if you don’t believe me explain the 4.7 reviews at Fresh slide,
with that out of the way I can confidently say that this is a very average pizza! The pizza lacks sauce making it to dry, the dough is nothing special, no bubbles no special consistency or krisp and the sauce taste is nothing special. If you are in the area and have very little options for food go for it but if you want to eat a good pizza go elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wani Radio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcDRTBchO8ENJOkSsWS-G154900Q2zzNmc9bpTXLf7LUtqCiI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I think it is the best pizza place in the Greater Vancouver area. The staff is always nice, and you can't go wrong with any type of pizza you order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi0GgR4Dc6jHy5NnFRnvVjdzaUtxDuzQI3XAYB&fid=0x0:0x264e941621f4b11a"],"When":"2024-8-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"nadia moiniyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrA-2JjxbqvKvB2uIVyr_6GbuV4AWA5-86PLEQzwEC6N32GZyj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is so fresh
Tasty and delicious. Price wise is perfect the portion is really good. Service is really fast if you are on your lunch break.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKcgQbwEGu1JPpfgjqdJiJnonP-6RBoH4ig5rm&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0rvDnecXDfwVDLaFbwPQJYJNz2v04UpZWTO7WomrClvsxnx0D=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Im going to Jordan Sushi multiple times a month,
often with a crew of hungry friends in town.
And aside from a few minor missteps, this place has consistently delivered.
The sushi? Fresh, expertly prepared, and presented with pride.
But the real showstopper today was the Nagasaki Jjamppong - seafood stew .

Jordan Sushi isn't reinventing the wheel, but they're damn good at what they do. Consistency is key, and they've got it locked down.

Already planning the next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNd8ZIW_Tf_NfV_nYvuFcHjLQ64r5liMQTMwLLN&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Jasmine Kizilkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAq0AwN_mcRX6CQC9qJrZthtN9bAt3YfEvW4fOgWwuI0AAcFR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: This is some of the best food I’ve had in Vancouver. The taste and quality was impeccable. The katsu curry and misp soup was just phenomenal, and the service was outstanding too. Special shoutout to our lovely waiter who said it was his last day. Good luck in your new job and thanks for making our experience amazing!

Previous Review: I ordered takeout and it was great. I got the chicken katsu and thought it was good quality and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp-aIRjLBCTXwoROuu2mJ0H83BykoHrxm5fSk7&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seems like a new sushi place inside and out. We went there as a group and they set us very politely with smiles. Their menu has many options but as my friend was their customer, he told us to order their dinner combo. It was a very good choice with lots of plates and highly suggested for couples and it costs $35 with tax and tip.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2giXD5nMGwZ1rwDalJ7u3bcALQdzgUfJNP2TH&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Fey N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3E0rVnOiz07StNteRqZEUIQdMicAfYFGWeEKF3CLBUA95uHdJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nice variety, kinda fresh, maybe not the highest fish quality? But we went there with a lovely crowd and that made it fun.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ-OS3-JueErnrrVbmNVqxQ1PmnkMkT_8Yjzdn&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Kayvon Motamed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZV-KNrA38EpQGr8TGg5ltcfviI_b7hBNVI6aiM-meGmKExyNj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good food, quick service, nice ambiance, decent prices. Would go back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzpiRXoz02FtqpBqOL2CA-2CBerU9hSAt4Exid&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Saveenah Bo-o","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVL2hvW1-8_AWRltGmncI5soE04htvRpu2TLT2Ltv3j0tvtqsnf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went AGAIN for their lunch sets! Super worth the price! Servings were huge! You need to order 1 set per person though. Their complimentary house tea was I think roasted rice flavor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcYnA7gTUXir7i_vEJPUPiIKDufODSGwq4MysZ&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Chris V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFU8xWfg7hQ5S29v-pNSL_iw7ZHlFPu2m2PZT9LP0KC8Wq5J1V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered the fried roll combo. Food is always good and consistent. One of the best fried rolls around. Service is quick and easy. Restaurant is nice and clean and staff is very nice as well. Great place for a quick bite especially if you’re staying at the hospital or doing anything nearby hundred percent recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMz8WfKRS8p-mHCYeq_AZZXG85mYppeUkPJFGVE&fid=0x0:0xbf10e1836aaeb185"],"When":"2024-4-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexandra L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwE8vLQGn7eqDG4vM1HzIzqfJalD8a3eRglR5ZQZx8pKm6MXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Visited here on a Sunday morning around 10am - place looks very cute from outside and located in a local neighborhood. I think this place has a lot of potential but the experience fell short during my visit.

- Firstly, there were very limited selection of food available during the visit in the display case and multiple items in the breakfast menu not available. Display case was almost empty (3 cookies and < 15 items in fridge). Breakfast menu (benny / scramble eggs etc) also was not all available. Avocado toast and benny were not available and shop keeper doesn’t seem to know the menu well.
- I don’t think that I visited during off hours which might contribute to this issue.. However, beyond the above, there were some many fruit flies everywhere when I sit down to eat which made the visit quite unpleasant.

I was really looking forward to the visit as I think this place has a lot of potential but between the unpreparedness of staff and unclean environment I will not be returning any time soon for coffee/breakfast.

Noted the place also has a small fridge with selection of convenience store like items (canned beverages, milk) which I imagine is convenient if you live in the neighborhood.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTNtImUpOds22CA2SEG4A_S7XMKtajkKHWUk0YXw9U-soQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing local coffee shop with great coffee, sandwiches and sweets. The scones, although not overly sweet, were incredibly tasty.
The cozy atmosphere was so pleasant, as well.
Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvQtwBU_jPuq2y5CNAiQZw0_XwVqhxMvg13tg&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2023-12-13"},{"Name":"Soefae Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO7ZNgUf5Dwk1W_QTwOUDH5IE-lT_O8VF-ftw5oM5hbRZ-8oOz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved the food and the atmosphere so much! The open space really emphasized the great neighbourhood! The food was slow to be served but, nevertheless, I recommend trying out their their breakfast menu!! I will definitely be coming back here again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWGaHLlgP1sN_4RCvsiM2kHGHQCZGn1921Pegf&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2023-7-15"},{"Name":"Jacob Pope","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwLf5bdkAI-kRTPCovp1KP7kp23I4rgHTspKwNIPJlm-xmk0enuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I visited the Corner Stone before and after the renovations. Prior it was a nice place to grab a rather affordable brunch. After the renovations (which look amazing) I was a bit annoyed by the service, which took over 5 minutes to even get acknowledged and seated with a mostly empty restaurant. Once seated I got friendly service, however the food left much to be desired. I ordered the chilaquiles (divorced to try both salsas) and I've never been so underwhelmed by a version of this dish. The salsa was cold and tasted like it was from a bottle. Chilaquiles are supposed to be served hot after stewing the tortillas briefly in the hot salsa, and that was what I was expecting. The refried beans likewise seemed like they were from a can and were bland. For the price I paid it was a disappointing meal. Perhaps it was an off day, but it is unlikely I will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLpKu5EFEvFrjavJ72aXYuQgvIb21--o3RMY1i&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2024-1-18"},{"Name":"Penny Rusty Sophie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkGfXMIDqwS_yD1axTk6tkHoLsnybE2ErvKrHMoMIElMJWekI_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little bistro nestled in a fairly residential area of North Vancouver. They also have a small grocery store section.

The Mexican Benny had tasty crumbled chorizo and the side order of bacon was perfectly crispy. While the hash browns weren't exactly crispy, they were still pretty good and worked well to sop up the sauce and runny yolks.

Ham and cheese breakfast bowl was quite filling. The food seemed to take a while to come out so a good idea to order something to drink while you wait like the London Fog or hot chocolate with whipped cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyJYmMlrhHD_fS7xWCEBWx-8jkDNltamh7r61v&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2023-5-7"},{"Name":"Tricia C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS8jxdORXKJaAWhct8yqQ3gE8qhWdlJFJL5jsz8u98jLVDfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was hoping to try out the brunch menu here but it was not offered on the day we visited. We were limited to the display case items and pre-made sandwiches.

I was pleasantly surprised with the creamy latte that had a smooth finish using beans from JJ Bean. The Turkey Brie sandwich was also tasty.

Looks like a fun neighbourhood spot to visit in the summer when you can sit out on the patio.

It is also serves as store that carries pre-made soups, drinks, candies, chips and other packaged items.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkHQMB8_RMhC9JnVKckeQZWg6dez5togbkPeH8&fid=0x0:0xec2dfa93a9300da8"],"When":"2022-12-30"},{"Name":"Minu Ak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpx6V6dzD6tisu6tWSZcHe3Ev1skK55mygxtuEg2Ryek5VqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered a burger and pasta, and both dishes were delicious—just like homemade food. The staff there are very kind and welcoming. The only downside was that the portion size of the burger and salad was a little small.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gemma Boothroyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYT33iilC0hUrH_Kx1DApSbirTimOoVbSL3BKh-5kba7gU_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great time at Corner Stone's live music night! Dawn Pemberton was undoubtedly the showstopper of the evening, but the food and service was also fantastic. Had the salmon with salad, and it did not disappoint. Really cute spot in the middle of the neighbourhood!","Images":null,"When":""}]
