user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We’ve ordered here about half a dozen times. The food overloaded with cheese and not very tasty. However, tonight we ordered the pizza as I was responding to an email that said 20% off pizzas on  Fridays. That email should’ve read occasional Fridays as tonight it was back to regular prices; albeit it was Friday. It’s a four star review because the pizza itself was absolutely excellent, warm and ready when we arrived to pick it up. Due to the coverings on the windows and some other decor issues, duct tape and missing lightbulbs…inside this place doesn’t seem too welcoming, however again if one focuses on quality of the pizza alone, it was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMakwUd-nDQYYcSkYBAQmWta5l5mJObDU-ttUOE&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Chloe Rachel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgExGuK1W-XgQc1tPnrQlqQkWxCTaNhdz977uVTTY3zjpsAzs-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I ordered the Greek Souvlaki Chicken off their lunch menu ($15), which came with one skewer of chicken. The skewer had 4 decently sized chicken cubes, and the plate also had a generous portion of rice, Greek salad and a wedge of garlic bread. The souvlaki was well-seasoned. The dining area was spacious and open. It wasn't crowded when we went for a weekday lunch, but we imagine they have their regular customers. The restaurant has been in business for 40 years! There was a bit of a wait for our food, so it's not the best option for a quick meal or those with time constraints on a lunch break. Overall, would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdRYl8qwrubbNEzvl3OJ0h1duFJ6nYnfMYvS35&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Herlie Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8SSSwQ7c_3JGugR1U7Jl7LcglaK4715UZTUEzRC8binm8Q-69=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The most disappointing service ever. After the 10 min wait time mark, I asked the server if we could get our order, but she said she was gonna do it after she refills the water on the other table. She came back with the water but never went back to us. We were excited to get some good food, but no one didn’t even bother coming to our table. Wasted 15 minutes. As we were walking out the door, one of the attendants only said “I’m so sorry.”   Never coming back here!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7mRkThddCtHhAKK8453oQPWyyYs6sR2Q89dEk&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Michelle Chisholm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXukDLj_aT-skOf3-x_A0jyNb4ZHUgyuJ3nlczitM_Co2CMERQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where to start, this was an amazing experience. I’m not sure why the reviews are so low because it was such a wonderful time.

My father and I try a lot of pizza around town to find the best ones, and we decided to try pizza at Andreas. We were not disappointed. It was delicious! Freshly made, perfect temperature and so tasty! I got a medium for myself so I could take some home and I’m glad I did.

I highly recommend this spot. The food is delicious and the service is great too! You won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoX4dJ0WdmiCLZkaVDUjht_-yHO632wAseiqd9&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Clara Jankowiak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEvxFX7kPn4GM4nJQxThAhRJ6aTWOgjPcRCcm84ppswESpSkAK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has delicious food and amazing service. We ordered the Greek platter and pizza, and were happy with the portions and flavours. The servers were very warm and accommodating. This place is so cozy at this time of year with the Christmas lights up!
Will have to come back soon :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Probably been 30 years since we last dined at Andrea's.  Living in the neighbourhood now, we decided to give it a try.  Our experience definitely exceeded our expectations, as I admit I am strongly  influenced by reviews on Google maps, which are mixed for Andrea's

We shared a platter that started with a very large Greek salad.  The ingredients were quite irregularly cut, but that's a minor quibble.  The  main platter was a very generous plate consisting of Beef Souvlaki, Chicken Souvlaki, Lamb Souvlaki, Hummus, Tzatziki, Pita Bread, Spanakopita, Rice, Roast Potato, Calamari, and Souzoukakia.  The beef was a little tough, the spanakopita was nice and  crisp, the calamari was tender and overall, a very good value for $60 for two!  Will return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZpBuhSORroWmQ-Bw-ixfL7A26lkzYJivXIFja&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Doug P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLx6YpxAAaIZ7Cj9PSMphfRQfkkw46YLaNdEeYIQOo495lpxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lasagna was delicious! Especially the cheese. There was enough sauce. I don't know if it was supposed to have meat because I barely tasted any but the sauce was tasty.
Service- on our receipt the name was Employee. I apologize if Employee has issues or is shy but he was basically non verbal. Not great qualities for a server. I was facing a corner so I don't know if Employee had other tables and was also non verbal with other customers. Employee also didn't check on our table for drink refills or extra napkins etc. There was a cheerful young woman waiting on the table behind me which amplified Employee's lack of interaction with us.
A group of us were regulars back in the '90s. It was great to revisit and find the food was as good as I remember.
To sum up; great food, but we had the one server who seemed to be forced into a position he wasn't qualified for. Perhaps he's new.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle G,","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLq4AM7e8OMq9DuJKcyJ0tEhamYB8Qq71QV-IIa_GXyTVKVZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked In on a Sunday night after being discharged from the hospital (crashed my face into the concrete during a bike ride) and this was the most perfect treat. My friend and I ordered the Greek platter and were not able to finish it (we r both athletes and eat a lot). The meat was so perfectly cooked, the chicken was not at all dry, and the server was kind. Place was super empty which was cool. Sorry my photo is mid we got too excited and started eating before deciding this place warranted this review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR9cKxrUVSSG0L5RJzK2G9Oh0n_v0qq8OkiBUS&fid=0x0:0xad34d2b59127b383"],"When":"2024-7-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lindsey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQyiiuHF0JaSjARZCxihi-4Fx7BgEOAVHk6EXgUDyUKg2V47Q5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was quick, attentive and not overbearing. Caprese salad was fresh and flavourful. The pizzas are amazing, the cook, crisp and crust are very good with great tomatoes. Lasagna perfectly seasoned. Glad we came.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdwaNhcAiJ33WnE4mUorJ1lsqmZ08xDoRaKgsU&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Alberello Pizzeria is on 15th St. in North Vancouver, just off of Lonsdale. They serve both pizza and pasta in their restaurant.

We'd been to Alberello Pizzeria once a few years ago and I remember being super impressed with the pizza there, so when the family decided to go there for dinner again, I knew I would be ordering pizza again.

In addition to pizza, I also tried some of the Rucola salad which another member of the family had ordered. The grapefruit in it definitely gave it a pop of colour, and while grapefruit isn't exactly my favourite fruit when it comes to taste, I did enjoy the juiciness of the fruit.

I ordered the Grille Pizza which came with marinara sauce, mozzarella, roasted eggplant, roasted red pepper, zucchini, fresh parsley and chili oil. Pretty sure this was the same pizza I had ordered the first time we came to this restaurant.It was super tasty and they did a good job of roasting the vegetables on top. When I eat anything with eggplant on it, I always prefer my eggplant to be cooked until it has become very soft.

My daughter however ordered the exact same pizza as me, and for some reason the veggies were not as soft on her pizza; so while I very much enjoyed my food I think this restaurant needs to work a bit on consistency since my daughter's pizza wasn't quite as enjoyable as mine.

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street
Location: 115 15th St., North Vancouver, BC","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNW55Jk43ZnmtT7Gi4igL_fAK_6ZvolshYvlLQz&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Guillaume Bourassa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv5-8qIsaut-K6utIhDeGMPbJTZOfr1s0gwe_bvTCBfNFlG4y9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was incredible. Authentic Italian cuisine made by the loveliest mamma italian. Came for the pasta and the carbonara SLAPS and the portion size was more than I expected. Definitely need to come back for the pizzas my wife and I will keep that place as a mandatory stop every time we come to North Van.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM87n-LA8ouTc72V5CHhuU_GIhGKTSzwrZihcWR&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2024-5-4"},{"Name":"Zhi Su","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIOR9QcmuN7xVMHRRZGlnxULc0lgkhWHVqVbkqx4LTpIv5_InbCw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza here. Not super busy on a weeknight but I could see seating being an issue if it busy since it’s a relatively small restaurant with limited seating. The pasta was really good and they have a kids menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOW1VxR5hwh1SIVMaHlilcGXFCinvQREZq4vAch&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"Dave thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv9qU2DUqoQaXgTQ_3A5hcDqqoa0iPpGhZlJC8WHj2R5UgyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"3 of us went there for dinner and all agreed this was the best pizza we ever tasted. These people pay so much attention to detail from the 00 flour used for crust to the little herb garden out front where they grow leaves for your mojito! Our waitress, Morgan, was friendly, witty and did an excellent job assisting with our selections. This place sets the standard and I can’t wait to go back! Diamond Dave","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very enjoyable pizza and comfortable atmosphere.  Our server was attentive without being overbearing.  Prices for pizza’s are fair as they are quite large and very filling.  We ordered one pizza each for three of us and we all took 3 - 4 pieces home to enjoy the following day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyzvg2cpVoCmDipj1lKFkVmtTG_I_ZAEIKhqMY&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2021-9-9"},{"Name":"Jason May","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2jazgHbT_ic2wRpKdw0Yjdu_4eGP1C-GnvIUYckRRJ2OaSuprMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In a street known for pizza this place is a must visit. Absolutely amazing food, delicious drinks and fantastic staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw4CZjGY-neju1Kwk_G9HAyE6_GSPfRTbfR5k3&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2024-3-15"},{"Name":"Ankit Rajvanshi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5Sy0k1EWvpF1DCNd4lRygWaCfOSYA3QlmwjoXzZdaRUyZ5i8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went there on my way back after Garibaldi lake hike.
Had vegetarian pizzas and focaccia bread. Pizza crust was on a crisper side which I liked but my friends not as much. Toppings and over taste is good. Busy place over the weekend, better to reserve the place before going. Ambiance and staff is nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd_XjP7VU9a_t8A9-z1drs1HNZgMwX9yaHxLLB&fid=0x0:0x5f22477537727e6d"],"When":"2022-3-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shiva Radmanesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX50D30SjZBR4QvfRxKL45XQxTtaGKOp6R4BwFd5j_tfXu-Hq4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited Hidra last night and had a great time! The staff were friendly, and the food was fine. We ordered the 'Maghz o Zaban' sandwich, and it did not disappoint. The place has a Persian vibe and decor that made us feel like we were back at a sandwich shop in Iran.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEW3C_257AQshpjpN0USRS0fOA2g8PsYyDBdhh&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Alice Hao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH33j80LSyz-aU-NnheuXAMUQP2LW0c9QnVbnfbQiSnCV18og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered roast beef sandwiches and special tea. The food is so yummy!!! The restaurant staff is very friendly! It’s a great place for dine in and take out. MUST TRY!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMg7INmi0gIWfFhrJjEQwJuD1GFN80evoGhXUNh&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Shahbaz Salehi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsbgr6SmAPEhFmhmcaR78qqYW_wrDDZL7lwNuJ2NTZt_LiQl41=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean restaurant. The service was amazing and the sandwiches were perfect. This is a very cute restaurant that serves nostalgic Persian sandwiches. It’s a cutely designed restaurant and it’s very clean. I highly recommend them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOErn74Pt7sZgH0hLUznE03uML4RYzGdfG0SzQh&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Atena Razmpoush","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDTwnpwsyCMQv83dsdwlkz2BAvureQHzZZxo2_BIzfjtUBCR_R=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super clean kitchen, tasty old-school Persian sandwiches, friendly staff, and nostalgic interior design.
We ordered Makaroni sandwich, Lamb tongue and brain sandwich, with their special Chicken Beef Burger sandwich.
Both were lovely, specially the brain-tongue.

The new sandwich “Roast beef with mushroom” was the best. It’s not on the printed menu yet, but you can order it.

Thank you for the service, keep what you’re doing!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4N8s8EoKNkqvkd5cHQTTvcBQcC0pU9zPuKHoP&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Fatemeh Sayadi (Tisha)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT0iXGjcmugjaf-sxnw_j5g7IpzISbK9kqKoWSQpUn_JCfvpEr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It has a nice variety of nostalgic Persian meals.

The Hidra special sandwich has chicken, burger, pickles and parsley, the toppings are the best, loved the chicken, the burger could be better though.

Bandari’s taste was nice and lovely. The portions are a bit smaller in comparison to the price.

The best thing about the sandwiches was the bun which was great, I don’t know if it was made in the restaurant or bot but it was perfect.

The special fries had mushrooms and dipped in cheddar cheese, it was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtaOv7WFzLNNvqTuhb2NvBmVZYAxgUWWfa3Klo&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2022-12-11"},{"Name":"Andrew Walsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnj4Reg2j3wZl_BVrZ8m0PZKz0M07-hvm4YX8hpgCoK4r8GHPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first experience having a Persian sandwich and it did not disappoint! The Kotlet, Chicken, and Special Tandoori Ham were all delicious. Fresh soft bread and you can tell that great care went into the selection of ingredients for these delicious creations.

Looking forward to trying more in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeXVa_XBza53Cj5sI62UZnzA8nVOSlyPnr_btA&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Rojan Javid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5a5V1XXPAk1QEKUvR_bnkhWEoAgtgrwXpqrFEP-DhIGVECzRL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wish there was a location in Toronto!! Their sandwiches are hands down the best and full of flavour. The place itself is very cozy and the staff are friendly. The portions are great and the bread doesn’t fall apart. There are lots of different options to choose from. We got a chance to try their fries as well with their special sauce which was perfect! Looking forward to trying more of their sandwiches during my next visit. Hope to see a location open in Toronto!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBmokyQ6d3yliOF3Tp8R57Fv1SPcDmsF4v3Arg&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Saeed Mirshekari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsMIZ0llu8KhQDjzcHVEnYvO-NmQHMivRM2algBKLhWD2rZhK_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great people, great food! Unique atmosphere. A must-check-out in Vancouver. I’d come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN49H_FZqIK0hu8-r_6e2-irCWnmKNu7xvGtUpa&fid=0x0:0x996a9a92dec6bd16"],"When":"2024-8-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexander Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFsUEPZNq4h8cBqaL42Gd2rh0aZi6fzay8o3wtjB86kaApSZtI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good variety. Friendly staff. I recommend the Tuna Carpaccio or Smoked Salmon Tataki. I didn't like the Chicken Karaage, but it was a fair amount (8 boneless pcs) for the price ($10.90).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8YpeBx6sYC8_mDreiiZg5DfUnasaAxK_nA3Fh&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely beautiful little restaurant.
Very nice service and the Japanese cuisine was amazing.
I loved how they offered the Tobiko Nigiri to come with a quails egg on there.

I definitely want to visit here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3pThjVRXTRR_t6RmZ5S6f0-QAY6YSCORISBHj&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Pete On The Street","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdCPmg937wv90tlRaBXtKDK-aCTAb7FrA83Y4igLR31Qw239o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always a pleasure at Sushi Kumo.
Everything always comes fast and super fresh. They have a great menu with some different things on thier appy menu then you generally see at your local sushi spot.
Prices are very good for the quality they always deliver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiuLaDu_-sjmG7h3GDiJTVmLoCXQfYaTdsO2AZ&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Legend Jeri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6MYkC-gehfX9m3YYJTQmTtqno291H98WwfQYtrJ5OQ5cDyOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nestled near Lonsdale, Sushi Kumo promises a haven for sushi enthusiasts, including the adventurous vegetarians among us. As a fellow risk-taker in life's culinary adventures due to seafood allergies, I dared to venture into this quaint establishment, and I'm glad I did.

Food Quality (5/5):
Each bite of the Avocado roll, Cucumber Roll, and Veggie Roll was a testament to the chef's dedication to perfection. The rice, cooked to just the right consistency, cradled fresh, vibrant vegetables that were a delight to the palate. Not a hint of browning or toughness, a common pitfall in many rushed sushi joints.

Price-Value Ratio (4/5):
While prices may tilt towards the higher end compared to nearby alternatives, the superior quality justifies every penny spent. When it comes to sushi, I firmly believe that quality should never be compromised for the sake of savings.

Ambiance (4/5):
Simplicity meets style in Sushi Kumo's ambiance. Though modest, the decor exudes a certain charm that complements the dining experience.

Service (3/5):
Unfortunately, the otherwise stellar experience was marred by lackluster service. The pace was sluggish, with no check-ins to inquire about our needs. Water and tea remained unrefilled, a disappointing oversight that detracted from the overall enjoyment. It was disheartening to observe preferential treatment towards certain patrons, a stark contrast to the egalitarian spirit of hospitality.

Final Verdict:
Despite the service hiccup, Sushi Kumo remains a gem worth revisiting. For vegetarian sushi aficionados seeking impeccable quality, this is the place to be. Just be prepared to exercise patience and perhaps a gentle reminder for a refill on your drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAAFLXypofXwTmZtzW2-QOdbIKtO4UIx5EjtS8&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Kat Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEo-i39N__rpJH69CgrWcJ6RTEhnTJfwjlxxJLH4yrE-w015XZoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Taste is good but they skimp on takeout portions. The takeout portions are significantly smaller than eat in. Service could use some adjustments, I feel bad going in and paying for my order it seems like I’m inconveniencing the staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLDX6MoyGjghL_aKaFJejYzluMW3lIJiGUgIZQ&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Raheem Merali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeLaFZt6ZP70nphRH5l2rTuJIePIpFBgyCuj7uBcbVkkkXxmFj9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to celebrate an occasion of any kind. Particularly your birthday as we did! Perfect warm sake. Ice-cold beer. Fresh sushi. Fantastic service. Parking is a bit tricky but hey, it's well worth it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPICcsxGbapY7WHx-4K8g3yD-UWk-xJN5YD5MJl&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2023-11-9"},{"Name":"John Seong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0htFjeJaWzfoh1Wx3ky51rbanezwWv8SlRvcZ43DjNt3_9Xz8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pleasant, fast and responsive service here. The food quality was also very high (freshness, seasoning and portion size) and price was also very reasonable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzK0jg-BQkF1PtA9KZaNH6xljZLdV_L7hpIPwk&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Kristy Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEfZ2rjxNiODjhooQ3vu4wU52UFmMssx1nBEw-QrGtiP3D8nPb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Definitely not impressed by the sushi here mainly because their quality is way below my expectations. Their soft shell crab had a fishy taste to it, which means that it is not fresh. The sashimi that we ordered was nothing special, I found that the pieces were cut a little larger than I would’ve liked. The rolls that they have are passible, but I would not come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHpEYCIu7MpIj_iTNhtWVUmJdvlT2ntpjO1Z2Y&fid=0x0:0x4208792eed890708"],"When":"2024-1-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Min T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHBCvyhMdMuGm8ISXRxIPWaPtZa7hX9LVxvDW4OOAn-tBBWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Brown's Social House has a nice atmosphere that makes it a comfortable place to relax. Unfortunately, the food was just okay, and I did find hair in my dish, which was disappointing. However, I appreciate how the staff handled the situation—they were prompt and professional in addressing the issue. Overall, it was an average experience with good service, but I hope for better food quality next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSel8OSS8cfrmpOfAOpvub3lGj_qBm0tauF5dK&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Hamid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZeCAMeEgy6nfEH_q_cdx_kw6M9nQkJXu6z624ESesXG758gNKQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Here’s an imThe food was decent, and the service was quite good. However, the main issue is the ventilation system. The dining area was filled with visible smoke, and there was a strong smell of burnt oil, which really affected the overall experience. If they improve the ventilation, it would make the visit much more pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH8YGDiZK1YRzf69AGElkF-TI5k1H-cz_aPKrz&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Patrick Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPGn-0rnYhibroPawC7crdZgRFkVYU_Vh2ofycQ4wRGDS96B-5jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here for Mother’s day brunch. I had previously found that it wasn’t too busy because they didn’t open until 11am. We had our choice of tables and we sat on some higher bar stool in the lounge area by the front window as most people were sitting in the booths. There were about 5 other tables full here so there was still plenty of space.

My mom had the Super Avocado Eggs Benny while I had the Southwest Brunch Bowl which was like a Benny but without any meat. It was like a cross between Eggs Benny and a taco salad. We both had fresh orange juice to drink which was refreshing.

My mom enjoyed her Benny but was not able to finish the tasty potatoes so she took those home. I love eggs Benny so the Southwest Bowl was a fresh take on it. It had the poached eggs and potatoes like the Benny but the corn, black beans, avocado salsa, feta and mole gave it a completely different flavour which I loved! The thin, crispy tortilla strips added a nice crunch to the bowl.

The service was great as they periodically checked up on us. I’d highly recommend this place for brunch or any other meal as I always get great food at Browns!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpWUNS7Q-LmySTOG8lYyJPYJ027mIPZVbKc_OF&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Michael and Marika Voulgaris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzQOb6hM2n_Y_NPJSrKFycEwXCEl3G86kFoIEilTXof27dY_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very lovely restaurant. Came with my husband and had such a joyous time. It was comforting and felt very family friendly, the manager Darcy was super hands on with his team and very helpful. The expo was killer tonight and the servers and bartender did there jobs with love and grace. Will definitely be back !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Everardo Ortiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEGjTelJpW_JTajFrpH8OZV074v6opFDLkMnN1S0SeRrFuhkY6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With a very nice and cosy atmosphere and excellent service this restaurant is definitely one of those you just keep coming back to. Their menu options are also very varied and sure to satisfy anyone.

I would highly recommend their margaritas but order them spicy. The spicy touch adds an extra punch with out them being too hot to handle. Both the raspberry and original spicy margaritas were fantastic!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAGBVn6U2X4xc_zqJCZqOqJrWFHHggCqkfIEGp&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"Heather Donaldson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlD-oqBvTzRy0gepqEFBGkkyEZsNFlfeRAotLYJPuwo9EwEgc9Tg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I gave  five stars for the atmosphere today. Got the summer chill vibe going on the outdoor patio with the sun shining, summer breeze , bright, red umbrellas, music, and friendly service.

Some food items were prepared well,  like the cod , but my salad had so much tough kale in it that was not chopped up much, so I kind of felt like a rabbit   chewing away at the tough leaves.
Presentation was nice, if not exceptional.
4.5. Overall.
Servers were enthusiastic and made the effort to please.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWIKVmfFy83Ikw_sChPDzv40EltpOHuGFlZCKd&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2023-7-4"},{"Name":"Jenny Baylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLC-WrCsIYovUKgQdEnQYwVZfZdMj87HcjT5-3RiF0b9hcMNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went out for dinner and my sister in law had made a reservation with originally 9 people and ended up with 11. None of us were never told about the 18 percent service charge. The waitress had given us our bill and had the POS machine. Then said she would be right back, came back with the 18 percent service charge. Every other place we have ever had a reservation at with more than 6 people has always expressed the service gratuity charge that way the party is able to have the choice to opt out. We were there from 6:15PM-8:50PM. I didn’t even order a main because it took an hour to get our appy, 20 minutes in between each drink ordered to get another drink, and 1.5 hours to get our main. My nachos were burnt, my partners food was missing the additives he ordered and they still charged us. The food was luke warm as well. The waitress came to see us maybe 3 times throughout the “service”. Had the service been at least decent sure the charge would have even fine, but that’s not even the 1.5 hours of the babysitter that we had to pay for. This place is a joke. I don’t go to Vancouver often and this didn’t make it any more worth it. Thanks for making our night suck.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andre Lucas Ribeiro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2l3it4qX5GvR2JgWz7xhUa1RENuyJXMFWUxXb_IzzZ_Na_z9fhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice pub with a very polite crew. Rotating beers on tap were very good! Did not eat though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdt9JSA5MMSdZs5PNiGVdufBxSHfr5U3e6nUh8&fid=0x0:0xad164437db490613"],"When":"2024-5-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chris Charles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrISq9W73HrjlGADtJWok_5lo7jNqrkaquC2lVl_FVv-ialwI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great local Persian resto.  Order, get your number, and food is brought to you!  Prices are great and portion sizes are very huge— you won’t leave hungry that’s for sure.  Very popular place and tricky to get a seat. It’s worth the wait/trip and I’d totally recommend and go back for more when in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDnvBU7Gw5TIekkwBE0dRZCm3S7ER-P_kRWyv8&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"KAUREEN MENDIS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLyN8E1hRGHsFD3sxl5TysphBJITv6qUWNQDBxqDr6eTnHtBcu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved everything about this place !!! The ambience and vibe reminded me of a kebab place back home the same smell and almost identical seating arrangement. The food was the best there is so much quantity for a reasonable price. The kebab and naan combo was so huge I was scared I wouldn’t be able to finish it. Top it with the Chicken and rice and you have a real winner. The beef cutlet also was so flavourful. I will definitely be back to try desserts as I was so full this time I could not try them. 100\100 would definitely recommend!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN46n5X793-YzAB4oWAR2yjdp3RSorxggYWcwb&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Aqeel Rehman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmfTi4uSjCNG16nlnRxtjqUz6fJYHXNTc6GpJq6E66XM14O3lZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yaas Grill offers deliciously addictive kebabs but milder than traditional Pakistani or Indian spices, still packed with flavor. You will find the location on Lonsdale, facing a park, with a cozy ambiance that shines at night. I found the staff friendly and cooperative. Unmatched huge portions and affordable prices make it a must-try. Bonus tip: Be sure to explore their veggie options to kebabs and gravies—you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLAm4Apopi2Wrx-S8Lf2e77dBxyYx56MSllx-5&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Aakanksha Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuYdKCUfmzBWVi8hHJdEW0VQHgKBu9GL7pviB3VjBf3i4r2lDX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tried Yaas after a lot of recommendations. The food is just right. Its like any other Persian restaurant. It was way too crowded and loud for my liking but the service was moving despite the line up. The prices are a tad higher than other places in the vicinity. We orderd a side of salad along with chicken vaziri and to my surprise it was a box packed salad. Looked straight out of save on ! The kebabs were juicy. Got neither good nor bad to talk about it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMenFwlcptr2mfZj8L5w2cPP-UwQqhhCx0fFA4M&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Shinjini M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD-NflD4SuBnG8b2CLK4vFRUp76N2PF3vkj0rSOEFsK6cFdJ0QmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Oh. My. God. The best Persian restaurant in town and I 10000% recommend the tandoori chicken with naan/rice. The best thing ever!! I love their Baghali Polo as well! Extremely quick service and very warm people. Please try this place out 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPA1Q0WHK_QdsCjqndWvBaSJgXRWvbiU4laahf6&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcjneWc_LCD45co2Cac8bHJnBcsw2HEfdzcQRnC4ndQPOjCkyC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"🍽FOOD -4   of  5
We ordered ash reshteh, kobideh and dogh and yogurt. The food was to our taste. Yummy
👨‍🍳SERVICE - 4  of 5
The staff were polite and attentive
🏡AMBIANCE - 2  of 5
The design wasn't great but acceptable clean
💰VALUE - 4 of 5
All our orders cost about $40","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNkILSdq5DRggJr7nG0oprQ_qAq9X976YUpygn&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Alie Noruzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXM4Sn9L1IoGp2Jj1t4kUFNUaFRpOrtAfP3FN6zdYu3v9YKa5Lm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had lunch here. The fresh bread was the best part (I remembered to take a picture of it when we were done eating). Also the koobideh kabab was very good. The rest was pretty good as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9f3RkzE7vFhSAzMKLLh_k8J9ml-x4Ily4SEjP&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Sahara Shaik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZtM6omifZZNI85JZaEEVEW7MsHt3UoOOrEoWlPJ9SkkPoYKxJeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at Yaas Grill was absolutely delightful! The Persian cuisine here is exceptional — from the aromatic kebabs to the flavorful rice dishes, every bite was a treat for the senses. The service was equally impressive; the staff was attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. The ambiance was cozy and inviting, perfect for a relaxed dining experience. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to enjoy authentic Persian food with top-notch service. Siah is super friendly and excellent service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_0qitr3ErGxexHeQPaZx8dh_fUK5yvCbUPRiZ&fid=0x0:0x66239fcea90e88d7"],"When":"2024-6-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dooyi Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE04OH6QJwbK2otI-LkstRX0Vl5gtBCif5z_TRvh0lKaV_Koej=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent pizza with a crust. We really enjoyed our meal in their cozy space and would definitely come back for future dinners. Thanks 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOynPxmj5ouk9MdFd2QSlJ1EgftVhLD77MHUjNy&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Afreen J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL1ZeweaycOte33MDbmpSg8MtgerWXZP23M-ogg8fCZaa9zvz8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, great pizza.

Had the brussel sprouts pizza, definitely a new flavour for me since it had honey on it. Nice ambience to the place to dine in.

There are only 2-3 vegetarian options for pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOudjzVr12LensYGoJzga0WYqLzcegxyu3EYxIs&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Panteha Ebrahimii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp1neZmF9TAV9Mm2SPPocowHUnqOs_JTslv6MT8SBP5-H-Z0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to Scratch another location before, so I was excited to try their new Lonsdale branch. I’m happy to say it was just as good, if not better.

This branch has a modern and cozy feel. The lighting is warm, and the seating is comfortable. It’s a nice place to relax and enjoy a meal.
The staff were friendly and helpful. Our waiter knew a lot about the menu and gave us great suggestions. We felt well taken care of during our visit.
Just like at the other branch, the food here was amazing. We ordered the marinated crispy tofu bowl , which was perfectly cooked. It was amazing experience for me and I will definitely go back for another delicious meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7_IU9dKBpG455FBaXo3c2sM5VClAtaNYeRNj5&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Ivan Katz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCPAXGm5aKjoGRQJlcvnDyKo8EfNmRz0gWSENU5FNE415ZLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this new spot and it's a gem. My dad  loved the Bombay at Butter Chicken pizza, and he is not necessarily the most adventurous eater. My prosciutto pizza was spot on. The dough is very high quality and cooked to perfection. Many Neapolitan pizza places end up with soggy dough centres, not this one. Great undercarriage. We're hooked and keep coming back. Service was excellent too. Oh, and don't miss the kale salad and peking duck pizza – they're amazing too. Worth a visit for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDEDK8rzzf5OUNKt02ShGYNVYxAP_6frO0rWiC&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Guido Katz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW756N_y_XbKgSp669VUrJgIDk83KNLFkLGHJ4L5Ux8Kkgzc9eL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were 4 adults for dinner. Excellent customer service awesome pizzas, delicious and original. Fair price. If you like pizza you have to try Scratch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB6IGgvVZgLnWCAvitysifcW6G9jP5I26SsjnT&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Sogol Khalessi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZzS1R7nD7nEM-UDueuf7_uZtW7ppi49MRjWO7fmPpxJv4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very disappointing  experience with our recent delivery order from Scratch Lonsdale. I had guest and I ordered mushroom Pizza , the mushrooms were burned and pizza was impossible to eat . Unfortunately upon calling them, I received a rude & dismissive respond they just offered a voucher for next order. Poor customer service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk8Xlet7jGx9U2XWRE534Hcn9h29JonJ1Xwm4&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Darya Ostad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJrY8Bp3vZFa9a7YflsxnTMdQeJTEsOyf_wXKgsrzzFnO164A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sophia was our server and she was amazing! Like a fairy that comes to your table and gives you everything you need (:

Food was great — not easy to find good gluten free pizza!
I like the lighting for the atmosphere. It’s a cozy and intimate spot

Will def visit again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Remy Herda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfm5sXYwW47IliNtGu2OTHHy1kMw43KNo8u-P1TLws07MSbXs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious especially the Buttermilk Fired chicken 🐔 amazing and the pizza of the day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQyQNfwUSADUtRU8cwfyco_ME2uNRiifvzxvKC&fid=0x0:0xa1e04530bd390beb"],"When":"2024-9-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Farhad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZsh7rsXskoTeFBdwx-4_jSK3VIUQ0BNWwnMfqcoyfBr3tpy_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Their food quality is just average. We tried Fiocchiona Pizza that was not good, a plain mixture of bread with sauce and pizza cheese. The sausage that was added to it was not good at all. You can get much better pizzas from thrifty foods just next to them with half their price !! We also tried truffle fries. This one was good. The only thing that I can recommend is truffle fries. We had a seat in the corner. That was not a good location. There were lots of propane tanks next to us that is both hazard and nothing standard in any restaurant. They charge us $10 more for bringing our own salad to our table, so instead, I had to skip paying tip. Overall not recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOttq74t-FnMB7O13sfhqv8KgrJZs5hjp0pLZ8&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a really good neighborhood Italian restaurant. Pricey but with healthy portions and friendly service. Very good wine choices. We didn't follow the traditional Italian primeri  piatti and secondi piatti and instead shared appetizers, pastas and pizzas in the middle family style.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoyOFv9btzBzZkZQA1DRrBvIMOuxJsag4Ew05g&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Kristin L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuO_421d89rSC-x3YKAZ93D_1k4fCeqZBvDbw1BmEcZ2dlmQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"While service was timely and wonderful, we found the food to be underwhelming and overpriced. When we ordered the Burrata at $23 we were expecting a nice full gooey ball but were presented with a piece smaller than the palm of my hand, and firm, almost like a solid piece of mozzarella.

The ricotta and basil pizza was very bland and when I ordered balsamic for it I was charged $2.
I found this very surprising as most Italian restaurants offer complimentary bread, balsamic and oil for dipping or at least balsamic as a table condiment.

The pizza oils were also not enjoyed and were extremely bland, though my partner did enjoy his pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1ie19uXYM9I7pRnejXciKl5uqTwQMaoCjGPE&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Elson K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ4aX-YHOP73VzQpZrNKTgmqafj2rfORjtiK24wdAkeFQEgEv8Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was excellent. We ordered olives, pizzas, dip, and garlic prawns. All but the prawns were from the Happy Hour menu which had a very decent selection.

Service and ambience were good. The restaurant is spacious and modern. We sat in the patio which was lovely with plants and herbs. Live music may have made it even more pleasant than it already was but it was early. I liked that we could hear our own conversation even though the patio filled up quickly after 6pm.

Edgemont Village gets busy so come early to find limited free street parking. We were lucky to find a spot. I think we noticed free underground parking when we left, below the Thrifty's.

Overall, my whole family was happy with the birthday experience. We stuck with water and our bill averaged well under $30 per person after tax and gratuity. Definitely returning, as it now ranks up there amongst my favourite Italian restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2C28rYEljvtHRBmZNpExTWtXXppR13shHuWhl&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2023-5-26"},{"Name":"Marcus Ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcDwWLtWbK6Uj0vd6jum5iY90wYzBtFNIIgaKELob3f_Mt3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Took my grandmother to early evening dinner; we had pasta and pizza that each was delicious. The Christmas decor is so cute and our server - we think the manager? Was very sweet and  informative about the menu and the happy hour wines. We will be backm","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brittany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaTw3mnOK8l8haAjS6bfO1ye0bRyF4XKnDg89neYDPBoOw4QlgPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A neighborhood Italian restaurant in Edgemont Village - great service and delicious meatballs, pizza and pasta. Reasonably priced, decent portions and delicious food. We enjoyed everything we had.

Great for groups, dates and happy hour. We recommend this local spot for a nice dinner with friends and family.

To the owners:  You nailed the Dine Out experience compared to 90% of the restaurants. Great options, great value on the menu, incredible experience with no pressure to choose dine out or the regular menu 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORMwO74oBJCOAXu6UGD4B8yYq29r2hySloHtrz&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-2-1"},{"Name":"saleh amini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMPMf_O7GAz4ToB7Fdrcx6A1uxNlfODqzt-jsLEa8UEksYthOX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kind waiters, great taste, fast service.
We enjoyed good white wine at their happy hours with reasonable price 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3j1g8Jy7BQGlDeInmET4jEks7V0UZwhFLVnrT&fid=0x0:0xd63af9ffdfa7acd"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"David Greer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQ0SE1MsZYkv5BeLIemQE_kGUzHTaqIDn_fZc66s0iEf0TwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My wife and I like to include Edgemont in our Sunday walk and Bufala has a perfect brunch menu for our tastes. Unfortunately the service is mediocre and they just can’t get the coffee right. We were there two weekends in a row and the second time, we decided just to skip the coffee, it wasn’t worth the frustration, but sure enough the couple in front of us were complaining about their coffee being luke warm. Our eggs were cooked perfectly, but the overall meal is just not hot enough. It just seems that there is a lag time from kitchen to table.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dharmendra Awasthi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIV4bH4pruWuwHwvFeVB2D5sgfuAyTLFuB7xlIyVnDZPxnWyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of enjoying breakfast every morning at Medley’s Grill, and it became one of the highlights of my stay in North Vancouver! The food was consistently fresh, flavorful, and perfectly prepared.
Special thanks to Mr. Raj, who greeted me warmly every day, adding a personal touch that made me feel right at home. Kudos to the chef as well—the attention to detail in each dish was impressive, and every bite was a delight. Highly recommend Medley’s Grill for anyone looking for a great start to their day with excellent service and delicious food! You cab find pictures of items with great taste!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHeoZAHkecFZGc2t9kYVjZnfQkw6y9xW0Jk5Hu&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Paul Jacobson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2HBD4f00h5UqewL3-ewcwTM9EcFvhH1ajV3fIuVz6NgDWYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the best lunch places associated with a hotel. Servers were attentive and pleasant. The meals were ample and delicious..
Nicely presented. A bit noisy, but someone was having a special birthday:)  oh yes, the extensive menu made selecting a meal a challenge.  I guess we will have to go back on our next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXfDvbWS33b7aX3pCmLfs1_VxUgqGMNtBE2Y2X&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"Panteha Ebrahimii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp1neZmF9TAV9Mm2SPPocowHUnqOs_JTslv6MT8SBP5-H-Z0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently had breakfast at Medley’s Italian & Grill Restaurant. While the food was good, with delicious pancakes, perfectly poached eggs, and tasty potatoes, the experience was slightly marred by the bread arriving very late. Despite this hiccup, I still enjoyed my meal and would consider returning for another visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxUgEQ3qvGoqblczSCWypNPQ3-yI3vuX4mlIzU&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Gigi Kwok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKduCnuALW3zyyrcjZE9ej0NKmTn_QUUA4aPA1hL1TVWCL4lw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely enjoy the restaurant! Our waiter Diego is really nice and helpful. The food was great quality and price wise. The restaurant is really comfortable and quiet. Would definitely come back again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Curtis Austin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCGZZ1k_-A-MlN3V02dyIx4v40F_dyXIMvpPUn1-FFT0Kr2iZg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very weird experience with Medley’s!

I ordered Fish and Chips on Skip the Dishes, menu description says that it comes with two pieces of cod. Only 1 piece arrived.

I ate what arrived and it was DELICIOUS, and very well cooked, would 100% go into the restaurant and order this again.

I then filed a report with Skip letting them know that there is a mistake with the menu description and there was a lot of confusion. If it is only supposed to be one piece then please please edit the description on the app.

I specifically said I enjoyed the food and didn’t require a refund, and just wanted them to notify the restaurant of the error - however a full refund was applied anyway.

Great food! Will visit in person very soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNloLk76eMx7HHYWFyZQFvIMmEXTqTFyOdEXXQT&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Amar Shan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOVcxE45W_CVBLTCgWqUwvlVQzo2kDNYjNrHgzI_ctbcqVZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow!!!    Just.... wow!    The chef at Medley's is a true artiste - every food item delivered is an example of "food as art".

I had lunch here, expecting a standard hotel diner experience.  Boy, was I surprised!   The calamari was exquisite - perfectly fresh, the dipping sauce nicely matched - and a lovely balance of colours with peppers that made the presentation as good as the taste.

Next up was my schnitzel.   Super!!!  Easily up to the standards of a German restaurant.  (I asked the waitress about it - it turns out, the chef recently immigrated from Germany, where he was a master chef. I have no doubt that, once he's saved up some money, he'll open a ultra high end restaurant rivalling the best in the city.  Meanwhile, this really is your chance to enjoy fine dining at a bargain price.)

One of the friends with whom I was dining had the butternut squash ravioli.  She commented the pasta was cooked al dente, to perfection, and the sauce was fantastic.   Topped with prawns that were apparently delicious as well.

Trying to lose weight, but this place was too good to skip dessert.   The creme brûlée is made in house and I can report that it came up to the standards of the rest of the meal!!  Forgot to take a picture though.

I think I have a new favourite restaurant!  :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYOfvolr3kEvDoC1kdPnPzyt9WIbDx6MI5QYSm&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2023-8-24"},{"Name":"Kyle James-Patrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2KmLqnKw5OuLPD3VmvEWziRB1HxsCYMBA4SJkhviIYoPHiTXf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Take a Dennys, paint it grey, make the plates massive and cut the portions by half. Drop the food quality and  are looking at the most miserable overpriced breakfast. Avoid.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQ1uLLytqkgufkyXo4Ra2UNbeWbFN2o-7CHnf3&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Simay Seydanoglu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfokMeINg0SamF1_jc_J_mOJcC6WJBJiCx4j-of7tkFk5w5Y3h=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I had a wonderful time at Medley's. The place felt cozy and friendly as soon as we walked in. ❤️ The service was really attentive, making us feel taken care of. We ordered salmon carpaccio and steak with prawns. The carpaccio was super tasty and delicate. The steak with prawns was the highlight though – it was cooked perfectly and had a great mix of flavors.

The staff was also really nice and knew a lot about the menu. ⭐️

We left with happy hearts and full stomachs, excited to come back again. 🎉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd1NtsQQj3hsJArejpCZGIzlpU920B1zlXT5SE&fid=0x0:0x8536bf29b5adce11"],"When":"2023-8-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Monica Glez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3YU5YCEHOH6RfLDdoBNeAfDdaY-PZ81kFz8bWoGFHRrolSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a secret spot in North Shore and I really like it!!
We tried the house sandwich which was really good and the paella (unfortunately it was not really good to be considered one of the best dishes on the menu). I love the decor, it makes me feel like in a homemade Canadian restaurant. The place was clean. The staff was friendly and they gave us time to talk and enjoy our meal. The price is good 👍 quality is good!
I totally will visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP9eBOWDVkCuVIRk7Kku5oCYjr7_zPoDXOKW9i&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality ingredients, generous portions, friendly service and fair pricing were the main impressions from our first visit to BLVD Bistro.  We tried the Chilaquiles, Upstream benedict and Paella and loved them all, especially the Chilaquiles.  Look forward to returning soon to try more of the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSjGOf5m7mArsmZsUM_ahti9yOgqq5aCglk0_5&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2rwh3w7SAciASeLC_7SKDxwrfz7egJUU6N8-BkPzs_szq9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly service and incredible food. Paella, brisket benedict and the French toast (on special) were amazing. Emma was our server and the sweetest human being, we loved her.
Everything was so good we went back the next day!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPobXvEzIZRCaXMvey9TeCCmy8dGS0TyzdbFzCK&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Nolan John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL2zeQ54CzDkklcnwdlPtjuKC2fdbKcXUJP42hG___IAc1vQT5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Place was busy and I can see why. The chef, Maria, came out to greet us because she was excited that we'd order two traditional Mexican dishes. Menu has a lot of the dependable staples but personally I really enjoy the Latin influence. The chilaquiles really hit the spot. Definitely would recommend BLVD Bistro and will share it with more friends whenever I'm in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUVzc8gW4KGT_t4q5TKJx1wYvH16_zLb3NpJ4U&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Kieran Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCdskN_dRX2qKBCjex39_s7MByNj1N7yfIz0FafWXMQEF9DTq9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It absolutely awesome spot for brunch! The service was wonderful, the menu is perfect for variety, and the prices were also very reasonable! I’ll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3duVQerReotwX7H08ifwHQDfn8JbqOHe7gjgP&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Naythan Rasquinha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvE2B428G9mm4S7ORqKOWfPtfOeyYdrOMRGE8Ng1kJvBb6v8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food at BLVD was amazing, definitely worth the visit, especially for the brunch menu. However, the service was just okay. Our server wasn’t very welcoming, didn’t ask how we wanted our eggs cooked (we ordered two egg dishes), and unexpectedly squared up the bill without warning. Despite the service hiccups, I'll be back for the food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDpUtX8Tw_pQUnoDS8QUfkzEJ7HzHJJ8wzfCSA&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-8-7"},{"Name":"Don R Campbell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlaWij7xrbYcwkz7FscJMnAIxuYixNyVFja7O780zWpDE5h2f7rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, what a brunch/lunch find.

Unassuming location, but don't let that stop you.

The depth of flavours was the biggest surprise.

I had the Chilaquiles (GF) . Superb.  Like nachos only MUCH better .

She had the Smoked Brisket Benny and kept commenting on.how good it was.

The service is quick and friendly.  A special shout-out to our server Kyra. She read the people at our table perfectly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-9MrczPHpNhlpK6IIUT65AF_5w_aqDfmOtA3M&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BLVD Bistro is a gem! I had such a fantastic experience there. The food was absolutely delicious, and the portions were just right. Even though it was busy, the weekend wait was only about 20 minutes, which was totally worth it. The service was excellent too—attentive and friendly. I highly recommend BLVD Bistro for a wonderful brunch experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_uTBUlmuTk54mejFfKJ3T-4RILwLEugYXwwl0&fid=0x0:0xc891f5f18c9d8642"],"When":"2024-5-12"}]

[{"Name":"Mehdi sh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXF_EQWBFWXmLJdRcBV-MtJ8SEv8MdCMD8PjQwKUYACMRzackID=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything was in excellent condition. The food was perfectly cooked, juicy, and tender. The restaurant is clean, offering a relaxing and cozy environment where you can enjoy your meal while listening to beautiful Persian music. The lady owner was kind and professional, giving us peace of mind that the restaurant is managed by someone who truly knows how to run it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb3BuVv0XOhGepgIZmxly8g6U6AMjxCFfhjpeM&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Devan Chi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtSt6qsdZUTz39ri5BiZcQQns5LUWm5IHqVD6KnrmgK57waSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent and memorable meal. Great taste and presentation, nice interior (and really comfy chairs), clean, and friendly owner. Try the baklava!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZd_-Uhj-HayPzgSv20rj9sf1feeR3Lig5Cj_d&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Vancouver Foodie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8w6jkWQhHhs1Z246avVvoKQqrR4N6KZDvvFaklq629YACSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A hidden gem of Persian food in North Vancouver.

Lots of great dishes. If you are close by, it's worth a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJJQBVkB1fWV4OwcCAATsA0jTxFqMlb7QRm43V&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Danial Emamhosseini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5yG-bMHoqbxyxcViS4vlLPGdzC7_8fQszfYP-souswf40xgFM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh food and great taste with a friendly staff. I also Highly suggest Baklava.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPo8BFy1ZeRMadVUv7RoIi5Tro0SF7xMHQ0Hwwy&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Paris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0WPazoJBCdtRqTbBzCZwEk_hqahECBnbuv3HHVvW2_zNHbRKn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Last night, we experienced a memorable night at this restaurant.
Saboo is a cozy spot filled with Persian charm. As we entered, the warm lights and Persian décor made us feel right at home.

The kebabs stole our hearts. Each skewer was packed with flavor, taking us on a culinary journey to the bustling streets of Tehran.

The staff at Saboo were friendly and attentive, making our dining experience even more enjoyable. Plus, with plenty of parking available, we could relax and savor every bite without worry.
They also had a beautiful decoration for Nowruz."
Saboo is more than just a restaurant; it's a place where Persian flavors shine bright, inviting everyone to taste a piece of Iran.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMju0r7hg9PTDWmRAmnwpg8B_7WuwuAjstQ3R7H&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-3-22"},{"Name":"Hana Kadri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr6wpOlRJ4zXMoxHED5VrxaqD67fPnr8qNYNa_JwMWJQEgS00f=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Persian food I’ve ever had. Amazing staff. Amazing service. Restaurant is clean and the food is amazing! Great portions and perfect seasoning. Definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNitYgb0-S0F1YflGQWnvEQVPjaICZ-gbmw5X0q&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Sab L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJVSM41S_fn-gD973T8KFIY-jOKF8nKH7Y4Y9n4JjsK8mH8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The chicken... the koobideh.. the lamb.. sooo tender and juicy!!! Thank you to the owner?! For being so honest and recommending what tastes best!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4C7cNW29M6-HVdbCH9JBFOvhV7qvaAq2bIwKr&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Michael Sayyad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnZoB3LAHhC30kzCYvZX844CLVY2QcbcHc_FgoerhWXrYctwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and service. Quality of the beef and chicken were top and cooked perfectly. Juicy and tasty... Baklava was amazing. Rice was perfect. Best experience ever!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjqg2ocD1V71DQ6h-_YZmMn03aW7QByA9KmbF2&fid=0x0:0x3392f1f66d9e55db"],"When":"2024-6-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rhodes Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUlN1n3pAekvjp51e2hLJxijqWk6fkyD3R5wi0vtHWK6uqt4ItsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The açaí bowls were really good and I would highly recommend. I was able to take them to go and were still cold and frozen when I got home. The cookies were way too sweet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz_3P-_EOoQi_3PyV7dwg6qyuG2TRaRiBu_NNb&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Jamie Uzunkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWx87Dr5B5JhvfGrD32_UzxRcSaHnY8uCRgMNjih7fUz1rzs3Xs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been wanting to try this place out ever since my sister in law started working here! She had a lot of good recommendations for me to try! I tried the cherry smoothie and the peanut butter açaí bowl. Both were so delicious. I definitely want to go back and try their matcha and their coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYAi-l8d7-AEeRYYXHXfl3zClWoaHbLBFXpug_&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Ruben Dias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRQm-dFG-t7_4ZY9xFC_uVe9KDx0B1GnM0fsF1XZmg0kLVJeIE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Plant-Based Paradise at Buddha Full!

Oh, Buddha Full, where have you been all my vegan days? Walking into your cafe is like stepping into a vibrant garden of edible delights, and I must say, I'm still floating on cloud nine from my last visit!

Let's talk about the "Nut-thing Better Acai" bowl first. If this bowl were a movie, it would sweep the Oscars. Picture this: a heavenly heap of organic acai, with banana and blueberries so fresh you’d think they just took a dip in the Fountain of Youth. And the star of the show? That decadent organic peanut butter sauce cascading over an A-list cast of banana, strawberries, kiwi, with a cameo of chia pudding, cacao nibs, and homemade granola that deserves its own spin-off series. Each spoonful was a blockbuster hit in my mouth!

Moving on to the Tofuino Salad—this isn't just any salad; it's a crunchy, colorful carnival of joy! The kale was so tender it must have been hand-reared from infancy, and paired with the smoky tofu, it was like a sultry tango of flavors. The supporting cast of carrots, radish, and purple cabbage added just the right amount of crunch, making every bite a standing ovation.

And let’s not forget the Grilled Please Sandwich. With its sunflower pesto and zen cheese, it's the kind of sandwich that brings peace talks to the table. It’s like if world leaders sat down and shared this sandwich, global harmony would be achieved before dessert.

Buddha Full, you’re not just a cafe; you're a culinary utopia. Your plant-based prowess is turning this meat-eater into a frequent leaf-eater. Bravo, and see you soon—my taste buds insist on an encore!

Yours in veggie and fruit-filled delight,

Ruben","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9SHoibPko_Itxrk79u3a907eXoAMmyrwogrr4&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Chloe Genargue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcB97SzXsMD6panoq_G9yq28plXwWkj0h7AznJw7Xc37ypMfg5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Something I don’t take for granted is this go-to place before I head to work a few blocks away. If I needed an extra lift of energy, this is the place I run to.
I always lean on my comfort flavors especially for a smoothie. However, today, I chose to try something different ( with the Server’s help, of course ) from my Happy Face 🙂 to their promotional smoothie QUI MON CHERRY smoothie 🍒
Such a good call! Thank you to the Server who made my smoothie, it matched my aura 💗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPf0_5CnDdqurPUR76OLntRXH-MS37yvtlO9mPd&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Tsui-Fang Hu (Tracy)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_ro0txUL1mG25heVUuoyMTMpTlXMMMT4-dXmn5rgUocYrBx5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The portion of the food was good (I felt tired of chewing at the end 😅 so healthy!!) The only downside was that tofu is an add on. Also the air was quite stuffy in there.
They got lots of interesting smoothies, maybe that’s the most popular thing?
Btw, the menu on the website still shows $14.5 for bowls which is $16.95 now I believe. https://www.buddha-full.ca/menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWR65tgA7S7Aoxah5voMKnTbn71hMnlxM2d7on&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Angelica Janis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL5gDvAC55KlzxDvdOtNrGcMw0VLyeelctUyVHxm0UxhK4tlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Horribly dry and chewy tofu. If this was supposed to be crispy than it was definitely not fresh. It was like eating rubber from the outside, at least the inside was soft enough. The vegan curry sauce was really strong in flavour, almost too strong for me. At least the steamed lentil is delicious! Kombucha on tap was not working. However, I will give this place another chance because I see the great reviews and the smoothies look and sound delicious. Perhaps I'll try a different bowl in hopes it will be better than the one I had the first time coming here. I feel a bit sorry to leave this review because the customer service was great and the place is beautiful. The bath bombs etc also look amazing, will definitely give those other products a try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"World “World Explorer” Explorer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWW-ckq9xRiAvj6L7wj9oir9Mf6czGNmdCmR57GytfYsDXbqcEk5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"That was our first time going there although we’ve been living close by!
Too bad. Now it’s one of our favourite places.
So cozy, unique atmosphere with healthy food, snacks and drinks options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlu0MqxYW--XW6DAO2U7_DPcac9p0Pex855zHp&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2024-2-12"},{"Name":"KS B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKqq0ZtAALrLMssgmfCwo9aWLa4qTSgRyC34h7DL55r3d75RjV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Want to eat healthy? Wanna feel healthy after eating? I bet you do :-) well you stumbled on the place to do just that. Great decor. Friendly stuff. And I mean look at those balls. That there is a bowl of goodness. A bowl of freshness. A bowl of tastiness. A bow of Buddha bowl. I mean the place is cool. Waters in the back if you want it. Easy to find. Easy menu. The only thing I don’t like. Is that tip thing for a counter service. I will I’ll be back. You bet I will be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqQITyucm67EG4C0SHnuW5qFzn5SRrtulonpvm&fid=0x0:0x69f7141f6183455f"],"When":"2023-2-27"}]
