user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pete On The Street","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdCPmg937wv90tlRaBXtKDK-aCTAb7FrA83Y4igLR31Qw239o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super quick made to order service.
Everything was fresh and hot and crispy.
I got the medium boneless sweet and spicy box which came to just over $17 all in. You get a nice heafty box which was about 10 pieces of super juicy delicious chicken.
Right of Lonsdale on 2nd super easy stop coming or going from Lonsdale Quay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIFajlY0hhrwm0hlaQ5-dunZenExxUbnYEUATF&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Cy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkSC7lAXZCJHRSMZSUu3uZL4bOwFtDRmBGSML5V01kGqEqK5Zz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"2024 Summer
A tiny, busy and specialty joint. Decent fried chicken and fries. Premium prices but good value for their lunch special.  Take out recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaStzAxiF9q9R1DMEk15yIzhT0TM8G5roDsx2N&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Kimberly D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8h7YCz4CKN35cUZuRzxi5Ui-JEII2xMD-HDnXgQelK1JZ12LY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a few times and always have the same great experience. Staff are friendly and service is quick
and efficient. The chicken is always fresh, juicy and crispy. My husband loves the chicken and waffles, I usually get a medium order of the chicken (either the cheese or soy garlic) with fries. The pickled radish is delicious too. We prefer a chicken box over other korean fried chicken restaurants in our area and will keep coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Juicy and tasty fried chicken!
It wasn't busy, but it should be since it's amazing.
Had the Nashville burger and it was delicious!  Should definitely eat it there nice and fresh, otherwise it'll lose its crispiness.
The chicken and waffles was off the charts!  The waffles are croissant waffles, and that makes it better than any other chicken and waffles I've had. They are missing Frank's Red hot, they should add this to their sauce line up and it would be complete.
I highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUvJJ7q2zqKpx7CPOHVgmRxT1EX13uKCzMqhty&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2023-4-30"},{"Name":"D Smurt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFMn_dqAOyQbOGs70jceToQMFxlTqwAZ_CpS19c2RhS51FXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing flavor, fresh thick juicy chicken. Some of if not the best chicken burger I've ever had. Extra spicy was the right amount of heat and the bit of sweetness with the coleslaw was prefect. First but not last time I'll eat here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxT_jucvth_0nEPiIggDijFRu1J4olgfTUj6G5&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really good chicken and waffles! The chicken was meaty and juicy. The waffles were craffle kind and light and crispy. Their sandwich was good, too, but a bit on dry and pricy side.
Several flavour choices…we tried crispy and honey garlic and both were good. They have other spicy kinds as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3OFI3jIVF7qRN9l2EukJCtoMenboe1693MDyY&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2023-8-30"},{"Name":"Vincent Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjBruVeZMWvNHxHcAgBcOWppDAX9xZQU1hDbqNXgVSz0fweXbl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Superb service! Friendly worker talked me through their menu options and told me they were very new. Everyone greeted me and said goodbye even when they were working on their stations. Lovely atmosphere.

We ended up ordering the Nashville chicken wings and a soy garlic chicken & waffles. The chicken was quite delicious with the perfect amount of crisp and crunch.  The waffles survived an entire drive home across the bridge and was still fluffy and slightly crispy.  It was a great complement to the saucy chicken.

Loved every bite. I'll be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3bHptvrVjH858CsrrqnyCQzUshlCRzw4XK4gf&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2022-6-21"},{"Name":"Andrew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKyNxnZbOKuiKThmqj1fhIzFPAEzf4pHpid4eMlRu2gI0Wa3uHYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got the lunch box with spicy Nashville sauce. Chicken was perfect, very tender and fries were excellent! Will be back to try the other flavors! This restaurant knows their chicken!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKRkvlHgvuFbfmaFXHc6_WNsOaUhOna99eNbNJ&fid=0x0:0x1ce6ff312a2c8007"],"When":"2024-3-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Farzam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIooZPCPPfH5D4G1f5pX_06Fqf4UZb5reyqU1DQAFjZqgdcZ04=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went to Cantina Norte for lunch around 12, but they only had the brunch menu available. Despite the limited options, the food was really good, and the service was excellent. The staff was attentive and friendly, making the overall experience pleasant. Would have loved to try their lunch menu, but the brunch was still a solid choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPimh26iWFFzkKepHTqXdadP3OPOoFBLNRueGrU&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Kasra Feili","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdWaTX9XZliZlg1I3eIYHEaYMQHVl6waF7WroHRqIPImqod_vI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at this Mexican gem! From the moment we walked in, the vibe was so lively and welcoming. Every dish was bursting with authentic flavors that transported me straight to Mexico.
Whether you’re craving a casual lunch out or looking to dive into some seriously good Mexican cuisine, this place is a must-visit. Can’t wait to go back and try more of the menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZm6lUkGtXwVeAzhPFYBwJFLA93koZsksiWlQX&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Tom C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdiYc5x_E-Q2lE0z_5xM3LFSGfnEnGmUa_btawv_geQdXHww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They serve some chips & salsa while you wait. Dishes were well prepared and tasted great. Happy hour starts at 2pm, $9 Margheritas sure hit the spot on a nice hot day. There’s also an outdoor patio area and free parking in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuu-82Qj8q1iD65-WaeZZ4cgMblDf62XX5VkgM&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Crabby Ermine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ghzWacgyIAQrG2Lk7qt0s7V3r_adVAnu6EbLXS1Ck1zLBRgjvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LOVE LOVE LOVE this place.
First time tonight with my wife and daughter.
Everyone was perfect.
Margaritas
Chips and salsa
Taquitos
Enchiladas
Tacos
Churros
Banana Cream Pie

And our server was so nice - like old school nice and she told us that her parents had the original Cafe Norte years earlier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBkHw6-jbp90UI2Smp5-6No4lg5u5B7KnV-uKZ&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Dr.Hadi Najafi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBM9NYEZFIeHoba9emgE-Tv48BhK_6O5OW-1M4xgZ6CtkAvZpt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cantina Norte is one of the best places to enjoy Mexican cuisine in North Vancouver! You absolutely have to try the tortilla soup—it's an unforgettable flavor experience. The friendly service and warm, inviting atmosphere always make us want to come back. Definitely one of the best dining experiences I've had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoHtB7oU4KEHYCuzPoKwVD24maN5RXWonJwzqx&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"SeotByul Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXo1VGavC46cOilmApk6kWId36YQC9xBmXbg07KN3Lonymvohe8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was fantastic! Atmosphere was enjoyable and patio seatings was excellent! Only down side was we felt so unwelcome by the male host when we first arrived. He seemed like he really didnt want to be here and didnt bother to even smile. He answered passive aggressively when i had asked a question. Thankfully our server made up for it and excelled in taking care of us during the dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfWJ0SagQZG7x_zERKgu4BnSeB6OKMHOhKGeJv&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Shahin Ghaziani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy1qF31PoUG993KIAqA6tuooGdzqYlTvWou9IItwKsSQ1BCVSy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious, and the vibe was great. Special shoutout to our server, Marcos, who was incredibly friendly, patient, and helpful. He made our visit extra special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkPvwrnADOUlLBQF_BTQ-HmvF2JbzBPFryAwFl&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"S Paull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxmkNt-NkNE3iOpigzCU5rTZ0feALLbSq5mJ8nodRivdUDSoQb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We could not decided where to go and son said try this place!  Another friend has referred it too.  We came in and the nacho are the best I have ever had!  The interior design is fun and we sis not have to wait for a table","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMy_2hW1s0zZSs52_o5p0sjaVZu7ADZ2vn2Kjb5&fid=0x0:0x5a84d793df6fb31c"],"When":"2024-7-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The whipped cream in the strawberry 🍓 and whip cream crepe was all milk cause the cashier boy made me wait and tool 3 more orders while my order sat there in the box. Didn't update the que thing to call me.
The crepe was prepared by the girl well and tasted good but ruined by the person that doesn't even prepare the food, just takes orders like a slug!

On top of all that the tip prompt starts at 18% !! 😵‍💫
Greedy & Lazy!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMr7C26MQO_KPpi26Zp_wORPf6_JSaYE4VkApbS&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"N ....","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPfZx_MEbzVKSYl-GHrgwpL3l9nXnbSnaC8sA22VG4guzX_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Get the savoury crepes and avoid crepes with whipped cream. Got both - the cheese melts perfectly in the ham and cheese crepe. But for the sweet crepe, they added the whipped cream in the crepe while it's still hot. Turns into mush. I'd say savoury is 5/5 but the sweet one was 3/5.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaPyiSHsM4ohoCGSYHHk-jCVDqj2kV58oYZN1D5GSrk9mBXHW6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I went to this place because it was one of few which didn’t have any line to them. Also, because I saw they have savory creeps on the menu.

Well… Don’t order their crepes if you are looking for the food to fill you at any extent. They are thin as a napkins, with a few tiny decorative slices of salmon. It was more a joke than actual food for $18-20.

I decided to write this review only after I tasted their chamomile tea. What could be more simple than a tea bag and a cup of hot water?! The taste was strange. After opening the lid I discovered that water is not transparent, it had very milky color.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNju3M36lkRcMCVCqiXx35qHI8-0Oh6Mo6NYXtT&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"Amin Sameni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7gOTJPCM-cxMdKwmmGT2dzn1GqI9KyFBzJ01UvZjTN1ONfqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This local business absolutely is worth your support. This place is great overall
Lovely food, great in look as well as the taste which comes with a reasonable price.
I have tried different kinds of their savory and sweet dishes as well as the create-your-own which is an adventure itself.

some feedbacks to improve: (it could have been a 5 star)
- staff could be nicer. no one greets you and you could stand there in front of the cash register for 5 minutes without anyone approaches you
- no one asks or offers for water if you do not order any drink with your food
- they do not sanitize their tables when someone leaves","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM2nkd-1Xjl_au9vAUyMjJ0xiIPqkgeQsa8TI4&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2021-3-1"},{"Name":"Sally Nam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkPAfPlQHapPH5eeRRWf2bOJ5publzFmnKTSREzBnrlhFiXTeX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered sunrise crepe. Open kitchen was very clean. Portion was good to fill my morning stomach. Overcooked cheese was crispy and delicious. Perfect with a cup of coffee. It was a great meal for morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZbP8q4fMnWV8Gm2T_AfYFVGKkZOSgVKq6In0z&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2023-8-1"},{"Name":"alice w","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfBFd5-MCz0iWhHQjADA6mFZoHPhSAyoSlVDQe971OUgYbxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good ,The food is fresh and healthy also delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs4kSMdHrzd5kt36fT_mTiP2818YZVwjkUqXBK&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Yanzhe Shao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3kww9_05pqfPJcWsbUeLuqQA9mqeB4MhNh1WT9wJBhev37g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of enjoying brunch at Craffles, and I must say it was an absolutely delightful experience! One dish that stood out and left a lasting impression on my taste buds was their Benedict Egg. It was simply phenomenal!
The Benedict Egg at Craffles is a true masterpiece. The perfectly poached egg rested upon a bed of fluffy Waffe, accompanied by a generous serving of savory ham and topped with a velvety hollandaise sauce. Every component was flawlessly executed, resulting in a harmonious blend of flavors and textures.
The presentation was also top-notch, with the dish elegantly arranged and garnished with a sprinkle of fresh herbs. It was evident that the chef took great care and attention to detail in preparing this culinary delight.
Note: This review is based on my personal experience and reflects my honest opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7xHDHGUCudModyTRUlPaD5SGZkulccrC_BSAx&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2023-5-25"},{"Name":"Nina Feger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVstF32wnUBiFqizzAZZRNkXQBN9_ykLYlveo99gT_ooxNGq-lX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for breakfast or lunch! We took two crepes : Tex-mex and crispy chicken, we liked Tex-mex a little bit better. They were really tasty, very very generous with cheese inside, if you like it cheesy this is the place for you. The personal are very friendly and you get to see them make your crepes on a real bilig which is super entertaining. This is more a Brazilian food restaurant than a « crêperie » like in britanny (France), but still very delicious. I thought the sweet crepes where a bit over priced. I am used to a crepe costing 3€ max, but I am sure they are massive to make it up. Would like to come back and try there açaí bowl.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzdD6VMwMA24V00GRxyRtV9IoFb5WnEoYwRdxB&fid=0x0:0x5b833fdea962f7b7"],"When":"2022-7-15"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Nunu Nasimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJfUisBXSzr-D6GB6Q09HxmiQWYDHdZ8NHbsmvkzKimMFq3jqmNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This was our first visit, and we chose this place based on the great reviews and high ratings. The soup was fantastic, and we really enjoyed the bread for the sandwiches. However, the three types of sandwiches we ordered were very dry. The chicken pesto sandwich, in particular, had no pesto sauce—we ended up adding it ourselves at home!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jack Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmd1TTFWzRsOLY_mLcZposYnI78-lLrblHA6kO8oJIR4tGLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the Cubano pulled pork, SO GOOD! I needed a quick bite while in the area for work and this may have been the best sandwich I've had in any cafe!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Wilkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpw4CZOlCgL5fuEP0GGgZtThqIl7xjwUamXHDCjGqx01NiTf6a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing place - couldn't recommend it more. Many great coffee options but the food is truly amazing. The vegetables were so fresh that you could taste each indivudual type in the sandwhiches. We had two and both were fantastic (the Up Your Alley and Veggie Burrito). Apparently they have their own garden for their vegetables and it shows. Staff were extremely friendly. Great atmosphere. Also a \"secret patio\". Highly recommend and will absolutely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcPYcXJUW8WDeajJ8SpY4EDAEG3TGLB5tzqRfT\u0026fid=0x0:0xc78e0e0170e571be"],"When":"2022-9-3"},{"Name":"Richard Armstrong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOGMlGkaDowM8QdDFGNic4XMlQXf91cHGC4_Fbo5W13-frKk98=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered my sandwich today at the cashier, the guy wrapping sandwich’s clearly couldn’t keep track of what was happening with orders. They packaged and lost my sandwich with another order, and I waited for a solid 20+ minutes before speaking up. It took another 10 minutes to figure out how to setup a refund and by that time my lunch break was over. Thoroughly unimpressed as this is a semi-usual place for me as the food is so good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert R.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhwuG4Ge1WiCpRm7SjwXkaURW8EAIQldfuq8lI-7CLw-Kjkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down, the best sandwich in all of BC. Nothing comes close. I’ve been ordering from here weekly for the last few years. If you haven’t tried it you’re missing out. If you have, I’d bet your a regular like me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mack Benz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3-a22DBVAppk_FXSQQwPiPXPQi0d3PCNvsjkyH7gemYeuxoDC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Easily me favourite sandwich shop in Vancouver, N Van, W Van, Tri-cities, Fraser Valley.\n\nSandwiches made with love, good ingredients and freshness. Cannot beat that winning combo. They never disappoint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2dnE7fzash2O8bMWZDgjsoVWmdi5WibpYz-rz\u0026fid=0x0:0xc78e0e0170e571be"],"When":"2023-11-6"},{"Name":"Maling Sun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLxrVpvBLeDjDbqxSw5ebEuGE6ULYMthOqllAX6mlVH_M9G0Z2Ig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Called in advance for pick up during work lunch.  I ordered Classic Chicken Pesto on multigrain bread. That is one tasty sandwich! Slow roasted free range chicken with house pesto mayo spread, provolone, tangy sun-dried tomato, shaved red onions and arugula.  Delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQbaL-KBo_7Pf_lxqCHwjLj9wCUduBzSFENTV8\u0026fid=0x0:0xc78e0e0170e571be"],"When":"2021-10-3"},{"Name":"Nicolas Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxCKAreGx67VSJZEieVsVD3BEZWX5PIEfeqAwrDtBfWBdP92qotg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Moroccan sandwich was very tasty and generous portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGY53M4HoPndAluvdLZcJ8M3jGbrZQ-IZdM9Gu\u0026fid=0x0:0xc78e0e0170e571be"],"When":"2024-10-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dana Sullivan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQIw-0oOUNgoyniYugTscGkgpKJS8tpx4V0tAajn3ZGkNIfqEk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Nutrition-focused vegan cafe with entrees, smoothies and juice, coffee, and desserts. The cafe is super aesthetic with lots of plants, levelled bench seating, and swings. The staff was very friendly and patient while I was trying to decide what to order.
I got:
Caesar Butler chicken wrap: Soy curls, rice, corn, and lettuce with caesar dressing. Really flavourful and a healthy portion. Also came with a heaping side salad with a tasty dressing.
Tiramisu: Raw dessert with coconut-based cream layered with a power bar sort of thing (a chewy bar, tasted like it was made with mainly dates and nuts) in place of the traditional lady fingers. Subtle espresso flavour and a bit of a saltiness in the crust. Pretty dense. A different take on tiramisu, but delicious!
Iced soul starter latte: Steamed milk with raw cacao, yerba mate, and various adaptogens (chaga, maca, and more). Unique smoky flavour.
Prices are a little high for fast casual food. My total was $30.
If you're into this sort of alternative healthy eating you will probably love this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOldvlD0_OdScqbHf52MHtNe7xE-dUx_6IxUfG2&fid=0x0:0x38925ac94a15c9de"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Nadima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJEeimLWW13EymUh976iEpx9lUa20btVuJ-MmCkFDCZK3Fgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disappointed is an understatement.

After a 2 hour hike, I decided to grab a smoothie. I opted for one of their "protein" smoothies on the menu. For a place that advertises protein smoothies, I found it very odd that the staff had absolutely zero idea of how many grams of protein the smoothie had. I asked them to check the nutrition facts label of the protein powder to clarify the grams but the staff told me they get the protein in bulk and do not have labels with that information. I was at a loss for words. I do also want to mention that the staff was almost shocked I was asking for the grams of protein, as if I was asking for information that is confidential.

For a smoothie I spent almost $15 on, I could not comprehend the fact that they had no ability to know how much protein was in their "protein" smoothies. After I kept trying to get information, they informed me that it is 1 tablespoon of protein. How is 1 tablespoon considered a protein smoothie? ... After finishing my smoothie, I was left starving and feeling unsatisfied. Realistically, 1 tablespoon probably had 5 grams of protein which I feel is false advertising when calling it a protein smoothie. It honestly felt like I was drinking water because of the consistency and this is due to the lack of protein and substance.

I feel ripped off and will not be coming here again due to the lack of knowledge as well as lack of value for the $13 I spent on a smoothie. Body energy club smoothies are $10 and their vegan protein powder has 30g of protein in a serving – much better value and leave you feeling full and satisfied.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjgG_kKMICKmayWO471_hA4hkLFsq5vxxeJ0k2&fid=0x0:0x38925ac94a15c9de"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Rhoxann R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdLaQ5HDJYIFXN4tUtLiDEBJJnoWxUAOJ2myCAS8HiCRvcsnXb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful relaxing spot. One of my favourite vegan cafes 💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUKqYCDOFCRcCZjMEfmfSRqPuXTGKbXZjcOCEg&fid=0x0:0x38925ac94a15c9de"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Melissa Denise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmPJUZyg5bbjNmbLw_9Zpw5GxBBDSB1XEPNgj4DHq-_lkoMwmALg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really pretty place to grab some super healthy food. We had just finished doing the grouse grind and wanted something nutritious and tasty. It was my second time here and I ordered the wild at heart bowl. Good portion size and very colorful. Lots of Veggies but I do wish there was maybe one more piece of yam added. I also ordered the liquid gold drink with oat milk. I did not taste much maple syrup but the drink was still warm and comforting. I would come back here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOigVT9yD4WhZO6swpbiYzU8D1abNNSkka_Yuqw&fid=0x0:0x38925ac94a15c9de"],"When":"2021-6-10"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This joint is a flawless bliss, da bomb!
We both got a couple of the Nut-Thing Better Acai bowls, best Acai bowl ever!! Super yummy, words do not do justice to how tasty this was. Packed with wholesome, organic and delicious nutritional ingredients all from natural sources which blend into the perfect combo. I'd recommend any of their incredible vegan menu, any day and any time. The staff are super friendly and nice people who are perfectionists at whipping up extremely tasty grub.
The quirky and edgy aesthetics and vibe of this place is awesome, I love it and blessed to be able to visit incredible local businesses like this. Thank you for such a fantastic experience and I'm stoked to return ASAP.
Support local businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh5SxUYG9PdqVXKWxB7JCvTiWp0gN5npcHe9gW&fid=0x0:0x38925ac94a15c9de"],"When":"2022-5-8"},{"Name":"Moj Noroozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXugascUb1Fko0SBjm9NLiM6IJLmrr73V93pNQAUcsSq60KoCcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I only had a chance to try their juices (golden aura) the mixture of black pepper turmeric and ginger was amazing! Environmental friendly idea to serve the juice in glass bottles (either dine-in or take out). It was a bit pricey. I liked their sitting area both inside and outside.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO07hgN7TfsCF4zivKxSvMMIaRN2zPAYetTKu51&fid=0x0:0x38925ac94a15c9de"],"When":"2022-8-20"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute lovely natural vegan cafe. Easy parking and the atmosphere in the store is lovely. The workers were all very friendly and very knowledgeable about their products. I had the banana loaf and an icedcoffee. The loaf was very yummy, but contained nuts which I found a bit strange and the coffee was a bit grainy from the grounds I believe. Aswell not a big deal but The ordering board has white text against a light background which made it a bit difficult to read.

Overall worth checking out if you’re looking for a nice healthy option","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_Fr4kT7ErXYUrSewRLzLsmImQWtn_T1W94M8_&fid=0x0:0x38925ac94a15c9de"],"When":"2021-7-25"},{"Name":"Aom Hildebrand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqzk0-t2eCJ3dWbzxrmO1EFkEGk94crNKQpEhBC-DrbexpqzAYfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At first my husband said no, I'm not really into this kind of food much but I love it so he gave it a try. Well, he finished his so fast .. lol . really good he said. He ordered Bueno burrito bowl so did my step-daughter, they liked it so much. I also loved mine were cocoa power ORBS ball and Happy Hippie Bowl, so colorful and really delicious. Good and fast service! Our babies were enjoying their cookies. So we all had a good time there, see you again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMroXxqsps9QfVrv3bwuAS888wc9TqFVoQlafxg&fid=0x0:0x38925ac94a15c9de"],"When":"2021-9-18"}]

descriptions: Japanese standards like sushi, teriyaki & udon served in simple environs with traditional decor.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pedro Henrique Munhoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHDgrUCRxsDI0QiyVrXSpD7YMiIjCu4Myp-mN5MwWyO4s-k5hcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at this restaurant was delightful. Everything, from the exceptional service to the high-quality food, impressed me. The staff were attentive and efficient, and the fish was incredibly fresh, which added to the authenticity of the Japanese cuisine. This place is a true find, and I’m already looking forward to visiting again on my next trip to North Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM628lzEK2pb18TgZ6T4RF6JE1qlbxNu3YLBf4m&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Natsuki Suzuki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlUENsD2ZXm-cLUARx3nxjUGjMsa5_hVZ_uT_-JIguLScDRV6rtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a Japanese person and also having worked at a top notch sushi restaurant in Roppongi, I am very strict about the quality of sushi.

I tried more than 10 places here in Vancouver but hamaei is truly the most authentic and the best!!!! (Also polite, friendly and professional staff ;))

My personal recommendation are toro taku, real crab roll, umejiso and hotate!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkkaLAJ-819xSBpcy2hsyeIOWYf0lWVBTfxfX_&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Claire Yeom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4LiIwHOIkUmd8J_gC2coCugTHLUmITcUaZPk-id0f7fycUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hamaei is my FAVORITE spot in North Vancouver. I often dine in, but I also enjoy ordering takeout. Every time I have their food, I'm always impressed by the freshness of the sashimi and nigiri.

If you're a sushi lover looking for a restaurant on the North Shore, I definitely recommend Hamaei. Once you visit, you'll see why ☻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLJuo2PzSvLXfZUWj0sfnYRTH1l8OLmoekH8bT&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Green Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvGkkQWLTgP6ZpLfyQFVTIZWmT7INBi5IdhvmkSI6w7pFFIwWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"authentic Japanese restaurant with Japanese chefs. Amazing food quality and taste. Can't say anything else. just amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOykZW1CkQWNMhTzN-cOpOQdp___k8pDxr_FPp6&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Hannah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImt4iW2NMcIImQXniRUnQBDhYrZ9cxmQ4QEP_drMINdByGn2k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is THE SUSHI place in the north shore! I’ve been going there for the past 25 years and it really hasn’t changed much. Fresh fish and excellent service brings me back here every time. It’s a must!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTjTd4zveGlDdsrjLCIK31m4ZwklZy8EPis4dK&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"John S. Mai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY2Ep7ch7V2UQQStkfKRCyZc0k9VeqhcTlPhj83vVQx0-nqsPqiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was told this place has the best and most authentic japanese sushi on the north shore. And got to try it out for the first time with someone who frequents the restaurant for years. It definitely stood up to the status quo because it was amazing!! So fresh and unique, they know what they are doimg here! But be prepared to pay a bit more for quality. Not only did they have imported seafood from japan such as uni! But They even have imported beer! Okinawa beer!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm-qugfRGqo27MFCW65h0XwSILanCc7YO5dV9x&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2023-9-4"},{"Name":"Kyu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXZ85Wf0rk3NhISiA0AX-0Z14hhXGxphfxl9eGZ5PS6gWxBP-q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't get enough of Hamaei. Every time I visit, this restaurant consistently delivers the freshest and most delicious sushi I've ever had. The atmosphere is cozy, and the staff always makes me feel right at home. I think I'm addicted to this restaurant. Their Saikyo yaki is also a must-try.

Highly recommended for any sushi lover!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa1zdYG3_3tyH53HU3axNPl3h0fhY_m18grxK8&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Kelly C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPnsDmAj3jabHSFY89EJK_vfxFLLJH82q2F4k-r7BkE9EnXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food ,When I entered this restaurant, I felt like I was in a small Japanese village <3

The chefs are amazing. It was a luxurious experience like when I traveled to Japan.

I can confidently tell you to try everything here. If you are worried about what to order, make sure to eat chirashi donburi and toro nigiri!

I'm sure it's the best sushi I've ever had in Vancouver. Glad they are opening 7 days a week now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEYjxMqGLw7VPYaVxFiMpZ21Z9vJi4D47ApINE&fid=0x0:0xe2db02c1114b2494"],"When":"2022-4-6"}]

[{"Name":"Robin Clements","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9PmsLxITJmMMeaAz28FAyYktWqAc6468HB42trXKaraHdb6JS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a fantastic little restaurant hidden in a quiet North Vancouver neighbourhood. I came here with my partner for brunch after he had been talking it up for ages, and it still exceeded my expectations. We sat outside on the patio and enjoyed delicious a delicious French brunch with kind service. The Alsacienne Onion Tart was so incredibly rich and decadent, it immediately had me looking up recipes to try and recreate it at home. The duck salad had a perfect balance of flavours and the meat was tender and crispy all at once. This is a must-go restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9Oy_NHdoL_H3cgJ-yI2zP_NDVpsj9IKBGHYd3&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Jamie Coo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMtT8SYH3ODglSdZyhsIz5N_cesns6jNpwE2VJCXq0WPBgF9EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Came here on a Saturday for dinner and we were the only table when we walked in. Food was good but nothing too impressive. We order the duck breast and the braised beef along with the onion tart and a mushroom tartine. Before the food came, we were given some bread with butter to start. The mains were both not as tender as we expected, although the flavour of the dish was done pretty well. The onion tart was good but the tartine was lacking a bit of flavour. Service was quick and friendly. Since we don't live in the area, we probably won't drive all the way to come here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4hDs3XDMw_oVQhAPkVxsU-AH84PwZQqvd-vsd&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Katherine Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_fbiyyufWMqoCFysCuKDQEuZRz-jR8Hk5G3BPhWwM2YISMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A little French bistro tucked away in an industrial area. Free parking behind the shop. Service was impeccable. Food was delicious. Duck breast and beet salad were our favorites! Looking forward to coming back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmbaR8BPhWE8qHkzRmPoZXwak3YDJ3lnRWB0QS&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Felix Rankin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpJ-yYQaqhIHkPOZ9xWbxX8zbVOuthsh7rV-GMj2_ucOkUKJU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t say good enough things about this place. Everything was delicious. Just give it a try I’m sure you’ll enjoy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwcPak7KgsxtxGl0DmPAths3NaVpmU0P4k2SUS&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Daniel Sung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ61DoMscspD7FnxbNGw4d3f5Af7KsUdL6bkhk3NlkyiWvRZg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good experience. The lamb rack was fresh and cooked perfectly. Definitely a hidden gem, when it comes to French cuisine! Can 100% recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0aeyqtDZLzVvt5rwCCs6jDH4GlYQAGnQPY3EX&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Clara P. Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKONJxuA5dQtdtFGCGPWKLxoHterPKgwWE82e0JPb3H2Pvk4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I finally did it. It’s been a long time wanting to try this hidden gem - Tour De Feast. It didn’t make us disappointed, their food was amazing and delicious. We all finished all the dishes without any leftovers 😂😂

We will be back again soon 😋👍🏼

Bon appétit","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpxpz5fcOV6b9LgZliq_AksBkOO3iKoHT4kWBN&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-4-29"},{"Name":"Lisa Palleson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXrmNnX0uw7uZfTzCYCSprjINSi1bNNvaM-7MYFSn3EuWX1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is excellent. Service was decent, could have been more attentive considering there were only a few tables. Its more of a cafe, bit the food is worth it forsure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS98R8aNgQhoXUUkDL9fni_W8W33ePGzFKXlR9&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Sarah Hearsum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWZKImXLGO6aBT9J9WxORvKvrk_-0dnkHnYZK_Yt-h4Fk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely brunch spot. Delicious food - high quality ingredients and good balance of flavours - and friendly staff. We had the Smoked Salmon Breakfast and Cassoulet (pork sausage one). Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWrJIfugiALRoSwA1mtHbje76loc_dG2xh5Q&fid=0x0:0x1b1585927bd8e4ec"],"When":"2024-3-30"}]

title: Minemura Sushi
address: 129 3rd St W, North Vancouver, BC V7M 1E7
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible seating","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair-accessible washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"offerings","name":"Offerings","options":[{"name":"Salad bar","enabled":true},{"name":"Vegan options","enabled":true}]},{"id":"dining_options","name":"Dining options","options":[{"name":"Breakfast","enabled":true},{"name":"Brunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Lunch","enabled":true},{"name":"Dinner","enabled":true},{"name":"Counter service","enabled":true},{"name":"Seating","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Washroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"atmosphere","name":"Atmosphere","options":[{"name":"Casual","enabled":true},{"name":"Cozy","enabled":true}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"Groups","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Accepts reservations","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"NFC mobile payments","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true},{"name":"Kids' menu","enabled":true}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Grace Peng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJao69vP5EGwuPeyLhm0IoYaWvKTcL63SOSMju6mxf6WRWkhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally found our go-to in LoLo… Unafraid to share my glowing review, because it’s such a brutal world for good restaurants out here. Photos have a couple pieces eaten.. we couldn’t wait!

We walked in at 6pm right before the rush. There’s inside seating for maybe 24 people inside, and a couple tables outside. The inside decor is more casual and homey than slick and refined, so you know you’re paying for taste and the chefs’ skills rather than flash. And the prices were solid - we stuffed ourselves silly for $80 total after tip.

The server was very friendly and welcoming, even while we had to ask her to correct the order, and our food arrived in less time than it took for us to decide on what to order.

Really loved the attention to detail, including generous and fresh salmon and tuna sashimi, right rice texture and temp, warm and crispy yam tempura along with a great variety in the veggie roll including oshinko, carrot, cuke, spinach and avo, buttery negitoro roll, and the tamago shining through in the Lady roll.

The hands-down showstopper of the night was the Dancing Unagi roll. I’ve never had such meltingly-tender, lovingly-torched crisp unagi and fresh and plump shrimp tempura together in one balanced, moreish bite. Not to mention the rice to filling ratio of all the rolls was perfect.

My only regret is not seeing a dessert menu.. a little cup of yuzu sorbet would have been the perfect ending!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMznozwI7sB4q17BgXslz-YWemu6rHwGtuyyaey&fid=0x0:0x5deaaa64013527aa"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"David Perel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwPnFlxHQW6CSgX-4tN9oirQxq9XUk3XFmTYxyAcB1z-NGqqUy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good sushi at a reasonable price. Excellent service. Our lunch featured the Grous roll, with wild salmon and smoked salmon. The Red Dragon roll was even better, 2 pieces of prawn with salmon and avocado (we asked for the imitation crab to be left out and they graciously did that). And of course had to have Oshi sushi, so got the salmon. Excellent. They brought miso soup on the house and it was superb. Note: The photos show selected pieces not the entire order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUEe-4icxSzr3gGpPqzx9n1IVAB5QAO4VpA2x0&fid=0x0:0x5deaaa64013527aa"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Prakriti Badal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXlh6qPvmUDw8ME_3Xf2LjcOETWKTiowrmJLoSLq4I_dnAKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walked in this place in a raining evening! The vibe and atmosphere of the place was homely and welcoming. The food was very delicious, especially the rolls.
Will surely visit again !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ9653xcMVda84SWovn9kwmeJbyTomIRnOXybY&fid=0x0:0x5deaaa64013527aa"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Legend Jeri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6MYkC-gehfX9m3YYJTQmTtqno291H98WwfQYtrJ5OQ5cDyOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Located in North Vancouver, Minemura Sushi boasts an elegant ambiance and promises a delightful culinary experience. However, my recent visit left much to be desired, prompting me to reconsider my recommendations.

Firstly, I was taken aback by the restaurant's stringent payment policy. Despite receiving a gift card for Christmas, I was informed upon arrival that Minemura Sushi does not accept gift cards—a baffling oversight for a contemporary establishment. This refusal to accommodate a common form of payment resulted in an immediate deduction of one star from my review.

As I delved into my meal, it became evident that the quality of produce fell short of expectations. The avocado, a staple ingredient in sushi, appeared lackluster and unappetizing. It's a basic principle: if it doesn't meet the standards of the kitchen, it shouldn't find its way onto customers' plates. This disregard for quality warranted another star deduction.

Furthermore, the attention to detail in the presentation of the sushi rolls left much to be desired. The uneven distribution of sesame seeds on one of the rolls resulted in an unpleasant taste imbalance, detracting from what should have been a harmonious flavor profile. This oversight, while seemingly minor, significantly impacted my dining experience, leading to the deduction of yet another star.

In summary, my experience at Minemura Sushi merits a modest two-star rating. Despite its upscale ambiance, the lack of flexibility in payment options, subpar produce quality, and inconsistencies in presentation leave much room for improvement. With numerous sushi establishments in the vicinity, I would advise exploring alternative dining options for a more satisfying experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZIw3IDeidf0Dzk6076xTQJg5vCEFF6EuVo4mW&fid=0x0:0x5deaaa64013527aa"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"Courtney Mcmillan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9e8pIj3cde718oXfswr3cNq5cypWdz2aMumiXWDawGh6R_kDT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered some basic rolls, but it hit the spot! I like the portion of rice they used for the rolls and the service was really speedy. Also got a complementary nigiri which was a nice surprise!  Would order here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2fa-M8cAahBRP70wuC5F3u9PWmKJ7z44oHfMG&fid=0x0:0x5deaaa64013527aa"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Leah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKarmcGZ1Js35SCZKS4LzTbiBHhnd6ukNdOqfbApRvwTocr3k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Hadn’t eaten here for a few years, but we remembered liking it, and figured we’d try again! We got takeout, like we used to, and either our memories were incorrect, or the quality’s gone down; regardless, it was a very disappointing meal.

•Deep Fried California Roll 3/5: surprisingly, the only decent roll out of everything.

•Veggie Dynamite Roll 1.75/5: Oshinko tasted off, and the tempura on top made the rest of the rolls vegetables soggy and warm.

•Spicy Salmon Combo 1.75/5: Spicy Salmon Sashimi was bland. Kappa Maki didn’t taste fresh to order. Spicy Roll tasted weird, not off, just weird, almost like the sauce had accidentally mixed with another sauce.

• Beef Teriyaki Roll 1/5: beef was incredibly dry, had lots of fat, and minimal sauce.

Unfortunately, we threw half away because it wasn’t worth eating.

I wanted to be honest, especially since there are many sushi options nearby, so I hope the honest review helps improve things!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jasmine Kizilkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAq0AwN_mcRX6CQC9qJrZthtN9bAt3YfEvW4fOgWwuI0AAcFR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great portion sizes and lots of options but we weren’t that impressed with the taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFScyCsI20WePPOWhs78N1S-CyukSlWnIRZ9fh&fid=0x0:0x5deaaa64013527aa"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Ashton Kerr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1ieDyt6H9SpQBKyopomyqKOnfYBQJ_7qHba996ttNjwb8UA0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Minemura is our number one sushi place on the North Shore, and for multiple reasons! We cannot recommend this restaurant more.

After trying many, many sushi places in the area since moving to North Vancouver in 2021, Minemura consistently comes out on top when it comes to price, portion sizes, quality of the food, and customer service. There is nowhere my partner and I would rather go for sushi - if Minemura isn’t open, we aren’t having sushi that day!

The staff really make our experience every time. Whenever I arrive for takeout or dine-in, I am greeted with the warmest welcome from each staff. It’s always a pleasant surprise to see an extra miso soup or pop in our order too, it makes us feel very appreciated! It’s the little things that count, and Hayley, Scott, Kim and the Minemura team do a great job.

Our favourites are the Deep Fried Salmon Cream Cheese Roll and the South Van Roll, but you won’t go wrong with anything you order!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: V-Nam Restaurant
address: 175 E 3rd St #8, North Vancouver, BC V7L 1E5
descriptions: Pho, vermicelli bowls & other familiar Vietnamese plates round out the menu at this simple eatery.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Selena Tuytel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9HO_TqF9PuUeRDOCG6oJQlYy_d9C_Kpg2LTWdOUuuc0dqhm8f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Uber order came about 1.5 hrs later despite estimated time being 35 minutes. Food was mediocre. Grilled short ribs were quite bony and many pieces were very burned. This left a charred bitter taste when eating this entree. I am very surprised that you decided to serve this despite all the burned pieces. Much of this had to be thrown out.
Lemongrass chicken entree was dry. Prawn rolls were fine. Cold cuts sandwich was salty, and small for $9.99. We would not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6HO1Kz-swgkJeHBClkkVIvhMCtIhYJejVsv7H&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Coline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbX_QKuaEf6ecbnocWzjer3WudYneLMe_JJVgbs8i0ijFAVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered a banh mi, portion size was quite small, taste was ok. My friends ordered pho which according to them was pretty good. Service was quite slow despite not being too busy, but the food came in around 15-20min.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkQx7P3Zoefp4lSedPdjR7BnN_6jrkn4PA7srA&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Jennifer Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW33no9zwbMBMFgyg1l_vTTdf3A3UbVTlHeeFD7hCYvVb1HuTr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The service was great! Sadly the food was severely lacking... It tasted like some of the food was just microwaved instead of fresh.

Middle-of-the pack viet food here: if they used fresher ingredients it might elevate the flavour

However for the pho, it definitely needs to be cooked longer and hotter. My bean sprouts were still cold in the broth and I was disappointed. The coffee was burnt rather than strong... i don't think they had the slow drip press.

End of the day, it's still alright - always room for improvement

I like that its open late tho! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9dYdH2ccbytJBD1uNcjyG5AU1a27Nmx1WEdG1&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"pianato","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVLXbdZkOc7b1QO4yfZn-lTBqUHNrLiNXg2vC4QFUcBR8PXtLaHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here today in the morning with a friend! Food tasted great! Loved the service! The Vietnamese spring rolls were my favorite!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP43MCAhavtNZaRmjQb07LmroJfJodLJSKVpueA&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Bank Apisit Suparan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLVGZqooX70iTAVXuVWOQdxzltdpf5cSOqPks98JPcrI0saeTz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently dined at V Nam Restaurant, and it exceeded my expectations in several ways. First and foremost, I appreciate that it’s a Vietnamese restaurant open till midnight, making it a fantastic late-night dining option.

One standout feature of V Nam Restaurant is the generous portion sizes they offer. You certainly won’t leave hungry, and the best part is that it comes at a reasonable price. It’s a budget-friendly option for those looking for a satisfying meal without breaking the bank.

The flavors of the dishes at V Nam are bold and packed with Vietnamese goodness. While some might find it more intense than expected, I personally enjoyed the flavorful experience. The authenticity of the taste is evident, and it adds to the overall charm of this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXxBJ8rqNW_ddtvZ5Pe9R2YH1cZigCmVA8E8WH&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2023-10-8"},{"Name":"Chris Smithson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ZPoi52jJsVk3YfvB72BCAyHy11qZAAdFY0afBmDsM-cd3x8C-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly service and great food, especially their spicy beef soup, but the Pad Thai was good but not great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2RkCAR4g_TGids1QzXgsP5PahkUkYKPhkHNN-&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Legend Jeri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6MYkC-gehfX9m3YYJTQmTtqno291H98WwfQYtrJ5OQ5cDyOI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This hidden gem of a Pho spot truly exceeded all expectations. From their convenient operating hours, extending until midnight, to the impeccable quality of their dishes, there's nothing but praise to offer.

The soup portions are perfectly sized, and the sandwiches make for convenient, quick bites. For those craving a classic beef soup, #41 is an absolute must-try. Meanwhile, if you're in the mood for a veggie-packed delight, #56 is the way to go.

The appetizers are a delight, with the spring rolls and salad rolls accompanied by a delectable peanut sauce that's simply irresistible. Their Guza and deep-fried squid are equally delightful additions to any meal.

Don't miss out on their Vermicelli options, especially #63 and #66 for those who love prawns. The fried rice #90 and Hawaiian #92 offer tantalizing flavors that won't disappoint.

For those craving something heartier, the Chicken Chow Mein #73 and the Grilled Short Ribs #99 are sure to satisfy any appetite, even your furry friends won't be able to resist!

The staff here are incredibly attentive and friendly, contributing to a fast-paced yet welcoming environment. Whether you're dining in or grabbing takeout, the prices are reasonable, making it accessible to all.

In conclusion, if you're on the hunt for a fantastic Pho spot that won't break the bank, look no further. This place offers an unforgettable dining experience that's sure to keep you coming back for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9ItlEmPkvQwAT_PWhJjHGfWDse40wTvOhGA7Q&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-5-7"},{"Name":"Ashley Westenberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtyhRtwmaNa3gRoxeO1UQTCAhOaE_GDLgGfEov12cWVmu2VQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered for the first time off uber eats.... veggie peanut pho, veggie vietnamese spring rolls, and shrimp pad thai! Delicious and will definitely order again. My only complaint is that there is hardly any protein, 3 pieces of tofu with the pho and 4 shrimps with the pad thai. The sizes are huge, but mostly carbs.
I was very happy to receive lime wedges with the pad thai, and the basil was very fresh with the pho!
(I've already eaten a spring roll in this photo and some pad thai)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjJwiPwQ873vF3qtrDtbJLW8a76Kjqyj6QPrF4&fid=0x0:0x5b0d98989e6f450"],"When":"2024-1-4"}]

descriptions: Gluten-free Indian dishes & handmade breads in a spacious dining room, plus delivery service.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steven H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK62iJj1ZUFGa-U3A8AjtI1ckQk60_9MMp9OhTpvv0nDBllSzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a couple times, always great.

Indian buffets - especially budget friendly ones - are quite rare these days in Vancouver and nearby, that is unless one heads to Surrey.

Clean, quality and tasty.

Around 4 appetizers and main 7-8 dishes.

Come give them a try, they only have buffet during lunch time.

Lunch buffet is great and at $18 a person, can’t go wrong👍!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8fcopDb2MqlCbKpvClqjCiIPirekz7ao_IkDt&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Sakshi Khurana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQXkIFOfJJCtdl5PPYOZWbyFIhRWjjxQLPqa7_pHWIyIt06kE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you know what Punjabi food is supposed to taste like, this is not the best place for you. The food was very sweet, didn't even need dessert at the end. The beef samosa and tandoori chicken had no seasoning or flavour at all... it did have a lot of artificial colour... service was not great either! North shore needs better Indian restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNn83YPwrXlIv4apjEqrvOHIVt5voLLF5QXJcZG&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Selena Tuytel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9HO_TqF9PuUeRDOCG6oJQlYy_d9C_Kpg2LTWdOUuuc0dqhm8f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We enjoyed a meal on the outdoor patio. Food was delicious and portions were good. Service was attentive...it seems like a lovely staff. We will be back with family and also want to try the buffett. The manager(?) was funny.
Recomm: lamb rogan josh, beef vindaloo, basmati rice, garlic naan, gulab jamun","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCxurkFb4ROjqgUpdztyaGsxz8upfNI7X_m8LB&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an excellent dinner experience we had the other evening at Palki! Have ordered take away a couple of times and it's been very good, but dining in was much better.  Naan arrived straight from the oven, steel chafing dishes kept the food hot.  Mellow Indian music added ambiance.

We started with beef samosas.  Never had beef ones before and they were very tasty.  Tasted homemade.  For mains we had chicken Madras and mattar paneer.  The chicken was amazing, with a rich and spicy tomato sauce.  The mattar paneer was a first for us and we thoroughly enjoyed it.  To finish things off we split a pistachio ice cream which capped off the dinner very nicely.

Since we live only a block away, we will definitely be returning often.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2ZZbwRBwfpVfsGftc7iH0NJliIxRK5qiSBRwW&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Britta Hawkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd7QboozOaef-FhzH6SuH2RodFD1eBtcGD3P9KCwTgntSRfnX8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the prawn coconut curry and my husband had the chicken madala + garlic naan and everything was incredible! We ate every single bite! It was so flavorful and the waiter was a gentleman- the atmosphere was quite romantic, and the music was really cool (hip hop) and we felt great eating there. We’d 1000% recommend it to all! Such a wonderful experience!! Try it!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1jra4W2pRkcq6yRyqmShIO3tCY5GYi_C5awdo&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"faratalk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeLO1lEo0a069YHPWZJr76UTBNXLPPOdNfYSylJC_r_D-QRDk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What truly sets Palki Restaurant apart is the exceptional service. The staff were attentive, friendly, and genuinely cared about our dining experience. They made us feel welcome and treated us like family, ensuring that every need was met promptly and graciously.

Overall, Palki Restaurant exceeded my expectations in every way. If you're looking for authentic Indian cuisine in North Vancouver, this is the place to go. I highly recommend Palki Restaurant and look forward to returning soon for another unforgettable meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB1QC8p7PMHeAYdORjXIyFu048rFFVfyMZxpC7&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Savithri Mohan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXy68CKDD66JedPDEp48Xq1XMrt7BmnmpEgS3QUyanip-FgA20sBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the food at Palki. Very consistent and tasty. We come regularly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgJUptXSIzr2uSlovnGPxKL1IO6gTDYarA6ydz&fid=0x0:0x23d6e7eec137875b"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Joe D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwZzMkzkHbWtd20GGopcaoCgS-lGQDqT-80-7UlYK6YyEF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been patronizing this restaurant since 2006 and it wonderful to see how they have transformed into becoming the top Indian restaurant on the shore. Celebrated my mom's 90 birthday recently with family and friends. Priceless experience. Great food, amazing value and Rahul , the manager went beyond expectations to ensure that we had a wonderful time. Hands down the best Indian restaurant in North Van.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Brendan Pearson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIybwdD51hhDWtrgZZIP2vTVWQSOs7krrtvl-JX5wSeJ_PHrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I eat here once or twice a week; it's basic and unassuming in a tiny mall, but the food is incredibly delicious.

I highly recommend the Teriyaki Pork.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MOHAMMAD RIFAYET ULLAH RIYAD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQrJAR-eaJL-tJCUGbFf2rNxpzRquY199XvhjqC6MFRIgIUW5W=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"His behavior is very rude . No polite with customers. Got anger issues .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLIb2gZtixSEBLgidu4P9Yjg9Dq1u3n9V2z1zU&fid=0x0:0xbc40c87d5debbbb1"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"michel violette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLf68kdcUCRO9gUewX31LYT2tckxrRgtEnaPChaxuQMnr-hug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this place by chance.
Delicious teriyaki.
Sauces are handmade my owner very delicious. I recommend their hot sauce.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Don Prince","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1yIUzFpw9h7cPGqYbVGz_03uf0QzsPLgAgvoYrR7qct6iJHJv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was great and well priced. Friendly and knowledgeable staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Evenchick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7pCL2FVvccrdOiTzdZbcTsiHdMq2yg8uZNt9O4TkjCpiLD7qE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, very reasonable prices which is rare these days, and the owner/Operator is a very nice man.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca Lyubimov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVt8qnh4i3Ips_r6lreupDPwz49sX663NWpVs_-_sb0UI6wns_gaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a good simple food! Good quality meat and the veggies are always fresh. My kids love it and always ask to have "rice and meat in the mall".
The owner is very nice and friendly, he remembers everyone in the community.
The only thing: I wish he'd switch to paper dishes instead of styrofoam.
UPDATE: he did switch to paper plates!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Desiree Parenteau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYb-MdZNjDOdXTFjWpAUn_QNUH2KBpa1YOFX50iw8ms1Mt5iB1pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always great food and service here from Bon! A fav lunch spot for my husband and I.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leonardo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeWQnZWJrsfubeHTCe-BehnmPQFrdU-UCrbrbOzgrAR5aMmvN_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing owner, kind and friendly. Food is amazing and prices are more than good for the quantity and quality of the food. I’ve came here for a while and I will definitely keep coming back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Familiar Chinese dishes, along with Hong Kong classics & dim sum, in a relaxed setting with a bar.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A reasonable dim sum lunch is available with a good selection. Service is welcoming and friendly. The congee was fresh and well flavored. Good range of dumplings. Radish cake was a bit soft because of too much radish vs rice flour and was not as tasty as others. Not really any other place on the north shore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg4UKSbac5EnAJwx1e5Lexdv26OYnS1Scz7wwg&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Daulton “Vaikael” Potvin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6PdyI1jn-pcl2-JoCYm7Pczwh1ls0AOaOg8qyH_DeAP9uhdYV-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Homey Chinese Food

Great stop in the West Vancouver/North Vancouver Area

Food: Always great, fresh, homey, generous portions.

"I always try a new dish everything I go and I've yet to have a bad dish."

Service: Accommodating & prompt.

Tables: a bit more space would be nice, tables for groups are great but smaller 2 or 4 person tables feel a bit too close for my taste.

Atmosphere: Feels like it's always busy, but it is fairly normal.

**I recommend you try the deep fried fish w/ garlic&salt, simply amazing!!**","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8cDpW7pTfuzvyayJ11JCsUI_Il0NSKCtSrqin&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Pauline Zabawski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfqotqn6N7SmwF_7bgomT3QoPDBa9cgHrOnLzY0Vo1KQ-kOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The chef on Thursday evening was having a bad shift!  Very disappointing!   The Honey Garlic pork, pork itself was dry and overcooked.  The Special Vegetables stir fry left a chalky residue in my mouth, everything tasted watery.  The chow mien lacked flavour, in fact, all the food didn’t taste fresh! I won’t be ordering again.
The delivery was prompt!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"applejuicecanada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHErTmrB60RPBz4XP-6fRmpiJU2y708fqI8tMQU3GMWVs-YK6C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great to be back! Having been away from this restaurant for a few years, I’m happy to be back to find their dim sum is as good as ever!
Especially, their shrimp dumplings are out standing and I also love their HK Style Fried Noodles!
Service is always friendly and efficient! During COVID-19 their social distancing arrangement has been outstanding too! Please look at the photos and you will understand!
Plenty of parking at the Mall, best to call ahead if it’s the weekend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMK7msoDXeZd8jIvY-ak_F8kdUcOFClBJSq95H&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2020-8-29"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The best dim sum on north shore! This Cantonese restaurant has been around for decades. Their foods are solid and consistent though you can find same calibre easily on the other sides of bridges. Still great when it takes more than 30 minutes sometimes to get to either bridge nowadays….","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqogq12Ey9w0YeGNfRv_7g0TA7payEq0RDWJ-0&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2023-4-17"},{"Name":"Cho Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0vTAdhqntacjNfh4cZe-qxrbbWZfqZI4BzEY4DOijj7RFtOmR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Honestly I was surprised that North Vancouver would have such decent authentic dim sum. My only advice, don't order the siu mai. Although  a typical staple dim sum here it was dense and the server told me pork was like that 🤣 aside from that everything else was pretty good. Definitely will do it again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZHtjK-bqn57sxG4h-dtHxPoHpSvPzKA59fHAz&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2022-6-14"},{"Name":"steve lord","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpSyznmeUGN41B3wjV_8UeQI6ud2VN4afA2KTaE57n9lyaMwKi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Welcoming staff and quick attentive servers. We tried special fried rice, ribs, chicken with cashew and spicy beans. All tasted good. Portions were quite large so although around $20 a dish, there was plenty to eat. Maybe not the best food on the North Shore but still good. Very convenience so close to Highway 1 and plenty of parking. Will return sometime.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6mKUinFfP0LParQQvwlbYwDX6OeKsC6ToNTT8&fid=0x0:0x541cf97cc364a52e"],"When":"2021-11-20"},{"Name":"Paul Lively","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDfwbZQUfxEskrGqiwYuS1N863I503Yr6WonmowXCt6vHFjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Last Saturday we ordered chicken chow mein as we had ordered it previously and it was delicious. Unfortunately this time it was awful. The noodles were dry and rubbery and there were hardly any pieces of chicken or vegetables in the dish. It seemed that these were left over noodles that were sold to us as a way to get rid of them rather than cook fresh chicken chow mein.","Images":null,"When":""}]
