user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ivan Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxSpZKM86T5p6jViWTlGRVdn7Aod5Z_pZR_Plw_p2-iFCRBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of visiting Meat at O’Neills, and I have to say, it was an unforgettable dining experience. I ordered the Fraser Valley Pork Loin sandwich, and it was, hands down, one of the tastiest sandwiches I’ve had in a long time. The pork was perfectly tender, juicy, and full of rich, savory flavors that made every bite better than the last. The fresh, locally sourced ingredients really shone through in this dish, and it’s clear that a lot of care goes into the preparation.

Beyond the food, what made the experience even more enjoyable was the exceptional customer service. The owner truly went above and beyond to make us feel welcome, offering personal recommendations and ensuring that every aspect of our meal was perfect. It’s rare to find a place where you feel so genuinely taken care of, and that level of hospitality really sets Meat at O’Neills apart.

If you’re in the area, I highly recommend stopping by! You won’t be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8JpNwsIN6TZndJouYTjmvm7xgmE7WgGKvac6i&fid=0x0:0x40957b1716f49865"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Frances Rogers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjVy9hO6lB9ekQ05_cxZVlw4lAfIfnhof_jNEzcHISX9B4Ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We first came across this unassuming GEM a year ago when visiting Vancouver. We found it by chance and so glad we did. The proprietors are so welcoming and nothing is too much trouble. The food is absolutely delicious, so much so, that I regularly longed to come back throughout the past year for another mouthwatering sandwich. We finally made it back recently and it was just as good as I remembered it being.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND going for lunch here!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9SAs0Sc4dMcnbplokg5EoQ4dsRIdx_p5imGdt&fid=0x0:0x40957b1716f49865"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Good Times","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzgdNbehhXErrh5ZfuYW1vAeGQfKOmLVHtaeMJ_pUv_gV_OA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is easily one of the best establishments in the lower mainland, bar none. The service, the food, the warmth, and the hours cannot be beat. Especially after a long week of work and being in desperate need of a cure after Friday nights adventures. It’s a shame they will be closing, but don’t focus on that and enjoy every second that’s left, and you will be glad you did!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9OHdPpNB5goDkzr8-xxhFv3M40vNZRv4xUL8h&fid=0x0:0x40957b1716f49865"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Mounota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvpiSPg9AtpTNs-8JJvoJHojdmAI1FZcME9pprQbBKumVFhadS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small and cozy. Great vibe. Great sandwiches. Will most definitely return there ♥️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKifMLbSIdoZqhoQivkfGirPLIUoIeWGWzl9Bo&fid=0x0:0x40957b1716f49865"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Karen Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5aQhQNiPlNolRP4krgc8tE_md58WxGJcDPoqeHRvOyBU26S_t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place came highly recommended by friends and North Van locals. I came in for their famous beef brisket sandwich but they sold out! Tip: get here before 1pm before they sell out!! I ended up ordering a breakfast sandwich and wow, INCREDIBLE! Hands down the best breakfast sandwich I’ve had in a long time! Quality ingredients, friendly service, and such a welcoming atmosphere. Sandwich bread can make or break a sandwich and they definitely have either made or sourced the perfect sandwich bread. Highly recommend stopping by if you’re in the area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONHxcuuJw14pMGhWcUnYxeTcQK7Jrm3GXGeRYq&fid=0x0:0x40957b1716f49865"],"When":"2023-11-29"},{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice little neighborhood sandwich shop. The food was great and reasonable prices. Fresh buns and great taste. The chicken sandwich was so tasty. The owners are very friendly too. All around great place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl-In1VLN-z8Cls8ESVLudBbnHUatEYS8CHJds&fid=0x0:0x40957b1716f49865"],"When":"2022-12-9"},{"Name":"Brandy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlpVxEv1z6RIR4r4Plz64Mivc1oS8bAAP_ApKCG_iKbriW9k9u=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small and cozy. Top notch. Feels like home! Egg, sausage and cheese biscuit was exquisite. I said mmm practically every bite. Highly recommend adding a potato patty to your sandwich! Will definitely be back when we’re in N Vancouver again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNrCMwGf04-5zyafXAvhKdJedrEFAFn54PU8dG&fid=0x0:0x40957b1716f49865"],"When":"2024-2-10"},{"Name":"Abhishek Das","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjsn1f0XSXkpXhIracq5EZW_JuhFwVbdXk1Ss5ZnAkS-lCdHfRRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You know what I love? Stumbling upon a hidden gem while wandering through a new neighborhood. And let me tell you, this joint is a prime example of why you should always keep your eyes open when exploring. The sandwiches here are the real deal, made with love and attention to detail that you just don't find at the chain shops. And if you're a true sandwich connoisseur like me, you owe it to yourself to try all of them - I know I did. But let me tell you, the pork sandwich is a standout that'll have you coming back for more. And not only is the food great, but the people here are warm and welcoming, the kind of folks who make you feel like you've been a regular for years. Plus, they're all about using locally sourced ingredients, so you can feel good about supporting the community while chowing down. Don't miss out on this neighborhood gem - trust me, it's worth the detour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnRTLf2oO9a0Apo0S6XFwmf8fDUOohc-0ZP_5K&fid=0x0:0x40957b1716f49865"],"When":"2023-4-26"}]

[{"Name":"D Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_EKyQh9FmLQDSzrGUIcGzWy5b7qFhm_MdaXcu1xUPQZIFltLu6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"$22 nachos, minimal toppings and cheese, salsa tasted like relish.  Other person's meal was good, maybe just avoid the nachos","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrbMOHv70k8f9HWxx4EguhQwMYMQfTT3wCFSx6&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Melanie Dekker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZWOVby0mjxg_a0S6eqeAGCK2KQNcgM-5_mfCOxgIdTCNbKSq_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where else can you get an excellent meal, with a fabulous atmosphere, AND a dog friendly 1/2 indoor patio at 10:30 PM in North Vancouver!? This is it- an oasis! And meanwhile thier menu is extensive!  Wine was chilled, water was served with ice and a lemon wedge, table and floor were clean, lighting was good (soft and a pub vibe),, and there was lots of fresh water in a nearby dog bowl. So fabulous all round that I’m writing this at midnight!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9jX3aAwMJgwNJdV4nD9njcVgaai7Lm6wLMwB1&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Anthony Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8y-iBHJnCSFubkfBNOVL_UU39pQSSYxw_jDvo0eweHGXm-bpozQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a great neighbourhood pub! The staff are friendly and the food is good! The Yorkshire pudding entrée is a real belly buster! Lots of roast beef and mashed potatoes! The selection of beers is great too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1cvJ-31UkwkWYoNHn1r8CgPOOq1mvdSnor_0f&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Andrea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAhvNMWHr7NtAX3wxOXDIVmhGcKMtW5Tp0g5bVWE6YLRKHpZ0S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I order to go .

Well , it was my first time trying their food . Very disappointed . Ordered a ceviche , and it was tuna turned into pico de gallo with nachos , washed up in a horrible salty lime like sauce … hideous !!!

The onion soup was the worst part, completely unappetizing looking , it looked like dog food, with a can tasted flavour and just not great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWLYMnilF9KH1RvAsAYlJaNlqVrIo90UZLx84S&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"Peyman Sadr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqWFn0ePe18uaG7kAYgUMrxS50pUSoy6sVewCdKiGzix56M_e-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I like the atmosphere, also there was a live music at there.food and service was awesome","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNha357BsSTxgiWVemEhiKICBgxKkE1OGK30Ps6&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Smokedoutmotions","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoFOvi24k4rG06J_myJfKotur7-1AnJeQByYtl1P3iU61FVb5h=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Date night. Was chill. Good neighborhood spot. Food always fire. We asked our server to be a little more attentive to her section next time. We still tipped proper for her great attitude. Recommend 👍🏽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwS0yRN8Zhb3NypV1dI1XqYS0k-syuHLvZ8JQp&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Rajin Basi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5LvMuceQXro1vKFYkHC15xH-KgMj9Bz5hUYe-FTQhCGTqxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited last week with my family and we had a great experience. The food was delicious (try the beef dip), the atmosphere was amazing for the hockey game and our Server Ember went above and beyond to make sure everything was taken care of. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a place in North Van to watch the game with family and unwind.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gazal MN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxiM9vbWvs6L14I9BW2Up8YaSQRQZ2rpd1FPfeC9zqMZoQYig0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious and filling!
The Yorkshire Pudding is to die for. I would highly recommend to check this out.
I had roast beef, mashed potatoes, and veggies which all come in a Yorkshire Pudding and of course a cup of gravy which was divine. The perfect takeaway dinner!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHay8zVBDCf4jVjonSMwY72D6SdX2uiKnAGhz4&fid=0x0:0x3b54814131d2b632"],"When":"2024-5-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mark V. Sinclair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6ve_wQQ4uxBt3cYQW8cTfAQRrRZkQ44mckIfxzATcnSTXi0wz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently discovered "Kypriaki  Mediterranean Grill" during visit of overseas family friend.  While running some final errands before heading to the airport, I decided to check out this well-known restaurant which has been in business on the Northshore for many years, and was known as "Kypriaki Taverna" in its former nearby Marine Drive location.

The restaurant is open daily between 12 - 9pm, and has both lunch + dinner menus. On-site customer parking is also available in a lot behind the building.  Kypriaki Mediterranean Grill is located mid-block near the northwest corner of Marine Drive and Bridgman Avenue and nearby Pemberton Plaza.

When we arrived at the restaurant at noon opening, we received a really great welcome.  The lunch menu was in effect with many really tasty options. I chose the generously portioned baked Italian lasagna, while the family friend had the chicken souvlaki, with rice pilaf, and Greek salad.

Greek cuisine is their speciality, and they are well-known for their tasty  Roast Lamb, Moussaka and Beef/Chicken Souvlaki, as well as Spanish Paella . Classic rich Greek  desserts like Baclava and Bougatsa are also on offer, and not to be missed.

The interior restaurant space has a great casual Mediterranean vibe: think light ochre + blue accented walls, landscape canvasses on wall / plants,  country - wood furniture, and overall warm rustic charm.

There is also a sports bar/lounge side of the restaurant with tables/comfy chairs, bar-stools, and 3 big-screens showing football/hockey games. Their daily Happy Hour drink/food specials runs between 4 - 5pm.   During Spring/Summer  there is an outdoor patio area along the front of the restaurant.

If you're looking for a casual Greek -  Mediterranean restaurant with longstanding reputation and delicious food at reasonable prices, you definitely have to check out Kypriaki.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxOfFIjSqhLEMKiydwG22gkC4CleoBZ_LarrtG&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"R M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_fz1ppRTsIp4sjPAQMlDnN0i9UFP0hSxVQWeP4OaNSz_YsQXRew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time dining at Kypriaki Restaurant, and we had such a great time! The food was delicious, and the lunch deal of the 1/2 Chicken Souvlaki was well-plated. The portion was spot on. The flavors of the meal and the tenderness of the chicken was on point. Our server was so pleasant and welcoming, which made the experience even more memorable. We'll try to come back sometime soon! Definitely give these guys a try - you won't regret it. *There's 90-minute parking at the back of the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs-asOkgX7diIUlUD7bf-pFxBTNWIwUiVlmY5J&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Jadzia J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKNNhbLBo-4xKK8CzqF34wIX9FRCk4PNtl54buFNSiKox_n9DG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best food ever. You have to go here. Amazing service and the cutest restaurant. Outside seating available and amazing menu. Sharing platters are really nice if you and your group wants to try multiple things. Tzatziki And hummus are very authentic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFLJpr3JzJWL7EBNCHMYjFSyvqzC5fkU4GYBNe&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Gabriel Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOkCa52Vsdzq4UrhpPpvpALmn_ltBcgw4mS7qMR--pQBoMADmn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated valentine’s there because we were craving for some authentic Mediterranean food. We hit the perfect spot for it. Good food, good portions and excellent service! The lady who helped us was extremely friendly and provided us with a top 5 stars service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvUTda5AXBaAaBtV5HxPNyIn3sEzRNYoQIIN1p&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Al Javer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJuFoJricbE5H8kdBLOXv2e97b0nXsK1KR6g0cLeYiMJHI6xB6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food my first time at this restaurant was invited by a friend for dinner excellent food quality very big portions and reasonable price our server Joe was very nice, but a few times we asked for service from Shawn ( another server ) and Shawn was amazing very polite made us feel very comfortable. I found out in the end that he was not our server. Thank you, Shawn and Joe. Only I felt was the tables were too small for four people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB5_wGg-LYlHghxD9lEBYKSliYHmcl5hwzfR7G&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Hassan Makhlouf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYREoqUkazVJoJhrGCrjS5g1lIMahzFkhsZA1Ir7O3A-YofJyb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a nice place to have Christmas party there. Although, it was full of people attending the party but service was great. The seating area is nicely organized where the bar on one side and the seating area on other side . Decorations are great. Parking is limited but it’s easy to find a parking nearby. Food is great especially calamari and chicken souvlaki. You will like it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKXI9TIY-xtBBjlzFPeIwxPnNfPOtvkPSxzL11&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2022-12-27"},{"Name":"Ali Mehrizi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWq9cg0fjpkngwNGme387YM4kRUdnI6Pf_Z33gzbG1mkoqze49=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute (but not little) Greek restaurant. The decor is pretty. There are essentially two sides; one side (pictured) is a casual restaurant and the other side is more like a lounge. Food, especially the beef souvlaki, is very good. Bread was fantastic, although a bit too greasy, but that’s a characteristic of the food. Salad and the yogurt sauce were nice additions. Service was courteous too. Overall, good experience in the North Shore with a nice unpretentious local restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqPTsZLRRUBM50-UerM7jOEIxgiqHXacYHld1S&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2021-2-15"},{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Nice new location with some pretty good roast lamb. Today's visit, however, we were served a fried calamari which was strangely undercooked with a soggy coating that was not golden but it tasted fine although soggy and a bit floury. You can compare my photos of an earlier visit. The nice golden ones are noticably different. Not their regular light and crispy golden brown. They did apologize. The roast lamb for four was excellent and nicely seasoned, but the hummus seemed a bit rough and watery tasting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7d5gWKhUJQFuHXKHvERQv5j3mAO8IooNuEkZY&fid=0x0:0x67e12243d5a5f6c2"],"When":"2019-6-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mojdeh M Roudsary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5O3py_nRPx1NJmlnFYQ1DwJz8uAkj3rfUnS8ZgtpRE0c_lnc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"plenty of options, and the breakfast was decent for the price. The staff, however, were exceptionally nice. When my husband accidentally spilled coffee on the table, the team members handled the situation with kindness and professionalism.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXiyCHFVzg-oraum89Xcb3eXz9zUP9vGVjNbGm&fid=0x0:0x9bb07eab46725ff2"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Tom Pal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI37IdsKSk53UzEnsfQO_7D3d0aaf__CDUcISEbl0tIYVPejg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We recently visited Cora Breakfast and Lunch, and unfortunately, our experience was far from great. One of the dishes we ordered was the Halloumi-Chorizo Skillet, and it was a total letdown. The chorizo sausages were burnt, the quality of the meat was poor, and the toasted bread was also burnt. You can see in the photo how everything was badly prepared.

To make matters worse, I asked for a coffee refill, but the servers were all gathered in front of the kitchen and took forever to respond. Service was slow and disorganized, which made the overall experience even worse.

Overall, it was a disappointing visit. Both the food quality and the service were lacking, and we left feeling frustrated. Not a place we’ll be returning to anytime soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOAKEEZYrFBZox6R1LQSZkMIKpsj2mNd_Gjwgy&fid=0x0:0x9bb07eab46725ff2"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Genna Summers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSs1mGlnP4HNnEJy6gAOnojW-9zbxVQE9FvtTWUEEM5RTn2Ad7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love everything about this place.
From the moment you walk in, the warm, welcoming atmosphere makes you feel right at home. The food is always fresh and delicious, with a variety of options.

The coffee is excellent, and the staff is wonderful, incredibly friendly and attentive, making sure you have everything you need. A special thank you to the amazing Maya!

This is my favorite place for breakfast, and I visit often. I even have a highlight folder on Instagram dedicated to all my visits!

If you're looking for a great breakfast spot, look no further than Cora's. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMy0_xLyEEu4XQNO-eN9Qlr2M_kTbKBVcNcNaB&fid=0x0:0x9bb07eab46725ff2"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice breakfast spot.
Super healthy stuff and any style of breakfast you can thin of.
Omelets,  crepes dessert or breakfast eggs ones, scrambles , traditional breakfast smoothies....omg too much to list get in there!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrh4SBn9LHq19pBJvXjxGMVKYn6eeAcgfBqPr0&fid=0x0:0x9bb07eab46725ff2"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Rouzbeh H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWCMxXVkNZ_4QMkz1wPqBkkS7jFJhn7UVl2MdvL6d9i9NL2iWBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was just ok , fruit was fresh
Service was good but slow, don't go if you are in a hurry. I believe they have few new staff and they need more training.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyx8dByRsNpemFqhMoLnc8gPbN4sw4V4Pzyxd9&fid=0x0:0x9bb07eab46725ff2"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cora Breakfast & Lunch started as one small diner in Montreal back in 1987 and has now grown to more than 125 restaurants across Canada. They have a good assortment of breakfast and lunch offerings on their menu and are a family friendly restaurant. It isn't hard to see how they've gotten to where they are now, from their humble beginnings.

We went for breakfast with Grandma when they happened to be having a Skillet Festival and their skillet is one of my favourite items on their menu so I had to order a skillet this time!

Crepes with bananas and cocoa hazelnut spread
Crepes with bacon and fresh fruit
Theo's skillet

Once upon a time, I recall dining at Cora and having the skillet dish served to me in an actual skillet. Now they just cook it and serve it on a dish. I kinda miss the actual skillet and wish they would start serving it in the skillet again. The food is still good though. I was very happy with the egg on top of my skillet. We had been to another restaurant recently where our eggs had been overcooked, so I was delighted to see that the yolk in my Theo's skillet egg was soft and runny!

Service: Fair
Parking: Plentiful and free
Location: 801 Marine Dr., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1HY7LB0hyFJc8QBaDxYDn4E4wElNIFCjIdmoW&fid=0x0:0x9bb07eab46725ff2"],"When":"2023-5-8"},{"Name":"Naghmeh Mostafavi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDCNzELMtwqzz39GN9NqVW7OQ93AmSsFBMxlHQkyW6wNIimvmb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I absolutely love Cora restaurant! The food is always fresh, delicious, and beautifully presented, but what truly made our experience exceptional today was the outstanding service we received from Maya. She was attentive, friendly, and went above and beyond to ensure we had everything we needed. Her warm demeanor and professionalism truly enhanced our visit. Thank you, Maya, for making our meal so memorable! We will definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Irvine Sky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIawsDvvqJJpyYSeEKHRhjSM2Rd4DT42kqNRe1TrxuMkAjQ_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"In middle of August, store ventilation either not working or wasn’t functioning properly. Very hot inside.It was like you are sitting in solarium. Not just one time in multiple days was like that.
Service is poor but staff trying to be friendly.
Food is decent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBzvZcPo46eNjmnPB55JFb3dcy4oDzPmH_m-5Q&fid=0x0:0x9bb07eab46725ff2"],"When":"2024-8-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Champagne Kingdom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT9L6nbhgKeVF6uvC80gh6he8ZgVExYxBb0bRQFJovbeiruBo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We recently tried the nachos at Seymour Pub and they were ABSOLUTELY TO DIE FOR! We added chicken to them, and oh boy, it was a game-changer! We made an excellent decision, and now we're craving them daily! We can't wait to go back and indulge again. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoXTMbYR0rw4fV4lpHn-CLGOZxfSCTHCG0_suU&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Matthew England","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLefDZJi8WmrC-ShTwI9UiCbeEAgFyt_VqDvBwugmpvhgsgJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This shout out goes Brannon who, at my request, went off menu to creat a meal of his choosing. I asked him to make anything he wanted with no restrictions.

I was expecting pasta or seafood. What I got was a sandwich.

An outstanding, tender and delicious steak sandwich with a cabbage topping, garlic and chive fries.

I spoke to the manager after I finished eating and recommended he add this to the menu.

I have no idea what he called the meal but it's something special he makes for his mom.

Well done Brannon and thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjvYQMrUpuEnmJ3WpyeyqYu9NSqBdIWZC2a-vD&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-3-8"},{"Name":"Taslim Burkowicz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXATcZsxf9xZMj07so-ZCTEpid83qpp6oPDjHkM1z_waNAOOIOD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This pub is the best kept secret in North Van. The staff is made up of unique and genuine characters that will keep you thoroughly entertained throughout the night. It has great authentic pub food and drinks (I recommend the Mai Tai). Come in the day for food but stay at nights when there is a DJ and enjoy dancing to the hottest tracks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxplYnYVykCmlT40mpVvFhcLyACqmTvBAxy9xX&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Shahryar Vafaei (MR REVIEW)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDQVBc0RstWfsl33qsRF971wa7HXuUPnyg6k5pqZAmhHNldg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was a very cozy place with a nice atmosphere. The tables were a bit close to each other, and the prices were slightly high. The quality of the food wasn't exceptional but could be considered above average. We went on a Monday, not during the weekend, so it was quite empty, which I assume is due to the day. However, I liked the decor and interior vibe; it had a good ambiance. There was plenty of parking available nearby and in front of the place, so I guess even on busier days, parking wouldn't be an issue. Overall, I recommend it for meetings or get-togethers that require a quiet, cozy space, especially on weekdays.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlotte Buchan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOGIw09_yN2tFZJzx9YWgvb_WLYe5HHN6nLtamz9OVPuHcsw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was a little salty but the vibes were great. Our section for our reservation was great and our waitress looked after us well and our food all came around the same time!
Thanks all ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mahdi Bagheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfqVUIHw1jWjM94Vskpd3sDLGv1YyVtiNeq8NINvEIv69WvgsE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seymour's Pub is unrivaled in this neighborhood, next to the Holiday Inn Hotel!
Hot wings are always on point, paired perfectly with a diverse selection of quality beers.
What sets them apart is their family-friendly atmosphere. Feel free to bring your little ones along with you worry-free!
At the end, don’t forget Wednesday’s beer and wings!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGadd5SnDPxmORqIWRF6uU-i0V9Sy9xwS3DLpy&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Gal N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2XdfDYCPt_cgiBt8j8cM6zHcI87DNDsylR1wlksYltRZLpynHnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food was ok, not the best. The service was a bit slow but pleasant. There is a parking lot for free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNP12Q9dDPbs1hTlmbOaLJ1nsgKEfQHlba_lHmg&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2023-9-8"},{"Name":"tracey Mcfacey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQctmHHRfo0DPt7MmA5W297hYWb-HCJu3yvg2ZVlyQizKd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could leave no stars for everything I would. I ordered samosas, they were rock hard and over fried. So I ordered the chicken tenders and they were almost black.
Our server, Sophia, was so rude, telling me they weren’t overcooked and walking away.
We had to go get our own bill and she was rude then as well.
I’ll never go back, my friends are in the neighborhood and I’ll drive elsewhere to go for a drink. DO NOT ORDER FOOD HERE! Gross and overpriced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrV2EMgYZNd4g71G1SRAns_2AS_LLBYojHCc8&fid=0x0:0xa7b10313a9ef7534"],"When":"2024-3-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rabab Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWanivbucCyNNTwR7jdzWUysTNBjVH3jiDRy0qZpiTFX8Imrw74=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"# A Delightful Family Dining Experience at Cazba

Our recent visit to Cazba was truly exceptional. From the moment we arrived, the staff made our family feel genuinely welcome and valued.

The service was impeccable throughout our meal. The waitstaff were attentive without being intrusive, ensuring we had everything we needed while allowing us to enjoy our time together.

The food was the highlight of our evening. Each dish was expertly prepared and presented, showcasing the chef's skill and attention to detail. The flavors were harmonious, and the quality of ingredients was evident in every bite.

What truly set this experience apart was the relaxed atmosphere. Unlike some establishments that rush diners through their meals, Cazba allowed us to savor our time together. We never felt pressured to finish or leave, which made our family gathering all the more special.

Cazba provided us with an outstanding dining experience. The combination of exceptional food, top-notch service, and a welcoming atmosphere makes this restaurant a perfect choice for family gatherings or special occasions. We left feeling satisfied, appreciated, and eager to return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtIF-UvqOtziZ2xw4fIWvJ7HIc8w3vfC4dV1vt&fid=0x0:0xdcb521200bdd5e0b"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Alice Zhou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYVr5lNGa3-Y8JLpOz1WaR4g8Yuaf6R94oy88F85SRq_gBkxTFaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing lamb shank, as well as chicken / beef skewers at great prices. I enjoyed the environment and the wonderful customer service. Food came almost instantly. Lots of cheap Street parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPicSDnL477tiasIqUusQRdoN5m9SFMCYh-pMIO&fid=0x0:0xdcb521200bdd5e0b"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Hani Azmarino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-7etwQf0eCefmJsSEHm9q3sA7rsXP3aQEYP4pafAtARBaifM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an excellent experience here! The food was absolutely amazing, served to perfection. The staff were incredibly attentive, and the owner treated us with great hospitality. We love this place and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB-xwXDW8W45vvFHDlVO5vI2uZlHeCslRJ-bd7&fid=0x0:0xdcb521200bdd5e0b"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Ken Eshtiaghi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtwi5N8I26KZIlVQMJC-wWim5CNoJU_pVIHQl4Y7iV3XGN3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious food. One of the best I have tried in the area. Prices are extremely reasonable/affordable.
If I lived here, I would be a frequent customer.
I highly recommend this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBDytiV8muXsvvc05d_DseAnR0xR_uyzlbdabD&fid=0x0:0xdcb521200bdd5e0b"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Ali Jaffer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxBuzDsninlt9GBGcwFVCC48Wjy59DzbkKFiPBRKjZ81qqviGf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice location, peace full and quiet. Food was tasty too. I loved it and enjoyed late lunch. The service was not that great though and could be better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN44I7Y4MEa0GRui-7kyOuoEPFAdJp03MjuZz6f&fid=0x0:0xdcb521200bdd5e0b"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Bee Cee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUd3DOWQEA4QD5YNhcW5uCk6L8XuXI3YaXxmOf7nPFLvuzp3NOM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant off upper Lonsdale in North Van. Excellent service, food is amazing every time, highly recommended the shishlik if you like Lamb","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMftRvScFeGAa1-etkcoUQXAsgGX1QiuCM_ThDW&fid=0x0:0xdcb521200bdd5e0b"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"soheil hosseini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwUSqjrhpqP7fgiGUZVOnuhXBMJgQHOCnyULHSDD-fmYuKzg14=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy and peaceful environment, excellent service, wonderful food, and the most unique customer service.
Thank you to the management and all staff and specialy thanks Mrs Susan","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSrnMXxe3CwBE_lIPLJ5jdXBJiCAjkNMZvdT2H&fid=0x0:0xdcb521200bdd5e0b"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Real Canadian Movers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGWppXxRvnTmP0QqbwB2SfwIkbtm5RD5H0Lf0tOUKlZdhyHLY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“I had a fantastic experience at Cazba! The ambiance was cozy, and Honey, our waitress, made us feel welcome from the moment we walked in. Her friendly and attentive service really added to the experience. The food was exceptional—fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. I especially enjoyed the lamb kebab which was a standout. Whether you’re looking for a casual meal or a special night out, this place is a gem. Highly recommend!”","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Min T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHBCvyhMdMuGm8ISXRxIPWaPtZa7hX9LVxvDW4OOAn-tBBWA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Thai food with authentic flavors and a nice variety of dishes to choose from. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, making it a great spot to enjoy a meal. Service was good, though there’s always room for small improvements. Overall, a solid choice for anyone craving delicious Thai cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfp-PKxAwYyG7P_C1q00ac2DN4JaLeIHshWCl4&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Vidchayada C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR65i_86-7YRWJJv1jChCqEzATGe4xvieQR3xystfgQ8ueMWls=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The taste was great. I ordered Pad Khee Mao noodles and the taste was as expected, spicy, salty, and sweet mixing together very well. This is the real Thai taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEGqSjLACT3H_79mOimed8VsvIXXU2-BosAaNi&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Kevin Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRlInPPESjD7KbYbuiMssEuSwDqZH8bTBQfIu4E3fLv0_Wky0t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great atmosphere off the water front and short walk away from the Quay. The food was cheaper for is due to exchange rate. It was good Thai food. We enjoyed the quiet, darker, moody environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSDWra8vCcSj1O3CVQLLt8tvMmh7MTRnhnvpnQ&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Elsa Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxWLNCQ4_ombl7NqJYPlDIIAXYci_vOM0JN64IiWvI2oOsuDQ6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and amazing staff, our server took great care in explaining the ingredients of the different dishes available for my vegetarian mom and was very warm and friendly - prices were also quite fair!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOg95MWxOM3S54sMcaKBiz9Ju1jZMDXDSTDnqfQ&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Chidapha Somchit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3004DQp1M76o8_EI2ugDWj3exAP9aLOfKuZBwpzlEP_hlGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I miss Singha which is Thai beer so much. Just 5bucks can bring me home😍 I got Larb and Yum woon sen with extra spicy and lime, it’s so Thai authentic foods! Jeff, the server has a wonderful service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlgSakBO7KV9QBIKWz4818IXlVFJVy8Tjhjems&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Wesley Nelson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJCWnrm6Ikquh7xSH0FIqLtDwnmUf7oMAZZRMD4-7T9uMf1fIh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in hungry late Saturday evening at 8pm. The service was great and ordered a Traditional Pad Thai for my son and a glass noodle soup (with pork) for myself. We also thought we'd share a duck lettuce wrap. Food was fantastic. The portions were substantial so we wound up taking a fair bit home.

Can't recommend it enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP63pZqqG_N3IeNJSfV57f09jZFSi7uact542o2&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Elle N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGbOcGsaQSlrEBFLH15vmcEa_H0yjRJR8lfupxajXqqVNihA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I appreciate that they have a good lunch menu/deal. The spring roll is crispy and tasty relative to other Thai places. The red curry with beef was suggested, but the red curry didn’t have enough flavor and tasted too fatty and lacked that special touch. I had only two spoons and did not enjoy. The chicken cashew nut was good and was a generous portion and higher than usual number of cashew nuts. I appreciate they cut the cucumber Thai style in fried rice but didn’t try it so cannot comment (my friends order). In general I was happy with here. The curry was not was I was hoping for though and I hardly ate it/did not enjoy. The rest was good. In general one big drawback with this restaurant is that it is really dark and I never get a pleasant feeling walking in. I am very familiar with Thai food and the competition in Vancouver so 4 stars by me means it’s good. I’m considering taste and cost. The atmosphere is super super dark and would lower the score heavily if considered important. The personal experience I had was the service was good and thankfully they don’t charge or make a big deal for containers.
Based on other reviews I would not try the pad Thai. Also I heard the owners are Chinese and thus not authentic but personally I have had Thai food that was really bad by Thai owners in Vancouver so that’s not what I consider.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt--O-mHtmhzARPbHeAiXGnE4h1GQhqXjR7m7q&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2023-6-27"},{"Name":"Yuen Man Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT_q7sVSjzZETYsKUTINR0iUXRjPeUIedbgF9CysStAEsoqP21fA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The rice and noodles were the best; the sauce in the noodles was good. Also we really liked the shrimp cake and fish cake. Food tastes like Thailand, and we will definitely eat here again!👍🏼😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcSdbKiZwhhLdZ9uZIv4FriEQ3duZYHXbR8L-w&fid=0x0:0x36b8f243dd8b10ab"],"When":"2024-1-20"}]

On our way back Lloyd told us to come back for their specials on Tuesday and Friday which we would definitely do. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmOzXg2MFtqNFt0bF3ZdBZ3lS0_sHIRMPGiM1O\u0026fid=0x0:0x7e213415c56b3382"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Anna Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlGMHoRuVkqtdfldW-aOAK5IiCbdzBGVFxNL0vXj7x8Y1m-Yo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We LOVE their roast beef and perogies!! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBnY5ALUqXP9XFCoYrm3L7bdvuw1enJq4fKypDblkj0PVpfrtk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant is clean and spacious, creating a comfortable and pleasant dining atmosphere. The menu is well-organized, making it easy to choose dishes based on personal preferences. I liked the variety of side dishes, which are perfect for adding a little extra if the ramen isn’t quite enough. The set menus are a great value, offering a satisfying meal at a reasonable price. While I didn’t try any drinks, they seem like a good option for those who enjoy having one with their meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk4p6PJoGMqevtFGPST2CTxfq22lxDzQsVl0Z5&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Zoey Yao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC3onBmDw5tKbE5P3XJ3sjec0RAXfS02olPL2DimfySyZ7JyVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This ramen place is great! They ain’t too salty like the ones I had before. The service was amazing. Great atmosphere! Bathroom very clean and tidy. I will come back for sureee! Recommend the pork shoyu and miso flavors!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf7vVpWmS6psTmeKhMCXLMkBOUTJeN1aQJC7m7&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Cheryl Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKRqwGsiyntapcBOAHD9FtzNPiBoZCzUhMf_hjWst1Da_zYAf8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was in North Vancouver on Lonsdale Ave looking for lunch… there were 4 of us & decided  to take the meal for 4. It does give you your choice of ramen plus 2 appys &  glass of pop. Service was good, so was the ramen. The layout of the restaurant was nice & clean. It was my first time trying Kinton ramen & I was not disappointed. Apparently they have different locations too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6RvJ5MfiNdIAYotbPvgUmVI9NLgB_fj53hT1F&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Sunny Yerra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwX9GsGvRD4Rmzpnxnt1YRL-Eg5T-wGNmWnsfNs3vgSTgJL4bc9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The hot chicken karaage was an absolute delight—devoured it in no time! I also want to give a big shoutout to the server, who confidently guided me through the dairy-free menu options, which I really appreciated given my allergy.

I decided to try the chicken jalapeño paste ramen next. If you can handle the heat from the karaage, you’ll find the ramen tangy and thoroughly enjoyable. However, I found it a bit odd that you’re required to finish every last drop of the broth to earn a stamp on the loyalty card. Is this tied to some Japanese tradition? I’m not sure, but it definitely caught me off guard.

The place itself has a neat, upscale, and intimate vibe that makes it perfect for a cozy meal. Honestly, I’m wondering how I’ve missed out on the Kinton train for so long. Great job, team—keep it up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-coKS9zNopX4NGFSKuHgk1GI7MiDzjRM5lgH6&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"E J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrvh4CbdP6FQQxMyj7Ing9kTE03rzh86JIpgFN_ZRhysfntmzi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven't had much ramen, so I don't know how to properly rate kinto, but I enjoyed my meal.

Great vegetarian options I liked that there was multiple veg ramen too chose from.

I had the shoyu for the first time and I liked it a lot.

Personally, I wouldn't recommend the cold ramen.

Service was fast and efficient","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN015yIVKSMbeEf28JtObUbSG_Y4KSuFxFtvM0&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jacob Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJb-cGUacHLYB8ACzniXc7cA8_rGXOFj3i_8VfUlEnrykW4v2M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the pork shoyu ramen and tokyo fries and it was very good. The ramen tastes like black pepper. The tokyo fries had good toppings. The vibes at the restaurant were electric. I LOVE KINTON RAMEN!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOY4nskoXihyQfLQdQs6Eg5rjy-lfm9A5Q4ICHl&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Braeden Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKVF9BmWqIB_YrgaToYdJO5a70o3sCDB6sXsqhID4TYeu5N0o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the Original Pork Ramen and it was very tasty and had a nice peppery flavour. I LOVE KINTON RAMEN ‼️‼️‼️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ2XgDuRd2svgw_cm2PD-HrYc_oji6Lx_8rGKL&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Verlandy Joseph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeqvz3epzGUYZUUg-TWLgp4N1xSJZSkd9AlLsRB5CMxapEDaHF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The vibes here are really nice. A calm atmosphere with great customer service and amazing food is always a win in my book.
Definitely one of my fav ramen spots. Something I found super cute was that they had mouthwash and toothpicks in the washroom for you to freshen up. Everything was completely sanitary. Super clean place. Love it here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTJfN31PTDFexWncRNrcPzM_dwNJgCF9d5nFyt&fid=0x0:0x1fe3b8fff88b81aa"],"When":"2024-11-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Maryam Koochari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtex8efNS5pPcX1TA082rwTbJD3TKY76phM94BtFRZ-uSe1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am truly sorry for this restaurant that has such a rude manager and doesn't care about customers' rights at all. I ordered food, and it was so
stale that it seemed like they were going to throw it in the trash. You might get food poisoning.I told them, "What if I get sick?" | said, "If that happens, I'll file a complaint against you and come with the police." They responded by saying, "No problem, bring the police." They behaved very rudely and acted as if I was lying.
They didn't care if I got sick. I will definitely file a complaint against this restaurant for their rude behavior and for not caring about the customer at all. They gave me another one, but it was even worse than the previous one.
I suggest you don’t buy from them at all, and don’t order through the app either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiaj5m5Nljdq-1Sxq_vhrBP7zsMFndO4jobc_P&fid=0x0:0x627c6d1104b1fab0"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"marry jane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY3Ox6ctO6AKmaEdUub1vEsRCXMkMPGycM4DNROXO-kbStQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I never leave reviews but after what I found on my pizza I had to create an account. The service from Uber eats was amazing but when I got my 2 boxes of pizza of course the first pizza I pick up has this **** on it… no idea what happened in that kitchen but for real, nobody noticed this?? I threw that pizza out but ate the other box…. I don’t even want my money back but if I get sick I’ll be coming through","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQ96m6_NGYs9AhbvdyNpr0yY4V0foBHG6WjEBm&fid=0x0:0x627c6d1104b1fab0"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Jeff Frewman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkkkeSSeKZFzpbV-MuI-Cp_yrfbX_NgQEya3Yi6ogVGO1wrSI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the staff here, very friendly and accommodating, easy-going, lots of smiles and good energy, and the pizza is delicious pizza, What More Can I Say!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm5L_JXCvaM_e59P18XHtIg-9KouwCvyVraEEj&fid=0x0:0x627c6d1104b1fab0"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Dildeep Bhullar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4xeO6EEbHc-MJChfHi8L1_pKR2o5PqE_mXU7Jg0n0ft9bfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“Best pizza in town! Perfect crust, fresh toppings, and delicious sauce. Great variety, including vegetarian and gluten-free options. Friendly staff, clean shop, and quick service. Reasonable prices—highly recommend!”","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lokesh Nain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaSjvJ14j5n2SnqlglAwYleXZmdYeCbIRZWtew4gILZYyKO8Ek=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They just can't get the order right, every single time they miss one thing or the other, this time it was my drink but on top of that when I called to let them know about it they said in "Their" order ticket there was no Pepsi while it clearly was from my end. Highly disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ramin Mousaei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1nf08yOg_oIYlKMo6OODHc8BEjq31xQAc13AAHeDirZO-Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A budget friendly option with good variety of topings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4KhVvpFNIl4fU9NhFK3OXA5hN_I0R3FcKelcf&fid=0x0:0x627c6d1104b1fab0"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"jass dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWltzKIWqqQkyKEI3wzp6Wz6D-Bog_ceY67t4MhsZL7F0-Lgphm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is one girl named Simrose she is very nice girl i like the way she take orders and give gud service and also their wide range of toppings, fresh ingredients, and affordable prices make it a go-to spot for pizza lovers. The crust is always consistently well-baked—crispy on the outside yet soft on the inside—while the sauces and cheeses balance each pizza perfectly. Whether you're picking up a classic cheese pizza or trying one of their signature combos, every slice feels like a satisfying meal. Plus, their commitment to freshness and customer satisfaction ensures that every visit is a good one. It's no wonder Freshslice is a favorite for both quick lunches and family dinners.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Krishna D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLnxr-AuKAp1UcyvQbuw3WiTVbPI_h6gI0W_KnZ3CK4qUO120oj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I visited the store first time to order for a party around 10 pizzas and have asked the employee if there are any discounts in store and employee promised for 20%. We went through the whole order that took them few minutes to take and after all the waiting, another employee comes and tells us we cannot give you the 20% off. We felt it is such a waste of time so I went back and saw few good offers online and have ordered from the store for delivery. I have specifically mentioned for plates and napkins which are not given even after me providing with generous tip. Our experience was not that good so far so which is why I am leaving 3 stars. Food is average.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Nicole Berg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGgphF1wf_T1hHeZeOPKZGWWo_sngPfQHfUTcU4Gmfe_e1A-Af=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This restaurant was shockingly bad. Truly. I try so hard not to write 1-star reviews because there’s usually some redeemable quality about most situations. But the Waterfront Restaurant? I can’t think of anything. The food came out one dish every twenty-or-so minutes, up to an hour and a half after ordering. Some of our party was done-and-dusted half an hour before another guest even got their food. And, when food arrived, it was virtually inedible. An 8oz steak — pre-cut and soggy? “Shrimp” — at an ocean-front restaurant, may I add — that was so obviously microwaved it was damp. Good heavens; this was an unforgettable experience, as in, I will never forget not to go back here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGdzIUQvoGknTfxIv9NYcQdC4vCVOuYJr3hVp6xoJ5WC9wtxo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Extremely slow service. Patience is required here as anything coming from the kitchen takes forever, including coffee. Staff seems unorganized and scattered. Save your time and sanity and find another spot. Visiting was a regrettable waste of my morning. The view is nice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Petra Ebner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUggn0L8o1SAF1p9_OzGt8WljqbuXyx5HBVyP05QB6zm4juEJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We were staying at the Hotel and had a food coupon but boy oh boy what a disaster. They were out of everything that wasnt deep fried and didnt even have the beans that come with the salmon. To say that the waitress was pushy would be an understatement.  She was still trying to convinced me what to have with my salmon when my husbands meal arrived when I hadn't finish ordering. I felt literally blackmailed into having to eat what was available but then came up with the courage to leave.\nI have never experienced anything like it EVER. Forget the view.  Nothing makes up for this!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deni Dahl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIC7emxe7n6PhElffoW3lM1nCz9UHFtaZNeSrwp6IVPR5QIdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Diego was our server and we had a lovely breakfast with a view with wonderful service! Would highly Recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxVhlDaLFnMhx1j3dkM40w5B9MshXzH7bMm1UA\u0026fid=0x0:0xb38287f307faef11"],"When":"2023-9-5"},{"Name":"MyraJean Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1lUgOGJYsLN-HV8jvqPhzJn5iI7EcivndfiLQ9-zIrEZxpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"View is beautiful - full stop. Food was barely edible. Guacamole was destroyed by too much lemon. Chips were good. They were out of half of the items on the menu. I think they need to narrow their selections, choose a direction and do that as best they can.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeffrey Vesely","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAatWRs0lKzcv591pY00rc7zPRxZbkopKVSVO72jmN3JnlIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ezekiel was our waiter two weeks ago and we are happy to have him again tonight.  Great drinks, service and excellent tasting food.  Been here before and plan to be back. Hiram was also great.  He served us on this most recent visit","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Gervais","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPZsODCZz04M5EhoTMV4e-lN651ZFSCTMe4BoH4xEoUXvwB0QF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Let's start with the positive: the view of downtown is great, especially as the sun is setting. End of list.\nNow the negatives: the food was barely edible, service was slow, and that 30% service charge feels like highway robbery. We waited nearly 30 minutes in an empty restaurant for our food to come, and got pasta that was both bland AND over salted, somehow. The cook is very heavy handed with the salt (pork chops too, grilled vegetables too, mashed potatoes too), but seems to put zero salt in the pasta water. Our waiter was visibly embarrassed when bringing the bill. Nice touch having your payment machine prompt customers to pay their choice of 18%, 20%, or 22% tip on top of the 30% charge.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn8kXoVMMYFhLUfeO_02FeWz8BvaITkTE1hqteqXgsjaShag=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I stayed the the hotel and upon check in was given $28 daily food credit coupons from the hotel, so I  thought I would give the restaurant a try on my second night. I had two appetizers and a 3 draft beers, the food was covered by the coupon but my bill ended up at $55 for what I had no idea we’re $10 beers (price not advertised) and service fees and 30% mandatory tip. The server seemed nice, food was not great and left feeling completely SCAMMED. The restaurant was completely empty other than 2 other people, I should have trusted my gut and went somewhere else.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Slim Shady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKrB6X2CF4mCx-XA0kVBj3nazPuJzsp8oTK7c7x0FSpzu_EJ3o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have now eaten here approximately 5 times and I really like it.

There are two V Nam locations, I believe, but this one has better portion sizes, accommodating staff, and excellent service.

Eating certain things is difficult for me, and they work around this with ease and grace. I truly appreciate their willingness.

Now about the food:
1. Very tasty
2. Authentic (I've been to vietnam)
3. Excellent portion size
4. Good price
5. Professional staff

I usually eat salad rolls, vermicelli bowl or plate, and lemon grass options.

I will continue to eat here and I do recommend with confidence.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXuAmHnOQ5kMvItT8wL0Y5c_zNVrVkTdhgAEVo&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Cristina Kent","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQjNO4wnEbCjloTHz-jx3xtVWo8RmMlReAzOnTTyeWxdxKdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing taste! Really nice staff! And The portions are really big! Don’t listen to the nei-sayers!!! Must try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcBGTKQnlrgehxezUc1QEm8drJKrMrvVZT0Jq8&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Jeff Stychin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5dqdYBM0IgRaiqovl4yMwoaj48OZNEjr44HlisGu20tFtwg-x=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When this location first opened the food and staff were great. Been going intermittently since then with only a decline in quality and service. Today the subs were filled with chunks of meat unsliced. Old sub buns and no sauce for the spring rolls which were also very oily. Overall quite displeased. It’s too bad because this place has direct competition with rice & noodle and I wish they cared more about their quality and service and attention to detail.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Green Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvGkkQWLTgP6ZpLfyQFVTIZWmT7INBi5IdhvmkSI6w7pFFIwWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The menu was quite confusing. For the noodle soup, I could choose between rice and vermicelli. I thought it would be rice noodle because it was under the noodle soup section. However, I got the soup and rice on the side. The soup tasted good though. I also ordered the fried noodle which tasted like something I would get from a microwavable noodle pack.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN48Z6Z0OF3KdvN2tJUhKpt7R2NNtlp8ZC7-gdx&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"Bah Gom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIV2ykYYjO0izdxjk6f51k63jaeW8I90IOPpEgtxRszAN62g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve ordered take out from this location before and if I ask for any adjustments like extra pickles they’re usually ‘out’. And the server can’t stop giggling long enough to take the order and will need to call back to clarify.  He couldn’t get off his phone long enough to finish his order  with me last time.  Do not recommend.  Definitively not on par with their third street location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLn28ZSzxsRWx-BXlwIwUrPV4yTq9Mq3Vc9B8eaa--gvAlCn6pq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Mediocre at best and that goes for atmosphere, service and the food.
The Pho was very light, noodle tasted very bland compared to other places.
I can think of 2 dozens places with lower prices and higher quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victor Huynh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-YB2O_RIH2LOdPnnJNXueg7yjtewMZfo-PiKCrXtOzJ477w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just open 1 week ago. The place is very nice, and clean. Food was delicious, staff is very friendly and polite. Dine in and take out 6 times last week and each time was very satisfied. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk0OfGB0M4YSPY-PsTw27jzZhJYxSeYy04xnqa&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Jason Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvoR1-6vax1OTFpztHyegkdbRt3mwafgPeY38hy4kxjcvOLxTa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the better beef soups in Central Lonsdale. Very friendly service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeVaCZLTWNQunKZpdooyBsg1AI6bLdl6LkXxwS&fid=0x0:0xe4d946fb3517c9bc"],"When":"2024-9-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Reza Omidi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWHdvjtnEyvuqPFPVRnQhnsD34pYISLtWfAUYbS89Ys5rL6_Ep=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited White Spot for breakfast, and I can confidently say it was a fantastic experience!
The atmosphere of the restaurant was warm and welcoming, with attentive staff who provided top-notch service from start to finish. I appreciated the cozy vibe that made it an ideal spot to enjoy a leisurely breakfast.
Overall, I can't recommend White Spot enough! If you're looking for a delicious breakfast option, don’t miss out on their omelet. I can’t wait to return and explore more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNU9zA93VE9RM1go9ZRGfpM_aoQX1BOFxRbQkjy&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Philip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGUq9ypAOu0w07TxOy_GCbqMqBoDm-D85TpF7Xuz_DAKbHhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update: the manager reached out to me to in order to replace the meal I purchased a few days later. I made the same pick up order, and this time the food was excellent. Lots of tender, thinly sliced beef and fresh bread. Review updated to reflect the experience.

Did a pick up order of the "Nat's beef dip". It was very underwhelming. The beef itself was relatively tender, but "piled high" on the menu meant about 2 or 3 slices of beef which was underseasoned and flavorless. The beef itself was overcooked and dry (refer to picture) The au jus was okay. The garlic bread that it was made with didn't have any garlic flavor and was also dry to the point where I had to add some mayo.

I requested napkins and utensils but wasn't given any.

The side Caesar salad it came with was decent.

Overall, not worth the 24 bucks for a sandwich and a salad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP3YUgzus40tOAfFNX-__8uRTIIhyrBomvwTMI&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Sam Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSeVO8E3yvku7uop8tLoVEGM_NaXzKBAia20QDNEQRDvXqDThPZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good quality food. Service is good and pleasant. Lot's of kids and family dining here so it must be good for a family outing or celebrate a kid's birthday I assume.  Wine could be served here. Plenty of free parking but White spot no longer bring meals to your parked cars like the good old days....giving away my age too haha.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnYJ2feykcMJZSP6dGFiiQK3LNzrVq5p5IV_8Y&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-4-3"},{"Name":"AnooChi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX724gIupKTCShWzyZdsap_cJn15icjlO94DUGjIkT_Iy-gyYiV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at White Spot in Lonsdale, and it was a great experience! The atmosphere was casual and welcoming, making it perfect for a relaxed meal. The burger was juicy, packed with flavor, and came with all the classic toppings that made every bite satisfying. The fries were perfectly crispy on the outside and soft on the inside—a great complement to the burger.

The highlight of the meal, though, was the milkshake. I tried the chocolate shake, and it was thick, creamy, and indulgent, just like a milkshake should be. It had the perfect balance of richness without being overly sweet.

Overall, White Spot in Lonsdale delivered on both quality and comfort. It’s a fantastic spot if you’re looking for classic, well-made diner food with a cozy vibe!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tania Mardani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWggPCicA3a-P1_DPXV5NcQqXv6ocr6c9-SbjTTzkecRu3tHVu6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"it was okay i ordered from the kids menu burger was just like mc donalds. but for the price it is worth it u get desert as well not the greatest service tho","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGfQ8JIc-RivrxSJh6t4TOGwH0kj8wRYBK7TH2&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"JL B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIukA5EvM9VUmDafYuId9DC4Est2UaCQx9sp8OMVSifefOpoDw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Dark, dingy restaurant that hasn't been updated in eons. Ordered the famous White Spot Triple O burger and was served a dry patty slapped together.  Apparently they use a machine to dole out a miniscule amount of triple O sauce now. Asked for more triple O sauce, which should have been on burger but server forgot request. Lunch for 2 with tip was $60+. Won't be returning anytime soon.
Give this place a pass.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Right Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEoie8FQHGh3Ee1l_u1wdX91vpY5rCYbGoya0OWfzPrem4Uw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The medium-rare New York steak is delicious, it's $33 +tax.
There are a happy hour meals menu thats is yummy too from 3-5pm, fried prawn for $12.
They have kids menu too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHkp3ULI1tdPa4o_yDYJjFGdZuO3si2XUxwTFm&fid=0x0:0x6d94cf6f3b8dcf79"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Fraser Snelgrove","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1T6ulVtelhMW2bWZjdjb6Mc4hyFg5iYfAr8yDMDdyjEJaNhwU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Charlotte, Pedro and Mahdi took great care of us while we waited for our take out food. They also took extra precautions with my son’s peanut allergy. Super friendly staff and hyper aware with allergies. Makes choosing  a quick dinner stop easy!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Steve Lloyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5mSZbHG3POhBmEwMM-hOBEYT_rfM4l_81Z3bGYN7YJSopu5E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered from a delivery service online and not knowing the spice level ordered medium. One of the dishes was far to spicy to eat. I called the restaurant directly and they prepared the dishes again in mild and delivered the order themselves very quickly.

I was blown away by this level of service. Oh...and the food is awesome as well!! They have earned a new and loyal customer.

I'd highly recommend Pawan's Indian Kitchen for the quality of the food and service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sonu Sonu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJctAYaJFYcj-HgkXwJuJyVD2zlkZbG_OwFHpjkK81qq7NUUg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I have my review for Chicken Biryani. No way near to Biryani .Their chef don’t even know the B of biryani . Plain  yoghurt  with black pepper on top is their Raita . They just mixed chicken rice . Disappointed .😔","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJxYcd8WUW-bRJ6ADtJi8D9wHArqpNfuVPuXDn&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Raj Johri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYg0zXO_IFR1pd6WRS0bw1N_QUZDh5uf0OddKHTZEyMbRwAqU9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It would be 5 star but the goat curry was meh.

Butter chicken, tandoori chicken and butter nan were 5 star!!

Will come here again.

I didn’t like choley in the thali.

Lassi is awesome too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOin-219vahqRX7dMbMgX3zUIWhXL_kteCwQEhT&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Raymond Albrecht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdcq1cgTlz2jM8KoacrOUDbgVs4z5r0XqeHF9B9u-6RMjzCQQK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing. The pricing was fair. The service was very attentive. It was actually so good props to them","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9GvFChIHpK5iCk64CQDH_3B3ksI5JyzyXjDFT&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Nathan Huesmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNRce5JVBVtdVN6lBs0ZUeDDEgRpOnHc99Jm9PETBsJks8Zzfm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first dining out experience during our vacation to Vancouver and it did not disappoint! Food was delicious and the service was spectacular. Super nice family run business, everyone was very warm and welcoming, and the food came out fast. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sydnii Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIL-QmcSnJXN1SoZ5vZS5_9NEo85HQYf677g54dSyi3TvUQQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food and family style atmosphere. We loved every part of our dish, but particularly the vegetable samosa and the palak paneer. Perfect spice level","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrD121iSa8H6QeyjDz1U6EYyRce3EXDcd17XiD&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-3-15"},{"Name":"Panteha Ebrahimii","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp1neZmF9TAV9Mm2SPPocowHUnqOs_JTslv6MT8SBP5-H-Z0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of dining at Pawan tonight, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience. From the moment I entered, the warm and inviting ambiance set the stage for a delightful meal.

The menu offered a wide variety of traditional Indian dishes, each bursting with flavor and expertly prepared. I particularly enjoyed Channa Masala and veggie rice which was perfectly spiced and cooked to perfection. The flavors were rich and vibrant, leaving a lasting impression.

Moreover, the staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that every aspect of the dining experience was top-notch. Their knowledge of the menu and willingness to accommodate dietary preferences was commendable.

Overall, my visit to exceeded my expectations in every way. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a taste of authentic Indian cuisine served with warmth and hospitality.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTSlvn-6JkO9OHB1qG4WvU263wwTihrY_SRQgD&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2024-3-14"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here twice, the first time was with friends and I came here again with my boyfriend. I ordered vegetable pakoras, garlic naan and baingan bharta which was great. My boyfriend ordered a lamb curry. The food is lovely, the service is good and good value for money. I will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf_mjYgsyS2S99Fw7n0Jk4XLxLmK-BU8zKRcz6&fid=0x0:0xeb921982c7e39622"],"When":"2023-8-7"}]
