[{"Name":"wah chi yip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKBykHMUbkrtJ4cwRRXsjOnAzAcOzwrpq-XVjovUt6A3trFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a really good location with a tiny patio in summer.  Good food with nice staff and the price are reasonable.
If you are going to the Christmas Market in Shipyard, this is a good choice if you don't want lining up for the food in the market.
The whole area of the Lower Lansdale is beautiful in Christmas time.  Come for a walk then have your dinner is a good experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjPoS-WQTkCSCpzyWX8Aw2_mgojY_tmfcHEPXy&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"hania daaboul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQa8NWbYsOBdoHhTx2i-DSDGlyXV65A1FtkVJsxdPzsebGoIfdxA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food looked good , presentation was very nice but taste wise it wasn’t the best. I would consider it an average sushi. The price is high compared to the quality. Service was good and they were fast. However, I wouldn’t come back. For someone who tried top quality restaurants I can’t accept a lower quality sushi anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbXrPmQs1X4GEdssVnCpRznRBMEPLZwMeDR53E&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"B.U. T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXl7Eo4CxkLXBYltusdSuGWvXJFunP-tcmzhop3RmY7E6mxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family dines at Mr.Sushi regularly. They are very accommodating with my mom's special diet and the server knows exactly how she orders her food. Everything we order is always perfect! This is our go to restaurant in North Vancouver. Never disappoints.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIduP85sSgQ6mNsF3mXyMj3l3jWpECfSjldAum&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super great selection. Nice menu layout, good restaurant vibe with nice clean washroom. Had Nigiri Tobiko, Volcano special roll and tempura appetizer. So good. Could have that again for sure.

Can't wait to go back!!

Thanks guys","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTX1gO3LT279m5aCm0LPUkk14X-8Tt5_IzyahN&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Dulce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLHE_9tO2cwAVc1bgEryV8dn_IfC22lagkIAHF0C2T8UerBo1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bento box was a big portion. I didn’t see that one coming. Overall experience with food was nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLECJdRz_ieg6ILFOLbJ4neYOODsxCOsaD51AR&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Timm Dapp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrlrwCS17HT2XjBAmvRfCR3emJF-qBRAdJw8fyL9xIEsxcpiHO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The legend continues on Lonsdale! I love the Mr Sushi in Lynn Valley, so trying this one out finally was a real treat.

Staff are very friendly, the food is excellent and maybe some of the best sushi for its price point in the area. The dining area is lovingly taken care of, accessible and very clean.

What can be said about Mr Sushi that isn't already said a hundred times? One of North Van's best sushi restaurants and in the great walking neighborhood of lower lonsdale.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdKsx5-5qVx8bskRVHjC-s3rlEwUK0P-JVTvrm&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-4-1"},{"Name":"Tyler Mark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWibLJJIi5TxlsNs8ZU4hGKMoyn16yOBcLgxqnRCXg_eeLkLjKyMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi tasted so fresh! Make sure to try the Oshi! Wild salmon is great!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4bQ0IcorfIFoCrB5_EyMEo-JtFix3dBP2yGIk&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Thanh To","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVd1WYJP1UmnIbSg76XorhMDMrCl48AkAncBIVkE7p0lcIIllbB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The lunch menu has some really good value. We got the sushi lunch special for $20 and the Oyako Don for $14. Both were very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGkE5s1pyAr6YMD3h9H5xrUMKDw6jHSeFAcIs9&fid=0x0:0x129964ec81b1af6c"],"When":"2024-7-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Christopher Suppa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzvGs8gP888XN9QfjfDACPqWfAi5-8OTC4hXwRRvcSZgqBGlCjTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Warning. Sushi Bella is now advertising a discount for 5-star reviews—5% off your bill for inflated ratings.

I’ve been coming to Sushi Bella for the last 5 years, but sadly, every visit has shown a noticeable deterioration in both food and service. They used to deliver exceptional meals with warm hospitality, but that’s no longer the case.

During my recent visit, the service was just okay but felt distinctly unwelcoming. Near the end of our meal, the sushi chefs began arguing loudly, followed by slamming plates, which made for an uncomfortable dining experience.

While the food itself was good, it took an unreasonably long time to arrive. Adding to the disappointment, the restaurant had a noticeable issue with fruit flies, which diminished the overall enjoyment.

To top it off, prices have continued to climb without any visible improvements in quality. I truly love this place and want to see it thrive again, but recent experiences have left me hesitant to return.

I hope management can address these issues and return Sushi Bella to its former glory.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeGxx4Y8v2x8jPjiq-MWAkHfhBJKij4iZoLOW4&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"NGALINDA LE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEYLmHKqxcqP3LyLNkXRcHnrRmWUv9bQS81qdyBjlN7QlDjPJr7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"There are limitations on certain items for the All-You-can-eat menu. The instructions are quite not clear on your order. Both waitresses were also not very good about explaining later nor apologetic about being more clear. Anything with "spicy" in the name of the fish is not your traditional sashimi seasoning. It's  a thicker and sweeter sauce. Think the sauce you would  put in your bibimbop bowl. Although not terrible, but when you crave for spicy  salmon - definitely you'll be in for a surprise.  The appetizers came out very inconsistent. Some rounds the tempura came out with the dipping sauce. Our first round did not. Same with our fried tofu. Not awful but probably i would not come back. So many more places to still try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg8MABv6LFR1587b0CYDFNoNHNXoN1Slh9Ma4P&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Haidy Elswefy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeDtQX9zZWJQ_bgez-LC3qeK5HuIFH1t4BljevET9SbGhBXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disappointing Experience at Sushi Bella

We had dinner at Sushi Bella today, and unfortunately, the experience was quite disappointing. The service was poor, and when I asked about the 5% discount for leaving a review, I was informed that it doesn't apply to the "All You Can Eat" option. However, there was no mention of this exception anywhere in the promotion or on the picture they provided.

Additionally, the "All You Can Eat" menu had unexpected limitations. It's not truly "all you can eat," as there are restrictions on how much you can order, which wasn’t clearly communicated upfront.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYnvktWQjH3tW9HCo4b8HgRliJLoDUfBB9GK66&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Jeena Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6xce568FNb1nvtgMQcSH6_L2QBKn5iwsXcC7qJ8VOzg5UHczPDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you're from the GTA looking for an AYCE place, this is not it. Despite other people complaining about how their AYCE menu is limited, we decided to take a chance. Their spicy samon roll is slathered with Korean gochuchang sauce on top which doesn't taste good. It tastes like rice and gochuchang sauce - same with their hand roles. Their nigiri's come with SO MUCH rice, it's ridiculous. Their dynamite roll was made hastly, with lettuce in it?? Who puts lettuce in dynamite roll? And all the rolls were cut a different size. Their salmon sashimi had the skin left on it still, and their tuna was unbelievable unfresh. Food poisoning vibes - my poor friend. Their chicken teriyaki udon dish is a ketchup sauce. The only decent things on their menu was the chicken karage and shrimp and yam tempura.

We couldn't finish the food and wasn't opposed to paying the fee for not finishing the food (though there was barely any left over) but wasn't expecting them to include our toddler in this fee too. I understand rules are rules, but let's use some common sense.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2_DSOtojzY7r2-ay9rO2eb47NClPR3UK9kKCw&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Kayla Mizuki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcEGcj5JPeyIAIQJw3qGO8j1u7XbI927-7frVyMbwPWPc2pbjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alright folks, buckle up because I’ve found the ultimate sushi spot in North Vancouver. This salmon donburi, priced at under $25, offers an abundance of freshness and flavor. Each bite is thick and bursting with freshness, making it worth every penny. Plus, the location is unbeatable, with the Lonsdale waterfront just down the road, you can enjoy a breathtaking sunset followed by a short stroll up the Lower Lonsdale hill for some incredible sushi. I highly recommend this place as the best bang for your buck, high-quality sushi spot in North Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9SvTvGjpIkQ4zjKsbKqr6bX9DVg9c22BGGtuD&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Tony Neumeyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUXdQgqHHRA0Xwn61cd9dSU65TN_lKM6TEuHYJTJ3WUWQ_kdtShw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and wonderful presentation. Friendly staff but they have a very difficult time getting to delivery a bar order like a simple beer or Sake tasting flight, which was very good. Lastly I'll say they really need to cool their beer more. The draft wasn't cold or even cool. The bottled beer wasn't much better.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPABTpadquDsLmRtl7gLZaRbFSmp5oOrSc7lAur&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2023-8-24"},{"Name":"Cathy S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3OxagPoF0cm-dlk96QXGFagy1KcqdrZp-UbvVCcUiOsfW_94=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Meh.

If you get all you can eat, they take very slow to prepare it. The sashimi is a lot if you get the max order and very large cuts. But the menu is very limited, for example no Philadelphia rolls and you get a limit to how much sashimi and other stuff you can order.

The spicy salmon roll was also kinda mid, they had a sauce that I have never seen before.

Ice cream was also not included and cost an extra dollar. A shame that this was one of the only AYCE places in vancouver because they really feel like taking you for granted.

The customer service also could have been better. Just overall weird vibes from the start.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7DVcbhYzSTnSzhI83rO2ulBlD3yEtp_WyGgHc&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Vyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXUU9RCJ1Wp88L62KCw_yXu62UgN1xK-LIyHGKVIXzNN1jP0ba=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had AYCE here for lunch at 37.99+tax. There were limits on sashimi (12 pieces max) but regardless of that, it was still filling. Menu isnt as large as expected but given that Vancouver doesnt do AYCE like Toronto, it was okay.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBth6dqRXVTrpyU_tRyp0RbM6RclBi8SOJDZJD&fid=0x0:0x6c5cee9b8594c884"],"When":"2024-4-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant is buzzing with great energy!  Delightful servers all attentive and friendly!  Wonderful flavours from the food and beautiful presentation!  I met the owner Sean, a lovely man with a keen sense for hospitality!  I enjoyed seeing lots of large parties enjoying meals and stories together!  A great place to gather for sure and so aesthetically pleasing! I am excited for this new location and look forward to coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-XM4lnhfEOG4XvBDa6VKUTPF1e4XulR_A3S0o&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Mahboobeh Zamanizadeh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqEBG6eNo_t_9kN7omWgJzl-6Utz3pZz1a9oMvytBeeINA_s0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently dined at Akbar Joojeh and had an amazing experience! The food was delicious—we tried a variety of dishes like kebab. Each dish was flavorful and well-prepared.

The service was excellent, and the atmosphere was fantastic with a traditional design that added to the overall experience. It’s definitely the best Persian restaurant in Vancouver. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a great meal and wonderful service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3_Oqf8hbYpn7zigOs-4LMrclOVeabASq4A_Cf&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Gordon Kwong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKjDehFqHA5ZT74ZkeWTLjTUZu8GTq7uesQO3c1SQIt6zn0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Excellent well seasoned and rich flavored dishes served up in a very comfortable and welcoming space. The eggplant dip was great, with a nice smoky taste with a touch of spice served with freshly baked flat bread. The roast lamb shoulder was a nice serving of tender juicy lamb with dilled rice. Service was good even though it was very busy. Well worth trying as the dishes are uniquely seasoned and a variety of dishes not found elsewhere..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpBvNnM4NQMWu0dD5uc9aObeD5eUEpp6VXxlXp&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Shervino T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6zkqt2zKitqKAocpq4XdjLGLKYwV6h6SPfkXKLCO94ZOjBHOX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This new branch is amazing as well. The owner really went above and beyond.
Great atmosphere great staff, great food and really accommodating. This is really a gem in whole Vancouver and must go to restaurant
Great food quality and portions

Must go to Persian restaurant. Make sure to order couple of dishes and it is so much that you can take a lot home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhOPMZHivsJH7vBsMjsbDtv69xU9efAVOnjEk_&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Aakanksha Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuYdKCUfmzBWVi8hHJdEW0VQHgKBu9GL7pviB3VjBf3i4r2lDX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The new restaurant is classy and elegant and lives up to its authenticity! We are a regular at their 16th Ave location and this is the first we dined at this one. They have added new items to the menu. Ginormous but delectable portions as always! We ordered their Lamb Shoulder this time that came with jewelled rice! And what a sight they were to look at ! The owner was around and gave us a complimentary plum chicken(or quail, I cant recall) and it was wonderful. The prices have gone up a bit but so has everything so can’t really complain about it! Wonderful experience as always! Coming back to it in out next trip to North Van!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO406PjAO-2YFzAkUd487tSr2xjLioksGifeYgl&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Eilia Keshavarzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZtBouUZHO8fExYhbz3XHkN1Ypg_QFj3HYKtLTc9reT-TmX2vh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Akbar Joojeh Restaurant is a must-visit for authentic Persian cuisine. Their signature joojeh kebab, paired with fragrant saffron rice, is cooked to perfection, showcasing fresh ingredients and traditional flavors. The cozy ambiance, blending modern and Persian touches, adds to the experience.
What truly sets this restaurant apart is its kind and attentive manager and hosts, who ensure every guest feels welcome and valued. Their exceptional hospitality makes your visit unforgettable. For outstanding food and service, Akbar Joojeh is unmatched!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKdA1nJ7okOf7UNngCwTIL4YvsB2mDEd_g-1NH&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Shabnam Ghaffari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFh7qe4ymy_GyRCGsWjUSP4S6hiYybQrMso1wAnBhY_Ivw_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing dining experience at Akbar joojeh Lonsdale! This new location interior is beautifully designed, with traditional Persian elements.
The food was absolutely delicious, full of flavors, and beautifully presented.

the staff is friendly and attentive, making the whole experience even better. A “must-visit” for anyone looking for a great experience.
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_lKt5lJDExow8QGtI4dnqmU6iHkh5T6zT5cK_&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Airey Richmond","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIP9MUi-YhtTAzu-aDc_F4hrMuGOBsYs-20yb5co4DGC8CwHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For a refined and exquisite fine taste of Persian cuisine, Akbar joojeh is the perfect choice.  The food was exceptional, the staff were friendly and welcoming, and the ambiance was perfect.! We thoroughly enjoyed the Akbar Logmeh, Vaziri Kebab and the Jewelled rice with Lamb. This restaurant is highly recommended 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOokdZDKaQyYZwr-Z3PXliSGmhkHOBYCEYUbHnO&fid=0x0:0x751cb3e4264f22ce"],"When":"2024-12-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lisa McKenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuPyCP6A05WqFz-1BE2a0EDZwH4OOg4-kEwgWC74RXr_k_lNK8Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The hot and sour soup had very large pieces of chicken in it (probably was meant for a stir fry dish and just dumped in the soup). It tasted alright but was cloudy and lukewarm. The ginger beef was cooked well but could have had a bit more sauce. We found a curly hair in the beef dish and a long hair in the soup. Going through the reviews, I can see we are not the only customers finding hair in their food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Bruce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHSs6mcXC-trA8z96jOfKHUTFp5fuSLwv2xvFnMO_rH7Ro8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A few food allergies but they get it right every time. Hot fast , fresh and delicious. So happy we found you. Everything is excellent! Recommending you to our friend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessie Goligher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVjo59csYqqPdEmOSv5bk_U8mf8kvV2As4T3Odt6PSGFmmaTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am so surprised that this place has such good reviews. My husband and I were very underwhelmed by the food. The chow mein was extremely salty. The pork fried rice was flavourless. The spring rolls were so bad that we each took a bite and then tossed them. The beef and broccoli was the only good item. I was excited for my fortune cookie hoping it would help redeem the meal and it was stale. It was also quite overpriced for the quality. Such a disappointing experience overall. I would not recommend eating here, there’s much better Chinese restaurants on the North Shore.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jatin Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8izz1sEcwEdW4S9MB2P4uYWW4u__aenq97ZmJp8JBkpw0RaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had lunch and it was the best lunch, amazing food best service. Food was sooo delicious and yum, highly recommended. Do go and try their food and they have a reasonable price also.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-0KH-_dB1PMJQm3WRz1d6S5mTgMhjndhiHuyA&fid=0x0:0xe8c77d623ebab00c"],"When":"2024-5-9"},{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food and service at Chilli Lee is excellent. Have been there many times eating in or take out - I had always assumed we lived too far away for delivery (Deep Cove), but on this Friday night I had a craving, and didn't feel like driving to Lonsdale - so I took a chance and inquired and so happy to discover that for only $6 delivery was possible. I'm sure it would have cost me more in gas to pick it up.

Thank you Chilli Lee, for making this happen - really needed a break and this treat after a very busy week! Family favourites include House Special Ginger Fried Beef, Mushu Chicken, House Special Chow Mein (Crispy), Cashew Nut Chicken. We tried the Orange Peel Chicken tonight and that was yummy too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAM0b77FFe6uqfUexyX8885xhHsIfOgqlf3hCJ&fid=0x0:0xe8c77d623ebab00c"],"When":"2020-1-25"},{"Name":"toffy concepcion","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYhf6f6Tr-b7ekbkXxFz9ueDreb1BCkopv3RQXbcpm54DeMfYl5g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place has traditional North American Chinese food from when Chinese food was economical and not as sophisticated as today. We ordered the fish congee which had a healthy serving of basa fish. We also ordered a single order combo of sweet and sour chicken and fried shrimps which was large enough for 2 people.
Covid update: They're closed for dine-in but it's one of the best deals for delivery or pickup Chinese food.  Now that old favorite Orange Door is closed,  this is the new Go to. Update: They're open for dine in again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBKTDWs4P5Sncw_n8wvQlASzDhu8LJskNG_3-Y&fid=0x0:0xe8c77d623ebab00c"],"When":"2021-1-11"},{"Name":"Jennifer Luther Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUchIqnFb8mvUNTLnaGIRYtVZqjsbl0iBvHd6i50D0_TQgP83aP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered takeout through skip the dishes so I can’t comment on the service or atmosphere, but I can unequivocally say the food is ‘average’.
Not necessarily in a bad way, but knowing that other Chinese takeaways on the north shore do the dishes we ordered better.
My boyfriend and I have been on a mission to try every Chinese takeout on the north shore, and Chilli Lee is the fourth Chinese we’ve tried.
Sweet and sour pork and chicken wings have been our control variable, with chicken curry making a guest appearance depending on appetite.
The food wasn’t bad, but the sauce was lacking. Additionally, I feel like both the S&P pork and chicken curry were lacking in quantity of sauce. At first all the dishes look generous but the quality of meat is lower (more fatty, more batter) and the chicken curry had a lot of chunky pepper, onion and celery which come across as filler vegetables.
All in all I wouldn’t not order from here again, but it wouldn’t be my first choice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean O'Toole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHShQo-SVr1R2Va7NS5Z3WeC9L9GurfypnxlBArEGSnOcH-78p=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These people are so nice and have the BEST Chinese food on the entire North Shore. We've been everywhere and nobody compares to Chilli Lee.Trust me on this and order their "War Won ton" and try and finish it, you will not be disappointed because you will be starched to your couch for the night if you do. So much good food. My only complaint is they should stay open till 11 on weekends and make a killing, they are that good.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Always happy to pop in and grab a slice. In the display case there are usually 8+ types of pizza ready to go, which they'll heat up in their oven. So good for a quick lunch on the go. Just had a chicken-mushroom-pesto which I think was my fav so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWXr004n60gcGzc9AYp0GHx_Zdxpkp7lb48CUB&fid=0x0:0x795736b333e47ab1"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Nicole Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxXB90ebt1T0RPN8RCTnAJ7XBdcHAEdbv8BemWyAi7fRFvpMT8Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently ordered two pizzas from Pizza Garden on Lonsdale: one Hawaiian for my husband and I, and one plain cheese (mozzarella only) for my very picky eater child. What arrived was a completely uncooked Hawaiian pizza and a cheese pizza topped with some kind of green-blue cheese that even I wouldn’t eat.

I called to ask for a refund for my son’s pizza since I could bake the Hawaiian a bit more myself, but the cheese pizza was simply not edible. They offered to send new pizzas, but it was already late and I had to prepare other food for my son. They refused to issue a refund for my son's pizza.

The manager was quite rude, which unfortunately brought out a rude side of myself, something I'm not proud of. I will never order from this location again and I urge others to avoid it as well.

Update: they replaced the pizzas rather than refund me for one. I appreciate that they did this but really don’t appreciate being told that the manager cut the pizzas herself and there was no green / blue cheese on the child’s pizza and that the Hawaiian was cooked properly when she checked. The original pizza was so soggy that it was leaking through the bottom of the box. That is not normal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxeGAf4_pz6Ji_2zL9ZRF_ByhGz_Pb0jj7Zm1i&fid=0x0:0x795736b333e47ab1"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Jasmine Kizilkaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViAq0AwN_mcRX6CQC9qJrZthtN9bAt3YfEvW4fOgWwuI0AAcFR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent pizza but nothing to write home about. Feel like the slices are better when you order them in store. The XL is a great portion though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv-3JDXoguh__aCLqVf9BRp_VqZwp_9qJcbuef&fid=0x0:0x795736b333e47ab1"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Fahim Panah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL033oeALzAceamDI0eA2UnYlWbW_lia7qSrSGxl1Vtk4LXhBThg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was a regular at this place for a long time. It was a quality place. Today I ordered a Carne Piccante and got surprised with what I got.
The dough is nowhere what it used to be. I don’t know what was it. And it was charred. See it.

Update: I appreciate your quick response. I'd never heard of well-done and medium cooked pizza :) I didn't know that some people like their pizza charred and tastes awful!
and I pass on your generous offer. I didn't write it to get a free meal; It's for others to make informed decisions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZIJmhgmGAXyx4PxDie9xeQBd-n7xCH2Bw7YLx&fid=0x0:0x795736b333e47ab1"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m a big fan of pizza garden. What I love about this pizza is: it’s so delicious when they reheat it. Something about this particular one that gets crunchier. Location is ok. Seems like they can do better with cleaning. But overall it was good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mariah Dars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLWe1vPLBtDFjPzz4RLRPwG6jz1QFaZc2HdOgmAoGsjkww7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A bad experience at Pizza Garden for the second time. They botched my order and tried to quietly remake it while I stood there, watching the whole thing unfold—without so much as a word of acknowledgment. They took “my order” and put it in the window to sell as slices. And if that wasn’t enough, they still managed to *miss an entire pizza* from my order, trying to show me that the order chit had one pizza on it, that’s not my problem. When ordering on the phone I repeated myself to the woman on the line—TWO PIZZAS— multiple times but apparently that wasn't clear enough. The lack of basic competence and communication is frustrating. We left, with no pizza.

Mistakes happen, but own them, explain what went wrong, and apologize during the ordeal! This isn’t the first time the customer service here has been abysmal. It’s a shame because the pizza is decent, but not worth the frustration and inconsistency.

I won’t be back, and I’ll be sure to tell others to avoid the headache too.

They did call and offer a free pizza if we return, but it’s not worth the bother.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Naz Behroyan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0-X0w98PrmbWjwVpTFtKWlN4m_mE4kqknb-dm6r8rRXS1_X_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pizza Garden offers an exceptional dining experience with its delicious Italian-style pizzas. The flavors are authentic, the ingredients are fresh, and the crust is perfectly crispy yet tender. Each bite is a testament to their dedication to quality and tradition. The ambiance is cozy and welcoming, making it an ideal spot for a casual meal or take away. Highly recommend trying their pizzas – you won't be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amelie cote","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLXcvo666_-8lwcAqVpmb5mNkcq9hT22kq6P3WFe_5zHlZGHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This was by far the worst pizza experience I had in a while. I used to love pizza garden and I was excited for this treat  (I say treat because let's be honest they are on the pricey range of what pizza should cost)
first off, ordering was a bit chaotic, the girl on the phone seemed confused, forgot to tell me how long it would take for my pick up etc. but hey we all were new at some job sometime so i didn't think too much of it.
when we got there (at the time we were told the pizza was gonna be ready) we were rudely told it was not ready and that we would have to wait at least 15 minutes. so after talking with them (felt more like arguing) they realized they got confused in our order and it was indeed ready to pick up.
all this would have been a small inconvenience if the meal would have had worth it but unfortunately the whole inside of the pizza was soggy, i dont know if it wasn't cook enough or if they just put super wet ingredients on it but it was honestly really unpleasant to eat. half of every slice were wet. So for that price ill definitely go somewhere else next time im craving pizza.

EDIT : they offered us a free pizza which we ordered this weekend and it was a better quality. thank you for making it right","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eva Zia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJp1CScTOq-jdIBVBA-K4f_r74TZU-kRd9MclConVIiSCPfy3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love all branches of Delany’s Café. The products are high-quality, everything is delicious, and the service is great. I especially love the Edgemont Village and West Vancouver branches and highly recommend them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJDQ1k6AEoRt_n7uvfvP2PLC5y3fzzCqdIH8jD&fid=0x0:0xcb216fbaaec86975"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"JCVN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSLVtszyROwrIXO23Ocf7-_nm0i3o8Ra8Lq_5zV146VQ8GAlwgoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Superb cafe selections here including sub sandos (try their Italiano!), breakfast burritos, sausage rolls (the best), scones (yum cheddar and jalapeño), croissants, and all the drinks. Perfect stop on the way up to or back from Lynn Canyon in the quaint neighborhood of Edgemont. Had to buy extra for takeaway so I could partake later.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2TR7qw505eL4aVne-1xW8E_v5Czs_ZWV8-7TU&fid=0x0:0xcb216fbaaec86975"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Vivian Morley-Senkler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUOaOadJWJPVgT1o7LXyEKPpr4Jmp7cT7vDy39PEA-mcAbrg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This coffee shop has a very chill atmosphere with lots of outdoor seating. I really enjoyed and highly recommend their italian butcher sandwich. Their white chocolate raspberry mocha i also really enjoyed but it is a sweeter drink.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYfMT8J76u674ZXVGz01hkryB8HWuzHenPZLSt&fid=0x0:0xcb216fbaaec86975"],"When":"2024-4-24"},{"Name":"Wandering Family Adventurer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYcwAz28I_3pdjJhY0EM7Cmy9UFWyzVN7ZRSVk2viaDGEp7EAb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The coffee is great and the pastries are melt in your mouth food... literally.  One bite of their Almond Croissant (made by Lift Bakery) and your tastebuds will be swept away on a wave of butter sweetness that will have you closing your eyes to savor the delightful flavors.
But don't fill up on that, because a Cinnamon Knot is waiting, and can't as easily be saved for later. The cinnamon knot has just the right balance of cinnamon, bread and sweet sticky goodness.
I was a bit concerned that I would overload on sugar since I ordered a mocha to go with it, but the mocha and latte we ordered were not too sweet, but sweet enough.... They were just right!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl83ec2vgvHYrLZhm6UGqzotBVO0UIAoYIz6ek&fid=0x0:0xcb216fbaaec86975"],"When":"2023-5-28"},{"Name":"Joanna Wallace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0Ct2AhtD0O8FL7kE4RIhZNjYzLpooh50DbSFn5ebh6-wrxkwD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delayne's is my favorite coffee shop anywhere. The service is always amazing. The coffee is second to none. Delicious, non-acidic, rich and delicious. We buy their bagged coffee for home as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AnooChi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX724gIupKTCShWzyZdsap_cJn15icjlO94DUGjIkT_Iy-gyYiV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Delany's Coffee at Edgemont, and it was a delightful experience. The cozy atmosphere immediately drew me in, making it a perfect spot to relax and enjoy some good food and coffee.

I decided to try their Caesar salad, and it did not disappoint. The salad was fresh and crisp, with a well-balanced dressing that added just the right amount of flavor without overpowering the ingredients. The portion size was generous, making it a satisfying meal on its own.

Of course, I couldn't leave without having one of their signature coffees, which was, as always, perfectly brewed. The combination of the rich coffee and the refreshing salad made for a great meal.

Whether you're in the mood for a quick snack, a full meal, or just a great cup of coffee, Delany's Coffee at Edgemont is a fantastic choice. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"April K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4BpgZlGi1I1e5GeqIZ3jPSC5u3a6Znf_0qibmSYM2gQIY2tQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was getting busy when we visited on Monday morning at 9:40am and non-stop. More than 10 people were lined up. >,<
We ordered brewed coffee, latte, a carrot cake and a sugar free muffin.
Even though it was a sugar free muffin, it was really sweet.
The staff told me that the sweetness is from pineapple.
I like the fact that the sweetness is not from stevia and made of real ingredients.
I can see many nuts, seeds and dried fruits. 🌞

No Wifi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMo2QzUHpMJ1-Hh5dyJIzg6E68H-czXBMTxFYVu&fid=0x0:0xcb216fbaaec86975"],"When":"2023-1-14"},{"Name":"Nina Lazarevic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSOZoX6askCUWeG03dHKmbgzqcMMuV5hXkTzAsGKjmC2-xBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been a loyal customer at Delaney’s for years because of its welcoming atmosphere and delicious food. Recently, I've been studying there for an upcoming exam, spending 3-4 hours each afternoon after peak hours when the indoor part of the cafe is mostly empty. I regularly order lunch/pastry and multiple drinks throughout the day. Today, an older man, who I assume is the owner, approached me and told me I had to leave after finishing my drink due to a one-hour policy that he curtly asked me if I had read. I said no, I hadn't known about that policy, so he asked passively-aggressively if I considered my presence the past few days there to be "overkill." I was taken aback because I’ve always been considerate, and would never stay long unless there were plenty of free tables (15+ free spots around me today). I also have seen many groups stay well over an hour or two without any issue. I explained that if the cafe were busy, I would have left but with so much space available, I didn’t think that my presence was unwelcome. He then handed me a coupon for a free coffee, which felt insulting given that I was being asked to leave. I left my half-full drink and the coupon on the table, hurt and embarrassed. As a university student who has spent the majority of the past four years studying in cafes, I never could have imagined an interaction like this. I wish I had stood up for myself better. Given how I was treated, I sadly won't be returning.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Anna Rudik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfbzegQqF5GcYN6-eKvX0Ey0niTEU_D1xuXuuxqMsc1LJvRQPNdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best seafood place in North Vancouver and very kind people working there  Always have very fresh muscles and clams. Very delicious marinated herring. Call the store before coming to buy muscles and clams, as in different season they might receive fresh products in some days. In September they always have big fresh muscles. They also do fresh sushi, sashimi and have some korean and japanese frozen ready to eat food, like dumplings. Defenetly recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtg7ywXxP_WMsI_iEm-uCxjbEwRgCQv1Vr4lDM&fid=0x0:0x713b049da0bbf2dc"],"When":"2020-9-15"},{"Name":"Shanna G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn1ed2-WmcGkaH3fr3ht7b-_ql0o7eaSCN-YF_Z8VlLKP1mi60=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi and lovely owners - would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryszard Krukowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYNnlaevHV4qVuRJbLEJ3P5FFjCzl17u_ixfbj5izVAkH-st5I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have shopped here for multiple years. Excellent service, great food, very fresh fish and their homemade to-go sushi is really wonderful. Usually pick up an order to deliver to friends and family as I go past or to eat on the ferry on way home. I usually bring several of their shrimpà and avocado rolls trays to potlucks (everyone loves them). Thank you so much for such excellent service and food. I highly recommend this shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"G Noonan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAPVu5d5B0w2BH-2QLuUEHxL7ljOT3Y-KPk3BMDRCypFRm8GIWMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really tasty and always fresh sushi at a very reasonable price. A great little independent Seafood & Sushi vendor.  An enthusiastic thumbs up!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Haysom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsmzuqrKMNXZtukIw7JhUOSSm_YkmWl5I7V2baoawpTopruw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always come here for the sushi and it does not disappoint. It’s so fresh and tastes so good , yes it is a bit pricey but the quality is amazing and the workers are always so friendly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rick langer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbc4npewJEZYyzYO4cbX_2WavKXhDBw-yYcKyFI1pZPNEBow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have ordered from here many dozens of times. The best take out sushi on the North Shore. Period. Best rice. Small rolls, ie not all rice. Super fresh. Great service. And the most reasonably priced !!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Audrey Kozak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJBO_r4uvDUl4cvPtI07uF3t94UAK6NofWfpToZq8HYy3HU5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always have a great selection of very fresh salmon. We have shopped here every week for a couple of years now, and have never found a single bone in the salmon we purchased. I can't say that for anywhere else that I have bought salmon. We're glad we discovered this shop. Very friendly and fast service too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A previous reviewer (Rick Langer) said it perfectly so I'm going to copy and paste! "The best take out sushi on the North Shore. Period. Best rice. Small rolls, ie not all rice. Super fresh. Great service. And the most reasonably priced !!"

Westview Seafood is not close to where I live but close to our orthodontist so I make a point of going there whenever I am in the area. Very fast, friendly service - really a wonderful shop and as mentioned above seriously the best sushi. I would go there all the time if I lived closer.

And soooo reasonably priced - I had the real crab California rolls and tuna and salmon maki today for ~$13 including tax - and there are several rolls in each package not just one! Can't beat the price for this quality sushi!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sarah Kosari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRKJF1Yntnp-zRLmumvc9e-i3Wwazxmkif9r_MkSiD9JZJ8ngfpA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a charming little shopping centre on Northshore! I regularly stop by for my groceries at Safeway, fresh baked goods at Westview Bakery, and local produce from Ken’s Market. The atmosphere is relaxed, and it's a convenient spot with friendly service and a nice variety of stores to meet your daily needs. Highly recommend for anyone in the area!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Del Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKR-FzLD3s7G3EAGAWHBK2IFS2yPC6bqBQ_OWXv9oC7qmX8UA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I like it here always get parking and selection is really good, pleasant staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aryan Kazimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvxbgdyiGIPxpIWKMat9228MKOdU6Y-R6FtCv4dwEtEMxQiEtz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the food options here are great!\n\nI like the McDonalds, Oriental Restaurant, sushi place, and Fresh Pizza.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fariborz Khademi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE-TiAojD9xNDWkwZFyDnHT1E119YcH44DDLGFBC5PVu3W1ut6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A very nice store with a variety of different types of food but prices comparing to the other stores such as Walmart is a little bit different and considerably.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave Mueller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLksq55O014B8RzwEnbCgG2WIdlgII8MOhmR4pNjYQAD1Xr5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Safeway liquor store haircut coffee is all great but why in the world would you park at dentistry in that big building? Obviously it's all about the rent not the people in the area we don't need another dentist we need places for people to shop ! Everyone that I've spoken with was disappointed that a dentist office is going in. This ancient shopping area needs to be leveled and rebuilt it's way too old.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean Mooney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2vmsDF40sC3yPP_ZKVGIPXUeqDv5wjonOK7Mi-PY1DUVRJP8T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quick trip in for last minute items before a drive .. ok prices yet North Van bridge Tax","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vahid Ghafarpour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQ-TC_s0BuRybj2AYy0KEYdS16aE6PWVkw_ELp715tX9qfnRmx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Westview Shopping Centre and adjacent professional building have over 101,600 square feet offering a variety of specialty stores and services from groceries to gifts, plus many services including medical and dental services plus a selection of dining options and entertainment which are conveniently and strategically located at Westview Drive and the Trans Canada Highway. The development fronts onto the Trans Canada Highway and has excellent access and egress as well as ample parking. Recently renovated, the Westview Shopping Centre is a neighbourhood shopping centre servicing the north shore community of Westview and surrounding areas with the anchor tenants: Safeway, BC Liquor Store, McDonald’s and Two Lions Public House.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan Melanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJgJL2XlLa3y0Er0S9NticgBldKqM8yVh_hXPOuj4TdPHbguom=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seems to have a decent collection of food and other neighborhood retail stores. Parking was easy to find and generally was a good experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jay Comeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIVrf9b12J34nZx-DdW8nSeaWJQj9SC3YcCQDEx890aNltP1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very generous older gentleman I came in not knowing he was closed but still put the effort in and made me a pizza! So blessed after a long travel from Ontario. Also gluten free pizza is awesome! Thank you for making my night.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuljGwZMQchxs6BLBxSUov2UW8H58ySEMie6Bn&fid=0x0:0x9c6ec7bf78c7ff17"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Sukhman Mangat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSolzUyXB4SmDrEs_B5cPcq73LT8w09l2riTw4iEV2yIE4hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Westview Fresh pizza.Staff and Owner treated me in very friendly way. They were really nice and informed me about all offers. Fast service is the positive point. I ordered 2 large pizzas and it took only 15 minutes to reach me. Waiting period is very short over here.
Westview Fresh pizza is very cost effective as prices are very reasonable . This place is very hygienic and clean. The taste of pizza is awesome with more amounts of cheese and crispy crust.This was the best pizza I ever had in Canada.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdnZqCv0driCJ3upjGPi5x3lw0DEvsmRS1u_DG&fid=0x0:0x9c6ec7bf78c7ff17"],"When":"2023-7-13"},{"Name":"Amy Ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2FYbh6jAT0dtQ2K8QjhFkpyreBY8ujI1tnnW3dhjHun7FJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and I love Westview Fresh Pizza! So much so that we drive from Coquitlam to North Van to pick up pizza when we want it for dinner (even if traffic is bad). That’s how much we like it. The pizza itself is fresh and made with high quality, real ingredients (real cheese, good vegetables) and the dough is crispy yet soft; not too thick and not too thin. Ordering online is very quick and easy - I think our first ever online order didn’t go through, but the gentleman in the store was so great that he made our pizza right away when we showed up. Our next times ordering online had no issues, and he even asked us how our experience was ordering online. The gentleman is very friendly and cares a lot about his pizza and his customers. We are so happy to support such a great local business that offers delicious food and excellent customer service. We will be back many times in the future!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sandeep Mehta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdAwiBobE4VP3s2Rz8oKJ4uFTiLPceFZZ13p-A8noIAEj7MRQ8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just want to share my experience in fresh view pizza the environment  ,food and customer service is excellent.  I tried yesterday fries and chicken wings it is totally amazing in taste it is very crunchy . One more thing the customer service they give everyone it is very friendly .I would like  to visit again again .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karanveer singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1I2LliDgCekdXsYc1v0C8BJ_alWEVorME8p-RAO5w7olFabhv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So i was coming back from squamish and was very hungry , so i decided to eat the pizza and this plaza was nearby when i went inside i met the store owner and he was very generous and patient because it was very hard to decide wt to eat because everything was tempting so he guided me with their half and half pan so i tried vegi feast and cheese . Absolutely, the best pizza i had . Cant wait to eat from here again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SONYA MANHOUEI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgPV1_8w7HS4Hqtys2BPJwHrLjaRx7A0bodHeXeWfA96J6mFP0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hello everyone
I just had an experience with new taste of 🍕
Trust me!!you won’t go anywhere else after trying this pizza, I got almost all kinds of pizza for my kid birthday yesterday,everyone asked about the place
So fresh,so delicious,so clean and affordable 🍕
Don’t miss it
Thank you 😊 for making our day 🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeIYXO3XmiOJQD7CQ24MEsLyIiBxzsEoJRr5fX&fid=0x0:0x9c6ec7bf78c7ff17"],"When":"2022-6-5"},{"Name":"Chloe Sutton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0VIn_-ZslY_gRbVibv2vom_VSBuJzvkOwIaOmdPHAgjUigyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best pizza spots on the north shore. Owner is incredibly nice, pizza is delicious, crust is crispy and fluffy, and the toppings are so fresh. Wish I tried this place sooner!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPY3F-fzjvsDHksHJEV8G-bXJAmz-j0rvwyAnBd&fid=0x0:0x9c6ec7bf78c7ff17"],"When":"2023-1-26"},{"Name":"Reagan Veazey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1X4SyeQeuXpfp5JbBTd2zrKC7dTJtCEXoBYszXjkfwuEJz1s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"EXCELLENT crust! Delicious pizza by the slice. Sweet girl running the place, too. Small little puxza shop with seating. Definitely recommend if you're looking for a quick snack or lunch/dinner.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nathan Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYlKwIGO9PHjqLgc7mRGN7qYIzJ_Yb1JOij4343pL12ye4fG4D-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great place!

This little secret hole in the wall is an amazingly awesome place.

We found it on Google, and decided to make this our place to meet for breakfast today.

It wouldn't be hard to miss this place, it's a little door at the side of a building that leads into a great little space. Too friendly staff members there to greet you, we were sat down quickly...

What an amazing menu they have

I ordered the Dubliner and it was fantastic. One of us ordered the Mexican pierogi breakfast, he said it was great! And finally one of us had an omelette. We all were amazed at how good and flavorful the food was!

The breakfast potatoes are awesome!

Great staff, great place, Lynn Valley... you're lucky to have this place!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMS6DoRjOFQZNJOVrAgpw79LXfDiRdwsgqFlc9F&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Frankie Macaulay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLa8skt56ef6ERgCOsPBvc-5vmgMurK467T8aJyKr74FTRI6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Diner vibes. Generic menu with special nod to veggies (there might be diff brunch menu, didn’t see any eggs benny). Yummy food (we enjoyed the yam fries and chicken wings). Quick and friendly service. Charming mural (I think of nearby Lynn Canyon, which is what we were in the area for). Small outdoor patio. Single stall washroom tad uncomfortable. Parking in next door ally perhaps not for this establishment, confused.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRMHlVEKyfBUgSJbZTtsu318MR008fDCqxyaq5&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Eunice Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_m19zpDnShMlACSrl6S-cDalRdCNjiwxQ6t6OmcK7Ajk5cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was excellent last year, but it seems the restaurant is now under new management. The pierogies are still as good as before, but the sausage is a bit dry, and the French toast is very thin now. I really miss the thick-cut French toast. The new renovation has lost the vintage feeling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKS5CfVuD440F8Ysaqj2bwGvbPzNVrXYHaSm4&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Nasim permanent makeup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVIPQi0SxdIQGvvm6YSWPo_pM7bYM5Lehsgh1glIS4yA7XbnCg1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Gem is in our neighbourhood and I have not had a chance to try it. Cappuccino and mocha with whipped cream were icing on the cake.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQDWwo8MTJkMzhmb1IVHFPFHtRaI52PGK2XpvX&fid=0x0:0x60d575c304d5f5c6"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Emily Odermatt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUywkRbXYNcuGZN5C1HwyJkPGB4Luik6zyiyABorhQQtOBCtfWP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by this local spot for breakfast. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Norman Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKauCUm-k2P6JXZbVaCjI514xmAUd8cPqhMzakFQdELGnjKWj0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This family-owned pizza and pasta restaurant is near Capilano University and North Vancouver's Inter River Park. The modest restaurant has been operating here for decades. We bought a plain cheese pizza with tomato sauce, another with pepperoni, and a somewhat unusual seafood pizza. Pizzas were ready promptly after a telephone order for pickup. The food was excellent and another bonus is that Westview Pizza and Pasta is not part of a national or international chain. People who want to buy local should choose outlets that aren't sending royalty payments to far-off places. This is one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZlkh3tlxfiR5C5UBJhqW7HCjqykA0fl2EOym5\u0026fid=0x0:0xb37200ef1f02807c"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Joanna Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSvOBryPapBUS1wQg4EUknLYpPtsn5vipZcv3GZQ1M8tlgK6bR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been all over the US, coast to coast before coming north of the border to Vancouver BC. Westview makes the best pizza I've ever had. I would even go as far as to say that I like it better than Chicago deep dish and New York style, which is saying a lot. This is the only pizzeria that I've seen where the mozzarella cheese has a subtle sour taste like it's been marinaded in vinegar. The flavor pairs well with the flavors of all the other toppings.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vicki Gogo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFoREVcNCXj_ViX_AXujAt86x22eOrNPVq6Shih3JaPcT9IaE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious pizza!! Friendly staff. We ordered the medium Vegan regular crust and the small Greek on cauliflower crust. **PS they are located close to Capilano University, Holiday Inn \u0026 Superstore **{no where even close to Westview Mall}","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM12M7kNGYUMX4CgptIj_NNQTHLwDQ3xX4R2e9G\u0026fid=0x0:0xb37200ef1f02807c"],"When":"2023-10-21"},{"Name":"Krista Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbST1dWaxS-O0W2H-CoBYG0eZS6dc7eL9BJm98Vt51bvxBhg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place! Delicious pizza and the workers are so nice. Might have to order tonight actually!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gale Leitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEjg3TtUewZPz6iqqgj3xHn24A56Z4LL1fyOXhgtZWQxAIeXQf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst, most disgusting pizza ever! Raw crust. I feel sick just thinking about the thick raw crust. DISGUSTING.\n\nThe beige stuff under the white blobs in the photo is the uncooked, raw pizza crust. YUCK. I think all the positive reviews are fake because the pizza there is one of the worst pizzas I have ever had anywhere. Raw crust? Raw crusts can make you ill. Shame on Westview Pizza! Ugh!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9zf_KylS4uMfZs-Xd8lJhiKZEbUSYhdHJcjSZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xb37200ef1f02807c"],"When":"2021-3-13"},{"Name":"GRADY SLIMS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUGhbzy_mBM5H9SmvF0ZUwLd2Ako0tTKtib4P69unABtWFzXz6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My guy has great pizza especially for the price. It's not an eat in kind of place orders to go","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Conrad Elander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqHrvlH3Ub2lOLygLs2dmXnSynMX1JtSv4L96JfobWaKXC2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a small family owned pizza place that always delivers good quality and well loaded pizzas. They don't have a dine in atmosphere but it is possible to eat there as they have a couple tables. Highly recommend, the pizzas taste home made.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott A.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtVUX_XWKfJmtQK-_TCrr0wQiALa-cWEGMQohNooKR4YW-3kxLuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The gentleman (who I assume is the owner) at Westview was super helpful in preparing lunch for my camp staff (even helped me load my car). The staff was very friendly and the place was very very tidy and clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkgi2YndAesBp3TNbfg52X0V5DwioRqwsnOtBy\u0026fid=0x0:0x639b3387f03a9c9c"],"When":"2022-1-31"},{"Name":"Cylvia Lian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtz5vj3HTbPnAyb9NjxyqDzMywBvQ5HYQJ0XaEq56VKeE0h6I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Been to a couple of ‘Bean around the world’ and it saddens me to report that the overall experience here was beyond poor. How can this be this inexpensive?! The prices for the coffee and the cakes/bakery are way lower than I thought to be. The service is great, too. Next time I gotta try the Thai soup. (sorry for the bite on the cake, I couldn't wait)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9qxYGzoHp7ozOG-TgFJXqgZVKNEpktrw9jBQn\u0026fid=0x0:0x84bd2a16d5e2a450"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Robert Kent DesRochers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhO7BC5YXmNAY6c7xl78-QcmZsR2FN7-Tg15vFet65LpjE5GRXGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this place. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Roozbeh Aghajari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV97OtEmKVzK1ycwdHEJj40HXqiFEGmWTMV6xFHMNDWdGIicGuj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Let me say some about this beautiful café in more detail.
The Latte art was amazing and stunning as you see in photos.
The latte itself gets just 5 out of 10 because you can't feel the taste and smell of espresso in it.
So finally, they have a sweet and delicious 'Cinnamon Truffle' (see photos) that you must taste before you die. 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHJi5ANh8gLCJZ4_2h0ZUFp9mH0XcrRhJGJOxb&fid=0x0:0x474736db501001f8"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Kylie Ozols","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfi1fd8B0p8oB0yiLQGEE9j9acqhgZSJi9mxDVrWSEz9fN3YZn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time trying Nomad Coffee and I really enjoyed it! The shop itself is cute and welcoming. I went on a Saturday and the place seemed to be pretty full in terms of open seating. They do offer tables inside and out. The staff here were very friendly and welcoming.

They offer a good variety of pastries and sandwiches, including vegan and vegetarian options. They even had a dog menu, which I thought was cute.

I love that they’re a sustainable shop, not offering paper take away cups. They promote “BYOC”, meaning bring your own cup. However, if you’re an out of towner like me, you have the option to enjoy your coffee in house, buy a $3 reusable cup to keep, OR borrow their take away mug, which they allow you to return within 14 days.

I tried their caramel latte with almond milk and it was really good. I also borrowed their take away mug and returned it after my walk.

Overall, it was a very good experience. I will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHffGV3Zyh8LTmn4pda7xEuT8ahl-Gy96EWO8P&fid=0x0:0x474736db501001f8"],"When":"2024-11-4"},{"Name":"Daniela J.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa9i8irPi83OB1SAqGuO5WrCQbQ6lbCtHsmPeVXabPuNBieyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This cafe serves the best flat white in the area! The coffee is always perfect, and the atmosphere is so welcoming and cozy. The staff are incredibly friendly, making every visit a great experience. Highly recommend stopping by for a coffee and a relaxed vibe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYQ9O9mEp6OjDWZ438y9jKPKPNaOCJhgQFjhuz&fid=0x0:0x474736db501001f8"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Negarin M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxeUy-Xe_jayEIGVpEAlI4LhYQPS9Sz5v-TLupFMZ2neFkExO8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the Cappuccino and the spicy cookie. The spicy cookie was phenomenal. The staff were extremely nice and energetic, and were very helpful when I asked for recommendations. I also loved how they had different coffee bean options that you could choose from. I’m definitely going back. (I’ll try the espresso next time.)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2hlYhFRtY0J6damvbi2lFh_nVh6GqYCT38aM4&fid=0x0:0x474736db501001f8"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"B D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiCh07bqWDiYp7oqbplMZzA59zctdwlpP4X8xfs_Eo8NBd_w2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This might be one of the best 3rd wave coffee shops in all of the GVRD. Their coffee offerings are excellent, their attention to detail is excellent, and their pours are excellent. I had two pour overs plus a SO espresso, and all were excellent. I must say, I ADORE the "recipe" cards that come with pour overs, to let you know how it was brewed. Very, very, VERY nice touch!
I also had a pastry and a sandwich, both very good too. It's a great place to get some work done (albeit a bit noisy, because:) it's also a great place to meet and chat with friends or coworkers. the interior design is absolutely beautiful, and the layout is very nice for both work and chatting. I absolutely love the "bring your own cup" thing, that reduction in waste alone is worth the visit. Highly, highly recommended if you're a true coffee nerd like I am. Bonus, they actually have a DELICIOUS decaf pour over which I bought a bag of because it was SO good. I literally can't say enough good things about this place, and I'll absolutely return next time I'm in the area. 12/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp2xYVfBfmRo9yDkKVvWUKjMphrhhuh-goOnXx&fid=0x0:0x474736db501001f8"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"Kwong Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNhrcdIOQyhkpCbdjoUSwC0OqkPEp5C09o-KZX9pyAsIQioX9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"☕️ Quick Energy Boost at Nomad Coffee & Bakery! ☕️

🚶‍♂️ On our way to explore the Capilano Suspension Bridge, we made a quick stop at Nomad Coffee & Bakery in North Vancouver. With its cozy, eco-friendly vibe, it was the perfect place to grab a quick coffee before the adventure. We ordered a cappuccino and a latte, and they were simply amazing—smooth, rich, and just what we needed to recharge!

🌿 Nomad stands out not only for its great coffee but also for its commitment to sustainability. It’s one of the first coffee shops to eliminate single-use cups, encouraging customers to bring their own. The minimal yet stylish decor, filled with greenery, adds to the relaxed atmosphere, making it an inviting spot for both a quick coffee or a sit-down.

🍞 Unfortunately, we were in a bit of a rush and didn’t get a chance to try any of their freshly baked goods, but they looked delicious! From croissants to cookies, the bakery section is definitely something we’ll come back for next time we’re in the area.

⭐️ Overall, Nomad Coffee & Bakery is a hidden gem in North Vancouver. Great coffee, a cool, eco-conscious environment, and friendly staff make it a must-visit. We’ll be back for sure to try more of their bakery offerings!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5j1tCnlC1kk0RsfBdGt77MPm2wDB5QxdmFbHo&fid=0x0:0x474736db501001f8"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved both the espresso and the pour over. For the pour over it was the first time I tried decaf, and it was delicious: sweet, good aftertaste, slightly acidic. The food was good as well, and I got some good tips from the barista.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOa55ejHNFPZPZmpRhJizL6gwtBCgWymRC2Lsic&fid=0x0:0x474736db501001f8"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Vida T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiC6pI87LCBM42vHcEr6B4tVkNyf68yEsWjF-Q2L8cQNAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cutest cafe! Amazing coffee, really delicious pastries. We had the gochujang scone and it was a very good savory pastry ( kinda reminiscent of a cheddar chive scone with the added flavor of gochujang ). Service was also great and loved their BYOC concept, other cafes should do that too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPil-uj8hbwUyxApTGiPxg4UoLrK3FyIrr97xM&fid=0x0:0x474736db501001f8"],"When":"2024-10-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Katrin Chupakhina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL3Lv8DwHec2HcVTNxxsBsnWxE_ON5b4L4EqxWaqkgju48bSu-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I reserved Cornelia Fine Tacos Restaurant for my bday party for 20 people this Saturday and everything went beyond my expectations! To beging with, the place had outstanding food with lots of classic dishes and more original options to choose from. No matter from we ordered though, everything tasted spectacular and we barely left any food on our plates, as people went to order multiple times throughout the night. Another fun part about this place is it’s way of serving! It’s so innovative and cute to see your order come up on the little train tray, as you then go to pick it up. It really adds to the fun atmosphere of the place, and also gives you lots of privacy, no matter whether you ordering just as a regular customer or having a little party there 🎉 People and I also loved the drinks, as all of them matched the style of the fine tacos dining experience. The place offers some authentic tasting margaritas and micheladas. Oh and one more thing - the service. It was so nice 🙌🏻 the owner, the manager of the place and the rest of the crew were very nice, helpful and professional. I always felt like they listen and were ready to help, as they love their customers. I highly recommend Cornelia Fine Tacos! Can’t wait to go back already ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtNOxMjqnYtFkCQ8B5bKyAwuCoqWPXTJCEZTkj&fid=0x0:0x7479bbff8e1134e9"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Angeline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0UM3fbK6pPbx2c4PRvm1CCSCnO93vVvtzRB-aCPisUDnzr6GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered all of the vegan and gluten free menu items and the hibiscus ice tea. Everything was delish!! It was kind of fun to order at the kiosk and have food come out on the cute conveyor belt. It's a really nice dining room too, the decor is festive and tasteful. I'll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZASnX4fkpUVNNmkQzOa95nAsbCc0lyspqmBGa&fid=0x0:0x7479bbff8e1134e9"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Zeina Samy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWraTx3FiHzleg_lmvbrPPS_QkzxmiuZshBXfFZxpoIh54tssq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is North Vancouver & Vancouver’s best kept secret but not for long. This is my fave dog friendly patio to hang out at! Each item is made to order, and arrives fresh. The cups are SO cute and the outdoor benches are funky! I highly recommend Cornelia’s. Today is my third time here. PS: the vegan mushroom taco is a must for vegans and non-vegans alike.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM1Ea5hmriBUOknb4vSyM-ntoVYpSlYHd4hoUPK&fid=0x0:0x7479bbff8e1134e9"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"James Basnett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXM2U6QuObKCSf4ncWP3_Lv03EnxxoNEKa9VcgdHOYjL1eAjPC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful space with self ordering which makes the restaurant feel more private. Mezcal cocktail was 💯. Tacos are good, with short rib and pork better than chicken tinga. We will be back soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhnEco20-tC4uHhgzWa_ztATh7-gRSitMO9JUg&fid=0x0:0x7479bbff8e1134e9"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Vida barjesteh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9_kBFjr3voOkbYXczo5n0ct5St2609pGRtJDzm3NZ8NF-ZcGD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We were disappointed with this Mexican restaurant. The food didn't taste authentic, with bland flavors and small portions. Our chilaquiles mainly consisted of tortillas with minimal sauce and meat. Prices were high for what we received. The automated ordering system and conveyor belt delivery felt impersonal and poorly executed. The restaurant lacked the vibrant, authentic Mexican atmosphere we enjoy. Overall, it was an underwhelming experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDPTveaJDKtOau8u1EbSWHSD7TJvymYxGQrofn&fid=0x0:0x7479bbff8e1134e9"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Joana Marie Bernabe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEn7jG769ed1r6q4sQnMQswM-jf9hvmKaCTFOzu75sHvnDVxUb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cornelia Fine Tacos offers exceptional dining experience with warm atmosphere, vibrant colors, and traditional Mexican decor. Their tacos, spicy lamb and chicken tinga are must-tries, made with fresh ingredients and bold flavors. Friendly and attentive staff provide top-notch service. Highly recommended for authentic Mexican cuisine lovers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7RWKMxlgy1Z1ec1U41CUGz9yQ2FPZ1sPlHPRl&fid=0x0:0x7479bbff8e1134e9"],"When":"2024-5-1"},{"Name":"Ali Bahaloo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_SSaY_eXhOEe7BxWKHThqZNXiRqIbs6wnTNWOk5do6Sg17OZM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The restaurant tends to be automated with no one taking orders or serving. I don’t like that idea. The human factor is completely gone and it feels very robotic and unnatural. I think one of the aspects of a good restaurant is how staff interact with people which unfortunately is completely removed from here.
The atmosphere feels soulless, you order your food on a screen, your food is delivered on a conveyer belt. You eat it and you leave. This is not how humans are supposed to eat food.
The food is average. Filling but not tasty. Look at the Guac and Chips I had ordered… that is not normal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMldlwiTe01IsytvWG5QfzIpf7R0zKP6hBywN5x&fid=0x0:0x7479bbff8e1134e9"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Handra S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxddszLDxkXkefHeYj-j30lP2BEAvi4qeSKZsvx0Y2bZGVQJI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a delightful experience it was! Their friendly staff, especially Aly, who was incredibly accommodating and full of helpful information about the menu. The vibe was warm and inviting, making it a perfect spot for a meal.

The food was simply outstanding—every taco was bursting with flavour and made with fresh ingredients. I also appreciated how tidy the place was. Everything was clean and well-organized, adding to the overall positive atmosphere. If you’re looking for a great taco experience with stellar service, Cornelia Fine Tacos is the place to be. I can’t wait to return.","Images":null,"When":""}]
