user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kyle Stansfeld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCOcLRzI3gNuuNuvLENZro3P_vwHmHUtnT9Xk5lvqAiZuUcAc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service is always fast, and the food is really good. Today I had the lunch combo. It started with a spring roll, followed by Wonton soup, and for my main dish was Chow Meiin and salt and pepper dry garlic chicken.. it was good!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlZhrO5m9XMP_TmnyWKcivCS_0vgMkVzPRCaLu&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited and try their delicious food
The service was very fast
We tried Diced Chicken with Peanuts in Chili Garlic Sauce with Steamed Rice & Shredded Chicken Chow Mein
And we were very happy with taste and our order

I highly recommend this place and ask to help and support local please","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPosB1En8jJxPdX9c8IzCUlyEAtkWEGzCoPO8zd&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Nadyne Rousseau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZxLwjFP7JsOCxXJh6XqFvS3cPzfQTfnLAYMg9cNkS23Hd8LA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food 3.5 stars, service (-)5 stars. Where do I start? First incident: pick up my order, get in my car, check my order and find a shrimp dish which I didn’t order but missing my beef dish. I went back inside and told the son of the owner about the mistake. He said I ordered it so I need to keep it but I can buy an extra beef dish. I explained to him I didn’t order this dish and would NEVER, EVER,  order a shrimp dish as my son is allergic to shrimp. I suggest he might have made a mistake with another customer’s order. He said that he did not and that was on my order. I argued with him and he finally change it for my beef dish.

Second incident: Went back because there is not much choice for Chinese food in North Van. Well, bad decision! Pre-ordered my meal ahead of time because I needed to pick up my son at soccer then drop off the food at home with my son, and drive my other son to hockey. When I got to the restaurant, the owner told me my husband already picked up my order which he didn’t. It turned out they give my order to another customer so they have to make mine from scratch again. The owner, her daughter and the cook started screaming at each other in Chinese about the mix up.

I had to tell them to stop arguing, do it when I am gone, and to hurry to prepare my order……. I had to come back in 20 min which made me late for my son, the other one drop off, etc. The best/worse part…… I finally came back to pick up my order and I asked for a discount on my meal (they didn’t offer) as their mix up caused me a lot of hassles. The owner offered few dollars off. I said the inconvenience they caused me worth much more than few dollars and that their customer service was sub par. I told they have no business etiquette.

The 18 yo daughter joined the discussion and told me I was insensitive to their business! Who made the mistake? I told them that they should assume their mistakes and not make the such a big deal about it. The daughter got upset and told me to get in my car. Never I’ve seen a teenager speak to an adult client this way while the mom (owner) was watching.

What a family!!! Should not deal with public !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle LeGrow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWK_MkdHm5LniyjTBLVq-wXmzzVrba1Ybvlrh0cb5mQzqHDVv6M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic experience. Food arrived quickly, and was all delicious. The fried chili garlic beans and the sweet and sour pork were the highlights.
The atmosphere was like a lot of family run chinese restaurants, however I could tell cleanliness is important to the staff.
The location is easy to get to with enough parking out front of the store.
Thanks to the friendly staff!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOI3OGNCPpEauerXWJwB66AHX6ff0JHYVoziAni&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2019-4-24"},{"Name":"James Coles-Nash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkJrmtjWT371XtK4SkdD-gc4742YrtKT1KSibl27VRSYpTt9Yi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Super tasty family run Szechuan style restaurant on your way back from Lynne valley. We have ordered many things over the years and they have all been very good and fresh. My favorite is the cumin lamb, but be warned it is VERY flavorful!

For people with kids they have high chairs and plastic plates forks and little cups. The only thing we have to bring is a bib and our kids!

We will keep coming back as long as this restaurant is here as it's the perfect place on our way back from the mountains.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN5vPxyP_PV3I7SK81qMmSylj_XHFR5W1NNZp8&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2018-8-18"},{"Name":"Wayne Lloyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvXczlh76llO-fYZcAF0qf3D1j8dsTDAeORSYb3v8bdTQEsiwW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Food is ok, but nothing great. Lady at the till is also the waitress. She tries to force tip even for takeout. Very grumpy, my goodness, abrupt with never a smile.
Recently picked up a large order and asked for them, in advance, to mark boxes that contained shell fish or anything that had oyster or other shell fish sauce; allergy concern request! Grumpy lady refused to do it. Couldn't believe her answer. After this last experience, I'm done. Will never be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adrian Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRz_uEV8AM70-EugybmCMjVZLIi0OfMP3My2LKS1PidWwGuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the better Chinese restaurants on the North Shore. More authentic than most and surprisingly tasty. The dishes were not oily and they were well seasoned. Pricing is decent. We've been looking for a decent Chinese restaurant on the North Shore for the longest time and think we've found one. Will give their other dishes a try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDNs97RKuEcXWm2qJF2JGYM_dGQWjReLzKnjaj&fid=0x0:0xd2b940037a061558"],"When":"2021-5-18"},{"Name":"The Canadian Kiwibirb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWARmdUVGjNiSIQ56E4hj34-9pERPD4zWAu0arXJDUm3CmO0Ks=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got our order wrong. Phoned and told them. They tried to gaslight us into thinking the wrong order was ours.

They made us drive all the way back to show them the food. Guess what, we were right. For getting our order wrong, making us wait an extra hour to eat dinner, and being rude on the phone, they gave us no refund and no extra food as an apology

The food was also bad
Pork-extremely acidic
Lamb-extremely dry
Beef-bland and burnt","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rhodes Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUlN1n3pAekvjp51e2hLJxijqWk6fkyD3R5wi0vtHWK6uqt4ItsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first thing they bring you when you sit down is genmaicha tea (roasted rice tea) which was perfect for a cold day. All the sushi was very fresh and delicious. The tempura was also cooked well. Good prices. Highly recommend if you are in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPmYeDMHxmNng-Xvviq8acyzIwHTxNa7swGIXQ&fid=0x0:0xb5662e0849eb0adc"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZCsf97y3t-Ppi4xqcVMVpZ9qy3abZg0k-7Vz9rSFc5K4h7Apj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I often get takeout from here, and the sushi tastes great. However, this is my first time trying the takoyaki. But why is each one only half? Still, there is a piece of octopus inside, and it tastes quite good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKuhcJDqpyAPeWP-0pTZJ5bXnLyvHuWOc4Ko48&fid=0x0:0xb5662e0849eb0adc"],"When":"2024-6-6"},{"Name":"Ads","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwDyuvQtXP_VygmU1rNXhUJ0mc48E4h1QtDkdEfrlXmuS-mYhL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Arigatou ありがとう !
This joint is a great little sushi spot! 100% recommend swinging by for some yummy chow down on awesome grub at excellent value for money. My first experience of Agedashi Tofu (揚げ出し豆腐) in this way, totally digged it, dope flavor and super tasty tofu! The Edamame 枝豆 salting was a little too overkill for my personal preference but a delicious set of Dynamite Roll 炸虾卷 , Inari Roll 稲荷 and Salmon Roll nonetheless. The Tamagoyaki 玉子焼き and Inari Roll 稲荷 were also phoneomenal!
Note, no brown rice options here but isn't a huge deal. The staff are awesome, extremely approachable and they also have high chairs for little ones with big tummies! Will definitely be coming back here next time I'm in the area without hesitation and pumped for my next opportunity! A great experience.
Support local businesses!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx00NYNmC6rKbkxhfo08eGvAx-QQF-s96-WiLj&fid=0x0:0xb5662e0849eb0adc"],"When":"2023-6-4"},{"Name":"Jacob Stephen Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcMBZM4PgHTOnBg5GxDBfdYWFaHpxGHWulQ4x5BQVB8S4xkNNL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for sushi very well done with good service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGktPHq6-Lrl8FhyNfpNQHMayon1wU1nQl20wj&fid=0x0:0xb5662e0849eb0adc"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Amin Sameni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7gOTJPCM-cxMdKwmmGT2dzn1GqI9KyFBzJ01UvZjTN1ONfqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small sushi place in Lynn Valley.
Don’t get fool by the look. Food is great here.
Great sushi selection.
High quality and delicious with reasonable price.
Service is also good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOd288kCWtEu22JLdfHS1qt5P0-74gkz2orKwlC&fid=0x0:0xb5662e0849eb0adc"],"When":"2022-10-10"},{"Name":"Jason Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVf9csMHmMhS9slZDYL9SCPfg8qstNE9unXcTBUjBqC_aENva5pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had two special rolls. The portions were generous, the ingredients were fresh, and the food was delicious. It’s a small but authentic shop","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmR0epwW-fjVhKZJmht-Gblaf2n1qCE6O9Gwc2&fid=0x0:0xb5662e0849eb0adc"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Anika Harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuGwdyjWhsTccQMhvOtJ5u464dMtAEnJriERMc01m6Cc88IpM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I adore this place! There’s something so comforting about a tiny little sushi shop! We frequent both dine in and take out and are never disappointed. Their agedashi tofu is a dish I dream about on the regular! This place is our go to for dinner when we don’t know what to get! Very much recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maryam Mahvelati","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqSIYCxGVWbE283eh01NcjwPUR5DY83Pb_UzjpeeSHnRZO8fY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I unfortunately have had to change my 5 star to a 2 star. I use to love coming to this place for years and it was my regular spot. However, they’ve really cheaped out the last few visits I’ve had - not including soy sauce, wasabi or ginger. I’ve been catching them and asking for it now and they give you the smallest amount possible that doesn’t even cover all the rolls. Their prices have also increased and the rolls are now really filled with rice.
I don’t know if their business isn’t doing well that they’re cutting down on expenses this way, but it’s definitely noticeable.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"April Heyman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzhK8ZI-LCFNEN2-quYoNjfEii33Wm3ajB65Q4iGUbScPkyz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The fresh is Chinese food I've probably ever had. It's steaming hot when it comes out. Generous portions and beautiful display. Service is always amazing even when it's busy. Only thing I might say is that it's far less salty than other Chinese food places. This will be a plus for a lot of people who complain about salt. I put soy sauce on my food when we dine here. I think my favourite menue item is the Buddha's feast. My hubby likes the ginger beef (extra good here) and says the Singapore Style Vermicelli is fantastic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlBSXJ0YF5h4pVLFtZMyBXmawHFUxJ7NStgAXB&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of our go to places on the Shore. We ordered a few dishes for our dine in dinner.

Food: 4/5 - decent portions and tasty. We love the green beans. Still tasty after all these years
Service: 4/5 - server came over a few times asking if everything was all good
Atmosphere: 4/5 - the decor is nicer than it was a few years ago

We’ll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeQgdze7B52canLSE11ldUAniT8C2JIH9fJbOH&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Tricia “Gigi” Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwNSJncUFmfw4xR63i5k1g42tUTsrNZ3tpNgKGJMSlYdHD9Ah5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their food is very favourable, freshly made on demand. We ordered online through the website, and the food was delivered fresh and arrived well before the delivery window ended. No soggy over, sauced or small pieces of ingredients, just fresh, tasty and voluminous.  Each picture was taken of the meals after two large servings had been enjoyed.  If I estimate 6 to 8 servings, it's between 15 and 20 dollars a person, including delivery and tip!  A good value for freshness.  I think there are at least 4, maybe six servings. (We bought two ginger beefs, with one of each of the rest) 5 Stars for flavour, freshness and food for value. Give them a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjs_GCRxumT_2TmDF77IOvs5bdARocH8TV-bl5&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-4-27"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful lunch today.  We popped by just after an early day.  Service was excellent and the food was too.  Nice to have decent Szechuan so close to home.  Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRXxLiXUZx4cL7K9Hv5dOB7chpIBGlAdKocico&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very delightful food served up fast!  Loved the spring roll full of cabbage!  My husband loved his Hot & Sour soup…he said it was classic!  He also loved his eggplant dish.  We ordered off the Lunch Special menu which is $10.50 add $2.00 for soup.  Fresh and tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTYXgoF4lOmNtsGuFMVgzCqS4v-Wqc5GkKM6r3&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2022-4-15"},{"Name":"Wendy Shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM7rkgmOMkjrjUmvCt0TGJxM9Hb_ISvesiiwwn9PZfMcoomfRy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Honestly my favorite thing to get from here is their chow fun with extra onion and fried chili squid it tastes heavenly with their tea and their portions are generation for their price in this economy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeJDQPzGcwsi6OVsBZp1PC6zFaHhY0nJeRzKms&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Colleen Shorter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWe4pcpfIazgv67N5u0c7ar5AgnbPX964McRNwm0sD9JU7gfk6d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fresh & flavorful, hot & fast. This is my second go to lunch spot in Lions Gate Neighbourhood. Many good menu items, I got the sweet n sour pouk with pineapple green pepper & onion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP5GxgH7DqBAI5Wr9xl37e9YUF0X3rTsO1yuTr&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2023-9-23"},{"Name":"Doanyelle Conner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvvNL8ub_TFe8DjCpCQQXCJ89dfFx7TFldIyytoWWq3JkpJUo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food! Convenient location. Plenty of parking. Smaller, plaza restaurant. The staff were not rude, but were also not very warm or welcoming. Prices were fair. The food makes up for the rest. Great flavors and good portions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGC28QWh111fbzN8fbP1xlW0NYe7Z4cPaFDD8&fid=0x0:0x3ef7c1869c373ac8"],"When":"2023-5-2"}]

address: 1093 Marine Dr, North Vancouver, BC V7P 3M6

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Samiul Haque","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKATpwAX4E3F9Ho8ZjdBY8D-vc1o-n17Nk_igZ2ZwMxrL6FNpK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We tried the Chicken Lover pizza, and it was absolutely delicious! The crust was exceptional, and the spices and toppings were generous. The chef even customized the pizza perfectly to my preferences—100/10! I’ll definitely be coming back.

Also, everything here is halal, which is such a rare find in North Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZMCk8RvRjkEor55QBdBTsE9CrL9Vyh1AeOLPy&fid=0x0:0x9fef6d06994dcf8b"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Yousuf Bootwala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDQt7rT_XsYM_n3faLlwI0ZevvICMUEL-L9CZMEL7uPlqI-g4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot say enough amazing things about Saffari Pizza! We stopped by at 11 AM, just as they were about to close, and they didn’t have all the ingredients for the pizza we wanted. Instead of turning us away, the owner Hisham went above and beyond—he literally drove to the supermarket, got the exact ingredients we needed, and served us the best halal pizza we’ve ever had. The dedication, hospitality, and care they put into their service is unmatched. It’s rare to find such commitment and genuine customer care.

The pizza was absolutely delicious, fresh, and packed with flavor, leaving us completely satisfied. Saffari Pizza has truly set the bar high and is hands-down the best pizzeria in the neighborhood. Thank you, Hisham and team, for such an incredible experience!

If you’re looking for a place that serves fantastic halal pizza with exceptional service, this is it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMu-dWa1KS8eTy2Y6F8D9qWcoQakeoBPxHUxLoW&fid=0x0:0x9fef6d06994dcf8b"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"morteza ghasemian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKjG_Plm7yBxh_1WDcOT2ng3yDJS6IgL_BjZfzTKJQQdaqGJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm still drooling thinking about the amazing halal pizzas I had from this store! The pepperoni and chicken pizzas were both unbelievably delicious! The fact that they're 100% halal is a huge plus. If you're in North Vancouver and craving authentic halal pizza, look no further! Strongly recommend this place to anyone, especially those seeking high-quality halal options. The flavors are out of this world","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvL1iqTKL4dcIQVqay7_rQrCM2s8mE5YPW5z03&fid=0x0:0x9fef6d06994dcf8b"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Zach Blank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIaYnCBxE7ygMJQ9SIb87MsC2McxPyI6mwdp3zdF5LD8sA_Qw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in after a long day of adventures. Place was empty at the time which is hard to believe with how great the pizza was. We were in a group and ordered 2XLs. Because we couldn't decide the staff were great offering 1/2 pizza options. Guy working was a beauty, super kind, friendly, went above checking in on us making sure everything was good. Cozy place worth checking out.

Pizza itself is great, crust has a nice crunch to and sesame seeds on it which was good. Toppings were generously put in without overwhelming the pizza itself. Cheese was tasty. All around great pizza no matter the type. We had Pepperoni, BBQ Chicken, Mediterranean and The Special.

Would 100% go back and order from there again, would argue it to be one of the best pizza places I've been to!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stanley Yong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULgQKkOEnQG8aY0fKWxkP3Q3_JS_dLm_ZKrgF8yPEWpttSKcTz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was such yummy pizza, the sesame seed crust and perfectly layered ingredients make these really special","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb642F9gw58Erw5igJ4eT4cVPLOL2e_C2iAIfQ&fid=0x0:0x9fef6d06994dcf8b"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Hassan Mk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUn8XljJKUWtM5hZCcrws3Ntw3dFgRbwi5l6-83UHe5aX-z7xYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at this restaurant and it exceeded all expectations, earning a solid 5 out of 5 rating from me.

From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted with warmth and hospitality. The staff's attentiveness and excellent customer service truly enhanced the dining experience.

I opted for their special pizza, and I must say, it was a culinary delight. The pizza was impeccably prepared, with a perfect balance of flavors, fine seasoning, and just the right amount of cooking time to achieve a crispy crust. Each bite was a savory sensation that left me wanting more.

One of the unique features of this restaurant is its abundance of flowers and plants, which added a charming touch to the ambiance. It truly felt like dining in a botanical oasis, making the experience even more memorable.

In conclusion, this restaurant is a gem that stands out for its exceptional service, delectable cuisine, and inviting atmosphere. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a delightful dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMczWEWclJHFTOdPEhY-FebhXF_liYQCWmfJqdu&fid=0x0:0x9fef6d06994dcf8b"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Mehrnoosh Zamani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFg0QwsMKGTsQgy8RpYdhdkSP9ZR99TzHP0hJIjvT7YmAzSx0x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean and polite staff, and environment.
I liked the pizza. They also bring you a small cute garlic sauce that tastes so good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSE8Ij5cPwqZqdxFsq392RR1oeS6ELHuUgOACi&fid=0x0:0x9fef6d06994dcf8b"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Zainab Udaipurwala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2Qdt43KbOvcDiKYVcu_rlmAWKibytbopxYictiTIngoV3xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big shoutout to Mr. Hashim for an incredible experience! He went out of his way to open the restaurant for us and served the most delicious pizza I’ve had in a long time. The flavors were spot on, and you could tell it was made with care and skill. Amazing hospitality and amazing food—can’t wait to visit again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ryan Broumand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQ8Qe_F9uy5zhbH23gYYByVGJNkf2yERtRuKQ71jjYwmM5sbjY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The owner is very kind and personable, but I have to be honest about the food quality and value.
For the super size $17, you get the same quantity on a platter as you would get for $11-14 and any other Donair shop w same quality or much better.
The quality is not bad, but also not great. Chicken is a bit dry which is not common for donair, and the lamb/beef is not very good in taste.
In addition, their “steak” donair is misleading with the photo of an actual steak vs just sliced processed lamb and beef that are fried to attempt crisp them.

I hope the shop can improve because the owner is a kind Persian man.
Maybe only selling chicken and another kind of meat will keep things fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrnfrMaPSJgb6N3DYsLEFwoFArzKMGd6V3ivqA&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Nasim Yousefi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWtFJYE2BnCXlIXcLOK5rDCE2MeW-Fdmu3YQ2gy8dbEC6F7Ybt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review is for Momo Danair. Love the taste of their chicken donair and the warm hospitality. Thank you for the kind and generous gesture. They served us tea and sweets once we finished dining. We were not excepting. Will be back and take more friends with me 🙂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqloC-gOPMKxxGhdfr07bGba5olTzN22lpYUvb&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Martina Southern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBNFmCp0ZCrYrcxu2UouqAvzWfCz4RtFed2AqJIEX8lUAVkMlq8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this place by fluke, and what a pleasant surprise. The food was delicious, with great taste and generous amounts. The ambiance was clean and welcoming. The prices were good, and the service was friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqvIFPmckWoKPY5W-xT2bp6BgyBn437VRyCidk&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Alireza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFO8S_5bnJ1Gbxa0DrJ-JDnEI06M_5nz8TkqZ51KiwdQjq5mRr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Momo Donair serves some of the most delicious donairs in Vancouver. They offer a wide variety of flavorful and fresh options, and every bite is truly satisfying. On top of that, the staff are incredibly polite and always make sure you have a great experience. Whether you’re in the mood for a quick bite or a filling meal, this place never disappoints. Highly recommended for anyone who loves quality food with excellent service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlvs8YEwdLQYblV7gr6Lp9QyatmHynoL9PAPtI&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"M D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPK9QUUFXT7ydVST5OkxvNJhzpqheNwHS4xUGaB53pG1rfQwVr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The donair special with fries and a coke is great deal! $14.99  The staff are very nice too. My only nitpick is the meat quality could be better. The meat quality used to be a better in the past. I wish this restaurant great success 👍👍.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sarah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsmMzEHH2TCJdi7_9_wE76d-6LiqLzDaVvb1yJz_pEhuCsZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cheapest and most delicious place to get a donair in north van. Super sweet woman behind the counter, very large super sized beef donair for $12. Toppings are fresh,sauces are fire and the price is crazy for the taste. Nice solid wrap job aswell! After trying most if not all shops out here, this is my new go to. 3rd time coming to see consistency, and I'll forsure keep coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw-F6TTr6sKc3EzARRh4EuFplVWEzS8hxyc-qA&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-1-5"},{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly environment
Topnotch hospitality
We tried donair plate and wrap and we love the food
Very juicy meat and fresh vegetable

We ordered tea as well and it was awesome
I highly recommend this place athe host was very amazing guy and very friendly

Also don't forget to order fries","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPix2aKY_3vATgkzk9zYSsHU4-wXeWvn9vO-MYd&fid=0x0:0x87f9f644efed9681"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Tom Barrett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVW2bCXoNmTezTL05YBddu_Ne-c8p8yCWHWAfJpnyX-CsVxw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I highly recommend Momo Donair. The portions are large, and provide good value relative to the prices. The owner and his staff are very friendly and provide a welcoming atmosphere. Great flavour on the Falafel and tons of sauce. The chicken is also good, I recommend both.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chef Menajem Peretz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFHHucZwQOsfB8-8SKRbUjhOVQd_5RL6RbAdEZcnLC3uuqNK4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Being here long time ago, it was nice to visit once’s more this place, easy location and easy parking, a lot of seating and very interesting decor.

The food was great, and the prices just right, with generous portion. Friendly service.

Very down to earth. But worth trying if you are in the area","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPohO6rRRckeUjxY_GoEZtMfDUx6m9DwBUizlc&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Mojgan Mousavi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAicKYLCVK_e974ojpUkK4N5EOcUi_hE5BdHbU2Z7hohPCbzRs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of dining at Gilaneh Restaurant, and it was an unforgettable experience. The warm and inviting atmosphere immediately made me feel at home. The menu offers a wonderful selection of traditional Persian dishes, and every bite was packed with authentic flavors. The kebabs were perfectly grilled, and the rice, fragrant with saffron, was the perfect complement.

The service was exceptional, with the staff attentive and knowledgeable about the dishes. They truly made the evening special. Whether you’re familiar with Persian cuisine or trying it for the first time, Gilaneh is a must-visit. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgW8ypcM9KBj2uaeK0tShTc_CIWDVwESpxfY8O&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Sima","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa1uCjxIK38PRHyykjdDBV_mHSpwBVaybw1VktpZL1KHn9RSqO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Gilaneh Persian Restaurant in Vancouver, and I have to say, it was an outstanding experience! The Persian dishes and kebabs were absolutely delicious, full of authentic flavors that truly satisfied my taste buds. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it a perfect place for a cozy meal. On top of that, the staff were incredibly kind and attentive, adding to the overall wonderful experience. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to enjoy some amazing Persian cuisine. Can't wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0kyGlir5bGTXbYLU6GFZB6f6tjZgTyLF_33bY&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Shiva Radmanesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX50D30SjZBR4QvfRxKL45XQxTtaGKOp6R4BwFd5j_tfXu-Hq4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gilaneh is a charming Persian restaurant with a nostalgic vibe. The décor feels like stepping into a Persian grandmother's house, and every detail brought back memories of Iran. The food was delicious, and the portion sizes were generous—perfect for sharing if you’re not too hungry. While the meal was on the pricier side, the quality and quantity made it worth every penny.

At the start of our meal, we were welcomed with complimentary warm bread and feta, which was absolutely delicious and set the tone for the rest of the dining experience.

We ordered the Bakhtiari kabob (a skewer each of chicken and chenjeh kabob) and the Gilaneh special kabob (a skewer of loghmeh and kabob torsh). Both dishes were amazing, though the Bakhtiari kabob stood out with its tenderness. For sides, we enjoyed doogh and the flavorful zeitoun parvardeh.

The only downside was the service. There was only one waiter, and we often had to wait too long for attention. Despite that, Gilaneh offers a memorable Persian dining experience that’s well worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhn47ioTyfr9DCS_cw62DJVkwEVIuom2dIGhQh&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Farhan Umedaly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2hcsJxhJGlfeNAgoGToEM34YuD8-TXiLheon1Bn02AUIxVvo2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found this place by chance and I am happy I did! A hidden gem on the North Shore. Such kind people and lovely, fresh food. This is now my new favourite place for great priced and delicious home cooked Persian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoBZQnTMTQfQun3KoOxplrs7YlYDJwi2Cbhb36&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Azita sfn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdfl-pfApx1hr_ikgNlWPx0qmh4isPvBd2oYHcHVAUTdevGI4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We were there for dinner;we liked its vibe and decoration.
Nice staff and warm welcoming made our night and reminded us good memories from Gillane in the north of Iran.
We ordered four dishes like especial Gillane, lamb, Dizy and Soltani. The design of our food were awesome. But mine was cold, my favorite kabab is sour Kabab which this one was cold and the grilled tomato was raw and cold as well. The pomegranate and yogurt was too old and watery. Overall we didn’t like the quality of food.
We tried multiple times Gillane in Downtown which is much better than this location.
And also they didn’t serve any liquor or beer. I believe that they are supposed to serve it.
Anyway we had a memorial night because of music and the decoration.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqKV20ZxolPi93fHgUKZ_jsA4T2DL0uy4uJv5q&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"Hamid Boleydei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUofgipij-WeBAmioY74wKuiU9RvGh41oi6L6GieDwog0ENfh15=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gilaneh Restaurant offers a delightful atmosphere, enhanced by the soothing sounds of Iranian music playing in the background. The menu is particularly eye-catching, featuring photos of the dishes, which is especially helpful for non-Iranian clients. The food itself is tasty, with generous portions that ensure a satisfying meal. The combination of authentic ambiance, visually appealing menu, and delicious food makes Gilaneh Restaurant a great choice for anyone looking to enjoy Persian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHlRiMa4H4V-077yyb6LzQtHu_zvCTaZaf2zRe&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Yassi Nikkhah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPTcMqfpb-MH9oRypaPNSdl0myrW3T6EWufEKmjOjJeAqZ8xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their food is amazingly delicious. This location is more convenient than the Downtown location to park our vehicles.
Customer service is very good and caring. The portions are big enough for two person.
I have been here multiple times. Also their breakfast is very well and in a better location (upstairs)
Highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCG6tbe_ptHh7eP3SyXoMhdDfZNffr0625Kya8&fid=0x0:0xf70e6fe5e55458d7"],"When":"2023-12-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pedro Henrique Munhoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHDgrUCRxsDI0QiyVrXSpD7YMiIjCu4Myp-mN5MwWyO4s-k5hcIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best sushi I've ever eaten. The presentation of the dishes is beautiful, the quality and flavor are wonderful. The environment is clean and cozy, the service is also very good. I highly recommend visiting and tasting the dishes at Sushi Town, they are excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJaD9L8p8B3CfVtVoJs160f8arVr6Tw33wDq3u&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Carrie Webb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ_wCGq4XFUvXrcQe8zO0F3ep-PaRAZl_kBsm1h6Q0rrpQUfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is great! The sushi was excellent for the prices we paid. There was plenty of different items to choose from, and our server was great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm-NpIoEe_XlvOQ9kBHdlls72Ki8qDGiwpzdYX&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Nikoo Hanachi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRTzlNHbEx2DreDSWZIc_YhvuJbsnSnS24b-Oh36y8Vlf5Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to really like their sushi but ordered a few rolls last week and didn’t enjoy it at all. Alaska roll was meh and the spicy salmon roll was terrible - salmon roll with lots of siracha on top!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNea68650czk6KFEQF71VFxe0kquiGElZ92jS8n&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Ava Fang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLga1s4NkqaMooM7OcRFxPYnk1HbRHKsSalAR610tB5058kGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered Mango Roll, Awesome Roll, Double Dragon Roll and a Avocado Roll. Everything squeezed together. I would like to pay extra for extra box if u need next time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjQO_q4YXSYHlB7hXT8APhvFYLYMkW4QlkexII&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Arash Khalaj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0GXUSHl_8DCHyw4vHYdyppBcUqglv7HGLybyxYX7Z0_EKZR0BNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was the second time we went to this restaurant with my friends, although I didn't like sushi at all the last time I tried it, but this time it was better.

I ordered fried shrimp with potatoes, but the shrimp was too raw and the potato was too sweet.

As I am used to Iranian food, I cannot understand how a dish can be without salt and very sweet.  Other than my taste, everything was fine except that the temperature inside the restaurant was very cold and I just wanted to eat my food and get out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8nvpwUqnHdaZML-JVXtdnnyiz3VApWgy3VShg&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Shayan Emami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMRtVjgeF0Xa8B9cN17jFb1xX_jsiTrD6AvufKoea_Jc3WiF0j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"As I remember sushi town north Vancouver was one of the first places that I tried spicy salmon sashimi for the first time. Their Alaska roll is also their signature. And vey middle class metro style restaurant, not so clean but very hospitable and fast. Their food quality is also good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGCBzgCxeTf-LlBbP9chdeb_icqkoFwKz87IO0&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Justine H (Sunny)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmvMXm-P_-zaDju2DtLb4mJNuo8OiXNtbw6zPhVOcICWtiAOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sushi town used town used to be our favourite sushi restaurant, especially this location and we have been consistently coming back for years. However, the past couple of times we've come, it's been quite disappointing.

Their sushi rolls have been pretty consistent and the presentation of their food has honestly improved but we noticed their portions for their dishes such as the katsu and teriyaki chicken have greatly decreased in portion size from before. I also found a large fish bone in my tuna I choked on and not even the slightest compensation was attempted to be made! We aren't sure if it's just because we've tried so many other sushi restaurants at this point but their food just isn't as tasty in comparison anymore. It's a lot of little things as well such as the fact they charge for asking for extra sauce for their spicy salmon sashimi while some other places do not.

They still have easy parking, good service, waiters that check up on you often and comfortable spaces for both small and large groups alike but unfortunately that is not enough to convince us to come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr_edgmyVJ46LP1cKC345ht8wHLFKBRCBLCh0L&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Shahab Mansouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfNsKFTuisHdEjpZevCagGP1uYVxkb9Cy86brACCwv2fvrZR8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The cuisine was excellent. The sashimi was delicious and very special. Try the Spicy Tuna and Salmon Sashimi, it's highly recommended. It has a distinct flavour and is served in a sizable serving. Godzilla roll was very tasty as well as the Fantastic roll. Crispy and excellent spring rolls. Hot sake and beers, were up to expectations.

I'm rating the service lower than the food, Not because anyone was unprofessional or rude, but rather because there is a significant gap and potential for improvement when compared to other competitors. They can help you feel more relaxed, check in on you more frequently, and make sure everyone is taken care of and has what they need.
I didn't like receiving the appetisers with my meal either, and I like restaurants that follow the standard order of appetisers followed by the main course, and so on.
I want to emphasise that this is a proposal to enhance the service, keeping in mind that we were likely the last customers and that the personnel may have been worn out from a long day.

The surroundings was another drawback. It was far too dark, and I thought the interior could use some updating for a more contemporary, clean design.

Overall a good experience because of the high food quality.

Pros:

- Excellent food quality.
- Appropriate portion sizes.
- Fair prices.

Cons:

- The quality of the service fell short of that of other similar places.
- interior was too dark and a bit old.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnnIb5pLueZXhlxzDY5y6OP7GClaf0rVAmzNw&fid=0x0:0xe90c924d72795abe"],"When":"2023-7-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"K H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVo2hR2qKHBGSuFyVVc1kqvuNnr23GVLd19IdZCsiU8tz8tbtW-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very spacious and open indoors. Right next to Persia foods. Food is extremely great value for the amount you get, very fair prices. Chicken was moist, beef was delicious. It was a good place for a quick lunch. Only one thing was that service was a little slow, but we could see them working hard.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN98uZbT7nQPxBKV4L9MYd513rbCfJ4_aZMi1fq&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Sadaf Shabanian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfeDm3sYiZ-8L_f5E8KD-zkqC_wweoCrMp0O727sns0f6yH5bX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This was our first time in Chelo after hearing a lot about it. Unfortunately it let us down, the portion is big and affordable but if you care about the quality and dine-in satisfaction I don’t recommend it. It is a big crowded restaurant and on Sunday it took them about one hour to bring us our food. We ordered Soltani, Vaziri, and Lamb kebab. Rice was oily and Soltani was cold. Koobideh had the lowest quality I ever experienced in Vancouver, it actually smelled! Barg and Lamb kebab was stiff. Only the Jooje Kebab was good! Gheymeh Bademjan was okay, but nothing like what we had in Iran, not a rich concentration and taste!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7-DTT2gsBkwIAKJZqRYwpdHWq-u550Rv07itj&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Negar Moghtadaei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRIa5Kn-UGHOLy4LwrYa0lGw0Rwc6-By_aUzLCbfh_MdhvN1s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It has a nice and nostalgic atmosphere, with pleasant vibe. The food was good, though I wouldn’t say it was the best Persian food I’ve had in Vancouver. The staff were polite and kind, but the service was very slow. We waited almost an hour for our food to be ready, which took away from the overall experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7TPFtaOeLfgFOlrymjjRnRxO3Ix297IYEtlZy&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Ronnie Hung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWS2hJQoFh52C_UnrYYQ7pt9yMvsP_s731SB6NGdk11MWiOtI7F5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was super delicious and flavourful. Portions were also very generous for the prices which is amazing. Only downside is the service was a little slow, but overall I would love to come back again to try their other food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWvglXzBDTywuD6hnF11YsB1mxzl3Ruj0wgyd8&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is decent and comes in large sizes. The steak kabob was a little dry but the loghmeh was juicy. Service can be improved as the wait staff aren't very attentive and need to confirm a lot of things with management. Also wait times can be ridiculous depending on how many pickup or delivery orders they have.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLO-gTEhCrE7wmd1XdH4rAWOY7ONFaDpilMdeC&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"Alex MZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFAZ3nTWliK_VtSenzw4uXoch_XcB3H6HxxbxlrUtcPTBIKY4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Persian cuisine lovers, this place has a good variety of Persian dishes, a spacious dining area which allows good distance between tables.
I tried Kobideh with salad, the portions were good and were delicious. There are free parking spots in front of the restaurant which was great and convenient.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBB7OerrRQ0fuIa3bGPPk-qy4yC4C9ycFHttae&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Mariena Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Nw1jeBXne8haJacgZytBHrMEqU2gmOMAF3l5QWK0CwO3rXPJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The first thing I liked about this place was how chic it looked when I first came inside and I was really amazed by how tasty the food was here. I suggest you try anything at this restaurant, because it all taste delicious! One last thing the price here is better than most Persian restaurants","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipON9ksLhpJFjo_Lect_M8gPvsDcMQtHKdLkScPD&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Abdelrahman Khalaf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2jHI4KfqcSaV3xQ_vuzOHPSCzM5tStwL7T9jnOX2wCZGamqfc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Of course quantities are massive in general, however i ordered lamp shank and it was okay.. i felt meet should spiced more.
On a side note: our table wasn’t so clean
Reasonable pricing tho.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBd26eFU_cbLJO1pCJ1dSjepiiv3J6ZxaKuhA4&fid=0x0:0x1cf36ecbcf7a4049"],"When":"2024-11-12"}]

descriptions: No-frills Chinese joint specializing in dumplings, pork buns & soup dishes in an unadorned space.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Irma Beck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwg_2ay10Qs47qiiRJqQsDu6T-xc6ftG1n2yAoTt3ZyW2rhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Oh what a disappointment.  We ordered from Mings for a special family dinner and the food quality was so disappointing.  The Sweet and Sour Pork and Beef and Broccoli had definitely been sitting for a long long time and was horrible.  Never again, please don't waste your money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi27xZNPvqZhryOjxET-MpWLFSLq4geCi_iqvh&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Blaze Geraghty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_--m4mLqSa_yq2zP8T3maP5-HUNUjgIZ9k1PjbapSDyq72TZ5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ming’s Garden in North Vancouver is an absolute treasure and a personal favorite of mine for years, not to mention my grandmother’s all-time top pick! Walking into Ming’s is like stepping into a warm embrace of culinary delight and genuine hospitality. The staff here knows how to make you feel like family from the moment you walk in, greeting you with smiles that are as welcoming as the aromas wafting from the kitchen.

The crispy spring rolls are a crunch-tastic start, setting the stage for a meal that’s nothing short of spectacular. The sizzling hot plates are pure poetry on a plate—succulent, flavorful, and an absolute must-try. Every dish is a vibrant masterpiece, bursting with fresh ingredients and rich flavors that keep you coming back for more.

Ming’s Garden isn’t just about the food; it’s about the experience. Whether you’re there for a bustling weekend dinner or a quiet weekday lunch, the quality and service remain top-notch. This place is quirky, cozy, and delicious—a triple threat that makes it the perfect spot for creating cherished memories. If you’re in North Vancouver, do yourself a favor and drop by Ming’s Garden. You’ll leave with a full belly and a happy heart!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQkXzbcgTiH0l_thrtruRv3nYGS2sjYu8SZI6a&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"C U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzSPBMxEzsF_wRao-B0ehPm0Kpk-alk1Mkg9m47N6NCeIvQISE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Sweet and sour was disgrace to the sweet and sour world ... It was like sour water
Chicken balls were decent with white meat so that's really what was saving this from 1 star.
Honey garlic pork is over cooked dry pork.. bad idea
Chicken chowmein is ok once you add soy sauce.
I won't ever be ordering from here again. Save your $$$","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdyGj354uzO_1rdQKwKYUPenaAO4ph_9A4Xuhp&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Melisa Cecilia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsOywiiZ3W02HXLLCk9cIHylVJNujFJOz6-eB_DU63tYHWSz6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The wonton soup here is definitely their specialty, its so good and I’ll probably crave for it often. House special fried rice is really good also. Will come back to try other stuffs and more wonton soup.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIzVzPBluRtVidZzds6GKmprzV0UO-_5tnPT4S&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ming's Garden is just across from Capilano Mall on Marine Dr. in North Vancouver. We'd ordered some takeout food from here once before, and it was quite good back then. As we hadn't ordered from here in awhile, we decided to give it a try, just to have a bit of a change from any of our usual "go to" Chinese restaurants on the North Shore.

Scallops with Snow Peas
Deep Fried Fish Cod Fillet with Sweet & Sour Sauce
Seafood Chow Mein (crispy)
Shrimp Foo Young

Unfortunately the food was not as good this time as it had been the last time we ordered from here. The main issue we found with the food this time was that much of it was too salty. Flavors and textures were fine, but the excess salt made it difficult to enjoy the food. Might be awhile before we try coming back here again.

Service: Good
Parking: Parking at rear, according to their website (I got dropped off and went through the front to pick up our food, so I never actually saw the rear of the restaurant!)
Location: 965 Marine Dr., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxow5rZmK9jB6232g5k1rmDqc9fNcX0CmtJQOA&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"aleksandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5hPxtHoRveqaKMGdV3iow-ktsMn5ivmwMApx0FiKVCv9S8isZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently moved from Toronto (which has a really big China Town) to Vancouver and have been looking for my new fav Chinese restaurant. I found it with Ming s Garden! Please do not believe any of the bad reviews! THIS PLACE IS AMAZING! BEST CHINESE FOOD I EVER HAD!! I got food from here 3x already last week and it was all absolutely devine with amazing prices and huge portion size. I will be eating here at least once I week from now on","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvl7-8QGRtO04bTALCx0exB_piqG0KIrBqepM_&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2022-2-14"},{"Name":"Swati Nayak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7UqVooYMMF2Xo_3P_FWihXeFsCKRO0QNxL04r9P7NsptAjaEh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place is a ripoff. The food you get is no where close to what the photo or recipe suggests. We ordered spicy chicken ( photo suggested chicken with red chillies) and Mongolian beef. This is what we got ( check photos ) - broccoli, mushroom and bell peppers in “spicy chicken”. Onions in Mongolian beef. Just avoid this place. They save cost by adding veggies and not serving what you order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjJLF_PJwyjxx0rEAERttjmTYBycOIOzvABoaj&fid=0x0:0x7cccd3e5bbc910bc"],"When":"2023-7-2"},{"Name":"Attack Hamster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf5BXJTMQEzkSkG-jZSwZ94LHqi4FoNsCvcv_gzRCbj2V0cqkv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My daughter ordered from this restaurant after discovering that Ginger & Soy in West Van had permanently closed.  We had four dishes delivered and all were disgusting.  Think of the lowest quality food court Chinese you've ever had and this being worse!!!  The compost bin had a hefty serving!  Total waste of money.  Never again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Pine sushi square
address: 935 Marine Dr #18, North Vancouver, BC V7P 1S2

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Yin Lu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlvbLFuHd8ZfQs6dUN7l52AFDkSQc-3XCe2iTgXsxJz9Os29xq7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family goes to Pine sushi every Saturday and it’s become a tradition for us to go there because the kids love the food and so do the grown-ups. The quality of the meats veggies and fruits  is very high through and through. The owners are also very kind of people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV5SiM47HD3swQ4B_NW6VXhwdarcs0DGWKEjZ9&fid=0x0:0x8dccc909df5b6a54"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Kevin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFCoWVo53-mnWxxeORSVTqoC8g1Jrt0LwUOt_XvfY7OdvnHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top quality food made by the most amazing team of people! Always love visiting Pine Sushi. The owners are dedicated to treating their customers with the best service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX2r0dirMzkqI0G7H8bq-1ugdpZUMJmqZLe6Pm&fid=0x0:0x8dccc909df5b6a54"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Kyle Heroy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHi7_TGt1TJlmn66QF7BIvLykDoXInyoGtoprTA6pN8I5ExmTm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is quite a hidden gem. I won't lie - I was not thrilled about going out for sushi in a mall. It... just doesn't feel right. But location and lack of atmosphere (you dine in a shared mall cafeteria) aside, this may very well have been one of the most delicious sushi spots I've encountered. Not to mention, not a long wait at all. We were 3rd in line and maybe waited 8 minutes max. The food looked exactly like the pictures and was even more fresh and amazing than I was expecting- again, judging off location in a mall lol. But there is magic in each bite and I was very happy with the outcome of it all. This experience will make trying other sushi spots in Vancouver very difficult knowing what this place can offer.
We got Black Dragon, Mango Paradise, and Salmon Oshi rolls.
I will warn, the mango paradise, which was pictured, did come out as more of a salad, but I still really enjoyed it and the dressing they used was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAOf-htygvZNx-bChnRNfuhRDfbIBbRW5hqlw0&fid=0x0:0x8dccc909df5b6a54"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Philip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGUq9ypAOu0w07TxOy_GCbqMqBoDm-D85TpF7Xuz_DAKbHhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food, great sushi chef, solid portions and great prices.

Had lunch here today and ordered a few items:

Agedashi tofu, Lion dance roll, mountain roll, Pacific donburi.

Each was well done and delicious, but especially the Pacific donburi. It was their take on a chirashi don and had salmon, tuna, scallop, Kani, and tamago, on a bowl with some tempura pieces, roe, salad, and sushi rice. Try it!

Their party trays are amazing value too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKW-5iREkGhxZQu2b_RadxCbUFO_Oxh1328brG&fid=0x0:0x8dccc909df5b6a54"],"When":"2022-2-28"},{"Name":"Young Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLR2prgvWw-uTDQeIQ8GjVHpKlUkYbJ0M51PI8TS7C1IMiovg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just tried their summer edition rolls and it was so delicious. Definitely coming back here again to try out their other promotional items. They always have different kinds of promo every time I come here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPuzwswIp0Mjy_hYrQUwRk76safy_yct2uruGV&fid=0x0:0x8dccc909df5b6a54"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Chris Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMHRuwVCB-3di7mQc5y5uuZfykdcZflW_iZPavk5YUdMAGHJ4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very fresh and tasty! Rolls were delicious and portions were great. Staff was very friendly and overall was a great experience would highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOE9fPGGrA6r4WPFUKGbVWyshsviqP21u-R1NdB&fid=0x0:0x8dccc909df5b6a54"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Tiff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5MlgTrZmTKlEA3uxjzbGr6AGdQ2xcGfVyJBNb2BpV55-VFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place really hit the spot! If you’re looking for fresh rolls, this place will guarantee that. I enjoyed the party tray with a couple of friends and this meal made our night!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKl1-L_1J6gRTKJFsetU5ZjRrJvT4i5ruwyDS_&fid=0x0:0x8dccc909df5b6a54"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Katrin Chupakhina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXL3Lv8DwHec2HcVTNxxsBsnWxE_ON5b4L4EqxWaqkgju48bSu-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best sushi! And I mean it. I’ve tried sushi all over North Van and Greater Vancouver. I tried seafood and sushi in London, Belarus, other countries and places. And the only ones I REALLY like and crave are always Pine Sushi. They are always so fresh, appetizing and just tasty! Yumm. Definitely come here and try them or order some online. It’s absolutely worth it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyUu8ymAl68oTUU1GKK4jd8NY87lKahI89aJC7&fid=0x0:0x8dccc909df5b6a54"],"When":"2024-5-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alireza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFO8S_5bnJ1Gbxa0DrJ-JDnEI06M_5nz8TkqZ51KiwdQjq5mRr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jade Garden offers an amazing dining experience! The service is quick and friendly, and the food is simply delicious. From the savory dishes to the fresh ingredients, every meal is on point. The vibe is relaxed and welcoming, and the restaurant’s location makes parking hassle-free, which is a big plus. Whether you’re dining in or taking out, the quality and taste never disappoint. Highly recommend this spot for anyone craving authentic Chinese cuisine with great service and a convenient location","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVP_xmYcE4ktxzOCm2zvwxIv9K2dJL2SVHzCYW&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Melanie Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEaB9CrD0QVaTK814gXZSgMBMdAj9ggEJx_qxq85NkH0kHvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Moved to West Vancouver recently and was craving Chinese food and came upon Jade Garden Kitchen on Marine Drive in North Vancouver. The restaurant was a gem. It had a relaxed and casual vibe, and the staff were friendly and attentive.

Pictured here is the spicy garlic wontons, pork siu mai dumplings and shredded beef with black pepper on fried noodles. Very tasty and everything was delicious. Cravings satisfied and we cant wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUhTGE_X8BYf8VOmQ8jywIgivBjFl2wZ90qu8d&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Steven Olmstead","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtGPLsUg7ybhRCsA9-VeVYuyaFqArSeyzqddnDm9gdPpsZ3M0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good spot for lunch.  Service is friendly and prompt, room is functional.  Food is good and plentiful, reasonably priced.  Really enjoyed the eggplant with minced pork.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1qAT6cjlX4sTFPlsflSPxz1h5aDBkfJOFB46g&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Cell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUumVkWk9OSHdDq0vh5aJLKHd-YSC3EbOYPhqvZIyIqMUu8ha15=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food, service, and atmosphere were all rather mid. Taste was bland and service was lukewarm. Not bad per say but certainly would not spend this much to eat here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTI_jrAaQb5G6VicGBe829TdC92VzjKG7xQc9s&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Beth B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5rErAWzMfBvFD65OVhkvID7GdQ5VVYqO30JSBaqAlfl0O2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty dinner at the Jade Garden - sweet and sour chicken and beef with broccoli. House Special Fried Rice needed a bit more moisture, but good once you added the other toppings. Reminded me of my favourite Chinese restaurant back home 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2PwaX3xwAqdLofeQW0T5N0eGTbzzqrhy6IHsd&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-5-24"},{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great experience at Jade Garden

Excellent food quality
Excellent customer service
Clean and tidy restaurant
I invited my family for lunch, and we were all happy with the dishes we ordered","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPY17FhhLqgEdkTiBJqYcNAj2eRrwO0HFE-O9D&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We used to order from Jade Garden quite often in the past. It had been quite awhile though since the last time we ordered from them, and even longer still since we'd actually dined inside the restaurant itself. Featured here:

Minced Beef & Parsley Soup
Peking Duck (2 courses)
Peking Pork Chop
Filet of Sole with Seasonal Vegetables
Prawn with Scrambled Egg Fried Flat Noodles
Pan Fried Salted Radish Minced Meat/ Egg

We were celebrating a birthday in the family and birthday boy was happy with his meal!

Service: Good
Parking: Free
Location: 1195 Marine Dr., North Vancouver","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdAy_MukdB0RDLPa3pPtMqJCDdbXg88JXXGVrL&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2023-10-10"},{"Name":"Peter Cross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHmBXMXmX9-43PxxMc-vQWx8OaX3r8ByLsfhp1pyyCEQpdxmTkCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great spot for dinner.  My wife and I stopped in for dinner on a whim.  We are glad we did.  Service was great and so was the food.  They have been at it for 10 years!  Wowza!  Cant believe I hadn’t been sooner.  Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4mNs91VAA8EjfGXQDUT0sSVTjr3grBEbcHSHo&fid=0x0:0x79d21849e0c84e9"],"When":"2024-1-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chelsey Bryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCniOTWW78byAhKkreQFsL_TI_kZgJSYghHMG4YL1hnNjicg6CDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Fish Counter is a must-try, offering amazing fresh, tender fish prepared with a perfect balance of traditional flavors and creative techniques.

We had the halibut fish and chips and the halibut was very buttery. The clam chowder was broth based and very flavorful. The crispy oyster was a perfect side addition to our meal.

The chef is very knowledgeable, kind, & personable
. He took the time to answer all of our questions about the types of local fishes along with providing some insight on how he prepares such delicious meals.

The atmosphere is inviting, with a focus on sustainability, making the experience both delicious and meaningful.

If I ever visit Vancouver again in the future, I will be making a stop to the Fish Counter again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfM54xS08rwFUN6B2BrbrnKoWJCOjoQEaE6E7q&fid=0x0:0x4125cae1e36db520"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Paris Sol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVo_cYGp2aG6vQ-wk0WRyzZ3_MAPgDiRRJmtw9In6KEQUnVnnT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful dinner at The Fish Counter in Edgemont. It’s a lovely family-owned restaurant that truly delivers on quality and taste. We ordered the classic fish and chips with cod, along with a shrimp and crab baguette sandwich, and both were absolutely delicious! It’s a great place to support a local family business and enjoy a fantastic meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO85-GzXu06FVI7loKbnB-Bc_sJaHIsdT6XLOg_&fid=0x0:0x4125cae1e36db520"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"HCS Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUsZNlh-z_hRWGZ5_xGZ7jum6_uUQVIV-m5M0kD-rovShQYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great seafoods! My Bouillabaisse was quite good with lots of tomato. Fish and chips were yummy, though the chips were a bit dry from deep fry.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKEpyFk_2J87-u5gNDY_JORjkdEPagR4N2pEQn&fid=0x0:0x4125cae1e36db520"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Jennifer Samson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtT5IdkZygAmaYY9R_dT61SBdrPtZz1UUfdXjAs9dVfNFKc01O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent fish and chips! I had the cod and the breading was nice and thin and crisp, the fries were great and they have a great pop selection and white and malt vinegar available. They have gluten free available, as there is a dedicated fryer as well as batter. I'm looking forward to trying more things on the menu.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaki Guterres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNJLOpKUtPJUuSNdpAnSjNYOG4fHAcnIDAoYx9E52ixju3KPFU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome! The food is delish. I'm not a huge fan of fried foods but my son really enjoyed the halibut and chips and I highly recommend the salmon wrap (the sauce is to die for).  Our server Alisiya was really great, very friendly and made good recommendations.

If capacity allows, a long picnic style communal table through the middle of the restaurant would be really cool. Edgemont is a fun, family friendly community and I think this type of seating would work well here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Muskanpreet Kaur Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYgNiBxzcrthjTbBUwQsevRDd8sz3KDQ_fn6jpxsLUrnHARw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just love their french fries!!! I am totally addicted, and the staff is super friendly especially the owner , he is such a gentlemen, i was bit in rush and he offered to deliver the food to my workplace , that was such a sweet gesture by him. This place is definitely worth a visit!! One should must give it a try.
Don’t miss their french fries:)
Will come back for sure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Philosophically Speaking","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRpGWk0caN-l_vXxWP_nPCdjKQ-pNx3Way_SK8SvePQYuWB5tU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m English, and grew up eating fish and chips. I took my parents (who are in the mid 90’s) in search of a more authentic experience than C Lovers offers. I am happy to report that at the new Edgemont location, everything was as it should be (sans the newspaper wrapping) and my parents, expecting disappointment, loved it! Unlike the competition, the batter, which, like it or not is crucial to fish and chips, was flavorful and crisp through and through, while the fish inside was soft and tender. As importantly, the halibut actually tasted like halibut, and the cod like cod; where normally the fish at its competitors is usually overcooked to disadvantage of both taste and texture; likely in service of cooking a less porous batter mixture that resists quick and easy crisping.
The fish portions were generous (a single piece was sufficient where often it is not), and the chips were authentically crisp and lightly oiled to a deep-fried delight. I can’t say how healthy any of it is, but as I mentioned, by parents have made it to there 90’s without challenges to there health, and are still enjoying this simple and delicious treat. On occasion of wanting something “healthy”, we’ve chosen to forego “fish and chips” rather than suffer a tepid experience of something that should ‘be’…FISH AND CHIPS!  For completely selfish reasons, I want ‘you ‘ to support this business so that my parents can continue to enjoy the convenience, quality and service it affords them in the North Shore Highlands.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Catriona E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0YhRFf8BLvwK-Eg95lTjj_wuHgDBcHa3HJTMFMDjGftfW2N4cjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited here for cod and chips.  It was busy and we waited a bit but it was worth the wait! Orders are freshly made. The staff were friendly and attentive to us even though we were just getting takeout. Both the fish and the chips were nicely cooked and we will certainly go back. @thefishcountervancouver thank you for choosing Edgemont for your new location ❤️","Images":null,"When":""}]
