user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Philip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGUq9ypAOu0w07TxOy_GCbqMqBoDm-D85TpF7Xuz_DAKbHhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It's white spot. Atmosphere is family friendly, casual. The salad I got was kind of sad because the chicken was dry and there was very little of it which I guess is a good thing.

Our server was pretty slow to take our order or fill out waters.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeRKTFJmOCWBFkiOkc2zvH0kukM46ThFGR9_2Y&fid=0x0:0xd55456e5a15d9994"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Ade Can","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiDadiHgRN1ij7Uaxctfge7DSy8pIiNJKbW7CXrDD8Cib2rlY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"FOOD:
Good for kids. I usually expect more on dining experiences but this is quite okay.
PRICE:
Well priced for what you are being served.
STAFF:
Friendly and accomodating. They always keep checking on how the food is.
LOCATION:
Located on a compound with lots of parking space. Accessible by public transport as well. Have a patio during summer days.
RECOMMENDATION:
Good place for a small celebration. They have a bar if you are into drinking.
You can always request for family friendly side so your kids can do their thing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOefpv-GZ2V6PLRYaMuM0Fa88h3JTprpMTISSu5&fid=0x0:0xd55456e5a15d9994"],"When":"2023-5-25"},{"Name":"Nicole P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_hMBqVmPn-ivShuVmEj9Fd6wPI7TJMIizPn7HJ9DiKb9e4ew8dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I met friends here for brunch and it was reasonable. There wasn't  a huge selection for the brunch menu but we all found something. Crispy smashed potatoes were tasty and the portion sizes were good. My friend was able to order a burger that wasn't on the menu for brunch, they were happy to accommodate. We'll be back to this restaurant again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPX3ftMFGa4G1DJl0FJ0Lvt12ZpjVmIsn3qyAnA&fid=0x0:0xd55456e5a15d9994"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food , I highly recommend this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0WsEUhsHSzK8J1i--VMJHZc5RAIWPARlJVoIs&fid=0x0:0xd55456e5a15d9994"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"stacy king","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfuM41L1saejmTnykhG7GfgvCWww00HyrtP-YN8-l5uENP4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"So sad,  what happened????   Popped by to pickup dinner on my way to class.  Been sick so haven’t eatten in a couple days.  Ordered old standby to go as I had a craving and only so much time.
Club on sourdough and zoo sticks.
Did they change the recipe?, are meals different recipe’s at each store? .    Club sadly was super dry with only little mayo and zoo sticks were dead with what looked like was a previously used tartar sauce.  Tartar Sauce…..
Ewwwwww.   So sad
Staff that took my order were great and super quick   But $29 with tip to get home and be totally let down…. not worth it. 😞","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_tT85lO7aZKFfq17wWpo8ldgI_n0GJFJfBhG1nWiEa2zXCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered prawns for happy hour and it was a bit undercooked, but our waitress took it back and gave us a newly cooked plate free of charge. The portions were generous and food was freshly cooked. Ample parking surrounding the restaurant. Highly recommend this location!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHRFBNbNfzSNyfkUU1aLo3_Ipr5o2cfk-pBka1&fid=0x0:0xd55456e5a15d9994"],"When":"2024-2-5"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Well we have been loyal White Spot breakfast supporters for 2 decades and finally today brings a close to that. We will never put a foot in another White Spot. It’s been a few years since Covid their service has got worse and worse and their quality poorer and poorer and the value totally declined. Their prices are absolutely outrageous for what you get and I’m glad to close this chapter having given a few locations the option to keep us as customers but just too many disappointments and today was the final chance. We arrived and seated by an ok guy but then the server Sergot came over and the morning went downhill fast. Asked host guy who I later discovered was the GM, to move us or get another server and he said he would but nothing happened. Then poor service continued and finally food arrived was appalling and totally inconsistent. We kindly chose to leave and avoid further frustration at a important family event. Too bad. Good luck White Spot.

Oh and on a funny point check out the door blocked in by seating. 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVlBZDaDKBdjfuxln4QOx_lCINLuL16hCFq3oG&fid=0x0:0xd55456e5a15d9994"],"When":"2023-6-10"},{"Name":"Karen Ashcroft","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOCMzrTEO-OdpEhLtNZWge2eQ0j9FmUbiNfT-8yyUjm011-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place for breakfast. Our smashed potatoes were more like roasted potatoes not smashed at all. Good otherwise.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTBPaKiA44s5nJokUYcuCnLcgX2UGMfss9Y3E2&fid=0x0:0xd55456e5a15d9994"],"When":"2024-6-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ali Haji Esmaeili","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAgsHxVY79VZXVaJdYAohrfhlcjTElHZox2tnu98VHGMwYFeCU9g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Haida in Vancouver and was absolutely blown away by the quality and taste of their sandwiches! As someone who has also experienced dining at their main branch in Iran, I can honestly say that the Vancouver location not only meets but exceeds expectations. The cold cuts were flavorful, while the hot sandwiches were a delightful journey for the taste buds—perfectly toasted, generously filled, and seasoned to perfection. Every bite was a testament to their commitment to quality and authenticity. It’s rare to find a place that serves food as soul-satisfying as this outside of Iran. If you’re in the area and craving an exceptional sandwich, Haida is a must-visit. Their food truly raises the bar for what good sandwiches are all about!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN_XuELKYIe-nib7TcaZOf5A3R8wolz942f5qD1&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Alireza Adibfar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWw0e0TPYH6ZGJ-h-9tpBv6EKeu0oq4WXMG5sJYunWQBSV6pZ-S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We visited from Florida and have to say this place is FANTASTIC! Tastes just like Haida back in Iran and even better. Quality of food and customer care are outstanding here.
Update: we came back for dinner as well and got pizza. The pizza is so delicious here, and you enjoy every bite of it. Tastes just like Iran. The management and staff are so friendly and adorable. They respect their customers so much and this was the most important thing for me that brought me back here. Wonderful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeECs25U7BPpqgULWl-BGrEx5tlYQ91MtCd_zt&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-7-5"},{"Name":"Alireza ghorbani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqLSY7yG-lKZWOCqXutzUS9yhyMZANM6kiDT1WNo6YC1E6lY5_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Haida and had an extremely disappointing experience. I tried two different types of pizza, and both were completely tasteless. The crust was bland, the toppings were sparse and lacked any flavor, and overall, it was a huge letdown. To make matters worse, the pizzas were outrageously overpriced. For the quality (or lack thereof), it was definitely not worth a dime. I would not recommend this place to anyone looking for a decent meal. Save your money and go elsewhere. Always read reviews.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ5WL41_iGYHer8LQtxjgDeTamb1HiLBTpT-PS&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Paris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0WPazoJBCdtRqTbBzCZwEk_hqahECBnbuv3HHVvW2_zNHbRKn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is truly one of my favorite spots! Every bite takes me back to Iran, from the mouthwatering sandwiches to the delicious pizzas. Everything here is superbly awesome. Plus, the prices are fair, making it even better. However, the only hiccup we encounter is parking availability. Despite this, the warm atmosphere and friendly staff always make our visits worthwhile. I highly recommend trying their Haida Royal sandwich; it's absolutely divine! One suggestion for improvement would be to consider rearranging the decor to optimize space for more customers; it could enhance the overall dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD9puRyMMR5SlF93EDf2erVcdsJAKWG_2CrRzP&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Paniz Tah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDSN0dDBYAGyl6xv4D0u3t_p22-wo9BqURgVUBvYvxZOTCtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Haida used to be so much better. The sandwiches were so big and filling and now you can easily tell the portion of meat is 1/3 and more chips. Sadly, we won’t be coming back anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh8FwlHgdZeb_Q8p5u0WonkmWkZUT7dU8AaQx9&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Zeeshan Sohail","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQzSgXcEIo5d0fY039IL3LLi7k1i-9eyjB9u0xnur9BQekUdtD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Double the meat in the sandwiches and pizza for that perfect meat to bread ratio. Decent sandwiches and all but that roast beef and mushroom pizza is one of the best pizzas in BC. Have limited seating, but still highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKFRjqWOPdE3FC2bxykPwmc9tG5sOT-JwRGoY-&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2024-2-17"},{"Name":"Shaghayegh seyedmohammad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_B0ehruFZbiddMnrUrt2yH8yL99Se1mfwshAzSCSHQDVEcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Haida and had an amazing experience! The food was absolutely delicious, with rich flavors and generous portions. The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, and I especially loved the touch of Iranian music they played—it really added to the overall experience. The staff was incredibly kind and served us in a very polite and professional manner. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for great food and a cozy dining experience. I’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Salar Sedigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5RjmND3ICPzng4b8UVVP7Tgc7nraBVl7BtV2Cc0vk7sIBFVDs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haida Sandwich in Lonsdale North Vancouver is a true culinary treasure that not only offers a unique sandwich experience for Iranians but also delights taste buds across cultures. During my first visit, I was thrilled to find the nostalgic sandwiches I had been longing for. They were nothing short of awesome, amazing, and exactly what we crave. The staff was incredibly friendly, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The dining area provided a comfortable space to enjoy the delicious sandwiches. To add to the nostalgia, Haida Sandwich offers nostalgic pops like Istak (Flavored Non-Alcoholic Beer), which enhanced the experience even further.

What's truly remarkable is that our non-Iranian friends thoroughly enjoyed their visit too. The Kielbasa (Deli) they savored was bursting with taste, and the bread was wonderfully fresh. This is a testament to the quality and craftsmanship that Haida Sandwich puts into every aspect of their menu.

If you're seeking a taste of nostalgia, paired with exceptional flavors and friendly service, Haida Sandwich is the place to be. From the delightful sandwiches to the inviting atmosphere, it's an experience that will leave you satisfied and longing for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEjG7RxIh78x4Az4nfkkoLRKD-8k6zfrZicl8j&fid=0x0:0x20d2fd7c4f62c85d"],"When":"2023-7-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ash S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL2CN5xxAMsX06vKwd5ojsEM_6x2BAAstbpJEk7IvtIe1L_kQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Seafood Chowder was the best I’ve ever had. 😍Very generous serving of seafood and overall so flavourful. English Style Fish & Chips was tasty as well. Delicious fries, tartar and coleslaw. It would be nice if the restaurant was accessible without paid admission to the park…I would definitely go back. Mmmmmm 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ4hEuM0knADUS3v7fjPrIhpiW6wsL7sAXVZ6O&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Lanie Zulueta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIjacOZZNFIlv1T1yr25Te9nNNi1G78MhV6gOT7cCRO1Lr8sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s my second time here and as always, the Seafood Chowder was amazing! The fish and chips batter was crispy and light. The Burger was superb! Great food, friendly staff and relaxing patio ambiance.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz0NqDmfWq-rY01zVE67LEsLWZBtTpzbWseR7x&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Rebecca Martz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHlHjB9Es28asHvg2NDOaeYB0hyyEsLiAxs7wohxLy1feQ0Vw52g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We loved our dinner here. I had the salmon plate, which was Gluten free. It was cooked to perfection and the potatoes with the mustard sauce were absolutely divine. My husband had the Canadian AAA steak; mouthwatering!!

It was perfect for us that it was in the Bridge park, while it may have been more pricey for that reason, it was beyond convenient!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm9v1kiYoE0_ikJfu5n7RVdEzbLQuQbhrTbTuH&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Nikko Tuason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQFNwE4KoIZ8EJjhYiIzj_PpnavVx_BiZORY4m_VR-gqh2pk5NWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Surprisingly delicious with great customer service. The fish and chips were full of flavour; the batter wasn't too oily, the fish was cooked perfectly, and the fries were nice and crispy. The seafood chowder was the best I've ever had. I just wish I could access the restaurant without needing to purchase a ticket for the Capilano Suspension Bridge. I'd be eating that Chowder every day.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVLYztmN-0AxTsufrujRrtH4PnkPyzx4XOkKhL&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Tatiana Bonilla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLUwM34qC4BI_LVSi6iR4lSso-WMuPKo-IQVbuK4j_VQC3q1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unforgettable experience and we’re grateful to find such a wonderful place in the middle of nature, the food was amazing, Beatriz made our experience even more enjoyable, she recommended the grilled steak, butter chicken and salmon.

¡All the staff was very friendly and professional!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHk07b66TeqNWOFR9XTDkqCEXgBSOltv8RWPkY&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Z M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR0hJ0y17JSQKYTIdhQEDWxPpRAy5q2nVVkZ3U0rwHirKPOlHG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an incredible experience at the Cliff House Restaurant that included outstanding food, a beautiful atmosphere in the middle of a rainforest on an outdoor patio, and excellent service! The restaurant Manager, Shiva,  took great care of us with my life-threatening peanut allergy. The seafood chowder was outstanding! The brussel sprouts we're also excellent! Highly recommend this restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgs0Jk5OF17UBUID3rssR-CUvL7lWyCXzxtKmJ&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKArlY8pQgqcMTuj_CA5u8zpw7V9PuTzGmfPA5qHRKyLw2Kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic environment and we are lucky to meet great staff! They are friendly and professional! One waiter was proactive to take a family photo for us, which we really appreciated! The dishes are quite decent and good prices. Really appreciate for the service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7h1qkxo15PZYtLkludjPVORrSkz6rUJ4C8YUL&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Rick Lupert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyPQMGkOC5sKzpn9MkynA5sY_AGYWHZ7a7LvZ1o-htQ--t8IEycw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Cliff House was exactly what we needed for a light lunch after exploring Capilano Suspension Bridge Park. It's nicer than the other dining options in the park and has several options perfect for vegetarians.

We were seated almost immediately upon arrival in the inside dining room. (Outside seating next to the park is available too. Service was fast and friendly.

My wife and I shared the Quinoa Salad with the salmon on the side (She eats fish and I'm a vegetarian.) For what it was, it was fresh and plentiful. I'd say for a salad that had "quinoa" as the first word in the name, there wasn't a whole lot of quinoa in it...it was more of a light addition to the main greens and arugula base. I would have liked the quinoa to have a more more significant presence. Despite that it tasted good and my wife enjoyed the salmon.

There are a few other vegetarian options on the menu including a Blistered Brussels Sprouts salad, an option to have their "Butter Chicken" dish with paneer instead of chicken, a house made black bean and corn patty for their burger, and a rice bowl. All are helpfully labeled on the menu (plus gluten free options) so you know right away if you have one of those diets that you are not a second class citizen.

If you're looking for a nicer, sit-down dining experience while visiting Capilano Suspension Bridge, you won't go wrong here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGA9kGEnliRhE1n3SMbGpMRNQDBSnVFc6n2pmA&fid=0x0:0xc8b36ac822f1632a"],"When":"2024-7-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ashley Fung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAfrS3PkBX4pNgSTeuND8Q1FNb7TVE1ddhySvwFG65dQgyCA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had New York Steak Dinner. Perfect 10oz. If you go to other restaurants, it’s unlikely to get this portion at this price. Very reasonable price. Appreciate it. 10oz steak with mashed potato and sautéed vegetables definitely make a full stomach. Very satisfied.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeYnEuq_ug-Sz6-uklnhIuTKn-bJzevY_fDvnb&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Bradley Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSjOdt_NCThfrgQQSPCAI9c1m2q4Cia70lWTZMyAGLNwKu8R3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to come here as a little kid, more than 45 years ago, and stepping inside now feels like flipping through an old photo album. The room? Just the same as I remember it, frozen in time. The Reuben? Toasty, warm, and exactly the kind of comfort food you crave when you want to relive the good old days. On those rainy days, the Tomahawk’s your cozy refuge. Slip into a booth or pull up a bar stool, and let the simple, hearty cooking take you back to simpler times.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnjiwooRhoX1_KSB_YD2QmChq15EgU5xSx7Tq-&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Daniel Hartwick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGbMgned5NZXuB7Pp9t-LEbvQhn64_MkABaDDfp5UM293vUa1K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow ! I almost met my match as a ' clean your plate ' generation dude, baby boomer ! I had the mixed platter. And ok, when you see a pic of what you order, it normally looks bigger than what you get BUT this breakfast was HUGE, GIGANTIC...but, I'm still undefeated, finished it. Food quality EXCELLENT,  Environment inside great, service very very good. Son, had the steak breakfast combo, Wow!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq_4T7x7yI54B_hemBOmQBAh7GaEaIZUGfuCBZ&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"John Pavich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHek5v_fSX8duNwx8Lk4q5we1_sn_ea56cGbxqkYRBa9BZuAW0LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant has been operating by the same family for 98 years, quite something. The place is decorated with native carvings etc on the walls and ceiling.
They even have a free cardboard headband which looks like a native Indian headress. When I was a kid they were made of real feathers really cool. We would play with them for weeks until they fell apart.
Now about the food everyone gets a large bottle on their table with  mint leaves after you are seated. Their yukon breakfast features many slices of back bacon and delicious cube potatoes and free run eggs.
My favourite dish is the Salisbury steak with creamy mashed potatoes with tasty gravy and eldente mixed vegetables, my mouth waters everytime I think of this organic Salisbury  steak.
It's the best Salisbury steak I have ever tasted and I've tried many but this is the best!!!
Their burgers are also very good!!
All the food is very tasty as well as their desserts, lemon meringue pie, etc","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNiXl18dRk3z-e0exR3u0mWNKR-znwsF78HIve&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Classic setting and menu. Had a good breakfast here. Nice touch with mint in the water! And of course the decor is steeped in nostalgia and history.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpfoKqEWjDjUjAEaNg6JMrm-I7VKdV9UrEK7gR&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Mahshad Refahatnia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0MWQXxK5H2ziADPybrpxrMcK2Wslz2Div7r7YjJ_M8wxhH16N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect experience! I ordered Hot-Outta-The-Pan from breakfast menu and that was amazing. Delicious food🤤 perfect service, and very nice staff😍. I enjoyed everything. It has always been my choice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwbUlUqydNTzXfnADpcjXyE6FZxgDYHveCj40a&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Michael Tillman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIqH_3syZwokgngl1kBc3IT8skyBdxdvC20Biu1xB7LDCpAINrmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful old building with wood trusses supporting the ceiling. It was a Jahovah Witness lodge before becoming a restaurant.  They serve breakfast all day, and their omelets were terrific. The staff was very friendly. Bathrooms were clean, as was the restaurant. It is a very popular spot. The outside only shows the street number, 1540 aside from the two totem poles. We drove past it. It is like a museum with hundreds of native West Coast indigenous objects hanging from the support beams and along the bar. The two paddles in the picture, on the top, are over 80 years old.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHUQTXQO8gbgitEJbbJUlt-wq4PFNJY4DFAzZu&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Melanie E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUR0bJcxqNkJt-i1wxCH3EaQXevncA86panZszfT__NAs_0KWRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hadn't been here in at least 7 years. What an improvement! Better and tastier food. We dined in for lunch & shared the Organic Turkey Clubhouse and organic Simon Baker burger with fries.

Food: 5/5 - fantastic prices considering you're getting organic beef and turkey. They even offer a couple of lunch specials ranging from $15 to $20. They also offer dinner specials at $35 on Fridays, Saturdays, & Sundays. If you like burgers, this is a must order. Food came out hot and was fresh. Good selection of breakfast and lunch items.

Service: 5/5 - friendly server who came to our table a few times asking if we needed anything

Atmosphere: 5/5 - great ambiance. You feel like you're in a museum of beautiful Indigenous art & baskets. Nice vibe to the place. Lots of history here.

Parking: 5/5 - parking in front of the building or on the street

We'll be back for the dinner! Note: they are closed on Mondays. Hours on Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays: 9 am to 8 pm and Tues and Wednesday: 9 am - 4 pm.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWWFEl5THuLti4MN4wLEeWpQIi3eywOh13OW8m&fid=0x0:0xdef40704411305d0"],"When":"2024-3-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had brunch there before hiking.  Potato was done pretty good. Crispy outside and very soft inside.  I am a bit surprised this restaurant is called Bistro as it’s as big as a restaurant and served like a restaurant.  The only thing is we were not asked how we would like the benny done and didn’t let us know until we had them.  They are all medium so if you don’t like medium, better ask when order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQfdYDZTucWSXK_PCK0BmUkRVycWDEJcZbq_UN&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Zoe Ching Yi Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrEFs9z7jmBIZq4_UMaJz8TrH2ZwH9DR3LSa5lTDnxUcXdpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant is absolutely my new favourite from now! Firstly, my friend and I ordered the Spicy Spaghetti (with shrimp & meat) and Penne Chicken (with goat cheese), both are remarkably fantastic creations in reasonable prices! Secondly, big shout out to our server Amie! Her hospitality and cares are excellent who deserves a 10/10! WILL DEFINITELY COME BACK AND RECOMMEND FRIENDS TO COME! Keep it up Chefs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnl7rCQuYGVOcsja0q9I6o7dJIrv6eek-gW8TC&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Caitlyn Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU23oPs6bp630i4HnRsvlmDM8OHCc6tCmjkktp0TTzRYVRaKdEDRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for brunch on a sunny Sunday morning and sat out on the patio. Loved the vibes and location near the water 😊 We ordered the coconut mussels to share, the Mediterranean bowl and the spicy spaghetti. This was for 2 people and definitely was a good amount, almost was too full but the food was so delicious! My favourite dish was the coconut mussels - it was 11/10!!! The sauce was so tasty and had a good coconut flavor that went well with the mussels. The fries were great with it and the portion was a good size. Would definitely come back here for mussels!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOLw5WLOFSHXgHbMU16nh7wW0v6gj1dWPccJi5&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Azita sfn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdfl-pfApx1hr_ikgNlWPx0qmh4isPvBd2oYHcHVAUTdevGI4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried this restaurant today with my family which was so pleasant and delicious food there.

@Lisa the gorgeous and professional server there recommended us the best options on  the menu, she was so friendly and warm.

I loved the food and nice staff and amazing view there.

Probably I’ll get back there soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPO-szfpz7WJAsr6ORwUVAJwxA1LhYDKfgVkFC&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"maciek macak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY4_kvFy2Lvws-A1OsccbUm5QenkzvnsgdeLYC6nR-5g5yMQ0CCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food, the atmosphere, the service and finally the location were all top notch. Appetizers and cocktails were delicious.
The mains and coffee were all great.
The level of accommodation that management provided was outstanding.
I’ll make sure to come back, whenever I’m in Vancouver. Can’t wait to try their other dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnpjX5WWM1iwBqs5a94-aNiIU_DQEjZFZblKhP&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Sandy Y. (CameraGourmet)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ9J8ig1HwUQBJbXRdKDIwR0OrTw3YtQtyHDEaRuCN8XnUDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We recently spent a perfect day paddleboarding in Deep Cove, a peaceful spot with its unique geography and calm waters.  After our paddling adventure, we headed to Arms Reach Bistro—a cozy gem right by the water in Deep Cove Village.

We love dining on their outdoor patio, where the heaters and blankets keep things comfy.  This time, we ordered the Wagyu Beef Carpaccio with Crostini (so flavorful!), crispy Calamari Frito with a mild spicy marinara, and Spicy Spaghetti with Chorizo and Argentinian Prawns (a must-try!).  Great portions for sharing!

Overall, we had an amazing night.  We highly recommend this spot after a day on the water!

📝📝

Food:  🍝🍝🍝🍝 Should Try!
Service:  👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳👩‍🍳
Kids: 👶👶👶👶 Yay!
Price: 💲 $30-$40 each person (dinner)
Presentation: 📷📷
Parking:  Parking can be challenged in the neighbourhood.
Tips:
📝 Suggests visiting in the late afternoon to skip the rush and catch the sunset.
📝 Recommends making reservations for large parties or dining at peak hours.
📝 Has daily features such as offering 30% off all bottles of wine on Sundays.  Be sure to ask the server about their daily features!
Would I Return: Yes 🙋‍♀️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPb8HPOV9RKT-rKyiMCRZI6-0fjrmIibYA6dymi&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Tully Giles-Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk1s8-oDyiiPa2Lv8qE_iiPpyRcX3uHAD3rn-19C0516p8kUen=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So we had the beef carpaccio it was ridiculously good like they must lace it with cocoaine it was that good. We ordered another beef carpaccio after dinner it was that good. We also ordered the duck special and the scallops. They were absolutely delicious. The portion sizes could be a fraction bigger but I feel like the prices were appropriate as it's 2024 and costs of everything is high. The service was actually excellent. Super attentive to our needs and even flagged potential dietary flags in regards to any food allergies. Food and drinks all came out very quickly too. And yes there were lots of other patrons.
Like I dunno if they are always this on point but they were next level for us. They have the warm patio heaters and blankets for everyone. Desserts were also delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtbawaDxjxPpys7NqjjM1VAKOy7XZyWxVby2tn&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Maschanka Fernandes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7ToBWhyLBbGLZ9_8uWWhNnrT3Kh2_4kSVOU9RxE3Xv4dVckVdYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"absolutely delicious! Loved the food. This was my second time here and the food did not disappoint.  Our server was kind enough to accommodate us when we requested to move inside after being seated out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJKlgAcbvsYhLLfWWNe1SvpQYF3k6zOkEI3LQi&fid=0x0:0x276d6733595b2a04"],"When":"2024-9-23"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ayda Sabeti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnnY_Ux4mZxrm4HgstCvc6xWZoWE4OLAu0MeH8yVB3xxW9DAep=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We celebrated my friend's birthday at Browns Socialhouse in Lynn Valley, and it was an incredible experience! The staff went above and beyond by surprising us with a free delicious Oreo cake, making the evening truly unforgettable. As a vegan, I asked if they could customize the Dragon Bowl for me, and they exceeded all expectations. The bowl I had was hands down the best I’ve ever tasted – it was absolutely magical and bursting with flavor!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPKbPxO2BAg97zz3TbVld6Sq2UVWo7MKv2tCAa\u0026fid=0x0:0x35811d542d1f09a0"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Uros Nikolic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqZKUGj61BfmTYu8vecdYC7cNoaJsQnfWJB3zipm50mUOPG3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for lunch if you’re at Lynn Valley\nI highly recommend this restaurant 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO18cg6MQ4Qt_UIEwTlu3xahqaLQO0OZW4XCWJ2\u0026fid=0x0:0x35811d542d1f09a0"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Brook Davison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVztoVPjnVt94_qyBSH9Zj0axIQ4SYEEqwld1FwLy5wQ6WYh3SL6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I absolutely love the Blackened Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo at Browns Socialhouse! The chicken is incredibly tender, juicy, and flavorful—I'm not sure how they do it! The patio atmosphere is wonderful, though it can get a bit noisy inside. Nonetheless, the service is consistently great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Flix","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUotE971eC9NXQ19LtELCVYjXaY3p36j-yOdIqSO-H042buFtk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice restaurant located in a relaxed environment away from the tourists. The food is great, the price is fair and the servers are very friendly and open. Very good stop after a trip to the Lynn Canyon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0ekfDA-nR1SGZfcPQ62VMZxEayZFtR_fjFSGj\u0026fid=0x0:0x35811d542d1f09a0"],"When":"2023-8-14"},{"Name":"Carlos Rodríguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVewmm74w5_HrdeKVirDhQpdVnEQEggsU604n8jUUDYoZkhg3lV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We spent a nice lunch at Brown's, it has such a good vibe and service. The food is really good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTj73nlGYGDwQDbYTwxJJYs-ZlY1Oc0R_AJxu3\u0026fid=0x0:0x35811d542d1f09a0"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Tony Neumeyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUXdQgqHHRA0Xwn61cd9dSU65TN_lKM6TEuHYJTJ3WUWQ_kdtShw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here many times. The burger is good, but wish they could serve it medium rare. Just stupid Canada rules.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe09v5MUCUjLgomn3HhVLASkfHiwVykTbXW2-l\u0026fid=0x0:0x35811d542d1f09a0"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Gal N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2XdfDYCPt_cgiBt8j8cM6zHcI87DNDsylR1wlksYltRZLpynHnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great restaurant with excellent service and pleasant music. They have indoor and outdoor seating areas. Great food. I really liked the brownie dessert. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNE8U8FQ8Ji72GOqo3uOPU5KTslWD7DNo4RfEQk\u0026fid=0x0:0x35811d542d1f09a0"],"When":"2023-6-23"},{"Name":"Karen Ashcroft","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOCMzrTEO-OdpEhLtNZWge2eQ0j9FmUbiNfT-8yyUjm011-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed the patio. Service was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOciZzS6IPZjQ42SM6keu4BVeS2V5BjqN_Sxx32\u0026fid=0x0:0x35811d542d1f09a0"],"When":"2024-6-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great happy hour menu! Some actual meals instead of mere snacks. Sometimes your dinner is not till 10 pm on a busy day…Enjoyed blacken chicken and steak frits. Great service and nice patio seating as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8c99jZ2R6Zmn8hgvzxuc66JAtWEJV6_brYoLp&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2024-6-28"},{"Name":"Marty Jordanov","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRQTqQECV2Pav8LRQrUOrCKWKNZ5au2gP_ah7iBw-Ju-MmlPug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sirloin steak was tender and prepared to order. The kale salad was fresh and quite good. I’d never had a grilled avocado before; not sure the grill added anything to the avocado, other than an element of novelty. The hazy IPA on tap was delightful. Cool atmosphere and friendly staff. Overall, a great experience. Recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXGNEjudKN6t5ssE8z2dK3dcFyFTgiWAHliN35&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2024-1-31"},{"Name":"Tony Neumeyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUXdQgqHHRA0Xwn61cd9dSU65TN_lKM6TEuHYJTJ3WUWQ_kdtShw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love stopping by the original Cactus Club location. Very friendly staff provide great team service.

The Calamari is good, but could use a little "pop" with either a different dip or a little more spice in the batter. We liked the wing dip better with it, so ask for that. I found the craft pilsner to be very good, but would like to see a free main stream beers as alternate choices.

We'll be back again.

https://amzn.to/3YNoIZv","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNycc73aopfJRK7hnlg0tCowo4BmSNXM9ihOAle&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2022-2-8"},{"Name":"Victor Hugo Vazquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWojsdNl9B01ttsDJjgBc8v89Jqfn3KZXh9u8vNgqFZgXLC7Ns=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This isn't the first time this team has made me feel truly happy! Jade, our server, was incredibly accommodating, Simon was exceptionally professional, and Joe's warm smile and friendly demeanor brightened our experience. A huge thank you to everyone for going above and beyond to ensure we felt welcomed and cared for. Your efforts don’t go unnoticed!

P.S. Thanks for my chiles toreados, Mexican style.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vanessa L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJn5-wWxex9aO-Mi9xid8mfp6Oc29KrF3vWBmCWD0VaoF9BhSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a lovely and funny server and there’s lots of inside and outside/shaded seating. The menu is changing as of today so many old favourites are gone like the frozen cosmo (frozen aperol spritz now) and the chili chicken among many others. the vegan/plant based menu will remain the same for now. i love cactus club and this is one of the many locations i love although there are no views like at english bay","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjBL3nyu5ZrQcr-jvxeDnZroBxja8iGtzv7fIS&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Aqeel Rehman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmfTi4uSjCNG16nlnRxtjqUz6fJYHXNTc6GpJq6E66XM14O3lZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great brunch at Cactus Club North Vancouver, tasty food, good vibes, and excellent service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP82TpTZIPihnWG7ZS2Ww0EJPLhlAeglIke9WbF&fid=0x0:0x4d4b73103ae07de5"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Tannaz Taheri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQ3G4OEPaVjWKmP9POl7aP13awHnDOJpL-qdfAfp5rd9--Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I'm a fan of Cactus Clubs since I'm in Vancouver, however in my last experiences, their service has really shocked me.
First of all, their volume of meal portions has significantly reduced compared to 2-3 years ago while the prices increased!
Secondly, from the moment the waiters bring the food to the table until they hand over the bill, they keep checking in, asking if you need anything. It’s nonstop, and they don't let you enjoy your meal or time to chat with your friends—it’s honestly annoying!
Last week, right in the middle of an important conversation with my boss, and while I was still eating my lunch, the waiter came over for the third or fourth time, and interrupted me to ask if I needed a to-go box!!!!!😳 He completely threw off my conversation and didn't allow me to even enjoy my food and time!
I think Cactus really needs to train their staff for a respectful behavior and customer service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elaine S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw0NZVlw-DYhg6yu3CwCqawu2sEc8yv_yDRJNRZHiHpXsjuXCx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I thought I had left a review a while ago but can't find it so this is long overdue!

I always enjoy the food here and the service is consistently great. I get cravings for the fish tacos with yam fries and stop by when I feel the need for a treat.

I have been served by Kianna several times and it is time to give her special thanks for always taking great care of me!

I also want to thank Joe for taking great care of my daughter and I one day when we had to be somewhere and didn't have much time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Nicli Pizzeria + Bar

descriptions: Modern pizzeria in a former jail & horse stable, with certified Neapolitan-style pies & a bar.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jamie L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIsaaODpzZi62wV-93lE__3OFGYxafaFgdJgxMDBfyIfS_ESBX0w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute place, amazing food. I can't get over how good their focaccia was. Everything was flavorful, great balance. We had the meatballs and mortadella, I loved the flavor and texture. They didn't stinge on toppings. We will come back to try their pasta. Other tables' pasta looked so yum.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzu69VsXsxcFYAcXp-WBjqLeTJ_4Nzps9QpOkz&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Peter Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjFHpMfr2lFzpF8LvaoCh0yxlwbevy7_F6KFcqn7xzMqEEB9ZK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This place was very close to Capilano suspension bridge so that’s why we decided to eat here. The food is not bad, but also not spectacular. The pizza sauce was good. However, the crust was severely burnt and left a burnt taste in my mouth. The pasta flavor is very good, but we could tell the pastas were not homemade and for the price I think they should have been. So I’m giving this place about two or three stars out of five I think they can make some improvements.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5KKuu-hDZcsnwxjdbMKktLjrMhM9l5tr3nwBb&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Gary Nijjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7c94uvfJu43Q9g5Q4ou_CpS8D1rxE9zejnN_FsDe8kU6ATCbp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We found this restaurant by accident while looking for a pasta place.
The reviews had us wanting to try this little hidden gem.

Johnny was amazing as a waiter. Non rushed, super energetic and very passionate about the food and restaurant.

The food:
1 - focaccia was amazing. The bread was delicious and the oil/vinegar was perfect

2 - pesto pizza. Super flavorful and fresh.

3 - campanelle e funghi with chicken. Super creamy, delicious and made me wanting more.

Drinks:
Nicili lager. I am shocked this is not on the shelves in stores.  I will be back for this beer over and over.

Environment:
The restaurant is inviting and has an amazing ambiance when you enter and sit down.

The team working here clearly loves what they do and show their passion, not only in the food, but with their inviting attitudes about enjoying what they have created.

If you have not had a chance to visit here, I recommend this gem to everyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGeLv_VC07ffjIkJp5vMHT72hV1UUSPe97Rt9E&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Philip Raymond Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5EIBAgpBLsauhPMdjXym7mJ4fA8mtryDtWQIJCZfJxYXxupU8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had a lovely dinner with the family here at Nicli. Was helped by Michaela. Trust me, walking into this place is like in a Broadway house. They all have so much sense of humour plus good food, what can I ask for? I had a glass of wine and now I’m ready to go home. Happy. Will definitely come back when I’m in West Vancouver.

Recommending Il Bastardo Pizza, Burrata Classico, Campanella e Funghi, and Costamolino white wine that surely made my evening :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMssfnrq6j5kiMmDl_5zlZjR3zVJZvBNX2RRL4m&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Lynne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZCsf97y3t-Ppi4xqcVMVpZ9qy3abZg0k-7Vz9rSFc5K4h7Apj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The pizza was delicious, and the salad was refreshing. The tiramisu was just to my taste. Although the restaurant was quite busy during dinner, the service was excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPkjBkmYcrarZm8AWW02fyRCHIkhm_dFRagx_bX&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"hosein jalali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMRJ-zbypkRGZEGZDTSGd1l-_mo-EgMWxQxKDCxwplEVXPzYk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Nicli for the second time for lunch, hoping my previous bad experience was just a one-off. Unfortunately, I was wrong. I ordered two pizzas, and both were burned. I was so hungry that I ate them anyway, but when I politely mentioned the issue to the staff at the end, I was rudely kicked out. The staff showed no professionalism whatsoever.

To make matters worse, the tiramisu I ordered wasn't fresh either. I should have trusted my first experience, where they also burned the pizza. Giving them a second chance was a mistake on my part.

I don’t recommend this restaurant to anyone. If you go, you’ll only be devaluing yourself, as they clearly don’t care about their customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNp98R9lxf0PN10xRXUrN4e7g6HT_zOwbqvnRws&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Dani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBK_VPJmM3HNw92FZJ3qfBOxBY84qgJshYwRUeK3lDNNEfHm0mIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is one of the best pizza and pasta experiences I've had. The burrata was amazing, as was the rose vodka pasta. I couldn't stop eating.
Just a tip about their private/over flow room. My friend and I made resos and wanted the ambiance of the main eating area, but were placed in the back overflow room which is cold and grey...didn't even seem like the same restaurant. If you are wanting a nice date night, etc, refuse to sit in the back area...it's needs a bit more thoughtful warmth.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gemma Boothroyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYT33iilC0hUrH_Kx1DApSbirTimOoVbSL3BKh-5kba7gU_FY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great gluten free pizza base — which is really saying something for anyone who knows the pain of a slice which doubles for burnt cardboard!

We had a great time here. The citrus arugula salad was a fantastic starter, wine was bright and spicy, pizza was tasty. Also really enjoyed being able to sit outside in the back.

Service was awesome. Genuine, warm, friendly and authentic. Would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNu8QMLipR25ZgnfbcDce0ouS1T40Rb3NJmaJ_K&fid=0x0:0xb07e2dc25b90f81b"],"When":"2024-9-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marc De Vinci","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcOJ8mRMqlnBdsa6zASLgWNyKUnRRXZtxhrNdX2W80TpZxpOE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent food terrible service! We waited for about a solid 20 minutes before the waitress came for our order. The restaurant was pretty much empty. There were some take out orders but nothing that seems to justify such a long wait. When the food finally started to arrive we had to ask for plates. She just dropped the plates on the corner of the table. No soya sauce plates. I’m used to get my tea cup filled constantly in Japanese restaurant. There we had to ask for it, our cups were cold that’s how long we had to wait. Perhaps the best option is to do take out for this place but there are lots of very good Japanese places in North Van. I don’t see myself going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaZPc5Ege_QuVK5VFURx0GOVja3Uapv66EGMgv&fid=0x0:0xae6fa63bf16877dd"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Jello Candles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHi7A-Ad-UZ-ihIVsJVirYVG_GwBefu03JiYiQDIqXUu231g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super delicious!!! I was googling for a nearby Japanese restaurant and luckily to find this. Price is reasonable. We had the Yohachi bento box, sushi and sashimi is fresh, volcano roll is super delicious, I love their spicy sauce!! - highly recommended. Will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2nLhHOepnFneznKFj3LwF_F4Orjr1ToCAbAsT&fid=0x0:0xae6fa63bf16877dd"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Elham Shahbandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8v0FqiWfwrKZlKpvymmkhzMYhJ-PBGxv_Ot_SbQhp9uNsQ3Yb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I love deep fried California roll.. every time this dish is included in my order.. tempura also is really tasty and crispy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn_2lHN-_8a82_WQNmUM7bqVj-mLt0NhfP3VSW&fid=0x0:0xae6fa63bf16877dd"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"MeganMoo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIqNrocluvebctUWQfv5il3VHeKMDGxr_n3l4nFY1oEA-JBEG8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered the dynamite and salmon avocado roll. The salmon avo was so small… price is a bit high for items so frugal looking. Server was horrible, 3 guests in an empty restaurant and he couldn’t give a pair of chopsticks. Slammed the plates down. Bad demeanor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKMZwK_sPQpf1MK11K7g_6mEbGyzsS7Nw6yIys&fid=0x0:0xae6fa63bf16877dd"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Sharon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgzRZN60LR5ltkQSN935OTodoqDxVL8ckji2PwZU4F8uKeI3iM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Definitely NOT authentic Japanese food. Filled with sticky sugary sauces which cover up bland dishes. Good service and nice atmosphere. So if you don’t care about the food quality maybe you can just enjoy the vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdkx5GfZBGx4g9w0p9x_wK8Idmajnz5zDwzN1z&fid=0x0:0xae6fa63bf16877dd"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Mrheydu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyM657ql02IGmyH5WSKBpYdJPAr4ZI4CMfJupg9x3e-YrO9jyJJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We've been on the north shore for a long time and never had checked this place out. We decided to go for dinner. It was good food and nice service. I was expecting a bit more wow as it was highly recommended but I would just say it's good sushi and I would go back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGqhQK4Ogz7ELWpaOix1T0xChN3LTr9ZEddaWS&fid=0x0:0xae6fa63bf16877dd"],"When":"2023-9-3"},{"Name":"Sharon Tse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPinUXtt2dPhG-XbmTzH_kRNIs6ws8ETE31fD4JBt_q3Ajjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious, my family has eaten at a lot of different sushi stores all across Vancouver but this is still the best one. The food here is phenomenal, so much so that leaving a review was an afterthought, we already hoovered everything down by the time I thought to leave one.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvVPLWrztdE-WclgbDRI1lDKr1-ljNLSaKuRRk&fid=0x0:0xae6fa63bf16877dd"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Timm Dapp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrlrwCS17HT2XjBAmvRfCR3emJF-qBRAdJw8fyL9xIEsxcpiHO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"There are plenty of sushi places on the shore, so I will explain what seperates this one from the others:

The service here was prompt and professional, our server Brad made sure all of our needs and wants were attended to quickly.

The yam tempura roll here was proper crispy, unlike other places. Our edamame appetizer arrived still hot, the way it should be.

The salmon sashimi we had was proper cold and portioned nicely.

The entire restaurant seems very well maintained. We will definitely choose this place again over others in the area for these reasons. Great sushi for its price point. This restaurant has been here for years and for a good reason. A hidden gem amongst the numerous sushi restaurants in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVWuVETpYd6lzKYYP9db7M4mihaia8uBwqGCd_&fid=0x0:0xae6fa63bf16877dd"],"When":"2023-2-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ksenia Zhilyakova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2t7-sAXVjQoIVJHtb1hbNxYFUiv-Kw_b8IYKnqb5WEHslCgnY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The place is lovely! I’m not often in north van so it was a random choice. I was looking for a nice place to have a coffee. I checked the  rating, and pics and it was exactly the same in real. Nice decor, fireplace, and surprisingly it wasn’t busy so I easily found a table (the cafe next door was super busy) they had a variety of coffee and sweets, so I was confused. I just ordered  cappuccino and Halloween themed sweet - meringue  (it didn’t like it much bcz it was hard, but it’s usually like that 😁) staff were friendly. I found a free parking somewhere nearby, you just need to drive around as it’s busy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJP69EcOK34XGD5ARTj3xmch9D06SahxmgNIFc&fid=0x0:0xdd7b5bcbec1d6f44"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"P G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0fCU2Qc0a_c6EyAnrC9oWHMXOLKbAIpYaZPyN9xTdV9lbUoGm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Used to love this place, was looking forward to a similar experience but our quiches didn’t feel fresh this visit & service was absolutely impersonal. The Bjorn bar was still stellar, but the other two bars we ordered were dry & felt stale. Nice to see it still busy, hopefully was just an off day","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNdVYiOhtfp3TfSVU7CdMCCbl_wksS2fUksVy60&fid=0x0:0xdd7b5bcbec1d6f44"],"When":"2024-8-28"},{"Name":"Faidra Berda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7qj6rx3TeHWUei0UrpZ84ZN1TacjQuzs75wQAYHlcyzCz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday I walked through Edgemont Village at night to look at all the beautiful lights and stopped in at a few of my favourite small businesses. I started at Kokomo and ended up at the other end of Edgemont Boulevard at Bjorn Bar.

The pastries here are incredible and the atmosphere at Bjorn bar is perfect. It’s warm and inviting and they have a nice electric fireplace with seating around it. They did a really amazing job of decorating for the holidays. It looks like it’s out of a Hallmark Christmas movie.

The young girl working recommended their mince meat tarts. It was delicious and a great choice for the holidays. I also really love their quesadillas, roast beef dip and their cherry turnovers. Bjorn Bar also has an incredible assortment of gourmet dessert bars.

Bjorn bar is well worth a visit if you’re in Edgemont Village in North Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBprcOtGL2sq2EzND3NJaTJemZ6rK2paEfrheH&fid=0x0:0xdd7b5bcbec1d6f44"],"When":"2023-12-28"},{"Name":"Amy Prystupa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-MvyProNlywG0PtfEhU76Xkt1khWR1LgOtTyHj0gzfDHNtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"If I could, I would give 3.5. We came here for the first time a few weeks ago and had a2 of their bars that were good and a “pumpkin knot” that was so delicious we drove 35 minutes back here today. Sadly they didn’t have any knots, which was no biggie, so we chose a pistachio croissant, artichoke tart, and raspberry “bomb” as well as two medium coffees.

Unfortunately we didn’t really enjoy any of the food. The raspberry “bomb” was just an empty cavity with the smallest smear of raspberry jam that I could barely taste - there was such little filling that I actually went up and asked the staff if there was supposed to be more because it’s called a “bomb” and they politely explained that was normal. The artichoke tart was quite over cooked, quite greasy, and was very skimpy on the toppings and just felt like a light sprinkle of cheese with 2 small pieces of artichoke on puff pasty - didn’t feel like a “tart” really. The croissant was soooooo greasy and heavy; it tasted like it had marzipan inside (maybe pistachio marzipan?) which wasn’t in the description. Lastly, we wanted to dine in, so we got our coffees in mugs - the mugs were so small, there is no chance those are equivalent to a medium to-go cup so this really felt like a waste of money.

The servers were all friendly and helpful, and the vibe is super cute. Since our first time there was so good, we might be willing to try again if we’re in the area - but would be more thoughtful about what we order and also would order drinks in to-go cups.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaMzFtrYIcAZ9o8LkOZTKAzf3Iw_6XYLhIpEIe&fid=0x0:0xdd7b5bcbec1d6f44"],"When":"2023-11-20"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a gem. Love the decor as it feels more like a home than a coffee shop inside with the couches and decor. The coffee was excellent and strong. Pastries looked delicious but did not try any. Prices are slightly expensive and there is limited seating. Smaller than the Delanys or the Starbucks in the village.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_VkTZhefhzZ5SK19E51OJb-L9dryYpfugJSVt&fid=0x0:0xdd7b5bcbec1d6f44"],"When":"2021-7-15"},{"Name":"Gen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0x4Eq9GRWvX9EA38H3GMWPqz4gj6UZw48zS61frnmQ0-oj3E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BjornBar Bakery has a large selection of baked goods, drinks, sandwiches, and more. Everything we tried was delicious!

On top of all the baked goods they offer they also have a large selection of gourmet dessert bars which would be great for parties or gatherings.

I highly recommend coming here. They also have a new location in Burquitlam.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAtAPe1C6_XP3aKvFDkpWQ_4p6-v9B_g6Z3rYm&fid=0x0:0xdd7b5bcbec1d6f44"],"When":"2022-6-29"},{"Name":"Sara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6Zcgf1FZ4xwAc3fBg_T7dZ8IIkelhB4DUPgrYjlIinTjQcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome! I came in today to purchase some bars & a pie as i am new to the village i heard about this place . the pastry chef Kyla helped me out , i had over 50 questions and even though it’s probably been a long day for the team she was so kind and took her time to explain every single thing i asked about them , she even boxed it up for me . If i could give her 1 million stars i will . Please make sure Kyla see this review , she is a true gem & made my thanksgiving.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"yaroslav starshyy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJw3_vX6cktZpTEJto0dHRzvTjtl0FsxDEl2on_8S9iUiXvdlk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you for raising the level and providing high service. Special thanks Maria for professional and lovely service.
And Sophie for amazing coffee","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXfQTEuvy3QJHLFqtYvUSd9_en1KTgSSRK67Zo&fid=0x0:0xdd7b5bcbec1d6f44"],"When":"2024-9-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ashley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItl4Nrnx-qvH8DpYTbdQQ4b9fX3lXFSp54MJ4ldlRjh_YoAmM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good was so good
And service also was amazing
We ordered Daily specials - twoonie Tuesday Taco trio mix (Austin,CBC, Wilbur)
BOWLS Austin and
ale beer,lager beer ,spicy Margarita
spicy margarita wasn’t good for us however, Everything was awesome interior is so cute and authentic I love it
Staff was so kind we said that couldn’t eat cheese she took care of us.
I will come again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFtTKNhbpH4UY-NDPb4y9uD4_95G1xCFyPobWY&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Mark Turnbull","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb3y-xYzCVR6N_Ai49HYr4STDQ454gU7LeU-LpiQKvRGfVZTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great tasting burritos. We got one in a bowl and the other was a wrap. I think the ratio in the wrap could have had a touch more salsa. The water cups were also fairly small. Overall this small Mexican restaurant is worth visiting. Nice small patio to sit on when the weather is nice too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu5A9rNfU69uQRpUzH_2KUvSZjPk39CBBXbi-9&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"David Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYWwbbj5xYvMxtEEq5HNMw_xynPQLHyq4Oq1zkZVKlnUQ0hjx8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fun spot on Lonsdale where the Menchie’s used to be. Staff was very friendly and attentive. Took our order, thoroughly checked for allergies we had, gave good recommendations, and were not pushy on drinks (we were with a non drinking group). Food was good. The burritos and tacos were fine - tightly wrapped burritos and well grilled/ toasted. Really good and not overly messy.  We have been here a couple of times, so I’d personally rate the meat Austin/ Angus > Encino/ Chicken > Wilbur/ Pork. The green sauce is yummy, the red sauce is very spicy. 🌶️. Food wise, they don’t serve and complementary chips or anything. So, for the experience it feels like you are at a dine in restaurant, but the food portions are very basic. Food Presentation and quality are a step above Chipotle, but Chipotle has them on selection of condiments and volume. 80s retro vibes and play list was super fun. I could see this place being a fun late night eat place with a small group.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIWP1iVc-Cw6trfd8Vr3agdehpJrMWX1IUBaFW&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Anju","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3NBFx2EqwPeNoEkV2MebyCIf0Znuxcr0FFtfaRAHKwPRpguQHlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The BEST vegan options. I loved my jerky bowl and my boyfriend got the kung fu burrito. The quantity was perfect and it tastes delicious, the server was very nice too. Cute inside and good price","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNm2OtiJ9JDsYVbpIcKDaSij2AmDxpe3EgGpKd3&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Sam Nagina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILktP5eBAiqYEw_d9nIp88FHviF6BkjUAmdT_6_5AHNglNJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Gringos is a great place to grab some great tasting tacos for an even better price. I recommend getting the 6 tacos for $22.50. The atmosphere is upbeat, and the music selection suits the environment. The house hot sauce is better than most places. It had a very nice kick at the end. The graphics on the table are very fitting with different taco inspired themes. Situated right on the corner with nice a street view. I suggest everyone try this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2NCVzCRZq3hbeqTtFJ4s3zo1PSZUioM3fdydr&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mauricio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQCeBI__-ADFeb2mcVXcZfR_gWkXVdXNkNsI2olML3maTuNvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly service, nice place, Marguerite and nachos were tasty. Good for groups until 4.

Btw Gringo email me and they can fit groups in after 4pm too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-vpp8115zdWBzm22JK9G1Drx5lM5Ndm8-tEEY&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Kyle Stansfeld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCOcLRzI3gNuuNuvLENZro3P_vwHmHUtnT9Xk5lvqAiZuUcAc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took a friend for lunch, on her birthday! We shared some tacos, and some nachos. She had a margarita, and another drink, I had a Pepsi. Overall the experience was good! The food tasty, and the service was also good!. I wasn’t sure how big the tacos were, so I got nachos also. Turned out I got quite full from the tacos, and ended up taking the nachos home. Definitely worth going there. Thanks for that!  ** I’m adding to my review ** I went back a second time, and had to change my review. The food is excellent and definitely worth eating at this location! Tasty, fast, generous, great deal and a great atmosphere. Very clean! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlee Mallender","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7-DVStmeN92dWI8NX8rSCs1RktJZuNGz8cpNZxQGtibnp57qx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience at Gringo and I could not be more excited they have opened in the neighbourhood! The staff were extremely friendly and helpful with the menu.  We tried the spicy margaritas, queso, tacos and a bowl. All of the food and drinks were great, we can’t wait to try more off the menu! The atmosphere is so fun, and the cheap beers and drinks make it even better!! Overall awesome new spot in Lower Lonsdale!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-3I_kTNgfeMqMxI062v9DuJORAZ3yLg5VKeME&fid=0x0:0x43a330c54bdbbfc4"],"When":"2024-5-29"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"MandyEric C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxuB_JnrsZZb2fdpTBXrnzo6r9HABusbLT1YvyciVL0SlNAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sam was super friendly and helpful. He made great recommendations for us to try food with different dishes that will be suitable for our tastes. We ordered the lamb neck, lamb kebab, ground beef kebab, and the yellow color rose water dessert (Sholezard). The portion was huge! And the lamb neck indeed melted in your mouth as Sam mentioned. The dessert was surprisingly good! It’s sweet but not too much. It lightened up the whole meal at the end. Everything was delicious and we highly recommend this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMNhdh45ZIzt2UDRUjGHmoJSfFkL1zXkx1rA9U&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Atlac Mdzh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmp8pn6U1S_KsOxdPvVN179SqKOQPaim2AxrOd-rorYkvJMKVF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I enjoyed my food, service was nice and they are welcoming, it’s more about taking out than sitting in, i recommend call and book the bench if you wanna stay and eat . Tried their beryon and mast misir and khoresht mast, all good i enjoyed it, the fact that there is no other place in Vancouver that offers persian beryoun did make me happy enough.
The bench fits 10-12 people","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyhcu59A7en3WYgXzBBmyRsoevWflhEvSBS4n2&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Amin Sameni","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu7gOTJPCM-cxMdKwmmGT2dzn1GqI9KyFBzJ01UvZjTN1ONfqq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I talked with the owner over phone to order.
Very sweet guy.
Food was really good
Beef Steak was one of the best I’ve had outside of Iran. Very tender and very well cooked
Chicken kebob was juicy and verrry tasty.
Koobideh was a bit firm or maybe overcooked but still decent.
Will definitely try them again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWLWRUYSNtkqDFdencE_quu7qRRE63o25Fif6w&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Farhad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZsh7rsXskoTeFBdwx-4_jSK3VIUQ0BNWwnMfqcoyfBr3tpy_n=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We purchased chelo kabab that was nice, although more oily than expected
Tahdig dish with Gheimeh stew was nice, again more oily than expected
Tahdig dish with Ghormeh Sabzi stew was OK, not bad, again oily
Kashk Bademjan (Eggplant dish) was really bad, not palatable, and not what we expected
Yogurt cucumber mixture was so spicy 🌶️ more than any usual Persian cuisine normality
The staff were helpful, nice
The inside of the store did not have ventilation, although it’s mainly a take-out place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiwShK0FNyAmuecpm3sJQK0nRYimFevMOFbN8&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Andrew Enduma (Drew)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9vDN56ZtpfNpzF6_D-nYXCuGa6hhrsRtYtkinWpk5R8xG6qcj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of enjoying Tanje Koubide Kebab, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience! The tenderness of the meat was truly remarkable; showcasing the quality and care that goes into their preparation.

The flavor was outstanding, with a perfect blend of spices that enhanced the natural taste of the meat without overpowering it.
Additionally, the portion sizes were generous, providing great value for the price!

Having tried both Tanje Koubide Kebab and Cazba, I can confidently say that I personally prefer Tanje. The combination of tenderness, flavor, and portion size makes it a standout choice for anyone craving a delicious kebab. I highly recommend giving it a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPtN-DZVAFMAYg6nUsdZ5QDQvjaZWwkcz6LzCj&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-8-21"},{"Name":"Mehdi Mashaykhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJltJjHUwj-9He6v6H2jjLPRoigTEMMJev-SsKHUT7wAOgMA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently ordered takeout from Tanije Restaurant and was thoroughly impressed. The chicken kebabs were absolutely delicious—tender, juicy, and packed with flavor. The Kashk-o-Bademjan was a standout dish, with its rich taste and beautiful presentation. Even though it was takeout, the attention to detail in the presentation and taste was evident. I highly recommend Tanije Restaurant for anyone craving high-quality Persian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsH9bnohqKmCj0MLQIXpZe13lHP5WASsmIixH4&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"raafa abdulla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWg27WMgV0cri9-zVkUqxtXhbvkjQAcWkQlzPpvLsL1UPIKry3bQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time ordering from this restaurant. I did the online order and it took them 10 minutes to complete the order which was three meals. The food was outstanding. You can see it was fresh and super yummy.  So many restaurants downgrade their standards but I am glade that Tanje kept the high standard.  They also gave my husband a cup of tea which was so delicious! I can't wait to order from them again. It is my new restaurant to go in North Vancouver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"rasool bousaidi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGqaJi6wcOx9yWBOBkLiml2UC5x23-mbh7mTSLE68jvnUOK_Wz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The quality, amount and the price was really great. Staffs were very friendly and polite and they great us with tea(for free) which was really delicious. Hope they can keep these points over the time and grow in the future.
I ordered Ghaliyeh Mahi and I highly recommend it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhhoGwOUjd1SJN7vfdW3ly5Y47U6Djg0iJIIgu&fid=0x0:0x99912f662b8064f1"],"When":"2024-3-3"}]
