user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fatemeh Ghanbari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGWIkt1mBb4WIF3mkORdmXa_432Y_UhLD_Ngzz1FaG-LheWQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Review:

I recently visited this cozy café, and I must say, the experience was fantastic! I tried the Egg and Potato Delight, and it was absolutely delicious. The flavors were perfectly balanced, and the dish was cooked to perfection. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, making me feel welcomed from the moment I walked in.

The atmosphere of the café was also a highlight—warm, inviting, and beautifully decorated. It’s the perfect spot to relax and enjoy a great meal. I’ll definitely be coming back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqchCIjAUxYxp5vtyWJqUHRwMzgYjgU2R54Ecy&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Josephine Ma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4ctBP8R2rm9S8Aa5NyuULMapTvyTQYakS6AvI9Cd025oSy86H=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place seems to be run by Persian people as they offer a mix of traditional Western style food, along with some Persian options as well. (eg.Persian Omelette) It's got a nice vibe to it. Love the decor.

Featured here:
Egg Bacon Sandwich
Ham and Cheese Panini sandwich
Classic Avocado Toast
Earl Grey Tea
Iced Mocha
Rooibos Cherry Rose

My daughter said she couldn't really taste the cheese much in her sandwich, but still enjoyed the sandwich all the same. Her Iced Mocha was very nicely done.

I found my Avocado Toast a bit on the salty side, and wasn't impressed with the egg that sat upon it. Runny yolk is what I like to see, but the yolk in this egg was very dry.

They have a nice selection of cakes in their display case. I might come back here again to have some tea and dessert but don't think I'll bother with their savoury foods again.

Service: Good
Parking: Free parking on the street","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXnDXKb-wcFYJXBXxITBL9tIu24WGxWves-EpL&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-5-16"},{"Name":"Mohsen Hashemi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqWjJ3FfE5HvtSYLuezJakGo1pAZOQ-SG65pg0pJSV7FVMOaOi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I  and my friends came echo cafe on Saturday 5th October …the avocado toast was amazing.  Mushroom omelet was neat.    My selection breakfast had perfect design . All of the orders were on  time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwC46edvZRmeAO8688mC3UmArjrhSZRxe58Goc&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Felipe Bautista","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD8Ocw-BYrQmD4Za-AtjcfdB8pbtfMHowdqj-NOPSE6zWVwSI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I spend couple hours here working and I got a piece of chocolate cake and a large latte, of course I will be back. The place is cozy, nice and very well presented. Washroom has something really closest to a Bidé and very clean. They have internet and lots of options in their menu. Music not loud and cool for work/business chats.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGRZbSW17qARgHTOg8Oj2222Lo49JHIpomUFTT&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Michael Swanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaMDFoxtF-rRkN8FbQK8Mq6xYLFRYls0ikPMEZnKjJJv7aHg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Large open seating area, delicious cookies - a bright place that gets a large range of returning customers.

I've been back a couple times and have always been happy. I've tried breakfast, lunch, and tea time snacks and it has all been good.

The breakfast and brunch dishes cube with good portions and great taste. The panini sandwich I had last time was also delicious - that makes it win-win-win for my visits.

I was lucky enough to have a chat with Echo herself and found her to be quite sweet and kids of fun to chat with, and that makes me even happier to write about the cafe!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO96xZ0rUxPeoRxivFWyoEYpYIawI9VOXApCddg&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2022-1-29"},{"Name":"Reid Gibbons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPjVw-w007m7wzzutBNrbjcTaaAtYRGVf12IZnYarU1U8tfwrm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"2 for 1 breakfast sandwich? No....they just double the cost for a single sandwich. Very slimy business practices on Uber eats for subpar food. And don't tell me it's for "extra prep" or "packaging" it came in sandwich paper covered in grease stuffed in the cheapest of plastic bags. Absolute joke.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKKQBDbQdoCrcYtnY230hOiLvouh_3ybQEYFUt&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Hunnie Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJDB3fBl3nshvwdnuJSUyRN_RQY_ymgng94Ek9lIkRZZXEgvw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Service is ok.  Atmosphere pretty nice, but come with a big budget and small appetite.  $13 for a tiny sandwich that was zapped in the microwave...ridiculous .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM789khB8jxqZi3khy2ALtDCQMkmDlXCS3dD3SU&fid=0x0:0xa1677bd9c4c33689"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Emily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJoGT4qP-mIuAKbuGcOnP96VV6skmV3Md8FWo6j6KyCL6OBnS5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Find somewhere else. On a Saturday around lunch, they only had one front of house staff working--taking orders and making drinks, thus unable to attend to restaurant cleanliness--every single table needed a wipe down.  The front of house staff person was good about getting the attention of the correct person for the correct order.

I and other customers waited about 25 minutes for food to come out. I ordered an omelet which came with some toast. When I asked for jam, I was told that would be an extra charge--that's completely ridiculous on top of already paying $17 for an omelet and dry toast. The omelet was good, but not worth the price.

The art on their walls looks like it was created by AI.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenelle M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuZsEhNkST7KjvVq3XbbFN5LW-NrE6ELrBGYwrFclaSNbIOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best park!! I love that there are public washrooms too.

Best for good climbers but there is also a zipline, swings, slide, mini trampoline, water feature (be prepared for them to get wet). We spent a few hours here and could have easily stayed longer.

It was pretty busy with day camps and daycares but there is lots of space so it didn't seem too crowded.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKOp3GJCJWklMrhALUoaMDXaUMn_n3pTSlDj-z&fid=0x0:0xd7fecd40875fe1b"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"michael sum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhM3-0VyjDmM2egrv5P6zIWMhlIAcEp1MmlCnZt4ISfTYWmg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice little park.  Parking is just around the corner from the park, maybe a 5min walk.  It is a gravel/construction parking lot but not bad.  The zip line could be a little faster as my daughter's told me.  The washroom looks pretty decent I didn't use but just from the looks of it.  There is a small walk along the side of the park which is nice.  The shade is what makes the park there's 2 covers which are placed to keep most of the play area cool.  Plenty of green space to run and play in as well.   One of the only redone parks with logs and not metal or plastic.  One draw back is it is built on a slope so it's either walking uphill or downhill.  Also the small  terrain section is pretty cool.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrRue7BggpqdLe37QFWSMoUDTybr7uvPeo8ip7&fid=0x0:0xd7fecd40875fe1b"],"When":"2023-9-6"},{"Name":"Keith Mewis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVus9IoCtkj9n4iecB-RTB1-TrhlKEzgS1Tz4dgq1fLc1iz4kG_LQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great kids park for all ages. Swings, zip lines, climbing structures, sand/water spout digging area, and really long slide. Also a concrete pump track nearby for biking/scootering/skateboarding on. The only downside is it can be busy because it’s so great","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoxldzRunWyyvTpgBl33vop-JdcdBVO7ZGnocn&fid=0x0:0xd7fecd40875fe1b"],"When":"2024-3-24"},{"Name":"Sato B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9Vf7gI-hYJuak45w6YfPsanMObDngVA8AwMDY64Jbyfv77A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very Great park.
Most kids would love this park.
Popular in summer time.
Fun course for running bikes etc.
Play ground : so much fun.
Zip line , Sand box, slide , so many.
One washroom only.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsPonhsnGMrFs4v1FRh6OZ4c9BKVgY2AWTMQsj&fid=0x0:0xd7fecd40875fe1b"],"When":"2023-2-6"},{"Name":"zaahira hassim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLePkCZjqjyK-WTDlcjvbln4eHL2CtLM0IHX_L0ADNezGKynQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such an awesome play area for children.
The facilities are so clean, and there’s so much for children to do. The zip line is such a winner for the slightly older children. The park is also located next to an open area for playing and along a great walking route. A lovely afternoon out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJf33ev9uEkNjYZYZGmafyxdSRq4cqvA0iybjD&fid=0x0:0xd7fecd40875fe1b"],"When":"2023-3-14"},{"Name":"Jennifer Thornton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxGkwZGNAlwKbi0bc9qqTJZsWoyAsXFmtNcwgpfNCHexwdoC9z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This park is awesome! The equipment has been very well-built and is super sturdy and fun. It’s very well thought out. It’s good all year round and nice to have in the neighborhood. Definitely adventure down to find the suspension bridge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRdOOObujSbcdXbcoahqVo-zUHMUf2q1a2vJeF&fid=0x0:0xd7fecd40875fe1b"],"When":"2022-12-28"},{"Name":"Chen Deng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2Sc2uBjqkI_Vrgov10v0VXhugvhUH392-IB7QNNX00Qta3eAkZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Moodyville Park activities playground is an amazing place for toddlers to play and explore. The playground is well-maintained and has a wide variety of age-appropriate equipment that will keep your little ones entertained for hours. There are slides, swings, climbing structures, and other fun play features that are sure to delight even the most active toddlers.

What's great about Moodyville Park activities playground is that it's not just a playground - there are also plenty of other activities to keep your little ones engaged and stimulated. The park features interactive play areas, water play features, and other fun activities that are perfect for toddlers. There are also plenty of benches and shaded areas where parents can relax while keeping an eye on their children.

Overall, I would highly recommend Moodyville Park activities playground to anyone looking for a fun and engaging place for their toddlers to play. With its variety of equipment and activities, as well as its well-maintained facilities, this playground is sure to be a hit with parents and children alike.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOENn6gvjitpWnXDGqqUUK1IG6o2YHCFxVmL3L5&fid=0x0:0xd7fecd40875fe1b"],"When":"2023-3-18"},{"Name":"Ali Zohourian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4LNzU6KkPs6uY7j4P5E8uoyO7rOq4S4PXpvDnK-xmTLBWL0z_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Moodyville Park is a fantastic place to visit with kids of all ages. The park has a variety of features that make it fun and exciting, such as a skate park, a trampoline, a sandbox, a zip line, and a huge wooden playground. The park is also very clean and well-maintained, and has bathrooms, picnic tables, and lounge chairs for convenience. The park is located in the new Moodyville complex, which has access to the Spirit Trail for walking or biking.

The only downside is that parking is limited and the slides can get hot on sunny days.

Overall, I highly recommend Moodyville Park for anyone looking for a great outdoor adventure with their family. It is one of the best and most complete playgrounds in the North Shore².

.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1zy_rA7pqn_c4ZnAk2iSkWWMNBXDc1HBClTKa&fid=0x0:0xd7fecd40875fe1b"],"When":"2023-10-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Crystal Dean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIfww0DI0g4uwD9aKvRAOIoLjw0fSPmahEBjDwU_muS4GAaHq4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Only giving a 4 star because I only tried one thing and would like to come back and try some more of what they have to offer.

Stumbled upon this place with my partner on our walk after we had already gone to Lucky's donuts.

The inside smelled super yummy! - like the PNE mini donuts which I have always loved, but I can see that being an issue for some people.

Being that we had already had our lunch and donuts elsewhere but couldn't pass up getting something, we decided to take one donut to go for our ferry ride home. It was a vanilla donut with the pink vanilla glaze and sprinkles.

Boy did we regret not getting more than the one donut. It was super airy, light, soft, and balanced flavour. We wanted more! Not overly sweet either which is a major plus being we aren't mega sugar fiends but love us a good balanced sweet treat.

We appreciated how simple yet delicious the donut was. It's been two weeks and we still talk about it!

The staff person helping us was also super friendly and fun to talk to!

Look forward to coming back someday when we're back in North Van! Will have to give the fried chicken a taste!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfYNYRu3_spA_Uthxj8aO0d-1jsXdg08WD_QGK&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Brian Zuzartee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPYrTmdQWyxA5qvIYcuku3MV3ItJ_Uaqa_uwwM67-7pa-vM-Th=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fried chicken was crispy and moist on the inside! Pretty good flavors. Their doughnuts were light and airy and weren't too sweet! Loved it! I've been here a few times and have just been consistent and delicious. The combo/fusion of a bite of fried chicken and their glaze doughnuts is delicious. Will always come back for more! Don't judge me for the ketchup!! Lol","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhxG1wF0zqTEnBea6GCAzWDUlpm01uQfP9FI7F&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Jordan Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFsjfnS-oiBTX7iRzPhMh-PXM_FEBemeI_C6-8CDhB4SzDFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was very happy that I found this place as I was searching for a place to eat nearby after work.

This hidden gem is definitely somewhere I'll be back to as the service, food and vibes are great.

I had the lunchbox special which runs from 11am to 1pm and got the Cajun Chicken Burger which was big and juicy. The only thing was it was a lacking a little on flavor but not to the point where I would take points off. The donut was fantastic though, light sweet and airy, would go back specifically for those!

When I went it was pretty quiet, I am not sure if it is always like that, but if it is, I can see this as a nice little cafe vibe getaway from the city within the city.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTwWaE-ekNpM1OtUxTXAZ04ddSV9aWnMhhIe7e&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Júlia Fonseca da Costa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe-9XYi95Rrw95VLOd_wwZPz1LE1R239MH7zQNUdavZXb007i2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good little coffee house that also serves.. uhn.. fried pickles? Interesting? Hahaha kind of a wild range for the menu, but the fried pickles and lemonade were really good. The donuts are also good, Ive found the boston cream a bit too sweet, and I came at 5pm, so no more drip coffee left 🥲. It was overall a good experience and I will definetly be back for a pumpkin spice donut.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN70aKiR8ssCN9q7g5ss50Ec6yn5H4GVzh5kck3&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"J D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEbZ2CIZTxWvqOM-K9XJJ32A2UebzBSHvuvBhDgVOxCsPUUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a sucker for good fried chicken and donuts, put the two together and I'm done for.

We came in Saturday towards the end of the day, no doubt the staff were tired but you couldn't tell, they were all bright and friendly.

The fried chicken was done perfectly, crisp on the outside, tender and juicy inside with great flavor. The sandwich combining a bit of spice on the chicken with the sweetness of the donut was delicious.

When we were done we couldn't help grabbing a few donuts to go.

10 out of 10 will return here the next time we visit Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlLIgs6lzmM4HU8fTCXgbCmM7kG3E_GxtAJmnB&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuROdrsF7vogaT38uZexLigYz1e5VXiDiWb4Iq30REJ6CyNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Coxy small interior. Only a few tables inside. There is seating across the lane in an area with patio tables and umbrellas. The fried chicken sandwiches were fresh, not greasy and tasty. Sandwich bread was soft and fluffy. There is some parking across the lane and in front of the eating area (see photos). Definitely worth the stop.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUemH1Ajcdsbk7R8bO3f4kYYdYm4ijEVkxSMpK&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"F M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiAuxCOUxOthoh8wyw2iAy6CmojcgUKL0veulsM0a6veQ3OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super friendly service, love the staff and wish I could eat this Nashville chicken burg on a glazed donut daily. The tots and garlic mayo will be in my dreams and bonus $5 for a nah of 5 day olds !! Bf loved the apple fritter too ( not pictured)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOWv30AN2M11V3uWNnm7inr4QQqFUktX4sX0Mc&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Amy Watt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtFx0Lt1_G_UCsXyvg1o5eSDevhehAM8wUiop0lPf09tXNft4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped by after receiving free doughnut cards at Lonsdale Quay and decided to check this place out. I tried the classic glazed doughnut, which was delicious, but the selection was quite limited. I had heard great things about their lemon curd and other flavors, but unfortunately, they weren't available—and it was only noon on a Saturday. The shop itself is cute, with a great vibe, so it's worth a visit if you're a doughnut lover, but be aware that the variety may be hit or miss","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoBgIc69FHRSawyOdMKhXLNZQJ6oQ2iaQvmvgj&fid=0x0:0x9ff439158355ddd6"],"When":"2024-10-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sunny Yerra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwX9GsGvRD4Rmzpnxnt1YRL-Eg5T-wGNmWnsfNs3vgSTgJL4bc9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kokomo offers a cozy dining experience with a focused menu. While I initially aimed for their Nashville-style burger, this particular location didn't have it available. Opting instead for the buffalo wrap with soy curls, I was pleasantly surprised. The wrap was a delightful blend of slightly spicy buffalo sauce complemented by a cool white sauce, possibly ranch, creating a heavenly combination. The soy curls served as a satisfying and chewy substitute for chicken. Additionally, I highly recommend trying their chocolate brownie, especially when heated for 5-10 seconds for an extra gooey texture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Obf4CVK4nPH7-HdRPW7rgI0B82QYu7kuA5oI&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2024-3-1"},{"Name":"Lee Van","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkdc0b5WROtpnJCruJpetIegq6Snt_2bGm0A5pSa9cqY1SCXL5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My friend recommended this place for a post hike, late lunch, and I'm so glad that she did. While parking is a bit tricky, I managed to find a 2 hour parking spot 5 minutes away. There are lots of yummy options to choose from. I ordered the koko burger with kettle chips and my friends both got the shawarma bowl. Food was great but my preference would have been fries with my burger. The inside seating area is lovely and they also have seats outside. I highly recommend this place and will be back for sure. I'm keen to try the acai bowl next.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVoAMoa3D9fUUUePq26qWMgJ38X3gbU1a-Z54o&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Faidra Berda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7qj6rx3TeHWUei0UrpZ84ZN1TacjQuzs75wQAYHlcyzCz7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yesterday I decided to walk through Edgemont Village at night to enjoy all the small businesses and streets lit up for Christmas. Absolutely stunning at night!

I stopped into Kokomo as it’s one of my favourite places to take out salads and other healthy meal options. I love their food, but I was absolutely blown away by the customer service I received by Harper who was working yesterday. We chatted for a bit and I was amazed at how knowledgeable she was about Kokomo and what an incredible ambassador she is for their brand. She has only been working there four months, but you’d think she’d been there for years. I was even more amazed to find out she was only 17 years old. Harper has a bright future at whatever she decides to do. I offered her a job in my business, so I’m hoping she’ll take me up on the offer!

My favourite dishes at Kokomo are the Chickpea Curry, Coastal Macro, Beet Poke Macro, Golden Laska Noodles and I love their Power Malt for breakfast. You can also get some items like the Chickpea Curry frozen. I always have a few of these in the freezer, as my husband loves their food too.

Kokomo offers a great product, a relaxing environment, and warm and friendly  service. Harper, you are outstanding at customer service and my job offer stands anytime you’re interested.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOh-iePTxIzOxRPzgdJOYTb_-x8V7zO9zI4mW8G&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2023-12-28"},{"Name":"asdfxyz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwt2ZWdKG273C2kpn4zigA9_GrtHOyHmibUoiZ_mPtRc9wsLc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered the Green giant smoothie online 30 minutes before closing at the pickup there was a girl working alone in the front. Not sure if she was new or she was in a hurry - the smoothie tasted good but these very hard unbiteable chunks inside that was very distracting and I had to keep spitting it out. I looked at the ingredients list of the menu and I couldn’t find anything that could be this so I’m confused.. While writing halfway through the smoothie I also found a piece of hair lol. The acai bowl here was amazing but will not be ordering any smoothies from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPDrO9OBSNcEqT_Hww3MefowLLiuEHcjFyR3Ib&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Virginia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa3XydPQq_glhUlXkwfatkhEWerdrPxg8tI4QaTCqozHt4m0gw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Their bowls are tasty but not very filling. The menu was can be improved by adding more salad/bowl options. Customer service is great and friendly. The location is prime. The inside of the store is not that spacious for large groups. Their energy bites are so tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIGsmJaQKI6VZtFzW3gCnTeJ-xEhraUlUUNDs1&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2023-1-12"},{"Name":"Kevin Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZeZ_Qfy0NGjKudQd0GIBf3b-6aq2LbpWAmbs5BaH4vCoNC-wE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A community vibe that is well designed. Enjoyed a light lunch and a refreshing milkshake. The baked goods weren’t too sweet - just to our liking.

It was a little break we took before heading to grouse mountain. Simple, easy, quick and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIBLyAQV5LjP7Gr3koxWQ0AcyvncT6IPLyX8lm&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2023-11-24"},{"Name":"Ryan Lundgren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZBC2-rmR55tlMOlwbD6XP7RMtRFIEqNtXbkmIbFhrgps5cw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Amazing food in store, NEVER order online. This restaurant has great vegan food, but absolutely takes advantage of out of store customers. My friend and I spent $34 on a bowl and a wrap with free delivery and they were both half sized, just because we weren't present. Never order online at this establishment, unless they stop cheaping out their customers who order out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leya E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPMEjpXUs-_xzos_qGHvk4l7M7xlbdXo1Tjq0QyJ9PdNqfi1Lr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hearty, healthy clean food I feel good about eating. Friendly staff and nice bright space.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs-1bOgAEiYWANKR8-Vo9e2M5CtTJrgMfY2gUC&fid=0x0:0x78eb5f0b1b7b2fac"],"When":"2024-9-18"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ali Abedini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbRr68ytCPfVo8PSc_cVIauSODi91rqgbkPR0poNeke2fuY4dLtw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"More than a restaurant, this is a little paradise. With 32 years of background, this restaurant offers some of the most legit and original Persian dishes. Not only the food and atmosphere, but also the amazing staff make you feel right at home when enjoying your favourite meals of all time. You know what I mean. When you know it, you know it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEECPlVgQnpmX7jS7cQqJEq6Oi2Dthal7vIZ8P&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Shay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcjneWc_LCD45co2Cac8bHJnBcsw2HEfdzcQRnC4ndQPOjCkyC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had kale pache, halim, and omlet they were all good, but my favorite was kale pache.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNtA_BLUDeV0LAufNt6HhAYzRUbgfhFUn4zT7s&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Shahrzad Matin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXr3Y2zjCIPyX_qS5DOamXBuLhPj_aJnaUF2sdw1Z1ZeFtoSqs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been eating at Kolbeh for as long as they have been open. A wonderful family restaurant. Always great eating there. We often bring home traditional Persian breakfast from there. Their prices & quality of their Halim & Kale pache is still better than others in my opinion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2j7nOyXLVmLx7LdUT4T53XNTYZkY7Wmtxd1TZ&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-3-30"},{"Name":"farshizo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmvSVacHVza1tsgUD3ace-WZmXIY0Bi62p9HbipEhBPg-ocku3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"It must be a new ownership, I went in to have some Kale Paache after years but was served with a small portion, half of the stuff missing and one small half pache, I tried to fill myself with the half bread! Paid $30 bucks and left, 1st time in my life I had Kale Paache but wasn’t full! Please do better!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jimjim ym","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1PiOSVCEn9bWgSGk-UbnwgQixs1lcWf48KuIObYXL-Zzxm8pF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When you enter the restaurant Kolbeh.
It's not just an enter a  restaurant. You came from another time to a very pleasant and comfortable time that called Kolbeh.
we are more than welcome at Kolbeh with joy and and smile, there you see foods that you don't even think about it because the food they cooked will surprise you because all food are really beautiful and pleasant and delicious.
Foods that you just think are cooked it for sale, no not at all, they were cooked for your comfort and satisfaction like a family, foods in Kolbeh are100% homemade with beautiful smells and delicious food to you for sure.
It has an incredible event. you feel eating more after you finish your meal, but you feel as if you don't eat anything, your stomach is still ready for more food.
There's one thing matter to me is the place where customers talk to each other and enjoy each other's conversations without knowing one another mostly. the space, an excellent atmosphere where other nations eat with joy in huts and remember the name of Iranian cuisine."kolbeh"
I have never eaten before some of those food and I have experienced these foods in kolbeh restaurant and they are very, very tasty and I recommend them to all of you.Ever since I've eaten here.
Kolbeh is the only place with real Iranian food with an incredible price.
I love to eat only at the Kolbeh because I realize my money is worth it in Kolbeh .
I also feel like I'm still in my own family because the management and best team are of Kolbeh treat us so warmly from moment to moment and they want what we need and taking care of us well, that cease we're in right pleac with our own family.
it's a point that made me come and eat kolbeh every day.
also i can't  find a place with a lot of pleasing to eat and tastey with beautiful smell of food.
The great professional team talks with customers and enjoys the nice encounter of the management with the best team all there. Today, new food was added to the list of kolbeh. It was the traditional "ghrmeh sbzi" that we all really love it. You have to come here to eat ghrmeh sbzi to find out of real ghrmeh sbzi is.
I spoke with  management about how come every food in menu is incredible.
Is Kolbeh challenging with others ?
Management responded to me that" of course we challenge with nobody, but e create challenge.
Joseph s","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAoJzXqX5kDSa8GzFJEnjFvZZgIfF9r7jBnwxC&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2024-2-23"},{"Name":"Brandon Hansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUknZldpkI6vajsmquke_UMEKpQ8D_qbaOF3o2R9hr4ouVh6Nex=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious Perisan food, easy parking at the park around the corner. The soup was fantastic, along with the meat. I don't know if I understand all the random vegetables that came with the meat, but that could be my inexperience. The server recommended the Iranian bread over the pita, and we are glad we listened! Very patient staff and pretty quick service too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwUhmYNdtorix9QrKAOhQr7iFQS2E-4N7TiUk5&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2022-12-5"},{"Name":"Semira Nikooparast","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIP5QAdrzsLbvQPxH6er6YfQ7m1Q9Bas18LF-aDQxsDsaB-WrWDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing here, fresh Kaleh-pache was tasty and presented nicely, you don’t really see any sheep head in the dish (which is a good thing!)
nothing too fancy but decent and clean. The atmosphere is a cozy home style restaurant. Service was friendly, staff are polite and welcoming. It can get really crowded in the morning. I recommend calling ahead on busy days as they may run out of the good food if you come later in the morning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPusboClZeCCbAFAxtoAjhSIH--uu0i2weuCOHi&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2023-12-30"},{"Name":"Dr DD","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7rVoqslZLLJaYceC7RbO-HwkCFHrLscKHrlTG2Kc8O8_Yfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was great, everyone were super friendly. We had the Persian omelette and Ash Shole Ghalamkar with Sangak bread. All super delicious. I absolutely recommend this place for a cozy breakfast/brunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZCY5Hp2hfd0HIKC8mSOXshXI2NuCQvej2CdQp&fid=0x0:0x4fb308bee057d235"],"When":"2023-12-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time over there. I like the coffee it’s good. However, the food even looks better. I took the PB square it was really good. Nice atmosphere in the background…","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7b9LJsthw9GMdW4LKKOGNWA9oCQBX9rw04Xe9&fid=0x0:0xdd6433021f91ef0f"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Teresa Vuong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUJw046ei3rg5CuHHs-2qP6Vyb5AkkJtNeQpAcMLqCsokx4Hek=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This little gem is one of my absolute favourite spots! The drinks and food are consistently fantastic, and the cozy atmosphere makes it the perfect place to relax or catch up with friends. I come here often, and I’m always greeted with warm, friendly service—special shoutout to Tia and April! They go above and beyond every time, ensuring that everything is just right.

Their attention to detail and positive energy make each visit a great experience. Whether you’re grabbing a quick coffee or staying for a full meal, you’ll feel welcomed and well taken care of. Highly recommend giving this place a try when you’re in the area. You won’t be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alaa F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUvNw5SCe69zZfgGDI9iircM7cKa11OrPh7KX_GloS3n19Wg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere, lots of places to sit outside. Very friendly staff. Latte was perfect and the carrot cake was soooo delicious! We also tried the tomato bocconcini sandwich and it did not disappoint!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqvwqGh7hvJIPjI7SzOajuYp8RI6VKwH_j4EtX&fid=0x0:0xdd6433021f91ef0f"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Melanie Faye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtPzOq20Oia9CKpRn4zQBk58dG4yJdZOd5JH-r6YfNy0c-bkGoyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Omg such a cute place, lively and open air. Reaaaaally tasty latte. Pretty nice berry tea. I didn't get any food but it all looked delicious next time I will get food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-9cE__x-dKrirJ8H5qbK5SPvtBkjxl7jhmUYN&fid=0x0:0xdd6433021f91ef0f"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"Rafael Roxas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuME9XYISyLHuy1gVOg2Zkk_ruW_vCUxI-Wo8gAI38bFuNbA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really loved this lavender tea and brownie. Service was nice!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNYBTiutRfGM0WDvagmJCz6u5uAkIrZUyeSwww&fid=0x0:0xdd6433021f91ef0f"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Eddie So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISSdmRal6WEYNToT2BfCZQ0cdumKRhmtyRM82KD93UMkc0-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife asks me to go there for Big Bands and Bass on Sunday.  It's the first time that we have a drink there.
What a nice place to have a cup of coffee in a shady patio with flowers planters.
The staff are helpful and friendly.  The coffee, tea and baked goods are good too.
My wife takes many pictures since she likes the patio a lot.
The maple tree shady patio looks good in fall too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZhz0h2bCuU_ELupMyjqgDiehmSMEb8oPt0oU5&fid=0x0:0xdd6433021f91ef0f"],"When":"2022-7-25"},{"Name":"Nadia Sews","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVce5vkXrAQ97C2kR_b49Rd2eOBAQgVQu3KQkJ2KZAW8tKKLbR0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I mostly really enjoy this coffee shop. Nice ambiance inside and has a large patio outside. Coffee is good, the chocolate whipped cream is great.
Extremely disappointed by their fruit smoothies. Not a single piece of real fruit, so the ice melts within 5 minutes and you’re left with soupy juice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julian Tu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUccbSC4ghmImblBXURerAc5in7hUNzwjywsW9q13-eiHpFJ49c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Went here after a hike to relax with some friends.
Walking in place, it did look really nice and clean and spacious.
Though there isn't really a direction where to line up since there's 2 entrances.

Food looked good, but the bakery side we saw a fruit fly on so didn't look too pleasant.
Its normal though there should be a closing door so that this doesn't happen.

We got 2 drinks and the a panini, panini I found good and the drinks weren't too bad.

For sure you can taste the Espresso for the drinks which may be positive to coffee lovers.

There isn't an area to put plates back ,so we went up to give to staff instead. Didn't want to leave the plates on the table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMB1ex6s4rGcdgUrqV3cBDltrVkJFAfZII2ZpfC&fid=0x0:0xdd6433021f91ef0f"],"When":"2022-9-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"不羡仙Let's Play","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9jFXiat_5VlqessqqODl95Z60bvmkweY23MCGCJHNvN04PR4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A highly recommended restaurant, the manager is very nice, often coming over to chat and joke with us. I really like him. The food is simply outstanding; it feels like the best ribs and sandwiches I've ever had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7nNtmK2Y-DHg6AGQstTKo1RWKFHGxFKx717th&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Mauricio","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQCeBI__-ADFeb2mcVXcZfR_gWkXVdXNkNsI2olML3maTuNvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The brisket and burger were excellent, and the service was friendly, clean, and organized. However, the open table did not work for reservations; it is better to call them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPblNTAAIbnxtUJGRL-I_CL2jYfohW9QYEJxidX&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Soroush Izadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4msDfeVCmxhAyXYp-MC4amgs16Iw-whrXDzT2XXvTe58BdbXv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place deserves more than just five stars! The food is incredibly delicious, the staff is friendly and welcoming, and the atmosphere is fantastic with beautiful decor. Their accolades truly reflect their excellence. You all are the best! I will definitely be returning.🍺🌮🍖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOz5OB_XrjjZ5utZlQp68WH-G5RmaaNhFUI0kjo&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Lunch Vlogs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2Y9QETN3ZvCf6nTuIWwY8yyIg2r0SE4_QfsDgUYPXwSH1nw4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing BBQ. Waited over a year to come here and not disappointed. Best ribs I’ve had, brisket was incredible.

Friendly service and amazing smoke rings. Will be coming back to try everything on the menu. $5 all day beer too what a win!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPR6n05k7MS3ZAPG6x0oLHxBzLlW6PKtTHucElS&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Amanda Song","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ_386UL-HlNq9-UHDiJ3GhUuGmPHsCiTMMiJAaZJ5-sqcRSs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super nice food! Would come here again! Ordered the two meat combo and all tasted super delicious. Owner is super nice, love the vibe","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKLvRCCOONstAHzsvUq47oENhhx3tDLwYVEGwT&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"D S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiwZP5uC5CzBgSahQQVkTqGSd5rHWgB0GVCkCWen4FIy1S7JRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the platter for 4! Excellent BBQ ribs, chicken, beef brisket, fries, potato salad, beans, and corn bread.

Definitely recommend enjoying this for dine in or take out.

The other menus with cheaper prices are over 7 years old, I've posted the most recent as of May 2024, use those menus and note the current prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf3qjrcOONIeZVNVXz3KR3C7_a_eL2onK33s2h&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"C U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzSPBMxEzsF_wRao-B0ehPm0Kpk-alk1Mkg9m47N6NCeIvQISE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is really good but the prices to the portion size are pretty bad.  I paid $30+ for pulled pork and fries. When it came it looked alright but after I moved it around so my fries wouldn't get as soggy, the portion size was disappointing, it just looked like a lot when it covered the fries.. lies!!. Like come on. Also the corn bread muffin isnt the best. I don't recommend it for the $6","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGGUXQh58ndzAe4LA4pQUR_n-AB6jsFUSFEbEh&fid=0x0:0xbf897c463fd6a7f8"],"When":"2024-5-29"},{"Name":"Sima Abdollhapour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAcrIjeZeHy3U_8MQxpE7YHz2Xc-Rq_u5OEJqKiK9WR9mo0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for a spot that feels like a warm hug from a smoky grill, Smoke and Bones is the place to be! My husband, my son, and I had the pleasure of trying their brisket and ribs, and let me tell you—WOW. The brisket was tender perfection, and the ribs? Fall-off-the-bone magic!

Not only is the food fantastic, but the atmosphere is cozy, and the staff? Absolute legends. They make you feel like family.

Smoke and Bones, you’ve officially stolen our hearts (and our appetites). We’ll be back for sure—save us a rack!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Young Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpNM6WqgyVzwImloe26Ko9yV5KMEBx4K94CBDyme_CByRW3E3e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly and a great place to quickly eat solo without breaking the bank. Large pho for 12 dollars, free parking and fast service. I like it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsViGRk9KZTnbP6li6Hezhg5BndmOkMalwZfSq&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Maya Hawj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdiukAAS91dGdmV7h3MJWYA-dQ0VbqFr69PyniXN1PWofrSTvS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"When we walked in the place seems dim. He gave us water with no ice. The portion was small and food was just ok. Very disappointed and not satisfying after driving 8 hours from banff and doing a strenuous hike up grouse mountain .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPB8D6Gh6V9DQuzWn_lirAKHUXcFzvHLmmb6CbX&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2024-9-2"},{"Name":"A H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJT8z40fUvjQT9hIMOIyZ_AUsBstHaSnO1f5800Ra4Cjcaq3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went in around 1:15pm thinking it would be a quick lunch but waited for 45 minutes for 2 orders of pho soup noodles. How is this possible? I would have walked out but my partner was too polite to leave. Don’t bother going since the pho were not very good either when they finally showed up.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great quality and food was fresh and tasty. Great service and attentive. Place was clean and enjoyed our time. Price also reasonable. A good Pho spot in North Van and easy access and parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3pB9TgyemYW8H_e808uQbmrjCCM9lhsybHfyz&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2022-5-24"},{"Name":"Rylan Posehn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCX6xkshZODPCiOQCpXaqqZ4n5lc_a3qlrAyymgF5cvPI4F_s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Came for lunch on the way to work with 3 of my colleagues. We noticed the hours are 11-8pm, but despite 2-3 calls to the restaurant that went unanswered, we had to wait until 11:30 for them to open up. Upon placing our orders for a large house special pho, a large rare beef and beef ball pho, vegetarian noodle soup, the grilled bbq chicken on fried rice, and finally 2 Vietnamese iced coffees. After a standard wait for the first 3 dishes, we each found our food bland and a much smaller portion than anticipated after ordering the large size. The rare beef and beef ball pho only had 3 pieces of beef ball and the house special had little to no tripe. The vegetarian noodle soup kind you we all tried and collectively agreed it was blanched vegetables and noodles in hot water. This was my friend’s first time trying Vietnamese iced coffee and after waiting 15min for it to finish dripping he was shocked at how little there was. The chicken and rice dish showed up after we had all gotten through about 60% of our food and he had the same reflections: small portion, bland and generally just mid.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jas L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-wGL0FxtKVRqhWyt6ye_cadaPSL0NRJhRuHwCOSwPQ9c-WwDm7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a great place to eat, friendly staff and tasty Pho. Always my partner and my go to when it comes to Vietnamese. The meal in the photo is my favorite dish "BBQ pork with spring roll on noodle" it's the best thing since sliced bread! 10/10 would recommend.

Update: We still go here regularly, we never visit any other Pho place because they are just that good! The owner greets us every time and remembers who we are.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYqJVy42mrPdNM4nJbSn9xAlnMxzLLmRKXAkLM&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2017-8-11"},{"Name":"Lisa Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo79veLnsCvDCjha0TJoTathwJUFPajJepLVXdR9rXYCLOAi7D6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Very friendly staff and nice service!  Prices are good and food is flavourful!  Portions are not huge but are proportional to $.  Very nice stop for lunch on a snowy afternoon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDFvQntWkaUANrC4XQ2TKM5JAgS5kQWcft6Njr&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2021-2-14"},{"Name":"thomas rafuse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmkxBa59YNvqDOpO5OTpT3qOEpUUl_Cj3W4o2UjyMZ93SvQ5at=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I like to think I give a pretty honest reviews overall,sometimes customer service or food will greatly influence my opinion and here its the food. I ordered the spring rolls for 6.50 and slightly worried because thats a very good price. After receiving them i realised why they are so cheap.
The #1 spring rolls were very small and very,very bland.
The soup I ordered was a #23 beef balls and rare beef.
The large was big enough but i got 3/4 of one beef ball and weird little growths on the sliced beef. Didnt finish my meal...
I definitely wont be returning again and hope you use discretion when choosing a place with 4.5-5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUhNUPuoSkhXWN-ngbiLKcE7rUz_oVX6Z9Yr_J&fid=0x0:0x426e014edd98b51b"],"When":"2022-6-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munro Stuff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWj0Wcuk6ox5dfAeJ4fAaMbhX_F-nzzt3p5oc_f0hBd0NpbGSM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped by for a chicken noodle ginger soup. Appreciated that they had real bowls for onsite eating. Focaccia bun was a nice accompaniment. But the soup really didn't have any ginger or distinct flavours though it was hearty and filling.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjdcunIbadRiPxaTs6Za0cTU6izc8xBV9EMnL5&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Dora Xu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKF9gph4WC3mTRwr-miAAN2QBKmlVpGFI874L4ViuzHLl29xg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place, as a teen this is super affordable, usually there aren’t many people around so it’s really great to just sit and relax (with a bowl of soup). I come really often and recommend it to my friends who also find the soup very tasty. Only thing is, sometimes the balance between the soup and the vegetables in the soup isn’t quite right. Yummy either way but some days the soup leaves you very full because there’s too much content inside and some days it does not because there’s too much soup.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monica Glez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3YU5YCEHOH6RfLDdoBNeAfDdaY-PZ81kFz8bWoGFHRrolSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The taste of the soup is incredibly good! I got the Boston seafood chowder and it was one of the best chowders I’d ever have.
The price is between $6 to $13 depending on the soup and size. It includes a piece of bread and butter.
The only thing I will suggest is that the place looks a little bit dirty and messy and as is an open area it doesn't look fine for the customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWLlEDPGAK2EvI-43a_pY4M94M9WFTB6ViCtrWjJKBm9a9Lplp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We stopped in for a bowl of soup today.  On the menu was clam chowder and beef noodle soup. We both had the Manhatten Clam Chowder and it was delicious!  Highly recommend visiting this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgef0n5d7tc4Np0GR6dhHyIk4UUAlfXe_bM5zm&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2023-9-27"},{"Name":"mark green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOmXVVG_tBZdtiUCB7LhPq1NpPTQlgKDBWCaHTwf5CZdoGwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been a customer for A LONG TIME ,
Never again !!!!!
I came from kits (on bike) to get some soup , with my purchase they charged me for a cloth bag .
On my way home THE SOUP FELL OUT OF THE BOTTOM OF THE BAG ALL OVER THE  ROAD !!!!

The birds have food now !!??

I spoke to Hugo ? And explained what happened , he said he had never heard of that happening before , thanks for the wasted words ,
if you provide a service, MAKE SURE IT WORKS
customer service is a joke

I WILL NEVER BE BACK , but and I’ll make sure all of my friends and family never return","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpVgz9njq8OpT8W7-1_kbLczmHfDXkDVo62EA&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Andrew Fredericks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBT1QOeanTpBtlbaO932uXUw6u-VfjO_FqsPItm53WI4I6ODOB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When it comes to Chicken Noodle Soup, the portions of each ingredient is key.

Often enough at other places, the imbalance of chicken & noodles is disappointing.

But the soup i just got tonight, I was *pleasantly* surprised to see that there was no shortage of any ingredients in here.

Abundance of noodles, carrots, and chicken. This made my day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dvir M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxK6vUXIZPF_mBYpyYRstLoQm3iHWCiUkMzdVCeCCrurOmcIbk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Update to my review from 3 years ago. My previous review it’s just in the photos that I added here. I used to be there at least twice a week.

I’m sorry to say that nephew but something in my opinion is super wrong. Raising the price at least 30% and giving only 2 sizes that they’re almost half of what it used to be, it’s not making the place better. It makes it only more profitable!!!!!
The place is very sad and seems very slow. I’m not writing this review to make you feel bad. I just want you to know that there are too many changes that they made this place to look and feel super greedy.
Leave the fact that the taste is not the same. It still good soup. Look at the sizing that’s a whiskey glass, you put only 1/3 of the amount of the chicken in the chicken soup. Very disappointing. I heard it from other regulars that they said that it’s not the same and it’s a sad place and I could understand because of the circumstances. This place used to have a lineup all the time. I’ll be checking it again but probably in a year. Good luck with this","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5hKH21X0LsKGLaVI6t47s-BQrHwHLCtzbwyBo&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Alexia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1YONEVDbJfsxeNvizFy1mYI6lhGdw9JVAGDhQ6PKl6i4D3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the loaded potato soup is so delicious! the staff are also incredibly kind. will be coming back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPakGqCEQ20umvcGKP-GVNwio7b5yXbZfT_WFds&fid=0x0:0x539ada25717ea047"],"When":"2024-12-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aisha Jiffry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpdLW73ITbiHPDEnII5e6j97XBkjReXwYhxebCypyTVxyiBmKqnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our corporate year end dinner over here last night, and they went beyond expected service to accomadate us. Very well organized and we were taken care of amazingly. Shout out to our server for night Shayan! What a great job he did to manage 30+ people. Good food and great location! Keep up the good work","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgksqxyBJ4m0UTJFWnDh91ETq8wHd2mgVjCGey&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Elham Shahbandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8v0FqiWfwrKZlKpvymmkhzMYhJ-PBGxv_Ot_SbQhp9uNsQ3Yb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The best within four dishes which we ordered was egg plant dish. Shashlik was good but because of happy hour, only two pieces served. I have no idea how many pieces comes in a usual dish.
Unexpected and not welcoming service.. while we were dining the server started vacuuming the restaurant!!!! Unbelievably she was fixing her hair while she was cleaning cutlery!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0Jn7cdjev5PQXuThj_KArtsupbrtas2k_Qr3p&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Ghazal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUxPjakfUDfUlOphLX0NHrhY3j03bOfl1WB2qtK88VIEBoxSUc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went back to this restaurant after 5 years! The quality of the food is still very good and the portions are just right. We ordered Baghali polo with lamb shank and Chenjeh kabob for mains and both were really good.

The dough comes in a huge cup which is a plus. The Shiraz salad wasn’t traditional though. The vegetables were chopped too big and it was made with lemon juice instead of grape juice.

The patio is always nice and relaxing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML4xUT89SvvZfF8g540iQpPbrQc-9pnvmsUzIB&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Ryan Goodrich-Hurlbut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5XXtQFA63yhnJknOwudTWTXiRQFfKATpErVaQVSOUauEimK_i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for an impromptu lunch and had an amazing experience.

Our server Zeynab knew the menu very well and was able to identify which items would have been a problem for my nut allergy.

We started with the mirza ghasemi, and had the loghmeh and lamb shank to eat. Everything was spiced perfectly and came in very large portions.

Lastly, the patio was very pretty, especially considering that the restaurant is in a mall.

Would definitely recommend this place for anyone in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6fCVNrSR9ciewCbX9GaEY7Gh_2-yuSU0FC_Cj&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-6-25"},{"Name":"Yavar Nanbakhsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW81N2WiBda0sPseNqtrthpo6PtCwkZFXNiB4HrEDC9DTFdTcWJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great first experience! We recently visited from San Diego and had a wonderful experience. The owner was very welcoming upon arrival, and Mohammad did a fantastic job explaining the menu and ensuring we had everything we needed. The food itself was delicious, and the atmosphere was fantastic. We'll definitely visit here couple times before we head back home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxRT_Wf1I-f6bigykAKtjwTL3Tn78osHw6yKLo&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Jaeyeon Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt56D-XyBGBMhgvuCWEDwTLAAks9HnGVL67In3FH-5sarydX0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was such a lovely dinner! Zeinab was  a very friendly and professional server. She made our dinner just so much better! Very much appre iated with the service. The food was amazing and flavourful, the seating outside by the waterfall was just peaceful. It was a beautiful dinner. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmiRp73I7ecpPX9sFBH9jRTzVNu_xBJ693NLlh&fid=0x0:0x4944696c782d40"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Mahsa Salmani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX05Z4lUr_4z97v8vMXWgyILJc20EoiKAqii8laijZOVU86-Gmu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time at a Persian restaurant in Vancouver, and coming from Toronto, which has plenty of Iranian cuisine, Khaghan was an absolute delight! The restaurant has a charming ambiance with a wide variety of options on the menu. Even the menu design was so cute, adding a thoughtful touch to the experience. The staff were incredibly friendly, and since we visited as a large group, the owner himself welcomed us with tea and baklava. Overall, it was a fantastic experience, and I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Vancouver!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leyla Shahverdi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpGhfrKH89V6X0cmhlRvNn-faKUFLfAZuYalFNrU9HQhDlng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently had the misfortune of dining at khaghan with a big group, and I can confidently say it was one of the worst dining experiences I've ever had.
First off, despite having a reservation for a large group, our food took an eternity to arrive. We were left sitting there for what felt like ages.
To make matters worse, there was no kid's menu available not even a french fries. It was as if they had completely forgotten that families might dine there. When the food finally arrived, it was cold and tasted like it had been sitting out for hours. The quality was shockingly low . As for the service, it was just as bad as the food. Our server seemed overwhelmed and uninterested, forgetting our drink orders and taking forever to check on us.
Overall, Khaghan was a complete disaster. If you value your time, money, and taste buds, do yourself a favor and steer clear of this place!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Law Rence H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX-gD_1eapEh74OqyTe0YNfW1L_Xu19R2dfxMN8tNFSt7HowTh1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Capilano Market - A Hidden Gem!
Capilano Market in West Vancouver is an absolute hidden gem. This family-run deli and cafe offers some of the best sandwiches on the North Shore. The ingredients are always fresh and of the highest quality, making every bite a delight.
The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, perfect for a relaxing meal or a quick coffee break. The staff are friendly and attentive, adding to the overall positive experience. I highly recommend trying their signature sandwiches and freshly made pastries. The organic espresso is also a must-try!
Overall, Capilano Market is a fantastic spot for anyone looking to enjoy delicious food and great service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGNGx_c9rdRuHOd3oG0r68W7xrJ1KDAIYMeiMD&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Jason Brawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGJaU20iM-ZTxKU88Eh8aQ0G6FeQUBkbo4O84nuTWj3KUf3yIR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is clean, adorable, has easy parking out back, warm n’ friendly staff, a fantastic sandwich bar, and enough delicious baked treats to satisfy your craving. I forgot to take a photo of the baked treats, which included chocolate filled twists, their unique take on baclava, croissants, and delicious-looking squares. We shared the pesto pesto chicken sandwich, which was filled with delicious and fresh ingredients including arugula - my favourite green!

The chocolate chip cookies we got were a perfect way to wrap up the meal, and we’ll definitely be back to try their breakfasts, or for another snack after a Grouse Grind. I can’t think of another spot in the whole area for food this good when you don’t have a lot of time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNY9fS1EfbPe_CJ4nZVsiCuAGGXjd2J-FO8WpRi&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-6-24"},{"Name":"Oscar Soto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWidy40c-AxD-sN2WIt_5otWLDpyFVwukAS-5FK714GmPk1vpKO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great, little place. The food was great and the staff were super nice and friendly. We liked it so much that we went for breakfast 2 days in a row.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHKdkw86IfW6OakHrH7sQGj25ntwoOz_Qqz58C&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Bronson & Sherri Gordon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXepSD6RRDKq4T6pFr5FPdSHuHMSELUYNVkndVu5HohVssTgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm in vancouver for work.  Came here for breakfast as it's close to my hotel. Ordered  a salmon bagel, almond croissant and tropical smoothie.  Absolutely amazing and fresh ingredients.  Staff are so friendly.  Definitely must try this place","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe5RQtHwAX7-FfXd5F3ivR6bd3e-GeGyXGXJI&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"Renata Cuesta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUi1OZYozy2KWuc3OOo2NmLWXN5QMuEhyMFQJVNNoggeF6I7PE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite place in North Van! This guys know what an exceptional customer service is. Thanks for always make my Flat White amazing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZ_CXewY1w9bQbP05YfGMyQqSlK14-HXqmpBgM&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Shafhan K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0MotrSYuJTGE_hu-qTtZ6HKseKq665Uoe-tltW_cbl_atAeog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled upon this bakery on my short stay in North Vancouver. First day had the chocolate and almond croissant ( baked in store). They were absolutely delicious and so filling.

On the second day had a rotisserie chicken sub and was amazed at how good it was. They took a bread roll and then threw it in a Panini press. Made it like a crispy flavor explosion in my mouth.

Fresh ingredients, amazing prices and good people. Definitely worth a visit. ❤️❤️❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvcfhODyLFgNxAKO6LIIkfx982nXTiUaulGFSE&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2023-12-31"},{"Name":"laura altamira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqsd4-hj1dwBuz0QWrVQfjO09W_7xB7tOb6HlgkrTjG6BGXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm visiting Vancouver. I found Capilano Market on my way since I'm staying closed by. I got a very well made bagel with smoked salmon, cucumber 🥒, 🍅, 🧅 and cream cheese with spinach.  😳 Wow, it was delicious 😋. I had a cappuccino and I went to eat it on the small patio outside to enjoy the beautiful sunny ☀️ morning. The two ladies in the counter are stellar. Great customer service and the best bagel I have had so far. I'll come back tomorrow. If you are nearby, a visit is worth it. 😋😊👍💯","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5ROxp9wEfSSAumkC4tbztfrFfCHjp-sIACVC7&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Jonathan Aguilar Vargas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZe8LoqJQZH6auHrkYXAeY0tSVckC1MzvdbLfKtsLmCGvuR1Nnxg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place, nice music (80s music 🎶)

**5 Stars**

This deli cafe in North Vancouver offers the best customer service in town. The team of Latinas and Persians creates a perfect match, bringing exceptional hospitality and diverse flavors. Their sandwiches are outstanding, packed with fresh ingredients and rich flavors. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhYz8ci8oEMkzu1AdLpLimZBj7eNyGyJjpD5oZ&fid=0x0:0x162cf6f6d66cccff"],"When":"2024-6-22"}]

title: Lion Hot Pot Ltd
address: 1356 Marine Dr, North Vancouver, BC V7P 1T4
descriptions: A menu specializing in Chinese hot pots & fare with homey feeling interior details & Asian decor.

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Stephanie McLean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqkPwBw645p-tz9vezhFNKVn9g0tCJsiPZZaUkzz3IJ90nGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love hot pot. With a large group, it allows everyone to choose what they want, flavour wise.  Since covid, it gives people peace of mind by offering individual portions (your own pot vs sharing).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDb42ReXQ-zpDnNgIvPMRBp3E3vxCXfvg1ZRc\u0026fid=0x0:0x279f73b48868f4f7"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Ajanth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNW-Zk2YtWMoP3B4MhYISJOCZHaCNu-8GchF8nHYQ29uqUVA_I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing restaurant with great dishes. Tons of vegetarian and vegan options. I got braised tofu, stir-fried bok choy, and sautéed potatoes/eggplants. Everything was delicious. Definitely worth the visit. I do wish they had more vegan friendly entrées.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8Mhyi_zWfdVm15oLqNYLeYqFQBBfYYc-zQMdM\u0026fid=0x0:0x279f73b48868f4f7"],"When":"2023-10-16"},{"Name":"Ted Bonazew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUX7aHHx-zQ2JUqNEGCIV3V5kgH1xs0Nv1ykBEDYpPoLB5sBBRpNA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got to try this little hidden gem, we've passed by this place for years and spoken about trying it out sometime, well last night was the night!! First of all, do not judge this place by the look of the exterior of the building, the interior is quite nice  and inviting. This was our first Hot Pot experience, so we were unaware on how the whole.process worked, but the server/owner walked us thru from start to finish :-) great first Hot Pot experience over all and  we look forward to our next visit. They have quite the extensive traditional Chinese stir fry dishes along with their Hot Pot menu","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtRGKNJz9pdxX9VpmINVeoAyRtAzoPrn1_gvOD\u0026fid=0x0:0x279f73b48868f4f7"],"When":"2023-6-17"},{"Name":"신시아","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQPszHjVvdwl5g8GOGVakLnqE7Kht1Vjv0Lyq5W6rAeMfXnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was so expensive compared to its quality and quantity. Hotpot vegetables were not various and some part of cabbage was black since it's not fresh, beef was frozen, poor quality. I don't understand why it has to be this expensive even.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"pratyusha mungara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkm2dv403IcKF0xCEjJhDrz5Tz1_ZtuqBFtfap75jfQQP6r1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We've gone here thrice. The food is excellent. We tried the mushroom and vegetarian hotpots, as well as the ala carte ordering for mapo tofu, friend rice and some cauliflower. All delicious!!! Highly recommend the place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vj Grimes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEQq7UJV3_HYa2qJdPJuE4ubH5DEHwxUb-o_uX7LlEorSCJgMn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lunch, Sa Sep 21, 2024. Driving Marine, a 1HR parking in front but--partner notice a sign, PARKING IN REAR. Wanted to try Lion Hot Pot, errands today, nabbed a parking spot, for a GREAT lunch. Ordered with help of server--hot pot, and beef udon dish, exactly right amount for 2 of us. Flavour sauce was so good. You sprinkle meal items into the simmering hot broth, you remove and dip them, Mmm! Spicy was an option. The place was empty Saturday lunch; they deserve to do well. I figure an adventurous GROUP to take up half the place as a nice gathering place? Nice person serving, helpful, calm and efficient. They may do well by pickup and delivery, though hot pot is all fresh. A very nice lunch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPwkUzkCHz1nMszTewEpvCYQvX3EPEQ4cJhQQ8wz0ERTmkPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in hungry after visiting Capilano Bridge. Was warmly greeted and helped with what to order. Wound up getting shrimp and beef hot pot and fried rice. Generous portions and authentic tasting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samantha Bacchus McLeod","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYiRIvy_TuMch5JQY-yF_gsT_IZst0-J--PuSw8Il6loRANjyf=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Literally walked into this shady looking stand alone lil shop and was blown away by the interior, food and service! We did not have the hot pot (that will be soon with a big crowd). The place is clean, the service is great, and the food reminds me of Hong Kong food. Hot and Sour soup was tasty, spicy and just sour enough to keep us slurping it up. The fast fried noodles was so good we cleaned the plates. Loved it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkXfwaAHhD5FGKIHQzmA6cWrMrDSw9ldIcJ3Go\u0026fid=0x0:0x279f73b48868f4f7"],"When":"2018-11-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"farzod darzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6S_yag_YL4YiZjd4sFjFB-maQTEZb8UDuM1Z0oL02xjRA8mT7AA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Persian stuffed pizzas are the star of the show, I recommend chatting with the staff and narrowing down what your favorite pizza will be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfAOda20-jZxcssuUBP_KddT6wtxzxt1rC2QLU&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Jaihoon Samizada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnZHRhx5ymDK8XJys6vp86gmtnh921AsAgdjqyI9kbgDqkhE54=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing! The Persian halal pizza is a delightful fusion of flavors. The combination of perfectly spiced meat, fresh herbs, and creamy cheese creates an explosion of taste in every bite. The crust is crispy yet soft, and the ingredients are incredibly fresh. Highly recommend this unique and delicious pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlGTVzxZHy4sm6Ce3aKZxHDNC-mOr_9T96PtE&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Markpaul Chohan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrD8dECOcxgoYqats6HPO66Wej2zy86MigkLafH4cIc6IJbBLTlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Crispy Delight Pizza truly offers something special with their authentic Persian-style pizza. You can really taste the quality in every bite, and their delicious toppings make it even more enjoyable. I wholeheartedly recommend trying the roast beef pizza—it's so flavorful and satisfying! You won’t be disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nassim Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCKClBCR3tdYgXbqwu8QjPtkDiPrgV4O4J0hWS_gwXJG-z-rcMrw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was amazing! If you’re searching for an Iranian taste of fast-food. We tried steak & garlic pizza and Cocktail Tanoori. The bread really tasted like Tehran bread. The thyme was good quality and generous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYbTwNa6VC9lp2CwyLlOKMLQhCWzcfq3mjiedq&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-1-1"},{"Name":"Elnaz Khanbabakhany","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNoVDqcRvdEGrG9pV6BptKIkW4quuOO9zasPuGWQPa9OzfcF5oKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Yesterday I ordered from Crispy via DoorDash and had an extremely disappointing experience. The Pizza I received was of very poor quality: half of it was overcooked while the other half was undercooked. It was clear that the ingredients were not fresh. To make matters worse, I ended up getting food poisoning from the meal. I would not recommend this restaurant to anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRWpIlNFRSPgNNvfwjvWJj4Bz1uBbkGwOcDhGW&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Hamed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViJ9EznENDd1HeEqpUkYuqmZFdKwptQI-w0AYNvWdb_l07iQpU7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It was after a few years that I tried this place. We ordered a large specialty pizza and ask them to do t half- half chicken /roast beef.
I have to say the specialty pizza was not that tasteful. And definitely lacking some cheese on topping as seen in the picture. But apart from that overall a good pizza place to try out that gives you that Persian style pizza experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoY3O3VPp9eE4HeB0H6X-XGt3sFmpZAzXjc0pT&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2023-4-18"},{"Name":"Rosie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpCKZpLxgzjkRJCBS_N5zfkP1Zj2bxX57YdySagUsEtPJHeCI6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The closest you’re going to get to authentic persian pizza in Vancouver! Even the vibe of the restaurant made me feel like I was in Tehran. Large portion for the amount you pay which is a bonus. The owner is very kind and accommodating, and took time to explain the various toppings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoXrk5e7NG7H1-Dn0bWUg4g8qxxRBQmJfZZqnp&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Fatemeh Sayadi (Tisha)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUT0iXGjcmugjaf-sxnw_j5g7IpzISbK9kqKoWSQpUn_JCfvpEr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved it there, definitely coming back. Everything was perfect, felt like home. The staff are super friendly.

Update: Just wanted update my review and mention that the quality and the taste is still the same. Every time we come here, we have great experience. Somehow the quality is better every time we come here.

The special house crispy is the best, if it is your first time trying their meals. Bandari is so good too, it has a special sauce which seems homemade to me and it’s perfect.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7Cuvu83Eh_wGlg9ZEFdt5Dk4By8dLiyD6KUsX&fid=0x0:0x16275516d4db4756"],"When":"2022-6-12"}]
