user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah Voigt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2EAzNUoldOuornM0o1FWcMCe2M-MNDmiD2zAZmG7vRX_TfBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Pork belly BLT was fantastic. Service was great. Would easily be a 5 star review, except this place smelled a little funky. Came in for lunch shortly after they opened, not sure if they wiped down our table with a dirty rag or something? Smelled a bit rank. The food was worth it though. Would still return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVgvcMbm3xyi5SGboIVrdGZu8OnXEQRNMzrnTU&fid=0x0:0xc836aabea2a7f4a0"],"When":"2018-10-23"},{"Name":"Hansel Y.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-QxmV8dw7zrHwCMKrRosFXvF9DqVIbTEe3WJk1Y5yjTMyy33Xdw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Large group of us were there last night.  Service was excellent. We felt well taken care, even though there was 13 of us.  Food was excellent. Frenched Tomahawk Pork Loin was flavorful and mouthwatering.  Lamb feature was really good, no gamey flavor like you would expect from lamb.  Chilli Fried Squid appy had a nice balance of heat (not too spicy) laying on a little bit of aioli. It provided a nice balance.   Portions are quite big and you will leave feeling satisfied.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP72KRQeRbIQQFyU32X5If_apTCbeVgVNJtvf4_&fid=0x0:0xc836aabea2a7f4a0"],"When":"2019-2-17"},{"Name":"Martin Vondruska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi3ZGJ6EsjMivvSIzJounUcRIMlDUrFywXlcIm7DvKGLACKs1Vcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Tomahawk- need I say more?!?
Small cozy restaurant on mid Lonsdale that has some good eats.

Had the tomahawk pork chop which was done super tender. Good size too.

Tried the chocolate creme brûlée... was good but it’s not worth messing with something that’s already perfect.

Staff were attentive and friendly. And the food came out fairly quick.

Worth checking out","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn4nsXXYXQnXmXkZCfdlM6NU7etyJN9eYY3kOn&fid=0x0:0xc836aabea2a7f4a0"],"When":"2019-2-10"},{"Name":"Mehr Poulad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnMmsASCmXLOvaFhR1RoQ03vxNx7oVUBdwy_npEYvb7k7uZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is amazing, service is amazing, you should eat here.
Ordered the lamb rack and it was juicy, cooked right and delicious. Gavin our server was attentive, professional and on the ball.
Will go back many times to eat here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8WoWe9DUVw9bC4Rrg-ZkQuhxWV3UmjyWcKoR3&fid=0x0:0xc836aabea2a7f4a0"],"When":"2019-12-23"},{"Name":"Alex N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJp9oY8yIRcZliYwrtBbr8QyspodFH7IaqOFKyaG29fNpXChQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing! We shared a few appetizers; portly fried chicken, scallops and pork belly, chilli fried squid. The plating here is exceptional, but the food and flavour just hit it out of the park!

The braised pork belly was melt in your mouth. Definitely recommend.

We also had the carbonara and it was amazing.

We were so surprised to be wowed. But the entire staff and chef have such attention to detail. We came with our two young kids and they were very accommodating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHx19EVwQCM5uRLv-oURW0UGAfnSB_nwqqDNsm&fid=0x0:0xc836aabea2a7f4a0"],"When":"2018-4-21"},{"Name":"Kim Ford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoguY48LiWeV4OhSi70embTJy69BEaYoZCgwghGLtOGOyAG4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had the special main and dessert and they were the best food on this trip and quite a few others for that matter. So good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYpFYEONAUPS7P0X5fbR_RS2nhnh2U4dqyUSbD&fid=0x0:0xc836aabea2a7f4a0"],"When":"2019-8-19"},{"Name":"David Staples","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLMpt8tdtgnYfk6EITlwiP4wmFuI06oQQHk7CD3LkYdPg7I44=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic food, excellent service, and a lovely space. A must try for anyone looking to get a great meal in North Van.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqhdsN2f9qiIwQ7Zgba_gAtuAgEoJ285pqnD28&fid=0x0:0xc836aabea2a7f4a0"],"When":"2018-4-28"},{"Name":"Howie Outerbridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ9H49itZHCe-8Dhwoh6HMFBASzu5T6UiZiB-T5Oe7Y_2E6aFPCg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fantastic food, loved the escargot...and lamb...and creme brûlée. Will go back again for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd7tNRk5_zJSvfSrorvLW64aWbjNJeF6giKt5q&fid=0x0:0xc836aabea2a7f4a0"],"When":"2019-9-29"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Craigs list","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlJ1iW94sYT378oKpb8m--E1YG532GPK0nbr-MJuVJK-U2hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I ordered the mac\u0026beef for take out and there was barely any beef for the price this is a total rip-off. what you get for  $26 is a small mac \u0026 cheese with a frosting of beef.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMORuPR_QAJfprfaJS9f6IfIxuWJwnBthnp40jY\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b4da59d14bf6912"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"shark 50","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ1hEiXNbIz4hpSVYqchXsLc8PkTC1Y0hBspNGQWOiquI3AdY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Underrated and the food is incredible my favorite pasta place. Please add more dishes though. Very good customer service always kind. And the atmosphere is cozy and nice. Good for your family will come again. Can be a little pricey though highly recommend it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leo Denham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKs010LDoetb5zXRfqCOKhXkvziIt-X46c8ms679fzPnft8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming to this place for the last two years. it is my go to pasta place for whenever i am craving pasta. i can assure you, this place is amazing i highly recommend it. The best dishes to get are the garlic bread if you are a garlic lover this is a god send. the next dish would be the seafood spinner absolutely amazing, amazing flavour overall this place doesnt have a bad dish everything is great here service is and always has been really good even when they were renovating. i would give this place a higher rating if i could.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVc9xvCUaFr5V-C_7vdjyD79hKbQROov63W80Cf0lEqxIW_-H0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This used to be my favorite place for pasta. Just ordered from there and the quality was terrible . My daughters meal was prepared differently than it has been in the past and when she exchanged it for something else they wouldn't refund the $10 difference. I will not be ordering from there again and I will not recommend to anyone i know.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Veronica Shields","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlaThxGO9AcZxrbDPhzxTnUA7_7jZVppEuMLHOuoUFPT3OoVcWBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great little bistro! Excellent food, good wine list, courteous and friendly staff, good service. We'll definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erin Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJMqhS4UsBafKuJyVuo3xVfLILz6zGwMZr0DhXSZ4RdRWqacM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Service was pretty bad while we were there today for a late lunch. We were the only table there. still it was hard to get the waitress’ attention. We weren’t offered ice in our water initially (in a hot day like this??!) and then we ran out of water a few times. My bill came out wrong but at first the waitress was adamant that it was not. I insisted and the waitress went to double check, and it turns out that it was wrong.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sanford Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM9xZMssfnzjoxDk_lE7GV5HXfXnHzYNMx4GiFw0W5okfRWfg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dinner at InGrain was a wonderful experience. Greeted by modern, simple decor and an attentive waitress, I felt welcome at this restaurant. The menu is simple but I believe in the quality of every item on it. You can tell the effort the kitchen goes to make the food so delicious. I loved the pasta, from texture to taste. The sauce was also made excellently, providing an amazing meal. The price is very reasonable for the food and service available here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBWuyL9b2solujifFgqXlI2z4hy0h_MYZqkXBW\u0026fid=0x0:0x8b4da59d14bf6912"],"When":"2018-6-24"},{"Name":"Michelle Cox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMLvTiOB-6QrjL75iAdbYIER3Rq4cBst0Ua3YFBbFyd0EYGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for a birthday lunch the other day.  The service was excellent and the food was delicious! They even acknowledged the birthday with a lovely treat!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Crystal's View Bed & Breakfast
address: 420 Tempe Crescent, North Vancouver, BC V7N 1E6
descriptions: Refined rooms with city/ocean views in a refined B&B with a garden, plus 3-course breakfasts.
about: null
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sabrina Toms-Ethier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfW47IhFClfGaT7HaOr3QwyWOmLrJYp0OsUfkkdrNjCEyIZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Crystal’s View Bed and Breakfast is amazing! The rooms are luxurious and the spa like baths with epsom salts is a wonderful addition. Crystal and her husband are true hosts. Crystal’s cooking is 5 stars! View is incredible. You will not be disappointed if you choose to stay here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6YS7ZIAOFjE_4ExYjGMoyvrQLJL-Wq2SbIRaB&fid=0x0:0x6ac250a39350d049"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Phil Wallace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEUQYSnNwSBl6FO4rjRFLoC0h7Y3B5J6-gzEsMKvRO93oAJw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot think of sufficently complementary words to adequately describe my stay at Crystal's View. First of all it is CLEAN! Secondly, the owners are accomplished tour guides. Their suggested points of interest made our vacation one of our most memorable. If you're in Vancouver, CA - this is the place to stay!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marlie Abangan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqFKMFJPqFAjWHqu5LHgE4zaTMs6rKzyk-DtJs1hMW0tz18NQX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We called this beautiful place our home away from home for 5 days!
Crystal and John were very welcoming, helpful and made our stay very enjoyable.  Crystal helped book for our Victoria Island day trip, gave suggestions on what to see and do and when they found out that we were going on a cruise for the first time, gave us some tips that were applicable then.
This place is situated in a quiet neighbourhood, the room/s were clean, comfortable bed and you can see Vancouver downtown from our window! Breakfasts were freshly cooked with most ingredients from their garden. What more could you ask for?
We have no hesitation in recommending this beautiful place and the owners are amazingly friendly and very helpful.  They will ensure that you have fun and enjoy your stay.
We will book with them again if the opportunity comes to be back in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPs73EQ4UqP-6DxjCp-e5RAp8h9cOyBbZH58-g&fid=0x0:0x6ac250a39350d049"],"When":"2023-10-19"},{"Name":"Jean Gerstner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQtB6cDRLCeiXIlEpWYPMSLlIvSs75pdxZGAKSvqb1b8l2SQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you for our wonderful stay in North Vancouver!  We appreciate your warm hospitality Crystal!  You truly care about your guests and it shows!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lee R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QdVsxDWqDDLG62Q3M3dmLlHORJs5jz0NWRJO3cP21KtRNPfosO7RpofjnbUgpyNjOTDew=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"We have stayed at bed and breakfasts and hotels in 27 countries together and travelled and stayed at several at places across the United  States. Crystal's View Bed and Breakfast in North Vancouver is by far the most beautiful, elegant, yet comfortable home we have ever stayed, and beautifully decorated. Crystal and John are by far the best hosts we have ever encountered. They are extremely personable, fun to be around and have the most excellent service we have ever received at a bed and breakfast. Crystal's cooking is comparable to any other gourmet breakfast. Their property, inside and out to include the rooms are immaculate. Crystal's BnB is impeccably maintained as is the inside of each room of their house. We not only enjoyed their company, and our accommodations , we plane to make Crystal's our place to stay whenever coming to Vancouver. |If you love small venues, Crystals is the place to stay!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Freedom16281264330","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QcoKrjftg2H5FSPDgamEji1HcAj6KJIMYEaB28IfM5URISpFokTGJ4TKCMmdB7Et-p_0g=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"You would be crazy not to snatch up this opportunity to stay at Crystal’s B&B! From the moment we arrived, Crystal made us feel like family. I felt an instant connection to her and that continued throughout our stay. My husband and I spent two fabulous nights in the luxury suite! The views are spectacular!! And the huge soaking bathtub with the jacuzzi jets… amazing!! From Crystal’s recommendations of places to visit and restaurants to try, we had the best time. Each morning we were greeted with a delicious homemade breakfast with fresh fruit and bakery and a mouthwatering entree. Have I mentioned how terrific our stay was? Stop scrolling and book immediately! I promise you won’t be disappointed!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carolyn Futtner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEn-z79YrPVH7z1v3g7HuhRl0_bdNAjhfnJIebVqW6DsA2M1D9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first trip to Vancouver and we stayed here for three nights.  Having been through the COVID times, we have become a little anti-social, so bed and breakfast was a bit of a risk for us. But I am so glad we chose Crystal's.  I cannot rave enough about this gem.  From the moment we arrived, we felt as if we were at home with family. We had a couple questions regarding accommodations which were answered and addressed immediately, and kindly as if we weren't being a pain in the butt (which I was a little worried we were being a bit high maintenance--but we were never made to feel this way)  Our first night Crystal arranged and made reservations for dinner with our daughter who lives in the city.  The breakfasts were incredible. I have never had poached eggs before, but ever since eating Crystal's, I cannot stop eating them. The room was so comfortable and beautiful--with a gorgeous view of the City.  Since our daughter lives here, we will obviously be back to Vancouver and will stay here EVERY SINGLE TIME---there is just no choice to be made.  Cannot wait to go back--and will be recommending this to other family and friends traveling to the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOT5Bc6rusS9ybkEqtUUECkY7FWmu__MM-KdmUD&fid=0x0:0x6ac250a39350d049"],"When":"2023-11-11"},{"Name":"Oleksandr P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/local-reviews/AJMZ0QfCm-MBS7Itwd4h-55xcyygsVKq1IZbUTNyg17UKkQsT2C3oSXBlQ_-pGTl8imnrFVtVw=s120-c-br100","Rating":0,"Description":"My name is Oleksandr and I stayed here with my fiance Aishwarya on 4/29-4/30. I would recommend this bed and breakfast to every person visiting Vancouver. Crystal and her husband are the most amazing host and made us feel like we were staying with our own family. The B&B is gorgeous and has a wonderful atmosphere. The view was lovely and the breakfast made by Crystal was delicious. Crystal was very kind and helpful with recommendations for places we should visit. I cannot say enough good things about this place!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"mohammad reza yousefi darestani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsy8CJRnn1CcomsiOhYyyjYhOlusGo_zB0m7tBxqTptjJMlMxS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 Stars – Fantastic Food and Excellent Service!

My family and I had a wonderful dining experience at Pomegranate in Deep Cove. We ordered the pizza and burger, and both were absolutely delicious! The quality of the food was outstanding, with fresh ingredients and perfect flavors. The service was equally impressive—attentive, friendly, and right on time. The staff truly made us feel welcome, and we appreciated the promptness of everything. If you're in the area, I highly recommend stopping by for a fantastic meal. We’ll definitely be coming back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sagar mahla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPYX3KHhJl4gqJe_6G1q2Bd0WF6R4ghufa7Gzv2_idY4gp8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited Pomegranate Restaurant and ordered pizza, which turned out to be a huge disappointment. The pizza had the cheapest, store-bought base, topped with nothing but basic tomato paste. It tasted worse than a frozen pizza, yet it was priced at an outrageous $23. For that amount of money, one would expect a freshly made pizza base, not something that feels mass-produced and low quality. I will never return to this place again. The quality was incredibly poor and not worth the price at all.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_xaCkezD0Zp3fdhFeu_h136Jv7cWur4pBcDg6&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Usman USI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbMG17262mDE18bbJW_RD28PaWd5-X0d02KHtLAat3j6g6PqCO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"It was alright. Nothing out of the ordinary. My cousin’s favourite spot, though he mentioned that the quality has decreased since the son took over the business.

Makes sense since the master chef makes their dish like none other. Very overpriced relative to what you get, very small fries portion too. Would not go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5fHN6oLVOcz89cT5JByHGnGPJbnA_tK-nF9Xz&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2022-7-19"},{"Name":"Keith Ver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVdqxLCf1LEt0AU82myo-eUqDcb2LcbdnfhupJTEW0sPAQ-qQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the few restaurants we visited when we were in North Van! If I remember correctly, I think it was the owner who served and cooked our pizza - AND IT WAS GOOD! Being able to see the owner prepare the whole thing was definitely the charm of the restaurant for me! Looking forward to coming back and trying their other dishes soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAGG0TCeY2ByEQUmVlF6aXjDTk3RuaQFfWMWzM&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2023-6-1"},{"Name":"Amar Shah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKowN3tGXOqBDfEHvl0-4YjOSSJ0dbfPt-HZm4ZXYf8HJSLFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"oh heck! I don't know where to start from. first of all, the owners and chefs made great personal relationships with us! secondly omg the burger!!!!!!! even though it's pricey it was so worth it. these burgers they make is so unique. and also the pizza! we ordered 8 pizzas I think. and boy, it was so tasty! I have decided everytime I go to deep cove I'm going back to this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxsl15q-3iFfETHNonp4VNs8o9PtICphJjuWPy&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2018-6-17"},{"Name":"Sukhpal Sall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkPv4fTd5APKQH29j_BziP8NJxRv1CFyH98VwsHK5Vub-87w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We recently went to Pomegranate Grillhouse & Cafe on July 27th, 2024. We were very disappointed from the service, the food, the communication from the store owner. We were charged $46 for 2 burgers and 2 fries. We asked why the fries were so little less than the Happy Meal from McDonalds and his answer was "i follow my rules, if you don't like it then don't come". We personally think, this old man doesn't care about customers and i noticed not much cleanup in the kitchen entrance area. I think this place needs to be inspected for safety. I would not recommend this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Kepkay • Vancouver Real Estate Today","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJaguQP22OtWiYJoI6jEXyGEyQ9JUOqQIvkT5i6uFHFxJVRTqz7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What I love about the Pomegranite Grill is that the food is homemade and tastes like the chef takes the time to make sure the burgers and tasty and juicy, the fries crispy and the pizza crust just right. The atmosphere is friendly and unassuming. It’s an awesome Deep Cove restaurant that you should visit after a kayak or hike.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwwbq1SqlaoDzXjhVjfueWAK555zf1w-xYS94R&fid=0x0:0xffb63d0c8b6cba7f"],"When":"2022-6-15"},{"Name":"sara pourjavad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqWvs0BWJpOiMN_fQTkARtOmSiarAkZM2nk73rYNZOFMgn2N4n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have very tasty burgers and the apple pie was also very tasty, the vegetable pizza was also very tasty, the owner of the shop was very kind, we will definitely come back to eat the burger again.","Images":null,"When":""}]
